item.text: thabs lam rim gyis ston pa sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho bzhugs so//
dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs rang
bzhin// rdul snyed 'dus pa'i ngo bo ni// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ye shes rgya mtsho dpag med kyi// yon tan rdzogs pa'i ngo bor gnas// 'og min chen po'i gzhal
yas khang// rgyal ba kun gyi b+ha ga'i gnas// yon tan kun rdzogs dga' ba'i klong// tshad med ye shes chos dbyings kyi// ngo bos kun nas 'khyil ba la// tshad dpag med pa'i
yon tan rgyas// rnam thar bzhi yi sgo khyud mdzes// 'dod yon lnga yi phreng bas brgyan// rnam thar brgyad kyi rta babs can// zla ba'i phreng bas mdangs phyung zhing// nyi zla pad+ma'i
gdan steng na// lnga phung dag pa'i sangs rgyas ni// rgyal po lnga zhes rnam par bstan// 'byung ba lnga yi rgyal mo dang// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi yi// rnam par
'phrul pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rnam shes dbang po yul dang dus// phyi nang sems dpa' yab yum rnams// rang rang mdog dang cha lugs rnams// bcu gsum cha lugs sgeg pa
yis// nyi zla 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs// lus kyi chos bzhi 'joms pa ni// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang// btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshul dang bcas// 'bar zhing rngams pa'i
tshul gyis bzhugs// ye shes rgya mtsho 'og min gyi// yon tan rdzogs pa'i ngo bor bstan// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte ba la// bdag po kun bzang 'khor lo bskor// bka' sdod skyes
bu mdun na gnas// brjod pa med bzhin go bar mdzad// dpag med ye shes yongs rdzogs pas// zhing 'khor longs spyod phun sum tshogs// dga' bde yang dag rdzogs pa'i gnas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi
rdzogs pa yi// ma lus 'dus pa'i gzhal yas khang// bdag po rgyan dang bcas pa nyid// 'jig rten gnas kyi 'og min las// nyis 'gyur shin tu spags pa'i gnas// dngos po'i mtha' gsum las 'das

pa// ma spangs rgyan rdzogs gzhal yas khang// yon tan lnga yi bdag nyid de// gru bzhi spyi bos 'khyil snang ba// de bzhin thugs kyi khyad par las// rang snang rgyal ba sems sogs dang// dang po'i sangs rgyas
sar rgyal ba// sems dpa' chen po 'joms pa che// brjod kyi mi langs tshad med dang// rnam gnyis tshul du bzhugs pa'o// 'khor gyi nang nas skal mchog ldan// 'dul ba'i dus babs gsang ba'i

bdag/ lag na rdo rje bsdu ba mdzad// de tshe dus kyi mtha' bral phyir// ngo bo dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid// rgyal ba'i sems dpa' rnal 'byor pa// dgongs pa rig pa rna bas brgyud// gsang ba'i snying po de kho

na// nyid de nges pa'i dbyings nas phyung// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// bstan pa rgya mtsho sems kyi lung// rang byung rang snang dgongs pa nyid// byin rlabs dgongs pa rang shar ba// sems nyid rang snang
gzugs can te// rtog ge byis pa'i yul min pas// rgyal sras sems dpa' rang nyid la// nyid la 'chad cing nyid kyis 'grel// gsang mdzod sgyu 'phrul drwa ba 'di// bstan pa kun gyi rtsa ba
ste// rang byung ye shes gcig pu nyid// ma lus thams cad khyab par gsal// gsal ba'i thig le chen po ni// yon tan lhun rdzogs bdag nyid de// d+harma tsakra chos kyi gnas// 'od bzhi e sogs dbyibs su
gnas// mi shigs thig le waM dbyibs can// rang la bde ba gsal byed bdag/ ma nu yid sogs rnam shes bzhi// ye shes myong bas bsdus par bshad// ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs skyes pa// pa ra mAr+tha don

zab mo// bde ba'i dus nyid snga phyi bral// dus gsum kun gyi ngo bor gnas// rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas b+ha ga nyid// las dang yon tan rdzogs pa'i gnas// thig le byang chub sems nyid de// rang byung ye shes
kun gyi bdag/ chags pas khyab pa'i yid can la// rtog bcas mnyam du gnas pa'i 'khor// lhan cig skyes pa'i bde chen no// brjod pa med pa'i tshul gyis myong// byed pa rlung gi mtha' bsdus pas// ma lus
lhan cig skyes par shar// dus la 'jug rtog med pa'i dus// bde chen btags pa zad pa'i dus// rgyal ba'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// gang la gang ltar der 'dul ba'i// spyod pa rgya mtsho de nyid de// dpag
med ye shes ngo bor shar// dus gcig yon tan lhun rdzogs pas// mnyam nyid res 'jog med par gnas// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang
po'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid// de nyid bshad pa'i dgongs pa yis// 'jug pa'i bde ba mnyam sbyor bas// ro gcig mnyam pa'i ngo bor gyur// phyogs
bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa// gcig pu du mar dbyer med pas// dgongs pa'i byin rlabs nyid la nyid// brjod cing gsungs pa'i don nyid ni// phung po khams dang skye mched dang// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus
pa// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// lhag pa kun rdzob nyid brjod pas// rgyal mchog btsun mo rang bzhin gyis// rgyal ba'i tshogs la dbang bsgyur zhing// phyogs bcu snod bcud ma lus pa// bde
chen thig le'i rang bzhin te// thig le dbyibs dang mtshon las 'das// bde ba mchog gi snying por gnas// de nyid gsang ba'i dbang nyid de// rgyal ba sras bcas myong dgyes nas// thig le bde chen nyid la
gnas// de nas thabs dang shes rab nyid// ma lus 'dus pa'i ngo bo yis// mthong ba'i don nyid bstan bya'i phyir// gnyis med thabs kyis nyams myong ba'i// chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs// lhan
cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid// gang du skye dang 'gag pa dang// gnas dmigs 'gro 'ong las 'das pa'i// de bzhin nyid ni bstan par mdzad// nyi zla dngas pa'i rgya mtsho ltar// yongs dgyes khyab
par gyur pa'i ros// ma 'dres gsang ba'i snying po nyid// kun kyang gsum du gnas pa ste// rang bzhin thabs kyis mngon byas phyir// ma lus gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid// 'jug pa thabs kyi rang bzhin
ni// thun mong tha mal kun spangs pa'i// thabs dang cho ga las byung bas// dam pa'i rigs la 'jug par mdzad// rigs dang rigs su nges pa yis// ngo bo nyid ni gnyis su 'gyur// sems lnga skyes pa'i tshul

nyid ni// skye ba'i gzhi dang skyes pa yi// rigs gcig rigs bzhir gang phye ba// 'jug pa'i ngo bo stobs las ni// rigs kyi dbye bas lam dbye ba// lnga dang gcig gi rgyu 'bras 'gyur// ma nges phyi yi dbye ba

ste// bzhi ni nges 'byung thun mong lam// de bzhin rigs gcig thun mong min// de nyid phyi nang cha snang bas// phyi rol ltos pa'i thun mong lam// grub pa phyi nang rgyu 'bras phyir// rgyu 'bras phyi nang 'brel bar

'dod// skabs 'dir bzhi gsum thun mong gnyis// phan chad sbyangs pa rgyu yi phyir// rang bzhin mngon sngon yang/ du song ba dang// phyed du ched du sngon yang/ mngon du sdur bas 'gro// des na thun mong mngon
rdzogs yul// gzhi dang skabs nas skye 'gyur ba// grol thar lam du rnam par bshad// de'ang cig car rigs 'jug pa// snod kyi rim pas rnam par snang// gang yang sems lnga bsdus pas te// g.yo ldang smon
'jug mthar phyin pas// lam bzhi khyad par so sor phyed// rang bzhin gcig las mngon gyur pa'i// thabs rkyen mos pas tshul bzhin du// lam bzhi sems lngas mthar phyin pa// mos dang mthar phyin tshul
gyis snang// dngos por rang bzhin rtogs pa ni// bsnyen bsgrub bzhi dang sgo bzhi dang// dag mnyam rtogs pa bzhi dag gis// dus gcig rdzogs shing smin par byed// rnal 'byor lnga la rim goms

pas// mthar phyin lam la the tshom med// stong pa nyid la gang goms pas// snying rje sgyu ma'i tshul du bsgom// phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor mngon gsal nas// rnam par spros la the tshom med// rang rang spyod dang ldan gyur
nas// bdag gzhan mthar phyin 'gyur ba'i lam// gang du chags pa'i khyad par gyis// rten 'brel lus kyi bsgom pa ni// bye brag rlung las gyur pa yi// ye shes 'byung ba steng 'og sgo// dgug dang dgug
pa'i thabs nyid de// 'khor lo bzhi dang srog shing gsum// me rlung 'gro bas nam mkha'i ba// bzho ba steng du rnam par grags// dgug pa gsum gyis sems lnga'i rim// skyes pa bcu drug sa thob pa'i// rang
bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir// 'ching ba nyid kyis thar pa'i lam// yul dang dbang por sbyong nus pa'i// chags pa'i lam gyis gang rtogs pa// dug gis de nyid sel ba ltar// thabs dang ldan
pa'i khyad par yin// gang zag thabs dang sbyor ba yis// gang la de ltar thabs nyid kyis// 'ching ba thabs kyis bkrol ba ltar// lung dang man ngag rtogs pas 'grub// dam pa nyid la mnyes zin nas// ye
shes rig pa mas las kyang las gyur// dbang po rim par 'gags pa las// bden pa gnyis med 'char bar 'gyur// gsang ba ye shes chen po ni// thig le'i rgyu ba kun zad pa// de nyid sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho

ste// dman dang bcings dang dbang bsgyur bral// rtog ge rnams kyi spyod yul min// gang du ye shes shar ba yis// ma lus dam pa'i ye shes su// phyogs med rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur// de nas kun mkhyen rgyal ba
nyid// sras dang btsun mor bcas pa nyid// ma lus gcig tu mngon gzigs kyang// thabs bral byang chub snying po ma rig pas// 'gro ba lnga yi bde sdug khyad par rnams// skad cig ma 'dres gsal mkhyen
nas// thabs kyis so sor sgrol ba'i phyir// kun mkhyen nyid la don gyis gzigs// dgyes chen bdag pos mnyam nyid phyir// yul dang shes pa dbyings gcig phyir// mi gsung de bzhin nyid la bzhugs// de

bzhin nyid ni spros med kyang// thugs rje byin rlabs rgya mtsho yis// med las yod pa'i tshul gyur pa// de nyid de bzhin gshegs nyid de// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten drug gi rdul rnyed
du// sprul pa thub pa chen po yi// gang dag tu ni rnam mdzes te// sku dang gsung thugs bsam mi khyab// 'dul ba bzhi yi khyad par gyis// rang rang las dang bsam pa dang// dbang po mos pa'i khyad par

gyis// gdul bya'i bsam pa sna tshogs su// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba snang mdzad de// rgyud dang thabs kyis grol ba yis// 'gro ba ma lus bde ba dang// rigs dang ldan par thar pa yi// 'bras bu don la 'khod par

mdzad// mtha' thug med pa'i 'jig rten du// rgyal ba dus gsum mnyam bzhugs pas// de las byung ba'i sprul pa'i tshogs// rgyal ba kun kyang de bzhin no// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba rgya
mtsho'i rgyud las// sems lnga bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas kun mkhyen dgyes chen pos// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun gzigs nas// lhan cig go phye'i 'khor rnams la// byin rlabs dam
tshig dbang thob nas// dbang dngos rang bzhin bstan par mdzad// ma lus chos kun rang bzhin ni// byang chub snying po'i rang bzhin la// dbyer med don du kun gnas kyang// lhan cig la brten kun brtags
kyis// ma rig gzung 'dzin ngo bor smin// rten 'brel gnyis kyi tshul gyur pas// myong dang spyod yul so sor gyur// nam mkha' rang bzhin dbyer med ltar// ma lus de bzhin nyid 'di la// rtog
pa'i dbang gi phye ba la// bdag dang gzhan yang yod ma yin// gang du dman pa'i rtog ge pas// mi shes rtog pa sna tshogs kyis// rang las gzhan du thob 'dod pa'i// thabs des bskal pa bye bar

yang// sangs rgyas ye shes dri med pa// rmi lam nyid du mi 'byung ba// slob dpon man ngag thabs nyid kyis// sgrib pa'i rang bzhin snang bar 'gyur// kun mkhyen dbang dang man ngag can// byin rlabs thabs
kyis phan 'dogs pa// 'gro la yid bzhin nor bu ltar// sna tshogs bsam pa rang mdzad pa// dman pa'i sbyor ba la brten nas// sangs rgyas 'khor lo 'char byed pa// lus dang longs spyod sna tshogs
pas// bskal pa rdul gyi grangs mnyam par// bkur kyang drin dang bral gyur na// lan 'ga' tsam gyis ga la yin// dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yi// rang rang sbyangs ltar mngon gyur nas// dman pa'i blta ba
spang byed cing// brtul zhugs rigs nges gang zag la// ji snyed nam mkha'i mtha'i yun du// brtson zhing btsal bas mi rnyed de// gdung ba gsum gyis gdungs pa de// mthong ba'i thabs ni gsum du
bshad// lung dang man ngag cho ga yis// rtogs nas skye ba 'di yis 'grub// rnam smin bcas pas 'grub nges na// rang dbang lus kyi smos ci dgos// rgyal bas ma lus kun gzigs shing// thugs rjes the

tshom mi bslu bas// nges par bstan pa 'grub pa ni// dgongs pa rtogs na nges par 'grub// rang rang blo dang mos pa yis// ji ltar 'du zhing thabs mkhas pa// tshe dang bskal pa'i drangs bral zhing// lo dang zla
bar brtsams pas 'grub// shes rab rkyen dang thabs ldan pas// ma lus dbyer med rtogs goms na// rang la rang snang goms pa yis// rang byung rang las mngon du snang// gang du blta dang dpyad bral

ba// ma bcos rang rig byang chub sems// byis pa rtog ge'i spyod yul min// dam pa rnams kyis nges par mthong// chos rnams rang bzhin rkyen bral ba'i// mi rtog 'od gsal dbyer med pa'i// kun gyi ngo bo de

bzhin nyid// da lta nyid du snang ba'o// don dam brten pa la brten nas// rgyu ba'i phyag rgya rang snang ba// goms nas bsdus pa'i thig le nyid// ma bcos rang bzhin mya ngan 'das// phyi nang yul sems 'dres

pa'i rlung// rgyu ba rig pa'i thig le nyid// rang byung stong par gnas 'gyur te// phyi nang re dogs rgyu ba med// ma bcos de bzhin nyid du mthong// thabs dang shes rab rtogs pa yi// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs
kyis// ma skyes mnyam la gnas gyur zhing// phung sogs gnas pa'i chos rnams kun// bde chen snying po gsal gyur zhing// dgag bsgrub med pa'i thabs las byung// spyod yul ma lus thams

cad kun// ma skyes dbyer med mngon du snang// sgra tsam mthong ba med pa'i don// ma skyes sgra yis mi g.yo ba// ka sgras thugs rjes rnal 'byor spyod// a la dbyung ldan yang/ las dbyug ldan gar sbyor ba// dran
pa gcig par nga nyid smra// de sogs byed pa'i rnal 'byor kun// ma skyes dbyer med mngon du snang// de sogs byed pa'i rnal 'byor lnga// gcig la ma lus gcig la rdzogs pa'i rim par rtogs/ kyang/ rdzogs

sam rtogs// rig pa'i khyad par rtsal gyis snang// gang du ma bcos rang snang ba// ma lus sgyu ma 'jig rten du// thabs dang ldan pas dbang bsgyur zhing// ma lus dbyer med tshul du snang// yab yum shi ra
bcud bcas sgyu// thabs kyis khams lnga'i ye shes gsal// bde skyed thig le ma rnams kun// sems mtha' bzlog pas gnas su thim// bcu gsum sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur ba// ngo bos gzhan nas thob pa

med// rtsa bcud shes pa'i ngo bo nyid// thabs kyi yab yum ye shes gsal// de nyid rten can rten lnga lngar// rang gnas thabs kyi bdag nyid du// nyon mongs sa bon kun kyang gnas// de phyir gzhan la rag ma
lus// dbang po yul sems gnyis med pa'i// shes rab thabs rol sgyu ma las// man ngag thabs kyis dbang bsgyur nas// rang bzhin sgyu 'phrul chen po 'char// thabs dang thabs byung 'brel pa nyid// thams
cad kun gyi gzhir gnas pa// rang lus thabs kyi ngo bo la// rang gi rkyen rnams mngon gyur pas// tshegs med rang log gyur pa yis// bden pa dbyer med mngon du mthong// rang bzhin ye shes mtha' bral

bas// thabs dang las rkyen skyes bu yis// spyod yul kun du blang bya ba// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu// chags pa'i dam tshig blang bar bya// kun kyang thabs dang shes rab nyid// phan tshun dgyes

pa'i thabs las ni// sems mtha' 'ong bas go phye nas// rang snang thabs kyis gnas sbyar bas// zung 'jug thabs chen de las byung// gnyis med ye shes rdo rje che// rgyu rkyen gzhan las byung ba min// rang

byung thabs kyi ngo bo nyid// lus dang rtsa dang longs spyod bcas// thams cad bde chen 'jig rten du// gsal byed thabs kyi snang ba las// rkyen gyis zlog pa mthong ba bzhin// gzhan las byung zhing snang ba
med// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor ngo bo nyid// bde ba chen po ma skyes pa'i// seng ge lta bu'i byin brlabs pa'i// gsung gis gnyis med gsal bar 'gyur// gsung gsang yang/ gsum bzhis sgrib ye shes
che// khams gsum 'dus pa'i thig le nyid// 'dres pas lhun grub ye shes nyid// dkyil 'khor gsal snang brtag par dka'// ma lus thig le rang snang ba'i// ma bcos rang snang thabs rtogs

nas// mngon par lta ba'i don rtogs na// rang 'byung 'bras bu rang las 'char// phyogs dus rgyal ba'i ngo bo nyid// mi zad 'khor lo rang snang don// ma mthong rmongs pa'i 'khrul pa rnams// byin rlabs lha dang
yon tan ltar// snang 'dod res 'jog sems 'dod sogs// gzhan las 'phags 'dod nor ba'i lam// mdongs pas nam mkhar bsnyeg pa bzhin// nor bas ma nor rnyed mi 'gyur// ma bcos 'bras bu rang
snang don// byin rlabs dgongs rtogs goms pa yis// ma btsal thabs kyis rang 'char ba// byin rlabs gdul bya'i snang bar zad// ces nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ chos thams
cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos// sangs rgyas kun 'dus dag pa ste// gcig dang du ma las 'das pas// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten

pa// mngon phyung nas ni gsung bar mdzad// a/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ i I/ u u/ e A+aio A+au/ a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya shai

i/ u U/ e A+ai/ o A+au/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ aM aHka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa

pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ rang byung mtshan pa las 'das pa// a nyid kun gyi ngo bo ste/// brjod 'das nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// snod bcud yi ger rang bzhin shar// thams cad yi ge'i rang

bzhin te// mtshon pa brda yi ngo bor snang// gang du ma skyes yum nyid ni// sa dang nam mkha' can rdo rje// stobs chen lnga ni dbang po lnga// gnyis pa lnga po rim bzhin du// sgeg mo phreng thogs dbyangs dang

gar// ya mAn ta kr-ita nyid du bshad// gsum pa lnga ni rim pa bzhin// snang mdzad rdo rje rin chen dang// dpag med don grub nyid du bshad// bzhi pa lnga po rim bzhin du// sangs rgyas spyan dang na bza'
dkar// mA ma kI dang sgrol mar bshad// lnga pa lnga po rim bzhin du// byams pa sgrib sel kun bzang dpal// rta mgrin rim par 'dod pa yin// drug pa bzhi ste rim pa bzhin// bdug spos mar me me tog

dang// dri chab lha mo zhes su bshad// bdun pa bzhi ste rim pa bzhin// rtag chad mtshan ma dag pa dang// bdag med ma ste rim pa bzhin// mthar zad byed pa rdo rje ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i ngo bo ste// sku
gsung thugs ni rdo rje las// rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprul pa drug/ brgyad pa'i yi ge drug tu bshad// bcu gcig gnyis pa rnam bshad pa// sgrib pa kun bzang ye shes ni// 'chi ba gso byed yin par

bshad// thog ma mthar zad mthing ga ste// rdo rje dril bu nyid du 'dod// dang po lnga dang gnyis pa lnga// gtso bo yab yum bcu nyid ste// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma ral gri 'dzin pa ste// dkar po mthing ga

ser po dang// dmar po ljang gu rim bzhin no// gsum pa lnga po rim pa bzhin// rdo rje dang ni rin chen dang// pad dkar rdo rje dkar sngo dang// dmar dang ljang gu rang bzhin gnas// rdo rjes gnon pa mthing
nag yin// bzhi pa lnga po rim pa bzhin// klu shing po ti rin chen snye// ut+pal dkar ser dmar ser dang// dmar ljang dkar ljang rim bzhin te// thod sbrul ser nag 'bar bar gnas// tsa la sogs pa'i lha
mo ni// me long phreng ba pi wang gar// gtso bo nyid dang mtshungs pa yin// gzhan yang a sogs bzhir bshad pa// bdug pa me tog mar me dang// dri yang gtso bo rjes mthun pa'o// thod sbrul 'jigs pa dmar

nag ste// de bzhin yi ge bzhir shes bya// rtag chad lcags kyu zhags pa dang// lcags sgrog dril bu thabs dang 'dra// sprul pa'i pi wang gseg par dang// po ti sgrom dang go cha dang// me dang chur ni shes bya
ste// dkar dang ser dang dmar nag dang// ser nag mthing sngo dud kha dag/ rim pa bzhin du shes par bya// rdo rje rgya gram ljang nag gis// ma lus gnon pa bdud rtsi 'khyil// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi ge
yis// ma dag pa dag dag byed cing// ma mthong pa dag mthong byas nas// de nyid rnam par grol bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ni// rang snang gsung gi 'khor lo las// rim bzhin rang gi gzhir

snang ba// dpag med yon tan lhun rdzogs pas// rang byung 'khor lo mngon par brjod// rang byung 'khor lo rgyu yi bdag/ ka sogs sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// ma lus kun gyi dngos gzhi ste// sku yi 'khor lor rang

snang ba'o// sgra dbyangs gsung gi 'khor lo ni// brjod pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs pa'i// ma lus par ni rang snang bas// gsung gi phyag rgya bzhir nges pa'o// rig pa thugs kyi 'khor lo ni// zag med ye shes drug ldan

zhing// sde tshan brgyad kyis brgyan pa ni// snying po dngas ma lngar snang ba// yon tan sprul pa'i 'byung bzhi nyid// bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i// 'gro 'du thig le kun gyi dngos// sprul pa'i thig le rang 'char

ba// snang ba'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// gang du thabs las byung ba yi// dngas ma'i ro lnga myong 'gyur bas// rten bcas ngo bo dag gyur nas// mdzad pa'i byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// shes rab thabs rol sgyu ma
las// rang bzhin sgyu 'phrul chen po 'char// thabs dang thabs byung 'brel ba nyid// thams cad kun gyi gzhir gnas pa// ma skyes sems kyi rang bzhin las// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i don 'char
ba// thabs la brten pa'i skyes bu nyid// gnyis su med par gnyis med 'brel ba dra bar bshad/ kyang/ 'brel bar bshad// gnas bzhi gar thabs sgyu ma las// nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal// cir

yang bdag nyid reg par 'brel// drang ba'i don du nga yis bshad// gsang ba rang byung 'khor lo ni// gnas dang ngo bor ldan pa yi// thabs dang rkyen las snang ba yi// ro lnga sems la mnyam 'jug pa// steng
'og thabs kyi mtshon byas pa// ye shes lnga yi ngo bor bshad// g.yas g.yon dbus dang ldan pa yi// nyi zla 'bar ba gang 'jog pa// thabs ldan gnas sems rtsi yis bzung// yon tan kun gyi ngo bor

gsal// ma lus pa yi byang chub sems// gnas rten byed pa'i ngo bor bcas// skad cig thabs las mngon gyur pa'i// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor snang// rang byung snang ba'i mtshan ma kun// bde ba chen po'i don
rtogs pas// dngas ma'i snying por gsal gyur pa// bde chen nam mkha'i mthar ltar snang// gang du mtshan rtog kun spangs pa'i// bde chen ye shes ro dang bcas// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// ma lus
sku gsung thugs su snang// thabs ldan ye shes rgya mtsho yis// chos kun ro gcig kun gsal ba// rtog dang mi rtog cha las 'das// de nyid mtshon pa med par bstan// sangs rgyas 'khor lo kun 'dus
pa'i// gsung gi dkyil 'khor mi zad pa// gdul bya'i don du kun bsgrags pa'i// rang byung 'khor lo'i gsung du gsal// phyi nang gsang ba'i mthar thug pa// snod bcud ro dang bcas pa las// mi rtog gsal
bar rang snang ba// 'khor lo kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'o// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ gsung gi 'khor lo mngon du phyung ba'i le'u ste bzhi'o//// de nas

bcom ldan dgyes chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin des// kun 'byung sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho che// dngos grub cho ga yang dag gsung// rang byung sgyu 'phrul drwa ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// gsang

ba'i ngo bo thabs kyi gnas// dngos grub kun gyi rtsa ba ste// sems nyid kun gyi rtsa ba yin// de nyid dngos med snying po ste// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas mchog nyid// ma bcos sgyu 'phrul chen po las// gnyis
med 'brel pa drwa ba'i don// ro gcig gnas kyi khyad par las// yon tan rin chen sna tshogs 'char// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// bzhi bcu rtsa lngar rang bzhin gnas// de nyid grangs las 'das pa
ste// ma bcos rang rig byang chub sems// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la// rang gi mos pa ji bzhin du// cho 'phrul sna tshogs bstan par zad// rang byung
yo byad dag pa ni// bskyed cing sbyangs nas 'bar ba ltar// nges pa rnyed nas longs spyod na// 'tsho ba bdud rtsi'i ngo bo ltar// gang gis rang rig byang chub sems// cho 'phrul gsal bsgoms rnal 'byor

pas// rang byung lnga la byin brlabs te// zos pas phyi nang nad sel 'gyur// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal goms na// rang byung gtsang sme med sbyar zhing// dang po gang yang rung ba dag/ gang ltar bsgyur ba der
'grub ste// rtogs goms stobs las byung ba'o// bdag nyid gsal bar brtan byas nas// mkha' dbyings rdo rje gtams pa las// bdag nyid bgrod par nus pa na// rnal 'byor gsal ba'i don rnams
bya// gang gi spyan dang thugs gsal bas// mi mthun ma lus kun bsregs nas// dngos med stong pa'i ngang du tshig/ lag mthil zla ba'i chu rgyun bsam// nam mkha' sa gzhi bcas pa nyid// chu yis thams cad
gang byas nas// sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil bar bya// rang gi sgrol ma'i rnal 'byor bsam// brtan zhing goms par gyur pa na// gling bzhi ri rab 'khor yug rnams// ma lus brlags shing 'thor bar

'gyur// yaM gyis bud cing khaM gyis bkrus// raM gyis sbyangs pas dngos po dag/ bdag gzhan rgyud la snang ba rnams// dngos med stong par ston par nus// mi mthun phyogs kyi dgra bgegs dang// sangs rgyas
btsun mo gang yang rung// lha'am gnod sbyin bu mo dag/ ting 'dzin sbyor ba goms pa yis// de ma thag par dgug nas ni// bdag nyid ji ltar dga' bar byed// de nas 'dod pa'i don rdzogs nas// yid la
der gnas mi 'dod na// gang dga'i gnas su btang nas ni// phyis ni dam bca' bzhin du 'grub// gal te phyogs par ma gyur kyang// bdag gi bya ba ma rdzogs par// sngags dang phyug rgya ting 'dzin gyis// ji
srid 'dod par bcing bar bya// rang gi don ni legs grub nas// lus dang sems ni sgrol ba yis// pha rol ci bder gnas par bya// bdag dang gzhan dag phan 'dod pas// rim pa bzhin du bcun

par bya// bdag nyid thar lam bgrod pa yis// stong pa chen por goms gyur nas// rgyal ba'i sku tshe mi 'chi nyid// mtshan ma'i rgyun gyis tshe bsdus nas// 'dod pa yid 'ong thob par 'gyur// steng 'og rlung la
dbang thob nas// bar ma'i rkyen gyis bslu ba med// mtshan bzang thig le bcu drug sogs// dben pa'i gnas su zla dang bcas// zhun chen la sogs bcud kyis gso// gang rgyas bdud rtsi gsang ba'i
lces// bsdus nas brngubs kyang/ mi 'chi nges par myang// lnga yi rtsa ba yan lag bcas// bdud rtsi rigs brgya nga gcig sbyangs// rtags phyin 'thungs na the tshom med// ra sA ya na la sogs

la// bsgrubs shing bsten na de bzhin no// tshe mchog las byas zla rgyas sogs// rtags ldan zos pa'ang nges par 'grub// gzhan pa tha mal las sbyar te// bdag nyid kun la nges par 'gro// sngon song pa yi snga

rol nyid// yang na mthar nye'i lam che'o// tshe yi rten ni gang rung la// bdag nyid stobs ldan rnal 'byor pas// phyogs bcu'i gzi byin kun bsdus nas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gyis// bstims la
nges par bsrung bar bya// gal te 'chi ba gso 'dod pas// rgyal rigs rje'u dang bram ze'i ro// rma med gtsang ma blangs nas ni// sbyangs shing rgyan dang ldan byas te// bdag gis gang yin bkug nas
ni// mngon bstim rtags dang ldan gyur nas// mgo dang lce bcad go mtshon gyis// lha min g.yul las 'joms par byed// lce bcad bltabs pas gser yin te// langs nas dam bca' chu blud nas// gang
'dod las ni bcol bar bya// gal te drag po brtsams gyur na// de yi bdag nyid dag la brten// ming rus bcas pa gsal bar bya// drag po'i gnas su bzhag nas ni// gnyen pos gnas bkug bstims
byas nas// dug dang lan tshwa tsha bas bstims// gnas lngar phur gdab de nyid gnon// 'dis ni kun kyang brlag par 'gyur// dgra dpung 'pham pa'i las bya na// bdag nyid lha ru gsal byas la// ras sam
gro gar ming rus bris// chags pa'i gos kyis gril byas nas// g.yas pas legs par gnan nas kyang// nga rgyal rang gi sngags bcas pas// phyogs su 'phyos pas 'pham par byed// de yis rgyal bar 'gyur

ba ste// spyi gtsug 'khor lo rtsibs bcu bzhag/ khro bo'i sngags bris byin brlabs na// ma yengs gar phyin rgyal bar 'gyur// gzhan yang thabs dang ldan pa yis// thabs dang shes rab gdan bskyed de// rgyal
ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi zlar langs// gnyis thim nyi zla bcud lngar 'dres// 'thungs pas bdud rtsir dag par byed// de nyid gnyis med ldan gyur nas// rtse sprad byed pa'i thabs bcas pas// dug gsum nad

bsal bde chen gyis// rang dga'i lus kyi stobs su gnas// rlung sems bde bas gang gyur tshe// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod cing// zhing dang spyod yul dag par 'gyur// gang

tshe thabs dang ldan pa yis// tha mal snang ba lus bcas pa// dka' zhing gdung ba spangs pa yis// bde chen dbyer med nyid du 'gyur// rang rig 'od gsal nam mkha' ni// rdo rje pad+ma la brten pas// 'byung
bzhi thabs kyis 'bar ba yis// tha mal zhen pa mi gnas shing// byang chub sems kyis gang bar byed// sgrol ma rlung gi thabs ldan pas// 'bar nas rim par gnas bskyod pas// steng gi thig

le zhu ba'i sems// dngas ma lngar thim gsal ba'i tshe// stong nyid nam mkha'i rang mtshan nyid// dbang po yul sems zlog par 'gyur// rang byung bcud 'dus thig le nyid// thabs kyis phyag rgyas bkug byas
nas// thabs dang shes rab stobs kyis bcings// rang byung bde ba'i nyams shar nas// rang rang gnas su gtang ba'i tshe// rlung sems zhen 'dzin grol gyur nas// sems mtha' 'gro 'ong med pa'i tshe// ye
shes rgya mtsho gsal gyur nas// ma lus bde chen 'bar bar gnas// bdud bzhi ma lus 'pham pa yis// phyogs med rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ting 'dzin gsal bar byed par 'gyur// bde ba'i thig le
rang snang bas// ming tshig tha snyad brjod bral bas// thabs dang shes rab thabs mtshon pas// bde chen rig pa'i thig ler 'gyur// thun mong khyad par yo byad kyis// sngon du bya ba kun byas nas// rang

gi thabs ldan rnal 'byor pas// ji ltar bsgrubs pa bzhin du 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// rang byung bde chen rgya mtsho ni// byin rlabs kun gyi bdag nyid pas// kun la 'tshams pa bzhin du

'char// thig les bde ba myong gyur nas// bde ba'ang thig le'i ngo bor gsal// gnyis med rang byung snying po la// gsal bar nyams kyis goms par bya// bde chen thig le'i ngo bo ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag
nyid de// rigs kyi bdag po kun las grol// mtha' dbus rgyu 'bras las 'das pas// thig le rang rig byang chub sems// 'gro 'ong dmigs 'dzin zhen las 'das// de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa yang// sna
tshogs zhen las grol bar zad// thabs dang shes rab thig le yi// nyi zla gsal ba'i sems ldan pas// dngos med nas kyang/ lhan cig skye nus na// sgyu 'phrul drwa bar gsal bar 'char// zhes nyid la nyid
gsungs pa'o// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// phyi ma bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen po// mtha' dbus med pa lhun grub pa// ye shes kun gyi bdag nyid de// sku yi

dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad// gcig dang du ma bral ba yi// rang byung ye shes phyogs med pa// ye shes lnga rdzogs snying po 'di// mu khyud snying pos yongs su bkod// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzhal yas khang// ngo bo
ji bzhin gsal gyur pa// che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pa// dkyil 'khor kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// ye shes 'khor lo drwa ba gcod// mu khyud thig les yongs su bskor// che ba'i yon tan phyogs med
cing// thar pa'i grong khyer khyams ldan pas// rnam thar mdzes pa'i sgo dang ldan// 'dod yon lnga dang bzhugs gnas kyang// zad pa med pa'i tshul du gnas// bdud dang 'khor ba'i nyes pa
yis// mi 'jigs stobs dang rdzu 'phrul dang// dbang dang phrin las lhun rdzogs pas// thabs dang shes rab skyon bral bas// rgyal ba kun gyi gnas pa'i gdan// rang byung rig pa'i 'phrul pa yis// mdzad pa

rdzogs dang ma rdzogs pa'i// 'gro ba'i don la ma 'dres pas// lha dang gdan gyi khyad par dang// bzhugs tshul rgyan cha sna tshogs bstan// rang byung rgyal ba thams cad kyang// rang gi rtog pa der byung gi// rgyu
'bras dka' thub rtsol ba yis// gzhan 'byung tha dad chos dang bral// rang rig lhun gyis grub pa la// yon tan khyad par kun rdzogs pa// thabs chen gsang ba goms rtogs na// che ba'i 'bras bur bdag
nyid gnas// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// kun nas rgya yang ma chad pa// phyogs bcu dus bzhi sku gsung thugs// ma lus bdag nyid byang chub sems// gdod nas dag mnyam rtogs pa yis// mi zad

'khor lo rang snang ba// ma lus thams cad dag pa yis// byar med bya las 'das pa yi// rang byung sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho che// skyes bu rab la de bzhin snang// ma lus 'dod stobs khyad par gyis// thabs dang shes
rab 'brel ba la// rab 'bring tha ma'i stobs bzhin du// dka' thub gdung ba spangs pas 'grub// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// gtso 'khor dbyer med dkyil 'khor ni// 'khor ba dag byed maN+Da

la// bsgom pas 'bras bu mngon du 'byung// thabs chen rgya mtshos zin pa la// 'khor ba'i rgyu 'bras ngo bos stong// 'das dang ma 'das dbyer med pa'i// rang rig byang chub de bzhin nyid// rang rig byang chub

rkyen bral ba// mos pa'i yon tan khyad par gyis// rang rang kha dog ji bzhin du// yon tan stobs las mngon snang ba// ma 'dres gsal bar shar ba nyid// sgyu 'phrul thabs kyi ngo bo ni// drwa ba shes rab ma skyes
dbyings// gnyis med gnas pa rtogs goms nas// 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i tshul du gnas// bskal par sbyangs dang rang gnas pa'i// blo yi bye brag ji snyed pa// thabs kyi rim pa de bzhin te// 'bras bu lhun

grub nyid du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas gyur pa// gsang ba'i bzhugs gnas thig le'i rten// ngo bo mtha' bral gnyis med pa// che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pa// sgo dang ldan te snying por rdzogs// thig
le chen po'i rang bzhin la// 'bras bu'i mtshan ma rang bzhin rdzogs// thabs chen nyi zla'i ro 'dres pas// ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// sku gsung thugs kyi
phyag rgya nyid// ma lus nyi zla'i tshul gnas te// skal ldan thugs la 'jug par 'gyur// bde chen rig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i byang chub sems// thig le rlung dang bral ba
yi// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur// gang dang gang du zhen bzung ba// bde chen thig ler zad gyur nas// zhing dang spyod yul bcas pa dag/ ma lus rig pa bde chen po// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med
pa'i// gsang ba'i thig le kun gyi dngos// thams cad rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i phyir// thams cad kun gyi ngo bor gnas// steng 'og g.yas g.yon las byung ba'i// snang stong thig ler 'dres pa'i bcud// nyi
zla thabs dang shes rab nyid// gnyis med thabs su 'brel ba yin// brjod bya'i yon tan kun 'dus pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// ma lus kun las 'brel ba'i phyir// sems lnga'i tshul gyis
mngon du snang// thig le dang po nas brtsams nas// ma skyes bde chen bcu drug mtha'// 'gro 'ong med cing mthar phyin pa// rang byung dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// thog med bsags las gang gyur

pa'i// las dang 'du byed sgrib pa rnams// bde chen sku gsung thugs gyur nas// ma bsgribs ye shes ngo bor 'char// bye brag brgyad cu sprul pa yi// thig le'i rkyen gyis 'dus gyur pas// ma lus mun pas snang

ba bzhin// dngos byed thabs kyi snang byed pa// rang byung rang snang ngo bo nyid// bde ba chen po'i thig le nyid// phan tshun 'brel zhing 'dres pa las// nyi zla 'khor bcas de dag kun// gsang ba'i thig le 'phro
'du med// bde chen thig ler lhun rdzogs pa'i// byang chub sems la dngas snyigs med// lus ngag sems kyi bya ba rnams// gang gis 'dul bar mi nus pa// byin rlabs rten 'brel las byung ba'i// bde ba
chen po'i ngo bor 'gag/ snang gsum las 'das thig le ni// phyogs 'dzin dmigs pa las 'das pa// rang rig dmigs zhen dag pa yi// 'dus byas zag pa'i bde ba med// sangs rgyas kun gyi thig le

ni// 'gro 'ong thig le rgyu ba dag/ mkha' ltar dag pa'i byang chub sems// rkyen bral ye shes zag med de// 'phel 'grib med pa'i tshul du gnas// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las// rang byung ye shes rgya mtsho
nyid// gdul bya mos pa'i bsam pa bzhin// thugs rje byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// ji snyed mtha' yas chos rnams ni// rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo ste// dbyer med bde chen

phyag rgyar gsal// gang du snang dang mi g.yo ba'i// bya ba byed dang mi byed pa// sgyu 'phrul drwa bar rdzogs pa yis// thig le mchog gi snying por gnas// rten dang brten par bcas pa yi// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i dkyil
'khor ni// sna tshogs bsam pa las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor chen por 'bar bar 'gyur// zag med ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i// gdul bya'i bya ba kun kyang spyod// ces nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu
'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos gzhi ste// gsung gi 'dul ba'i don du ni// de dag 'khor

lo bskor bar mdzad// rtsa ba cir yang 'gyur ba'i b+h+rUM// rin chen ye shes sna tshogs pa// phyi nang mtha' dbus rgya bral ba'i// chos dbyings 'og min gzhal yas khang// rang rang sa bon bskyed pa dang// gnas
dang byin gyis brlabs pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin dang rgyal ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas nor bu pad+ma dang// shes rab 'dzin pa'i rim pa bzhin// 'khor lo'i tshul bzhin gnas par mdzad// rang rang sa bon ji bzhin

pa'i// gnas dang bskyed pa'i byin brlabs pa// nang dang sbyor ba las byung ba// lnga ste 'byung ba'i rang bzhin nyid// rang gi btsun mo spyad bya ste// bde skyed 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas// ming gi dang po las byung
ba// rnam shes bzhi yi mnyam nyid ni// gnas bskyed thabs kyi byin brlabs pas// rang gi gnas su de bzhin gshegs// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa// yul bzhi bde skyid btsun mo ste// sa bon gnas
bskyed thabs las byung// thabs dang 'brel ba'i tshul du bzhugs// skye mched gnas kyi rang bzhin las// ming gi dang po las byung ba// gnas dang skyed pa la sogs pa'o// gnas ni ji bzhin gnas par

'dod// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// dus bzhi btsun mo'i rang bzhin ni// dgyes pa skyed pa'i lha mo ste// gnyis med 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas// dgug dang bsdam dang bskyod pa dang// dgyes pa chen po'i
rang bzhin nyid// tshim dang me tog gtor ba yis// gnyis med lhan cig gsal ba yis// ma lus khyab cing gsal bar byed// 'di dag dbye dang dbab pa dang// thim dang bde bas tshim pa dang// rim pa

bzhin du yang dag gnas// gang du rang gi sa bon las// gong ma ji bzhin gsal gyur pas// lus kyi chos bzhi'i ngo bo ni// ta kr-ita sgo srung tshul du gnas// gzhan dag rang gi btsun mo ni// lha mo bzhi yi dang
po las// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// mtshan ma 'joms shing 'khril bas 'khod// ma lus 'dus pa'i ye shes ni// dmigs pa gsum las 'das pa ste// yul gsum 'das pa'i 'dus ma byas// de nyid
'dus pa'i ye shes dbyings// kun gyi rang bzhin nyid ces bshad// thabs dang shes rab la sogs pa// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// chags sogs mtshan ma drug po ni// sa bon gnas bskyed las byung
ba'i// sprul pa'i sku ni mngon par brjod// rang byung rten gyi thig le nyid// phyag rgya bzhi yi sbyor ba las// dga' dang chags dang bde ba dang// ye shes nyid ni gsal bar 'byung// sems lnga ye

shes lngar smin pa'i// ye shes thig le gnas 'phos nas// rang 'dod gnas la phog par mdzad// nyi zla rig pa'i thig ler bcas// phan tshun 'dres par gyur pa na// lnga dang lngar ni mi phyed pas// rig pa'i me
tog dor zhes brjod// gang gis gang la gsol btab pas// thugs rje byin brlabs sbyangs byas nas// thugs bzhugs 'dres nas dbyer med pa// sras gyur dgongs pa gcig la gnas// rang byung gnas
dang mi 'gal zhing// 'bras bu nyid las gzhan min pas// ma lus 'khor lo thig le rnams// bdag gi sras su bsgom par bya// lam dang 'bras bu'i khyad par dang// rtog pa ye shes 'od las byung// byin
rlabs 'bras bu dngos 'brel bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras tshogs bsgom// rang gi ma bcos dngos nyid las// rtogs pa'i ye shes byin rlabs nyid// ma lus snang bas rgya mtsho ste// dman dang rigs

chad spyod yul min// ma lus sku gsung thugs sbyor ba'i// de nyid thabs dang shes rab ste// dbyer med thim pas phyag rgya bzhi// gnyis med 'dres pa'i tshul du gnas// gnas lngar thim pa'i thig le ni// sangs
rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur phyir// dbu rgyan cod pan ldan par brjod// gnas gsum yi ge'i rang bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa// thim pas gzi byin bskyed
pa ste// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin no// dngas ma 'dus pa'i thig le la// ye shes lhun rdzogs lnga yi ros// ma lus kun la rgyas btab pas// ye shes lnga yi tshul du gnas// nyi zla 'dus pa'i thig le
nyid// rngams dang thabs kyi rang bzhin las// gsang ba'i ye shes lnga yi ros// khyab pas gnyis su med par gsal// 'khor lo gsum gyi thig le nyid// yi ge gsum du rang gnas pas// thabs kyi sbyor bas
gnyis su med// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba'o// g.yas g.yon thig le dbus gnas pas// yab yum bde ba'i thabs dang bcas// rang lus bde chen gsal 'bar gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar
snang// gzhan yang gsung gi phyag rgya mchog/ ji ltar 'dul ba de nyid du// rtogs 'dul gnyen po thabs su snang// de nyid mtshan mar bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas ma lus phyogs bcu rnams// thugs rje ye

shes sna tshogs kyis// gsung gis de ltar bstan pa'i phyir// gsung gi phyag rgya'i ngo bor shar// brjod dang brjod bya dbyer med pa'i// rang byung gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus 'dus pa'i gsung mchog
nyid// ji ltar 'tshams pa'i tshul du snang// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung nyid ni// ma lus kun dang dbyer med pas// rtogs dang bsgom dang brjod pa yi// byin rlabs skyob pas sngags su

brjod// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las// thog mtha' med pa'i byang chub sems// gsung mchog phyag rgya mtha' yas pa// ma lus 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid// ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// chos kyi phung po

dpag med pa// 'dul ba'i thabs su gsungs pa yang// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i gsung du 'dus// zab mo rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i// rin chen rgya mtsho'i rgyud chen 'di// sku gsung thugs dang bya ba dang// spyod dang

rnal 'byor rgyud chen rnams// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying por gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs pa'i// rang byung gsung nyid rang snang bas// bstan pa rgya mtsho'i rang bzhin te// thugs rjes gdul bya'i don

du snang// zhes nyid la nyid brjod do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// gsung gi dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos// lus rtog phung por bcas pa

rnams// bde chen lhun grub byin brlab phyir// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzad// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin ni// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i mtshan nyid do// bde chen thig ler mngon rdzogs pa// phyi nang
snod bcud thams cad ni// bde chen byang chub sems kyi rgya// bde chen thig les rgyas btab pas// 'da' dka' rang bzhin mi shigs pa// shes rab stong nyid nyi ma ste// rin chen gsang dkyil zla thig

le// sems lnga gnyis sbyor byang chub sems// ye shes lnga ru gsal ba nyid// ye shes dkyil 'khor dpag med pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor kun gyi rgyu// thig le 'brel cing rtse phrad pa// thabs dang shes rab
gnyis med pa'i// nyi zla bsnol mar drangs pa las// bde chen nyams myong gcig tu gsal// dngas ma thig ler gsang thim pas// bde ba'i thig le 'phro 'du med// rang byung bde chen 'od gsal ba// sangs
rgyas dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// phung sogs rtog pa ma lus kun// bde ba'i ye shes lnga ru gsal// de nyid bcu gsum sangs rgyas la/ sa yin nam// ye shes dbyings yig rang gnas pa'i// khams gsum
'dus pa'i thabs las skyes// skyes pa nyid na bdag tu gsal// bcwa brgyad khams sogs btags pa kun// dngos med lhan cig ye shes che// skyon rkyen yang/ bral sems lngas 'pho 'jigs pas// go phye
nyid na ye shes lnga// gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// kun spangs bral bas gang med pa// snang med snang ba dam pa'o// rang byung thig le byang chub sems// rten dang brten pa dbyer med pa// gsang
ba'i thig le nyams dang bcas// rnam shes rlung gis mngon bsdus pa'i// khams gsum thabs kyi ye shes che// rtse mo 'bru gsum gnas mthong ba// rdzas lnga'i ye shes so sor gsal// nyi zla'i
khams 'dres grangs mnyam sbyor// 'phel 'grib med pa'i yon tan mdzad// tshogs drug ye shes cha lnga mnyam// thabs las bzlog pas sngon gnas shes// 'gro 'ong rdzu 'phrul nges lung gsal// brjod
'drar thos shing sa gsum mthong// phung khams yul gyi zag pa med// A li kA li bde ba nyid// phan tshun ma 'dres gcig par shes// bcu drug ngo gnyis mtshan dang ldan// phyogs gcig ye shes lnga ldan
pa// brgyad cu bzod pa'i rgyu las 'phags// thig le gnyis med bde chen nyid// rnam pa bde ba rang bzhin gcig/ thabs dang 'brel ba'i rang bzhin la/ 'og gi bde chen bla dgas sogs sh+lau ka bar 'dir
yod pa'ang 'dug/ phyag rgya thugs sogs gdod nas rdzogs// phyogs dus ma lus thams cad ni// bde chen phyag rgyar gsal 'bar bas// sgo gsum bya rtsol ma lus pa// mun pa snang bar gyur pa kun// bde
chen gsal bas rtsol ba med// steng 'og g.yas g.yon gnyis med du// bde chen 'khril ba'i rang bzhin la// bde chen phra rags yongs rdzogs pas// yul dbang rnam shes dus dang bcas// phyag rgya bzhi
sogs rnam pa kun// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor gnas/ rtogs kyang// khams bzhi 'dus pa'i sku gsung thugs// rang byung thugs su rang dag pa'i// gnas drug lam gsum rang gnas pa'i// thabs kyi drag po me
byung bas// bzhu ba'i bde ba'i lte ba yis// ar thim sprul pa'i gsang thig le// ye shes nam mkha' 'byung ba'i rgyu// bde chen rgyu las char rgyun sems// rim par gnas thim khams gsum pa// ye shes lo
'dab 'bras bu bskrun// 'gro ba chags pa can mthong na// lus dang phung por bcas pa rnams/ ma spangs 'dod yon longs spyod kyis// dga' mgu chags pa'i ror bcas pas// bde chen tshim zhing gang bar
mdzad// phyi nang snod bcud dran rtog kun// thig le gnyis kyi sbyor thabs las// drug dug kyang 'gyur chags pa rang sel ltar// thabs chen gsang bas grol bar mdzad// phyogs bcu kun 'dus byang chub

sems// gnyis med rol pa'i byin rlabs kyis// rdo rje gsum gyis lam mtshon te// ma skyes don gyi snying por thim// sprul pa'i thig ler rang shar bas// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor smin// kha dog cha byad rang
nyams dag/ bde ba chen por kun 'gyur bas// de nas snang mdzad rdo rjer bcas// yon tan gsung mchog las su bcas// spyan dang nam mkha' lha mo lnga// dbang po yul sems dus bcas pa// rang rang bde
ba'i thig les rgyas// bde ba'i cho 'phrul phyogs bcur snang// la la blta zhing chags pa dang// la lar 'khyud cing rmongs mdzad de// bsdams pas bzhad dang zhal sprod dang// dgod dang sgeg
dang 'dzin pa dang// bskyod dang phyogs bcur bgrod pa yis// ma chags pa ni de bzhin te// chags pa smin cing rgyas par mdzad// rmongs dang brgyal bas kun bsdus te// ma lus bde ba chen por thim// bde

chen gsang ba'i phyag rgya yis// nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rgyas btab pas// thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings// rang byung gsang ba thig le'i dbyings// thams cad ma lus byang chub sems// rang snang dkyil
'khor phyag rgya'i tshogs// gnyis med ye shes sna tshogs mchog/ mi dmigs mi gnas de bzhin nyid// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// sku gsung thugs kyi de bzhin nyid// dag mnyam bde bas rgyas btab
cing// dus bzhi mnyam pa'i ngo bor gsal// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// ma lus thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// zhing dang 'khor lo rol mor bcas// ji

snyed dngos dang dngos min pa// thams cad bde ba chen po nyid// lam dang bral ba'i khyad par dang// yon tan lhun rdzogs bsam mi khyab// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i dkyil

'khor snang// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// byang chub bde mchog thig le nyid// mi phyed bde chen ro gcig pa// skal ldan dag pas mngon gyur pa// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul snyed du// che ba'i yon tan kun

spro zhing// mdzad pa sna tshogs rol par ston// mnyam nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med// dbang phyug rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// dgyes chen
ro yis khyab byas nas// bde ba chen po'i tshogs su snang// rdo rje slob dpon thabs ldan gyis// pha rol dag par bya ba'i phyir/ skabs gsum dag ni ma gtogs par// byang chub sems ni 'phro ba min// bde

ba'i thig le yongs rdzogs pas// bcu drug rdzogs pa'i tshul du gnas// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas
bcom ldan dgyes chen pos// rdo rje gsang ba dam tshig mchog/ nges pa las ni gyur pa yi// dkyil 'khor nyid ni nges par bshad// gang du phyi nang snod bcud dang// dbang po yul sems ma lus pa// bde chen

zhing du kun mnyam phyir// sa gzhi rab tu mnyam par bya// phra ba'i dam tshig la gnas pas// phyi dang nang la goms pas ni// sor bzhi mdzub gang tshad du bya// sbyangs dang dri bskyed yid 'jug pa'i// chags pa'i
dam tshig blang bar bya// bcu gnyis bcu drug la gnas shing// nyi shu'am nyi shu lnga yi tshad// dbang po pad+ma rab rgyas la// rang bzhin rig par thig btab la// rang rang rigs las brtags pa
bzhin// mtshan ma gsal bskyed byin gyis brlab// ye shes mtshon pa'i don phyir 'dod// lus dang b+ha ga'i rang bzhin dang// rang gi rig pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// dbang dang khyad par ji bzhin du// rim pa
bzhin du mkhas pas brtags// lus rtsa yan lag snying du bcas// dkyil 'khor rgyan du ngas bshad de// ma lus gzhan yang snying por bshad// yab yum dngos grub rang bzhin nyid// rdo rje gsum du nges
gsal zhing// sangs rgyas rdul snyed sku gsung thugs// mnyam sbyor ma 'dres mnyam pa nyid// gang gis gang la gsal goms pa// de dag gsal ba'i tshad ldan pa// de yis de la byin brlab phyir// lhag pa'i
ting 'dzin stobs kyis bri// bdag gzhan byin rlabs nus ldan phyir// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul snyed pa// thabs dang shes rab ngo bo yis// gang 'dod thim par byin brlabs nas// rgyan phreng mdzes pas

tshul bzhin bya// bdud rtsi longs spyod tshogs ldan pa// bdag nyid mnyes par bya phyir brtsam// longs spyod khams dang gsang bar bcas// me yi cho ga rab ldan pa// thabs kyi cho ga ji bzhin du// las bzhi'i

sbyin sreg brtsam par bya// gal te mtshan ma sbyangs pa na// tshad dpag med pa'i bag chags rnams// las dang sbyor bas byang byas nas// snga phyi rim par bar gcod pa'i// bgegs rnams khro bo'i sbyor bas
spang// mtshan ma bkod pa'i yam shing la// gnyen po'i sbyor bas bsregs sbyangs nas// bshags dang byin brlabs chos ldan pas// dag pa gsum la gnas bcas nas// dam tshig ye shes bskyed bsgyur
bstim// mchod bstod bzlas pas rtags thob cing// ting 'dzin gsal brtan goms pa dang// dbang dang dam tshig ldan gyur nas// lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gang 'tshams par// bseg sbyang cho ga rgyas par

brtsam// ltas brtag las kyi rim par bya// gang du chags pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// chags pa'i glu dang gar dag dang// de bzhin mnyes tshul sna tshogs pa'i// bro gar sprin tshogs rnams kyis mchod// gang du

gnyis med dkyil 'khor ni// nam mkha'i tshad dang mnyam sbyor bas// bde mchog sgyu 'phrul drwa ba nyid// sna tshogs 'bar zhing khyab par gsal// gang zag mos pa'i don du ni// dkyil 'khor bzhir ni snang gyur
te// 'jug dang dam tshig ldan pa la// dbang bskur cho gas legs par smin// chags pa'i dam tshig la gnas pa'i// bde ba chen po'i man ngag 'di// dka' thub can dang rgan po dang// ma ning byis pa'i spyod
yul min// gang du chags pas bcings pa rnams// chags pa nyid kyis rnam grol zhing// nyon mongs rtog pa ji snyed pa// thob dang ldan pas ro myang ba'i// 'jig rten chags pa 'jig dus su// de
dag thang gcig rnam par grol// dbang po kun las rab 'das pa'i// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du// ma lus gsal bar mnyam sbyor bas// dka' thub tha mal gtsang sme dang// re dogs bag tsha rnam par
spangs// 'jig rten mun pa rnam bsal nas// da lta nyid du rnam grol bas// mun pa la ni mar me bzhin// phyis 'jog 'bad rtsol med par mdzad// de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// btsun mo'i tshogs dang rol

mdzad cing// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor nas// 'o dang 'khyud pas gar mdzad cing// byang chub sems dpa' rdul snyed dang// lha mo rdul snyed bcas pa kun// spyan ni chags pas gzigs mdzad cing// snga phyi dran

rtog kun 'gags nas// bde ba chen por rab tu 'bar// zhing khams snod bcud bcas pa dag/ sgyu ma chu zla brag cha dang// dri za'i grong khyer bzhin du mthong// de phyir rnam dag lha mo yi// pad+mar rdo rje'i thabs
reg pas// bskal par bsags pa'i mun pa dngas// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// 'dod chags dri med chags bral 'joms// bde chen 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub// thabs dang shes rab gnyis

med pa'i// gsang ba thabs kyi bde bskyod pas// bcu gnyis sa la nyi shar tshe// lus kyi chos bzhi 'dus byas pas// thig le kha bsgyur phan tshun du// dgod pa'i stobs kyis spyir gnas tshe// sku gsum mi zad

'khor lo tshogs// 'bad pa med par shugs kyis 'byung// gnas kyi gzhi lnga 'bras bu yang// tha dad rgyu med dus gcig khyab// thabs kyi dam pa nga yis brjod// rang byung thog mtha' med pa yi// thabs dang
shes rab nyi zlar bcas// re dogs 'jigs pa spangs byas pas// tshe 'dis sangs rgyas lhun gyis 'grub// rdo rje 'dus pa'i snying po dang// ge sar bcud bcas 'brel pa yis// ji snyed kun 'byung dngos 'di

dag/ rang dbang med par rnam par 'jig/ pad+ma kha phye lta bu la// zla ba rgyas pa'i thabs sbyor ba// dzaHhUM baM hoHthabs ldan pas// mdzes dang chags dang bde ba yi// grong khyer gnyis med ngang du 'jig/ nyi ldan
hUM phaT oM dang mUM// bskyod 'dres bde ba ngoms pa med// thig le 'pho ba'i rgyun bzhin du// dga' ba'i phreng bas rgyu 'bras 'byung// brjod dang bral ba kun gsal ba// rig pa'i gsung dbyangs gnyis med
rdzogs// nyi zla 'dres pas lhar bskyod pa// sa ya bcu gsum bcu gsum lha// phyogs ris med par kun nas ldang// dgyes pa chen po'i gar yin no// bcud 'dus thig le thabs sbyor bas// 'byung ldog bde
ba dgyes pa che// mUM gyi sgo phye las byung ba// puN+Da rI ka'i me tog dag/ gnas su 'phros pa'i chu skyes dga'// de nyid slar thim thabs las skyes// de tshe ye shes gnyis gsal mi// bde ba chen po
kun tu gsal// mtha' gnyis rab mnyam lhun rdzogs pa'i// ye shes rgyal ba kun gyi thugs// rim nas rim par bcu drug go// dang po bzhi tshogs gnyis sbyor lam// gsum pa bzhi mthong bzhi bsgoms
pa// tha mar thim brjod rim bzlog pa// rim pa bzhin du gsal goms pas// 'gro 'ong med pa'i thig le nyid// 'bras bu'i ngo bor lhun gyis rdzogs// rang byung ye shes thig le la// 'bras bu'i ro rnams

rdzogs par ldan// ngo bo thabs kyis mngon gsal na// 'bras bu lhun gyis rdzogs par gnas// zhes nyid la nyid gsungs so// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ rdo rje bkod pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste dgu
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen po// kun mchog dbang phyug rgyal ba yis// byin brlabs gsang ba rtogs bya'i phyir// rdo rje byin brlab mchog tu mdzad// gsang ba mchog ldan dbang phyug
gis// 'khor lo rim par brtags byas nas// snod dang mos pa ji bzhin du// rab 'bring tha ma'i bsam pa ltar// phyag rgya mdzes pa'i rol pa dang// thig le mchog tu 'dres pa yis// dri med dbang bskur
grol bar mdzad// sems kyi thig le thog mtha' med// rang rig mkhyen pa'i ye shes la// kun mchog thabs kyi dbang bsgyur bas// tshe 'dis nges par grol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku

gsung thugs// rdo rje dbang phyug snang ba yis// snang dang ldan pa'i gang zag la// byin rlabs dngos po 'jug par 'gyur// de tshe stobs dang nus mthu dang// byin rlabs mngon shes la sogs pa// shes rab ting

'dzin la sogs pa// 'di tshe rtags ni 'byung bar 'gyur// phyag rgya dbu rgyan cod pan dang// gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang// rgyal mtshan go cha snying po dang// phreng ba dag gis dbang bskur te// de nas

glegs bam phreng ba dang// rgya gram 'khor lo rdor dril nyid// nus pa brtan po thob pa'i phyir// ting 'dzin ldan pas sbyin par bya// de nas rgyal ba'i sku thob pas// gsung dang thugs la gnas bya'i phyir// gsang
ba la sogs rim pa bzhin// mos pa ji bzhin bstan par bya// gzugs dang lang tsho ldan pa dang// btsun zhing na tshod dar la bab// dul zhing blo gros mchog dang ldan// yon tan phun sum tshogs pa
dang// zas dang gos sogs rjes bsrungs la// dam tshig sdom phog dbang bskur nas// thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs nas// mchod bstod bzlas pa mthar phyin pa// thig le nus pa brtan phyin nas// tha
mal zhen pa spangs pa dang// gnas ngan len pa dag bya'i phyir// thabs dang shes rab thig le'i bcud// rtse nas rtse ru phyin pa yis// rang rig lus ngag sems su bcas// bde ba chen por 'bar
bar 'gyur// lus ngag sgrib pa dag byas nas// phyis ni bde chen gsal bar bya// nyi ma zla bar ldan pa yis// thig le rgyas shing brtul zhugs ldan// byin rlabs mnyes par gyur nas ni// 'dod chags thig le

rgyas byed pa'i// bstan bcos bye brag brtsam par bya// shes rab thabs kyis g.yas bzung ste// stod smad bkug pas kyo ba blta// dbang po yul bsdus 'khyud pa ni// gsang ba chen po'i zhags pa'o// stod smad

shin tu bsdams byas te// ma skyes mi stong sgrog gi las// bskyod pa ha si bde sgra sgrogs// kun tu drag tu bde myang ho// thabs dang shes rab yi ge bcus// ming dang lhan cig skyes pa brtag/ snang ba gsum las

'das pa yi// rnam rtog dngas shing bde chen la// slob mas bde chen myong ba'i tshe// phyi nang zhen rtog ma lus pa// gnyis med ngang du gnas gyur nas// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal// dbang po yul sems

ldan pa yis// dran rtog skye 'gag rgyu 'bras rnams// sems lngas bde ba smin pa dang// sa bcu'i khyad par rdzogs par bya// rnam rtog bya btsal yul 'das pa'i// bde chen thig le mi rtog pa// sangs rgyas kun

gyi thugs nyid de// gnyis med bde chen ngo bor brtag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen ni// rgyu 'bras 'gro 'ong kun bral ba// thabs dang shes rab mi phyed pa// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang bar dgongs// ma lus

gsang bar ro gcig pas// ye shes sgyu ma bde chen po// gcig dang du ma'i sa las 'das// ye shes rtse mo mchog tu 'dod// rdo rje slob dpon byin rlabs kyis// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba la brten nas// dug gis dug
nad sel ba ltar// skal ldan mchog la bstan pa yin// bde chen thig le mi g.yo ba// rgyu 'bras dbyer med byang chub sems// cig car dbang gis mun bsal nas// ma lus bde ba chen por skye// gang tshe zhen

pa kun bral ba'i// rang byung thig le gsal ba'i tshe// skye 'gag gnas dmigs 'gro 'ong chos// zhen rtag bde chen ngo bor bzlog/ rgyun chad pa dang mi 'phel dang// rang rgyud pa dang byin med pa// 'jig rten

log pa mthar gyur pas// 'di dag rnam par spang bar bya// de nas gang du mtshan ldan pa'i// yid 'ong phyag rgya la brten cing// rgyu ba rlung gi drod ldan pas// de ma thag par grol bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i thig
le rgyun bral ba// 'gro 'ong med pa'i thabs nyid kyis// rang byung thig le 'pho 'gyur med// rtogs nas goms par gnas par bya// 'dren pa'i thabs stobs las byung bas// bde ba chen po mi g.yo ba// rnam
shes mtshan ma'i yul las 'das// bde ba chen po thog mtha' med// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni// ma skyes bden gnyis dbyer med pa'i// ngo bor ma lus kun gsal ba// mi 'gyur brtan
par brjod pa yin// skal dman thabs kyi bde spyod na// steng 'og thabs kyis gnas byas la// shes rab 'phrul gyi 'khor lo bskor// rgyas dang 'byongs pa'i rtags byung na// rgyu ba bcad la 'khor lo
spang// bde chen bar chad med 'dod na// thabs kyi rim bzhin bsgom pa dang// shes rab yum gyi de bzhin te// yang na gnyis su med pas bya// rang rang thabs dang ldan par brtsam// bar chad dag ni 'byung
ba na// thabs dang ldan pas bskyed par bya// lus la brten pas sems gang ste// phyi nang bde chen rgyas par bya// de nas nam mkha'i mtha' thug par// khyad par bar chad med par gnas// goms pa'i rim
dang byin rlabs las// mkha' 'gro gsum gyi snang thob nas// zhing khams phyogs bcu rdul snyed bcas// bde chen zag pa med par gnas// dang po byin rlabs smad thob nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa mtha' thug

pa// tshes nas bcu drug mthar phyin ltar// man ngag stobs kyis shes par bya// lung dang rigs pa la sogs pa'i// yid dpyod tshad ma ring spangs nas// nyams myong tshad ma la brten pas// rim spangs tshe 'di

nyid kyis 'grub// las dang skal ba dman pa dang// bla ma thabs la rgyab kyis phyogs// log pa'i skye bo'i dbang song ba'i// gang zag 'di dag rnam par spangs// thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mi spyad

pa ni gang yang med// mi bya ba yang yod min te// bza' dang mi bza' cung zad med// 'di la sdom dang mi sdom med// thams cad mnyam pa nyid sbyor bas// bya dang mi bya kun las 'das// snang srid 'dod yon
lngar gnas te// bde chen rigs ma kun nas dag/ ma lus yid 'phrog tshims byed pas// sgo gsum phyogs su gtad du med// bya med bya las 'das pa yi// rjes su mi dmigs de bzhin nyid// ma bcos rang
rig yul dang bral// gang du blo gtad gang 'dzin med// ma bcos thabs kyis bder bzhag pas// rang byung ye shes mtha' dbus med// gcig dang du ma kun bral bas// thams cad ma lus chos kyi

sku// bden gnyis tha snyad las 'das pa'i// ma skyes rang rig byang chub sems// yi ge tshig dang ming spangs pa'i// brjod bya ma lus rdzogs par snang// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud
las/ snod byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid// gcig dang du ma kun bral ba'i// dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyi// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par
mdzad// phyogs bcu dus bzhis bsdus pa yi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// tshogs gnyis las byung bsam mi khyab// rang byung 'khor lo mngon rdzogs pa// dngos po'i 'jig rten mtha'

yas pa// sku gsung rdo rje gyur pa ni// dngos por snang ba thams cad nyid// rang byung sgyu 'phrul rgya mtshor bstan// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// phyi nang gsang bar 'jug pa yi// rtog pa bzhi la rtogs
goms nas// ma lus lhun rdzogs dbyer med snang// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i// chos nyid dbyings su tshul gcig pas// ma lus rang snang chos thams cad// ma lus byang chub sems su rtogs// sku
gsung thugs nyid rang snang ba'i// ma lus gsung gi rgyan du rtogs// thams cad gsung gi yi ge ste// thabs dang ldan pas rgyas btab bo// de nyid dbyer med byin rlabs las// de nyid de yi byin rlabs

te// gnyis med tshul gyis rang snang bas// byin rlabs ngo mtshar bsam mi khyab// rang byung rang snang chos 'di dag/ gnyis med rang rig ma skyes par// gsal bar mngon sum the tshom med// rtog pa kun gyi
mchog tu bshad// dngas ma las byung thig le yis// zin dang ma zin khyad par las// 'das dang ma 'das rang snang bas// bde chen nang du ro gcig pa'o// rang byung 'khor lo'i rim pa las// gsung gi
dkyil 'khor rang snang ba// skye dang ma skyes dbyer med pas// yig 'bru'i tshul dang nges par brjod// gang du thabs kyis byin gyis brlabs// gnas dang rtogs pa'i ngo bo yis// rim pa'i tshul gyis byin

brlabs pa'i// 'di dag byin gyis brlabs nyid de// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// rig pa'i phyag rgya mngon gsal bas// sgro dang skur pa zhi ba yi// de kho na nyid mngon du snang// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med
pa'i// bde ba chen po'i ro nyid ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te// gnyis med gnyis las gang gyur pa// de nyid thig le'i bdag nyid do// sgra dbyangs gsung gi bstan pa rnams// gnas bzhi thig le'i
byang chub sems// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// mi zad 'khor lo gsum du snang// gnas dang thabs dang sbyar ba yang// gsang ba'i byin rlabs rang snang ba// thams cad bde ba chen po ste// de yi

byin rlabs nyid snang ngo// sgro skur med pa'i bstan pa nyid// bde chen rlung gi sbyor thabs kyis// snang srid phyi nang chos rnams kun// bde chen sgyu mar mngon sum snang// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med
pa'i// yul dang dbang po rnam shes dang// dus dang mtshan mar bcas pa yi// 'dul thabs nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis// thams cad rang gi thabs bzhin du// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor snang// de nyid sgrub
pa'i yo byad lnga// ma nyams gsal bar rab spyad na// bdag gzhan ji snyed snang ba rnams// ma lus dag pa'i ngo bor 'gyur// de tshe las kyi gzungs ma bzhi// rig pa'i rtsal las grub pa

ste// gnas skabs rim par sbyor ba yi// lhun grub nyid la the tshom med// bsnyen dang nye bsnyen sgrub pa dang// sgrub pa chen po'i rim pa yi// sbyor ba bzhi ni brtsam par bya// bde chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
gyis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// dgyes mnyam thim pa'i ro ldan pa// thabs dang ldan pas blangs spyad pas// gang 'dod 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// bdag gzhan phyi nang las byung ba'i// ma lus
bsgral bya thams cad ni// so so bya ba kun snang yang// kun gyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid// bdag nyid gsal bar mngon bsgoms te// ting 'dzin thabs kyis mngon bsgral te// 'jigs pa chen po'i sa thob
nas// brtul zhugs mnyam pa'i thabs kyis ni// bde chen ma skyes sras su brlab// kun bzang thugs dang gnyis su med// phyi nang gsang ba'i rang bzhin gyis// snod bcud rgyud rnams dag pa ni// bde ba chen
po'i zhing khams nyid// ma lus dag pa nyid du gsal// sku gsung thugs la rab gnas shing// cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yi// gnas dang longs spyod ci 'tshams par// bde ba chen po phongs med
par// longs spyod ldan zhing dka' thub spangs// gnas dang longs spyod rgyan rnams dang// 'byor pa ci bder brten pa ni// gang yang 'grub ste gzhan du min// longs spyod dga' bas mi gdung zhing// yab
yum 'dod pa lngar ldan pas// brtson pa'i tshul bzhin rab bsgrubs na// rdo rje'i lus dang rnam smin du// tha mal 'di yis 'grub par 'gyur// sa nas sar ni mngon 'phel ba// bla ma thabs dang gzungs stobs

kyis// gong bzhin las skal dag pa ni// myur du bar chad med par 'grub// las dang dngos grub phra mo dag/ chu rlabs lta bur rang snang ba// byin rlabs sngags dang ting 'dzin gyis// ji ltar 'dod par 'byung

'gyur te// nga rgyal zhen pa'i tshul dang bral// las dang dngos grub thams cad la// zhen chags sbyor ba kun spangs la// bdag nyid chen po'i sbyor tshul gyis// 'di ni ci bder 'grub par bya// thabs dang shes

rab ldan pa yis// ma chags thabs kyi sbyor ba ni// yengs pa med par rab bsgrubs na// myur du 'grub ste gzhan du med// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa thams cad la// gnyis med sbyor ba khyad par che// gang du 'di
yi thabs ldan pas// ji ltar spyad kyang 'grub par 'gyur// ma chags pa la chags spyad pas// chags pa nyid kyang 'grub 'gyur te// spyod lam kun tu gnas pa yi// 'di yis 'grub ste gzhan du min// bde chen
phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor dang// lhun grub la gnas cho ga bzhin// dus dang rang rang skal ba bzhin// le lo the tshom med brtson pas// rab 'bring tha ma ji bzhin 'thob// 'thob bya kun gyi ngo bo

ni// rang byung gsal ba'i snying po ste// gzung 'dzin tha dad kun gyis stongs// byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'bar ba nyid// bde chen sku
gsung thugs nyid de// rang byung nyid las gzhan ma yin// thog med dus nas rab sbyangs pa'i// skal ldan dam las ma nyams pas// rang rang cho ga bzhin bsgrubs na// sangs rgyas tshe 'dis 'grub 'gyur
na// rig 'dzin sa la smos ci dgos// rang rang goms pa'i thabs nyid de// mos dang 'tshams pa'i khyad par blta// gzhan du cho ga nyams par 'gyur// dpal ldan rang gi dam tshig 'dis// bskal pa bye bar

mi 'grub pa// nyi shu lnga ldan lhun grub sa// skye ba 'di la the tshom med// bya ba byed la ma chags shing// gnyis med sgyu mar gsal goms na// dka' thub gdung ba kun spangs pas// 'di nyid la ni dga' bar
'grub// ces nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// tshogs kyi 'khor lo gsang ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba dgyes chen
pos// bskal pa brgya stong dpag med du// rnyed par dka' ba'i 'bras bu ste// sgyu 'phrul lam la brten pa yis// tshe 'dis 'bras bu thob phyir bshad// gsang sngags lam la gnas byas shing// thabs dang
shes rab dbyer med pas// mtshan ma'i bya ba spangs pa yis// 'di'am bar mar chos sku thob// gang du bden gnyis dbyer med pa'i// don la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// byed pa sdom pa'i man ngag

gis// phyi nang dngas snyigs 'byed pa'i rlung// snying po a la phog pa yis// bde chen stong pa'i thig ler mnyam// snyigs ma'i bag chags sangs gyur nas// bde chen nam mkha'i mtha' ltar rgyas// thabs dang

shes rab nyi zla'i bcud// bsnyen bsgrub bzhi la goms pa yis// rang nyams rtags dang rtsa rlung gi/ dug gis dug nad sel ba ltar// lhan cig skyes pa mngon du 'char// de nyid bde la mi rtog pa'i// bar chad
spangs pas 'grub pa yis// mun pa snang bas gsal ba ltar// ma lus bde ba chen por snang// bdag gzhan bral ba'i bde chen gyis// nam mkha' 'od kyis gang ba ltar// dug gsum ma spangs nan tan
bya// gsal bar mngon du nan tan bya// mngon du gsal nas ma bsgoms par// dbye ba med par gsal bar bya// bde chen nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam pa// bskal pa rdul snyed 'phel 'grib dang// 'gro 'ong
med pa'i ngo bo ni// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'chang// thog ma mtha' ma med pa ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// dang por rang bzhin skye med pa'i// mi dmigs pa las 'das pa yi// de
bzhin nyid de ma bcos pa'i// rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin dngos med pa'i// bdag gzhan dngos 'dzin zhen bral ba'i// de bzhin nyid ni ma bcos pa'i// rang bzhin ngang gi

rnam par bsgom// dngos dang dngos med zhen bral ba'i// rang bzhin ye shes kun snang 'od// nam mkha' lta bur phyogs med pa'i// sgru ma lta bur bsam par bya// rig pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin las// thabs dang

shes rab nyi zla'i gdan// hUM bcas rdo rje 'od du 'bar// phra mo rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// gang yang rung ba'i yab yum bsgom// gang rung phra mo'i rang bzhin las// tshad dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ste// skyon dang bral
bas rtag bsgoms shing// de dag gsal zhing brtan par bya// gnas lnga dang ni gnas gsum dang// gnas gcig phyag rgyar gsal bar bsgom// de nas sangs rgyas rgya gcig las// thabs dang shes rab phye ba
yis// brgyad cu gsal bar bsgom par bya// de nas ye shes lnga sogs pas// sku gsung thugs la nan tan bya// ye shes sems dpa' goms gyur nas// rigs bzhi'i sems dpa' yab yum dang// kun
bzang yab yum sgo bar bcas// sprul sku la sogs de bzhin gshegs// de nas rgyang grags dpag tshad dam// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs par// 'jigs dang

bcas pa'i tshul bzhin bsgom// gang du gang ltar mdzes pa yi// spyod pa rim bzhin brtsam bya ste// dang po bya ba bral ba ste// de nas thugs rje chen po nyid// gsum pa rtse gcig ldan pa ste// tha ma tshogs kyi spyod
pa ni// rim pa bzhin du legs par spyad// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// yid 'ong rab dben sa phyogs su// bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas// dge zhing bkra shis phun sum tshogs// bza' btung

ro mchog ldan pa dang// glu gar rol mo tshig stabs bro// rgyan dang bgo ba phun sum tshogs// thabs dang shes rab nyi zlar ldan// glu tshig sgra dang ldan pa yis// tshe la dbang bsgyur gnas thob nas// goms nas
phyag rgya'i rigs su nges// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa las ni// bcu drug rgyun gyi sangs rgyas sa// dri can dman pa'i gang zag la// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbang bskur bas// zhing dang longs spyod ting 'dzin
stobs// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa yis// 'bras bu lhun grub ngo bor 'gyur// gzhan du bsod nams chung ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// gcig tu sbyor ba'i ngo bo nyid// yab yum sbyor
ba gcig tu bsgom// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i ngo bo nyid// ngo bo gcig dang tshul gcig dang// sku gsung thugs ni gcig bstan nas// byin rlabs dngos grub stsol bar mdzad// dpag tu med pa'i
rgyal ba rnams// sku gsung thugs su snang ba yi// mi zad 'khor lo rang snang don// ngo bo gcig tu 'dus par 'gyur// de dag nyid kyis thob 'gyur bas// khyad par gzhan nas yod ma yin// sangs rgyas zhing
khams dpag med pa'i// rang byung byang chub snying po ste// 'khor lo yi ge kun 'dus pa// thob pas sna tshogs 'phro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// til 'bru rdul phran grangs mnyam

par// rang byung ye shes nyid kyi gzugs// de ma thag par thob par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// ye shes rgya mtsho zag pa med// che ba kun rdzogs gsang ba'i don// bla med thabs chen 'bras
bur gnas// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phru rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i theg pa'i lam bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid// gsang ba'i longs spyod
byang chub sems// dgyes pa chen pos tshim mdzad nas// gsang ba'i don 'di bstan par mdzad// gang du gsang ba'i rang bzhin ni// phyogs cha mtshan ma las 'das pa'i// rang rig brjod pa'i yul 'das
pa// dngos med dngos po kun gyi gnas// 'di nyid kun gyi yul yin pas// rang bzhin brtags dang bsgribs pa yis// la las dmus long ji bzhin du// bye brag yul du ma gyur te// tha mal zhen pa'i rang rgyud
pa// 'di ni 'jig rten phal pa nyid// rang bzhin ngo bo la sogs pa// byed pa med cing gnyen po med// gdod nas rang shugs kyis 'grub pa// ther zug rtag pa rang rgyud pa// gang yang med par glo bur

du// snang ba 'jig rten 'di dag ni// sngon med phyis med gdod nas snang// phyis snang bar yang ji ltar rung// la lar tha dad rtog pa ste// chos kyi bdag la dngos por 'dzin// la la bden gnyis rkyen byas
nas// rten 'brel 'khor lo 'gog par byed// la lar tha dad mi gnas te// rig pa'i rgyun ldan mi rtog 'dod// gzhan dag rig pa rnam med de// nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dmigs pa med// la lar sgyu ma'i don
la gnas// la lar cha shas med pa yi// mtha' yi spros pa rnam par bcad// gang la gnyen po kun dang bral// gnyen po'i don ni mtha' la gnas// la las las dang bya ba dang// dka' thub sdom pa'i tshul la
gnas// la las lta spyod tha dad pas// bsgom dang spyad pas 'bras bu 'dod// la las byin rlabs rnal 'byor gyis// bsgoms pas 'bras bu thob par 'dod// rang bzhin gsang ba'i mtshan ma nyid// rdo
rje theg pa'i snying po ni// yi ge sgra tshig las 'das pa// gsang sngags kun gyi ngo bor 'dod// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bka' rgyud theg pa'i snying po ste// gab sbas gsang ba'i rang
bzhin pas// rtog ge pa yi yul ma yin// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa yi// thabs dang cho gas byin brlabs pa'i// slob dpon thabs kyis shes gyur te// dman pas rtogs goms yul ma yin// thog ma
mtha' ma med pa yi// gdod nas dbyer med gsum ldan pa'i// gang du rtogs goms gsal ba yis// sgo gsum rang lhar gsal ba la// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dag tu bsgoms// sku gsum rdo rje gsum las
byung// ye shes lnga yis rgyas btab la// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// gzhan yang de bzhin shes par bya// phung po 'byung ba rnam shes dang// yul dang dbang po dus su bcas// 'khor lo gsal

bar brtags byas te// ma lus sku gsung thugs kyi ngang// zag med ye shes thig le la// ye shes 'bras bu lhun gyis rdzogs// bdag nyid rig pa rang snang ba'i// snying po rdzogs pa'i thig le la// ma lus chos

kun rang snang bas// ye shes sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar khyab par snang// gsang ba'i thig le chos kyi dbyings// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rgya bral

ba'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// rang byung snying po gsal mthong bas// 'bras bu ye shes lhun rdzogs pas// thob bya gzhan na yod ma yin// rang byung snying po'i dngas ma la// byin rlabs rtogs pa'i
dkyil 'khor gyis// gsal ba la ni goms byas pas// thig le dngas ma ma lus byung// ye shes lnga rdzogs dkyil 'khor nyid// zag med bde ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// nam mkha' lta bur khyab par

gnas// rang byung thig le mi shigs pa// 'byung bzhi thams cad kun gyi rgyu// 'byung ba'i dngas ma kun gyi yum// chen po rgyal ba'irang bzhin nyid// byang chub sems dang dbang po dang// yul dus yan lag

bcas pa nyid// rangabyung rten gyi thig le yis// nam mkha'i gzugs can skye ba med// tha mal 'byung ba la brten nas// lhag pa'i ro la thugs kyis blta// snying po thig ler mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i dkyil
'khor bsam mi khyab// rang byung thig le 'pho 'gyur med// gzhi la rang bzhin thim pa yi// zag med bde ba'i dkyil 'khor tshogs// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba thig le kun gyi
dbyings// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lhun rdzogs pa// che ba'i yon tan bsam yas pa// kun gyi ngo bor rang shar ba// ma lus zhal mthong dbang bsgyur bas// 'bras bu grangs 'das lhun gyis rdzogs// rgyan
dang che ba'i yon tan nyid// rang byung don goms mthar phyin pas// thugs rje rang snang dkyil 'khor nyid// phyogs med zhing khams mtha' yas par// rdzogs pa'i zhing khams sna
tshogs spyod// thabs dang shes rab lhun rdzogs pa'i// dbyer med gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// thig le bcud 'dus rten nyid la// bcu drug lnga 'dus rnam par bsgom// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med

pa'i// thabs kyi cho ga las byung ba// gcig la'ang ye shes lnga rdzogs pa// zag med khyab pas mtha' dbus med// gsang ba'i thig le lhan cig skyes// bde ba'i longs spyod kun gyi dbyings// 'jug sgo bzhi yi
phyag rgya las// 'byung bzhi rigs kyi yum du snang// phung po bde bar rgyas btab pas// dbang po yul sems rang bzhin thabs// kun bzang rig pa'i dkyil 'khor la// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin

gyis// rten dang brten par mnyam sbyor bas// ye shes lnga ni rang gsal bas// bde ba'i ye shes dgyes pa che// ma bsgoms bde ba'i longs spyod kyis// bde chen sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid gsal// bde ba'i rol mo
bsam yas pa// gsang ba'i thig le ma skyes pa// kun gyi rang bzhin gnyis su med// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mtha' yas pa// rgyal ba'i che ba ma lus pa// lhan cig skyes par zhal mthong zhing// thig ler rlung
sogs dbang bsgyur bas// ma lus ye shes bde mchog yin// rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor la// zag med dkyil 'khor rang gnas nyid// mthong goms rdzogs pas lhun gyis grub// ma spangs rang la lhun
grub pas// ma lus dkyil 'khor rgyan du gnas// 'byung 'jug med pa'i dkyil 'khor la// che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pas// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' thug par// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor phyogs med

snang// bya byed med pa'i tshul gcig pa// rang byung snying po dkyil 'khor mchog/ thun mong thun mong ma yin pa// shes rab yum la mnyam sbyar nas// rang byung 'bras bu lhun gyis grub// bskal pa rdul snyed

grangs 'das nas// mos dang sbyangs pa'i rang bzhin gyi// gsang ba'i don la gang zhugs pa// tshe 'dis rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur// 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs pa'i// rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi bcud// 'dus

pa'i gsang chen 'di yin te// lam gyi dam pa nye lam yin// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs dag na// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed// bstan pa phyi nang gsang ba kun// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las 'phros te// lam

gyi dam pa nye lam yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dang// bya ba spyod dang rnal 'byor dang// rnal 'byor chen po bla med pa// ma lus 'dus shing 'byung ba'i phyir// dngos grub brlabs chen kun 'byung
ba'i// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud chen 'di// mos dang mthong dang bris pa dang// bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur na// rtogs dang goms pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'bras bu thob par smos ci

dgos// rang byung dkyil 'khor kun 'dus pa'i// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul drwa ba ste// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog/ snying po las ni snying po mchog/ ces nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/
gsang ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa chen po// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa des// gdul bya'i bsam pa sna tshogs phyir// 'bras bu'i cho 'phrul snang bar
mdzad// ji snyed rang byung dkyil 'khor rnams// bya byed med pa rang snang bas// thig le chen por lhun rdzogs pa'i// bdag gzhan dbyer med de bzhin nyid// phyogs bcu rgya yang ma chad pa'i// bde chen

longs spyod dpag tu med// zhing khams 'khor dang che ba nyid// rang snang 'khor lo rang snang nyid// ma lus rang snang sku yi tshogs// bsam yas rdul dang til gang bzhin// gang mos blo la snang byed pa// gdul
bya mos pa'i don du zad// gang du ma bcos de bzhin nyid// rang gi ngo bo gsal 'gyur pa// kun gyi rang bzhin rkyen bral ba// snga phyi med par kun mkhyen mchog/ dus gsum phyogs bcu mtha' yas
kun// dbyer med rdo rje nyid snang bas// phyogs med byin rlabs gnyen po bral// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par bzhugs// mi phyed rdo rje'i rang bzhin la// brjod bya'i rang bzhin lhun rdzogs pas// dbyer

med ngo bo kun snang bas// mi phyed gsung ni kun gyi mchog/ tshig dang yi ge kun bral bas// ma brjod dgongs pa brdas bstan pas// mnyam pa chen po'i tshul du ston// rang byung ye shes byin rlabs ni// gcig
dang du ma las 'das pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings ltar gnas pa yi// dgongs pa chen por brdal ba nyid// rang rig skye ba med pa las// ji snyed chos sku rang snang ba// mtha' dbus spros pa bcad pa yi// de
bzhin nyid kyis gsungs pa med// thugs rje byin brlabs rang snang ba// sgra dang dbyibs la sogs pa rnams// mtshon pa thabs ni dpag med du// thugs rje byin rlabs snang bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi
yon tan mchog/ sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las// rgyal ba rigs lnga snang mdzad de// re re zhing khams gdan sogs snang// rang byung dmigs med byang chub sems// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen
po// rnam dag dri med 'od gsal bas// mkhyen pa'i ye shes bzhir gsal nas// thams cad gdod nas dbyer med pas// gang dag de ltar mkhyen pa yis// bdag gzhan bya byed med pa yis// phrin las lngar
ni snang bar 'gyur// steng 'og brten pa las byung ba'i// ye shes brten pa de bzhin nyid// sku dang gsung dang thugs 'khor lo// yon tan kun gyi las dang sbyar// dbyibs dang yi ge rang bzhin

las// nam mkha' lta bu'i lnga rdzogs pa// zag med yon tan lhun rdzogs pa// byas pa med par rnam bzhi rdzogs// rang byung 'bras bu rten bral ba'i// ngo bo dbyer med de bzhin nyid// bzhon pa rlung gi stobs
bral bas// thig le 'gro 'ong 'du 'phro med// dbang bsgyur phung po 'jig med pas// 'byung bzhi 'du ba'i tshogs dang bral// rig pa rlung la dbang bsgyur bas// sdug bsngal chu bo'i 'jigs dang bral// ye
shes ting 'dzin las las 'grub// shes rab stobs sogs mnyam sbyor bas// 'phel 'grib thig le 'byung 'jug med// tshe dang lus dang bde ba dang// ye shes zag med zungs ldan pas// ma lus zhing sogs
dag pa ste// bdud bzhi skye sogs bar chad med// 'byung bzhi dngas ma la brten pas// rig pa'i bde chen bar chad med// rnam rtog 'gyu ba'i rlung dngas pas// bde chen nam mkha'i mtha' ltar gnas// tha

ma'i dbang la rang snang bas// zhing khams rgya mtsho rdul snyed kyi// thabs dang shes rab mnyam par gnas// dri can nyid la dbang bskur bas// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor kun sad de// rmongs pa sangs ltar mngon
sangs rgyas// de nas nam mkha'i mtha' thug par// bde ba chen po'i sku nyid dang// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad cing// bde chen mi rtog gsal ba'i thugs// zhing khams phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed du// yon
tan bsam yas mngon bstan nas// gdul bya'i don ni ji snyed pa// ma lus mdzad pas tshims par mdzad// lam dang mdzad pa zhing khams dag/ sa dang khams dang mthun par snang// snod bcud rgyud zhen dri ma
gsum// nyi zla sems mthun mtha' yang 'gro 'ong gis// gnas su 'dren pa'i lam nyid kyis// dag pa yab yum ye shes gsal// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// 'khor 'das dbyer med rang bzhin
la// 'bru gsum mtshams nas rang zlog pas// thabs la brten pa'i gar bskyod pas// ma skyes lhan cig skyes par gsal// rten can rlung dang thig le la// rang byung goms pa'i blo yis blta// rkyen dang bral

bas mngon gyur na// sems kyi thig le 'chor ba med// rang byung bde ba mngon sum ste// goms dang thugs rje rang snang ba'i// 'dod yon longs spyod sna tshogs la// lha mo rol rtsed stong gi bdag/ grangs med
'khor lo'i tshul bskor bas// ma g.yos bde ba kun khyab can// phung sogs rtogs pa thams cad kun// bde chen ye shes lnga ru gsal// de nyid bcu gsum sangs rgyas sa// ye shes dbyings nyid rang gnas
pa'i// khams gnyis 'dus pa'i thabs las skyes// skyes pa nyid na bdag tu gsal// thabs la mkhas pa'i khyad par gyis// gang la 'dul ba'i tshul snang ba// yang dag log pa yod med
kyi// shes rab spyan gnyis yul gcig kyang/ thabs lus kyang// sA lu phug bgrod snang med bzhin// ldog med stobs su rdzogs pa nyid// dang po 'jug pa'i rim pa nas// mtha' ma mthar phyin rdzogs bar
du// phyi nang gsang sogs ji bzhin par// skye 'gag gnas dmigs 'gro 'ong gis// g.yo sems skyes la mos spyad kyang// zab mo bsgrags pas bskyed rim brtan// smon lam 'dod yon 'jug pa
yang// gnyis med don la sdang ba med// gnas pa dang ni mnyam gsum gyis// yid ches shes rab 'phel bar byed// rgyun du gnas pa'i spros bcas tshe// mthar lam nyid la sbyor ba'o// bsgrub pa'i rgyu yis mi

ldog pa// de goms phyi ma'i rig rigs kyang/ las bstan// lhun grub phyi tshe yongs su rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba thig le rdzogs skyes pa// rang bzhin med pa'i sgyu mar 'gag/ de
nyid ma skyes dbyer med gnas// gnyis med rtogs pa gang dmigs pas// 'gro 'ong med pa'i 'bras bu 'char// bslad pa'i tshig bral sgro skur med// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu bdag po dang// gnyis med don las mi
