rol// hU~M hU~M hU~M gis char chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed che// zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi sgrol zhing gnon// gzhal yas ljang nag chen por ni// 'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang

po rnams// khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan// srog chags chen po'i pags chen yang// tsham ngam chen po'i na bzar gsol// cir yang sgyur ba'i gzugs chen po// che'o che'o dpal chen po// sangs rgyas sku yang

chem chem gsol// srog chags gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 'jigs byed sku ste cho 'phrul ba// drag shul gsung gi nga ro yis// gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje mngan sems khrag chen dang// gsod
cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la// shin tu dgyes pa chen por ston// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu

dgyes// hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ha ha ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha sa/ ru ru rak+ta/ ka ka kar ma/ yo gi ni/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// kro

d+hi shwa ri de bzhin rigs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// khro gnyer spyan gsum mche gtsigs shing// dbu skra muny+dzA rgya bcings te// thod rlon mang pos rgyan du byas// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i
sdong mig can// ser nag gyad gyi 'dor tshul du// b+han+d+ha rak+tar ldan pa yis// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis gtso la stobs// dur khrod 'bar ba'i me chen dbus// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gnon tshul

du// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// rdo rje gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing// srin lag mthe bong rtse gnyis kyis// a mr-i ta la sogs pa lnga// blangs te thugs dam skul bar mdzad// dgyes pas rdo
rje pad+mar 'jog/ rol phyir sta na mchog kyang mdzad// ka la gyi la dgyes pas rol// rdor dbyug tri shUl sti ra za// a ahi hi gad mos 'gengs// thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du// 'jigs rten ji
srid thams cad sdud// khams gsum kun gyi dbang sgyur mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// pags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par// kun kyang thal ba bzhin

du rlog/ khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na// thabs chen po yang chem chem gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i dgyes chen yang// rol pas dbang du bsdus nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// zas su srog chags
kun gsol ba// ma hA maM sas sku brgyan cing// zla gam mchod pa chen po yis// khrag 'thung chen po 'dzum par mdzad// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston cing// nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad// rnal 'byor

dbang phyug chen mo ste// dam tshig can la dngos grub sbyin// khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni// hub hub hub kyis zhal du gsol// rdul gyi gong bu mang po rnams// chem chem chem gyis zhal du gsol// sod
ci sod cig dpal gyi yum// choms shig choms shig dpal gyi yum/ gtogs shig gtogs shig dpal gyi yum// sregs shig sregs shig dpal gyi yum// chings shig chings shig dpal gyi yum// gnod
par byed pa'i bdud rnams kun// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid

pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ A ho sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA/ sid d+ha rU pe dza/ lo hi ni la sha ta tsa ra na a khi ya me hu b+ho ga yo ka sa ma yo b+ha be/ ta ru la sarba yo

gi ma hA na ra nri/ rak+ta dzA ya/ so khya ma nu bi la si/ ka ba sa ma le ma ku d+ha/ tri shU la rak+Sha b+ho ga yo gi ni/ ma hA sa hu maN+Da la ti la ka ban d+ha na/ a la la ho// rdo rje yum chen rgyal gcig ma// kro d+hi shwa ri dpal gyi

yum// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi ldan ma// keng rus 'bum gyi gdan la bzhugs// smug nag gyad kyi 'dor tshul du// b+han d+ha rak+ta gtso la stobs// gdugs pa'i tshogs chen mang po
rnams// mnyes byed phyir na sku la 'khril// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing// dbu skra muny+dzA rgya bcings te// thod rlon mang pos rgyan du

byas// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// tsit+ta'i glo snying mang po rnams// zhal du gsol nas 'khril zhing bzhugs// chags pa'i gar thabs chen po yis// gdug pa chen po'i sprin 'phro zhing// las su
gsod la shin tu dgyes// dur khrod 'bar ba'i me chen dbus// zhabs ni brkyang bskum chen por bzhugs// rdo rje gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing// srin lag mthe bong rtse gnyis kyis// a mr-i ta la sogs pa

lnga// dang ba'i sku la rab brgyan cing// dgyes pas rdo rje pad+mar 'jog/ rol phyir sta na mchog kyang mdzad// ka la ki las rol bas dgyes// rdo rje rnge'u chung rdung ba dang// tri shUl 'phen cing sti ra za// a a hi hi
gad mos 'gengs// thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du// 'jig rten ji srid thams cad sdud// khams gsum kun gyi dbang sgyur mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// pags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi
gsol// dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par// kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rlog/ khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pas na// thabs chen po yang chem chem gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i 'gegs chen yang// rol bas

dbang du bsdus nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// kha T+wAM ga la rgyab brten byas// rol la rngam pa'i cha lugs kyis// bka' las 'das pa 'phrog cing gsol// zas su
srog chags kun gsol ba// ma hA maM sas sku brgyan cing// zla gam mchod pa chen pos ni// khrag 'thung ba yi mdog skyed cing// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston cing// nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad// rnal
'byor dbang phyug chen mo ste// dam tshig can la dngos grub sbyin// khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni// hub hub hub kyis zhal du gsol// keng rus rdul gyi gong bu rnams// chem chem gyis ni zhal du
gsol// sod cig sod cig rdo rje yum// choms shig choms shig rdo rje yum// gtogs shig gtogs shig rdo rje yum// sregs shig sregs shig rdo rje yum// chings shig chings shig rdo rje yum// gnod par
byed pa'i bdud rnams kyang// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs pa// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas

na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// o~M hU~M sa twa ka ra rU pa// rak+ta dzA la si pany+tsa ta thA ga ta sid d+ha kA ya rU pa/ pany+tsa tsit+ta ta thA ga ta rU po/ ta thA ga ta b+ha ga sid d+hi/ yo ga yo gi dzA la d+ha/ ha na ban d+ha na A la
la la ho// rin chen khros pa'i rgyal gcig ma// tshad med bzhi yi yon tan can// bkres skom phongs la gter sbyin mdzad// rang bzhin rnal 'byor yid bzhin gter// mi zad mdzod du gyur pas

na// rnal 'byor ma zhes mtshan du gsol// ye shes khro mo khro rgyal gtso// dag pas mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba'i yum// mthing nag gyad kyi 'dor tshul gyis// b+han d+ha rak+ta gtso la stobs// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi ldan

ma// gdug pa'i tshogs chen mang po rnams// mnyes pa'i phyir ni sku la 'khril// nu 'bur stod smad dbye zhing 'gying// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yon du 'gying stabs sbyor ba yis// thal sgra

drag pos gdug pa gsod// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing// dbu skra muny+dzA rgya bcings shing// thod rlon mang pos rgyan du byas// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// yan lag gcad gtubs phral
nas kyang// zhal du gsol nas chags pas 'khril// chags pa'i gar thabs chen pos ni// gdug pa chen po'i sprin 'phro zhing// las su gsod la shin tu dgyes// dur khrod 'bar ba'i me chen dbus// zhabs

ni brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// rin chen gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing// srin lag sbar gyis khrag chen 'thung// dgyes pas rdo rje pad+mar 'jog/ rol phyir sta na

mchog kyang mdzad// ka la ki las dgyes pas rol// dbyug pa rnge'u chung kha T+wAM 'dzin// glo snying yan lag kun gsol zhing// a a hi hi bzhad mos 'gengs// rol pa'i rkan sgras thog thog g.yo// rdo rje spyugs
pas dgyes mdzad pa'i// thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du// gsad pa'i dur khrod kun gsol mdzad// khams gsum kun gyi dbang mdzad ma// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// pags chen brjid pa'i g.yang
gzhi gsol// dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par// kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rlog/ khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na/ thabs chen po yang chem chem gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i bgegs chen yang// rol pas
dbang du bsdus nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// ro la brkam pa'i yum chen mo// bka' las 'das pa 'phrog cing gsol// zas su srog chags kun gsol ba// ma hA maM sas sku brgyan cing// zla
gam mchod pa chen pos ni// khrag 'thung pa yang 'dzum par mdzad// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston pas// nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad// rnal 'byor yum chen chen mo ste// dam tshig can la dngos grub
sbyin// khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni// hub hub kyis ni zhal du gsol// sti ra che chung mang po rnams// chem chem kyis ni zhal du gsol// sod cig sod cig rin chen yum// choms shig choms shig rin
chen yum// gtogs shig gtogs shig rin chen yum// sregs shig sregs shig rin chen yum// chings shig chings shig rin chen yum// gnod par byed pa'i bdud rnams kyang// rab tu rol
la tshul bzhin du// khag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin

tu dgyes// o~M hU~M sangs rgyas kun gyi mi zad rgyan dang ldan pa rang bzhin he ru dpal// dur khrod bdag por za byed yum chen mo// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan gter ldan ma// byang chub snying po'i dgongs pa nges

ldan bsnams shing gsol// rmongs pa log pa lnga dang ldan rnams drongs la tshul bzhin stobs// kun gyi dbang mo dbang dang ldan pa'i yum chen kun rol cig/ sems dpa' khrag 'thung nyid kyang sku la thim par
rol// khrag chen gsol zhing glo snying za la brkam pas rnal 'byor kun gyi las mdzod cig/ bdag dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad rdzogs pa yin// a la la la ho// sku gsung thugs ldan rnal

'byor ma// pad+ma'i gsung gi sangs rgyas yum// chags pa'i pad+ma rgya cig ma// yum chen kro d+hi shwa ri ste// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// dmar nag sku yi cha lugs ma// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir

bgrad// rdo rje b+han d+har ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// chags pa'i thal mo brkyang nas kyang// khrag 'thung pad+ma'i sku la 'khril// glog stong 'gyur ba'i 'od mnga' bas// mun pa nag

po thibs po sel// sdang mig mche gtsigs tshems rnon gsod// rnge'u chung rdung zhing stir chen za// sha khrag 'dzag cing ro la brkam// bya byed mang po'i nus mthu yis// lha chen po yi mgo yang 'gems// tshangs pa
chen po'i pags chen yang// yum chen mo yi na bzar gsol// muny+dzA cod pan ral pa can// gdug pa tshogs chen mang pos bskor// thod rlon rgyan gyi phreng bas brgyan// brkyang bskum sti ra'i gdan stengs

na// gyad kyi dgyes pa'i 'dor tshul gyis// sta na byed cing ro la brkam// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// bgegs chen kun la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// bskal pa'i me dpung

chen po'i dbus// tshogs la rol la tshul bzhin du// dang ba'i sku la rgyan du byas// tsham ngam drag shul sder tshogs dang// dur khrod las la shin tu dgyes// 'di dag dgongs pa'i dam tshig ste// de bzhin ma

byas nyid sgrol zhes// dbang phyug rgyal pos rab tu gsungs so// o~M pany+tsa rU pe b+hi ta rU pe b+hi ta rU la pad+ma ma ma kro d+hi shwa ri sa ma ya yod b+ha bad/ sarba b+hi sha rU pe sa ma yo gi ni hU~M/ b+hi yu li ga tha pad+ma kro d+hi shwa ri sa
ma yo gi ni/ a ha ha ma na sa ma ya yo gi ni// pany+tsa rU pe sid+d+ha hU~M/ ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na khA hi hi/ las kyi rigs kyi yum chen mo// sku mdog ljang gnag 'jigs pa'i sku// phyag gnyis gyad kyi

'dor thabs kyis// b+han d+har rak+tas gtso la stobs// snum chen ldan zhing ro la brkam// kro d+hi shwa ri yum chen mo// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// khro gnyer sdang mig mche gtsigs shing// nyi ma

'bum gyi gzi ldan zhing// gdug pa'i tshogs chen mang po rnams// mnyes byed phyir ni sku la 'khril// nu 'burastod smad dbye zhing 'gying// g.yon du 'gying stabs sbyor ba yis// thal sgra drag pos gdug pa

gsod// dbu skra muny+dzA rgya bcings shing// thod rlon mang pos rgyan du byas// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// yan lag nang grol drangs nas kyang// zhal du gsol nas chags pas 'khril// chags pa'i
gar thabs chen po yis// gdug pa chen po'i sprin 'phro zhing// las su gsod la shin tu dgyes// dur khrod 'bar ba'i me chen dbus// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum snol mar yang// keng rus tshogs chen gdan la

bzhugs// pad+ma gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing// snyim pa sbar gyis khrag chen 'thung// dgyes pas rdo rje pad+mar 'jog/ rol phyir sta na mchog kyang mdzad// ka la ki las dgyes pas rol// ral gri dgra sta rnge'u
chung zhing// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis phyag na bsnams// sti ra'i zhags pa 'dren cing gsol// a a hi hi bzhad mos dgyes// rol pa'i rkan sgras stong gsum g.yo// rdo rje spyugs pas dgyes mdzad
pa'i// thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du// khams gsum ma lus kun 'dus pa// khams gsum kun gyi dbang mdzad ma// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// pags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// dpal
chen 'bar ba ma gtogs pa// kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rlog/ khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na// thabs chen po yang chem chem gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i bgegs chen yang// rol pas dbang du bsdus nas
ni// khrag 'thung las kyi zhal du stobs// ro la brkam pa'i yum chen mo// bka' las 'das pa 'phrog cing gsol// zas su srog chags kun gsol ba// ma hA maM sas sku brgyan cing// zla gam mchod pa chen po
stobs// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston pas// nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad// rnal 'byor yum gcig chen mo dang// dam tshig can la dngos grub sbyin// khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni// hub hub
kyis ni zhal du gsol// sti ra che chung mang po rnams// chem chem kyis ni zhal du gsol// sod cig sod cig las kyi yum// choms shig choms shig las kyi yum// gtogs shig gtogs shig las kyi
yum// chings shig sdoms shig las kyi yum// srigs shig snoms shig las kyi yum// gnod par byed pa'i bdud rnams kyang// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du
stobs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs pa// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// ha ha khA hi khA hi// o~M hU~M las su gsod la dga'
ba'i rnal 'byor ma// bde gshegs las kyi rigs kun sku la rdzogs par rab snang yum chen mo// tsham ngam brlang ba'i za stangs gar dang bcas te gtso la stobs// kun gyi dbang dang ldan pa bsod nams
lus la dbang sgyur ma// sder chags mang po'i tshogs dang bcas te rol cing dgyes par mdzod// sha khrag dmar chen mchog la dga' bas dang du kun long la// rnal 'byor dam tshig can la byin gyis
rlobs// a la la ho// dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs ka nas// rnam par bsgyur ba'i gzugs byung ba// cir yang 'gyur ba'i sku mnga' ba// rnal 'byor sngo gnag ke'u ri ma// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs

shing// ral pa 'khyil pa'i muny+dzA la// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// mi lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku
yi rgyan du byas// 'jig rten sreg pa'i me dkyil nas// tsham ngam gzugs sku chen po yis// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje b+han d+har ldan pa

yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// sder chen glo snying 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// dbyug pa rnge'u chung phyag na bsnams// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang// dgyes pa chen
po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs nas tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig

gis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// tsham ngam skus ni tshul bzhin du// dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni// ro la brkam pa'i stangs kyis su// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// rol cig sprul cig rnal
'byor ma// sod cig longs shig rnal 'byor ma// gtor cig sbyongs shig rnal 'byor ma// choms shig choms shig rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu
dgyes// drongs shig drongs shig dza dza// chings shig chings shig hU~M hU~M// sdoms shig sdoms shig ha ha// rol cig rol cig phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ sku yi dkyil 'khor mdzod stong
pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// rnal 'byor ser nag tsau rI ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs 'chang ba// khro gnyer sman bgrad mche gtsigs shing// ral pa 'khyil ba'i muny+dzA la// thod rlon

tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// mi lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// 'jig rten sreg pa'i me

dkyil nas// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje b+han d+har ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// stir

chen glo snying 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// drag shul mda' 'phen 'gengs pa yis// dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs kar gzo// rnge'u chung tri shUl phyag na bsnams// 'jigs su rung ba'i
rkan sgra dang// dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs kar gzo// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sku la

stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung 'bar

ba'i sku la stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// tsham ngam skus ni tshul bzhin du// dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni// ro la brkam
pa'i za stangs kyis// khrag 'thung 'bar ma'i zhal du stobs// rol cig sprul cig rnal 'byor ma// sod cig long shig rnal 'byor ma// gtogs shig sbyongs shig rnal 'byor ma// choms shig choms shig rnal

'byor ma// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// drongs shig drongs shig dzaHdzaH/ chings shig chings shig hU~M hU~M// sdoms shig sdoms shig ha ha// sgrol cig sgrol cig phaT

phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ khro mo rnal 'byor dmar nag sku// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ral pa muny+dzA rgya bcings shing// thod rlon mang po'i cod
pan can// sti ra'i phreng bas rgyan du byas// ko rlon mang po'i na bzar gsol// mi lpags g.yang gzhi sham thabs can// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// gsung gi dkyil 'khor mdzod gtong

ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// rnal 'byor chen mo pra mo ha// dur khrod mang po'i tshogs dang ni// bsur chen sreg pa'i me chen dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i
gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje b+han d+har ldan pa yis// khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol// stir chen glo snying 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du

stobs// chu srin rgyal mtshan rnge'u chung rdung// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang// dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung 'bar
ba'i zhal du stobs// khams gsum za byed zhal du stobs// pad+ma gsung gi yum chen mo// gzhal yas dmar nag chen po nas// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen

kun// tsham ngam skus ni tshul bzhin du// dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni// gar mkhan chen mo'i stobs tshul gyis// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khro mo rnal 'byor khyod kyis rol// khro mo rnal 'byor khyod

kyis sod// khro mo rnal 'byor khyod kyis ni// longs shig chings la tshul bzhin du// gtogs shig sbyongs la bsnams su gsol// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ ha ha ha/ khA

hi khA hi khA hi/ rnal 'byor khro mo mthing nag sku// stir chen za ba'i be ta lI// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ral pa 'khyil pa'i muny+dzA la// thod rlon tshogs kyis

rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// mi lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// 'jig rten sreg pa'i me dkyil na// tsham

gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ral pa 'khyil ba'i muny+dzA la// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// mi lpags rlon

drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ye shes sku yi cha lugs kyis// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// srin lag mthe bong rtse sprad

de// a mr-i ta la sogs pa lnga// ljags lam dbang por sku brgyan cing// a hoHsra kas dgyes shing 'khril// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i

sgrol cig phaT phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ o~M hU~M ta thA ga ta su pa u go ba/ kro d+ha ki li/ sa ma ya yo gi ni/ ma hA maN+Da la/ ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha/ kA la kriSh+NA pi ta lo hi ti dzA la su khe na yA mi/ yo ga kA ya/

sarba bud+d+ha la/ ma hA he ru ka/ sa ma ya yo ga ru lu yot+tam dz+wa la ni/ ha na d+ha ha rU pe pa dzaHsarba sid+d+hi kA ru NI ka/ ma hA su khe na/ ba tha ra su khe na sa ma ya yo ga dzA la a su A/ bo ga yo gi sid+d+hi a la la hoH/ mu khA
gsod byed seng ge'i mgo// ser nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs kyis// phyag gi thal mo bsnol nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i

sdang mig can// mche tshogs mang po'i 'khor du byas// zhe sdang 'joms ma'i za byed ma// ma hA rak+tas sku brgyan cing// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// mthing nag seng ge'i ral pa phyar// thod rlon

nas// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong// srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing// bsod nams lus kyang chem chem

can// phyag gnyis bdud rtsi thal sbyar zhing// shin tu dga' ba'i mdangs kyis 'khril// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// mche tshogs mang po'i 'khor du

byas// nga rgyal 'joms pa'i za byed ma// ma hA rak+tas sku brgyan cing// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i
g.yang gzhi gsol// se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// thod rlon phreng bas lus brgyan cing// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la
bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong// srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing// bsod nams lus kyang chem chem gsol// b+han d+ha rak+ta zhal du stobs// dgra stas klad 'gems lcags kyus

'dren// rnge'u chung rdung zhing stir chen za// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang// dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen
po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma/ stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar du gcod pa'i bgegs chen rnams// ro la bskam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin

du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu khA gsod byed dur rkun mgo// sngo gnag gyad kyi 'gying stabs kyis// stir chung za zhing gtso la stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche
gtsigs shing// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// mche tshogs mang po 'khor du byas// 'dod chags 'joms ma'i za byed ma// thal chen rak+tas sku brgyan cing// dbu gsum phyag drug

zhabs bzhir bgrad// thod rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// thod rlon mang po'i phreng bas brgyan// dur khrod
chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong// srog chags chen po'i snying 'dren cing// bsod nams

lus kyang chem chem gsol// spu gris mgo gcod rnge'u rdung zhing// kha T+wAM 'phen cing b+han d+ha 'thung// gsod la dga' ba'i mu khA ste// zhags pas 'ching ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra
dang// dgyes pa chen mo'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drangs

te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de bzhin brlag/ mu kA gsod byed shwa na'i mgo// mthing nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can// glo snying 'dren cing gtso la stobs// khro
gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// mche tshogs mang po'i 'khor du byas// phrag dog 'joms pa'i za byed ma// thal chen khrag gis sku brgyan can// dbu gsum phyag

drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur
khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong// srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing// bsod

nams lus kyang chem chem gsol// b+han d+ha rak+tas zhal du stobs// kha T+wAM 'phen cing rnge'u chung rdung// zhing chen za ba'i mu khA ste// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang// dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol

snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs

chen rnams// ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu khA gsod byed bya rgod mgo// dmar nag gyad kyi
'gying stabs can// zhing chen rgyu 'dren zhal du stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrad zhal gdangs shing// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyan du byas// gti mug

'joms pa'i za byed ma// thal chen khrag gis sku brgyan cing// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// thod rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi

gsol// sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi

'da' thugs dam skong// srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing// bsod nams lus kyang chem chem gsol// b+han d+har 'thung zhing rnge'u chung rdung// zhing chung ril mid zangs gris 'debs// zhing chen za ba'i mu khA

ste// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang// dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen

mo mkha' 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de
bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu khA gsod byed snar mgo ring// ser nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can// zhing chen lag gis gtso la stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrad zhal gdangs shing// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i

sdang mig can// gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyan du byas// bka' las 'das pa za byed ma// ma hA rak+tas sku brgyan cing// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// thod rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan// ye shes

sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing
chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong// srog chags mang po'i snying nas 'dren// bsod nams lus kyang chem chem gsol// b+han d+ha rak+tas zhal du stobs// dbyug pas
klad 'gems rnge'u chung rdung// zhing chen za ba'i mu khA ste// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang// dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin

du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drongs
la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu khA gsod byed bya rog mgo/ mthing nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can// rdo rje klad 'gems spu gris

gcod// b+han d+har khrag chen gtso la stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrad zhal gdangs shing// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyan du byas// zhing bcu gsod cing za byed ma// ma hA

rak+tas sku brgyan cing// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// sti ra chung ngu mang po'i
tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong// srog

chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing// bsod nams sku yang chem chem gsol// kha T+wAM 'phen cing rnge'u chung rdung// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang// dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs
nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen

rnams// ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu khA gsod byed 'ug pa'i mgo// ser nag gyad kyi 'gying

stabs kyis// lag gnyis b+han d+has khrag chen stobs// snying chen glo snying 'dren tshal du// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyan du

byas// sha khrag za ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// ma hA rak+tas sku brgyan cing// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// thod rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang

gzhi gsol// sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me chen dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las
mi 'da' thugs dam skong// srog chags chen po'i snying 'dren cing// bsod nams lus kyang chem chem gsol// lcags kyis 'dren cing rnge'u rdung rol// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang// dgyes pa chen

po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig
gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ khA hi
khA hi/ rdo rje bka' yi pho nya rnams// rdo rje bran mo gtum bag can// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po ste// sna tshogs las rnams grub par byed// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i
sdang mig can// dmar ser mi srin chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig pa la phyag drug gzugs// b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs// g.yag chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin

byed// zhing za lcags kyus tri shUl 'phen// spu gris gsod cing rgyu 'dren zhags// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs
glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar skya tshangs ma chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug
'jigs pa'i gzugs// b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs// sbrul gdug mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rtse lnga rdo rje zhing chen za// kha T+wAM 'phen cing lcags kyu
zhags// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum tshul gyis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin byed// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par
mdzod// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ser nag khro mo chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dril 'khrol dbyug to stir chen za// b+han
d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs// gzig chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// lcags kyus 'dren tshul spu gris 'debs// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum

rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig
can// dkar dmar khyab 'jug chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs// bya bang mgo yi zhal gdangs nas// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin

byed// sti ra khrag chen kha T+wAM rnge'u// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de
grub par mdzod// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ser nag gzhon nu chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen rgyu

'dren gtso la stobs// pha wang mgo can zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// b+han dmar kha T+wAM 'khor lo 'dril// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen
gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar ser
dbang mo chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen khog 'dre gtso la stobs// dred chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// b+han

dmar dbyug chen lcags kyus 'dril// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod
las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar mo 'phrog chen chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen rgyu 'dren
zhags pas stobs// dom chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dril 'khrol lcags kyu dung dmar dbyug/ thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing

chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// sngo nag
bdud rtsi chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs// chu srin mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// kha T+wAM mda'

'phen rin chen yum// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par

byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// sngo skya zhi ba chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// glo snying 'dren cing gtso la stobs// sdig chen

mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dril 'khrol rtse lnga dung dmar dang// rin chen bum pa khros pas 'dzin// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing
chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig
can// nag mo be con chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// stir chen glo snying 'dren cing stobs// khra chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// khrag

chen dung 'thung kha T+wAM 'phen// gris 'debs rgyu zhags dbang phyug ma// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya
sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba 'i sdang mig can// ser nag khro mo chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i

gzugs// b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs// wa chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// zhing chen rgyu 'dren sti ra'i rnge'u// rab tu gtum pas kha T+wAM 'phen// thod rlon g.yang

gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs klu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan
ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// mthing nag za byed chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// stir chen snying 'dren gtso la stobs// stag chen mgo yi zhal gdangs
shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dung dmar dril 'khrol kha T+wAM gris// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin
du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dma' mo khrag 'thung chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig
phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// bgegs 'dul lcags kyus zhal du stobs// rgod chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dung dmar zhing dbyug kha T+wAM 'phen// thod rlon

g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka'
nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar mo khrag 'thung chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs// rta chen mgo yi zhal gdangs
shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rtse lnga dril dbyug kha T+wAM 'phen// zhing chen za ba'i dbang phyug ma// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen
gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dkar dmar
gcig pu chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs// byi chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rdo rje tri shUl dril
dbyug zhing// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par
byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar nag yid 'phrog chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// stir chung za zhing gtso la

stobs// spyang chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// kha T+wAM dung dmar lcags kyu gri// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal
'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci'adod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dkar dmar grub pa chags

pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// stir chen glo snying gtso la stobs// pu shud mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// pad+ma kha T+wAM dung dmar zhags// thod

rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi
bka' sdod ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ljang ser klu mo chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs// sha chen mgo yi zhal gdangs

shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rnge'u rdung kha T+wAM gri 'debs zhing// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs
glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar nag gsod chen chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug
'jigs pa'i gzugs// stir chen glo snying gtso la stobs// spang ti mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rdo rje ral gri rnge'u chung rdung// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan
du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan
ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ljang dmar me mo chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen rgyu 'dren zhal du stobs// skyin chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra

dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dung dmar kha T+wAM lcags kyu dril// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag
rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ljang ser phag mo chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i

gzugs// b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs// phag chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rtse lnga zhing za kha T+wAM gri// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang
gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig
can// ljang nag sna chad chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// bdud rtsi dung dmar zhal du stobs// rnga chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// kha

T+wAM zangs gri zhags pa 'dzin// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub

par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// sngo skya chu mo chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen glo snying 'dren cing stobs// bya

rog mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dung dmar dril 'khrol kha T+wAM gri// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi

bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar skya rgan mo chags pas 'gying// dbu
gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// bdud rtsi dung dmar zhal du stobs// skeg chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin du// dbyug dril kha T+wAM rgyu 'dren cing// thod

rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi
bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// gnag cing nag mo chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chung za zhing gtso la stobs// khu byug mgo yi zhal gdangs

shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// lcags kyu dung dmar kha T+wAMgri// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu
phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// sngon mo ra na chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i
gzugs// zhing chen rgyu zhags 'debs shing stobs// ra chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dung dmar kha T+wAM dril chen zhags// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du

byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs
su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar mo bum rna chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs// spre'u chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas

bka' bzhin byed// zhing chen kha T+wAM 'phen tshul du// lcags sgrog kun 'dzin zangs gris 'debs// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka'
bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ljang nag gsus 'dzin chags pas 'gying// dbu

gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen glo snying gtso la stobs// spyang chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dril chen sgra sgrogs dung dmar 'thung// kha T+wAM 'phen

cing rnge'u chung za// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par
byos// pho nya rdo rje dbang phyug ma// cir yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs can rnams// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po yis// dam bcas bzhin du las kun byos// de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i

sprin// rnam par spros pa bdud btul ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje he ru ka khrag 'thung chen po rnams byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las/ o~M ma hA tsit+tA maN+Da la/ kro d+ha ha ha

ha/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ tsa tur yo gI ni hring hring hring/ tring tring tring/ mring mring mring/ kring kring kring/ ha ha ha zhes brjod pas rdo rje he ru ka sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa khros pas rngam par gnas so// rat+na he

ru ka sbyin pa'i khro ba mdzad do// chags pa'i he ru ka dang sku dbang gi tshul gyis shin tu khro ba mdzad do// las kyi he ru ka kun du mi mdzad pa med pa'i tshul gyis gdug pa'i khro bo chen po'o// de dag kyang rdo rje

'dzin ma khro mo dang// rin chen dbyug to ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang// pad+ma b+han d+ha 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang// las kyi dbyug to ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang bcas pa rnams brkyang bskum gyi stabs kyis

dpal he ru ka la 'khril nas gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa chen por gnas so// de'i phyi rim na rnal 'byor chen mo dkar mo dang// rnal 'byor chen mo skul byed ma dang/ gsod byed ma dang/ za byed ma
dang/ rnal 'byor ma dang/ gtum mo dang/ rnal 'byor ma las grub par byed ma dang/ rdo rje rigs byed ma dang/ dbang sdud chen mo dang/ drag po'i cha byad kyis khrag dang keng rus kyi dkyil na zhabs

gnyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas so// de'i phyi rim na rdo rje phra men chen mo dang/ seng ge mgo chen mo stabs dang ldan ma dang// stag mgo chen mo stabs dang ldan ma dang/

myos byed rta mgo chen mo dang/ 'ug pa'i mgo can dang/ bya rgod mgo gsod byed stabs chen mo dang/ mchu rings mgo can gcod byed chen mo dang/ wa'i mgo can skul byed ma'i stabs chen mo dang/ rab tu sgra

'byin gyi mgo can dang/ rnam par rab tu sgyus gsod mdzad pha wang mgo can chen mo dang/ mi gtong bar za bar byed ma phag gi mgo can zhe sdang chen mo rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang/ gdug pa'i mtshon dang
chas nas gnas par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba las rnam par bsgyur ba'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste le'u bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gtum pa chen mo dang/ rnam

par sgyur ba'i tshogs rmongs pa sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dgyes par mdzad de 'di dag phyung bas kun du g.yo ba chen po mdzad do// o~M sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA shrI he ru ka sarba kha thaM/ du pa tsa ma hA tsaN+Da hU~M

hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ o~M ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA rat+na he ru ka sarba kha taM d+hu/ pa tsa ma hA tsaN+Da trA~M trA~M trA~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ o~M sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA shrI pad+ma he ru ka sarba kha taM ma d+hu/ hrIM hrIM hrIM hrIM hrIM/

phaT phaT phaT/ o~M sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA shrI karma he ru ka sarba kha taM d+hu/ pa tsa ma hA tsaN+Da ha ha ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la ha la hU~M/ o~M sarba ma hA kAru Ni kA ya/ bud+d+ha lo tsa nA DA ki ni/ ha na ha na

ha na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba kA ru Ni kA ya/ badzra lo tsa na ma hA DA ki ni d+ha ka d+ha ka hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ rat+na lo tsa na DA' ki ni/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA pad+ma

lo tsa na DA ki ni d+ha ha d+ha ha d+ha ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ karma lo tsa na ma hA DA ki ni tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hU~M hU~M hU~M/ trU~M trU~M ha~M/ hroM hroM hroM/ ha ha ha/ phaT phaT phaT/ o~M ru lu gau rI/ o~M ru lu tsau rI/ o~M ru lu pra

mo hA/ o~M ru lu be ta li/ o~M ru lu tsaN+Da lI/ o~M ru lu g+hasma rI/ o~M ru lu sma shA nI/ bin d+ha bin d+ha/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/ ha na ha na ha na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ o~M tsau ra ka ra sid+ha he he/ o~M gau ra ka ra byA g+h+ri he he/ o~M tsai ra

ka ka ra sri gla he he/ o~M shwa na ka ra gr-i D+ha he he/ o~M kAng ka ka ra kA ka phaT phaT/ o~M ga ta ka ra pany+tsa ma he he phaT/ hasta ka ra U lu ka he he he/ hriM hriM hriM/ phaT phaT/ ma hA tsa tur yo gi ni ha ha ha/ he he he/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/

phaT phaT/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu/ khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi/ phaT

phaT phaT/ sa ma ya sa ma ya/ yo ga yo gi ni phaT phaT phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas thams cad rab tu brgyal/ rab tu dngangs/ rab tu myos/ rab tu bsgral bar gyur to// bsnams shing gsol nas mi gnas
par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mnyes pa las sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rngam pa'i stabs kyis dzaHdzaHdzaHhU~M hU~M

hoHhoHzhes par mdzad do// mngon spyod kyi las kyi sbyor ba sbyor ba chen po mdzad do// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mdzod nas gsang ba'i yum gyi pad+ma yongs su yangs pa'i nang du sems can gyi tshogs byang chub sems su

mdzad nas mkha' phab ste sras su bskyed par mdzad de mdzad nas dran pa rnyed do// sangs rgyas kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa me dpung bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshon cha dang dbu dang zhal mang zhing skyi bung zhes byed

pa dngangs shing gsod par mthong ste smras pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i khro bo rnams// shin tu bde ba'i gnas shig gnas// bton pa skal ba rab tu chung// da ni ci mdzad la gor mdzod// lha cig rje cig 'on zhes
smras pa'i tshig gis sems can gyi mtshan ma 'byongs par gyur par mkhyen to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rab tu smros la gnong long shig/ rje la gus par dam nos la// 'di la
gnas par skal med pas// phyi yi dkyil 'khor sa la 'dug/ ces bka' stsal pas dngangs pa rtas par gyur te/ rdo rje bran mo'i mna' bor nas smras pa/ skyes mchog lha rjes su zhig lags// 'bangs dang
bka' stsal bdag cag nyan// phyi yi gnas su gnas su bgyi// ma sring bran g.yog 'khor yug rnams// 'jigs pa'i skus ni gzhes su gsol// ci mdzad khyod mkhyen gzhes su gsol// yun du skal ldan
gzhes su gsol// bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba'i rnams// de ring dam mnos slan chad du// 'khor rnams skyong bar mi bgyid dam// bka' bzhin las kun mi sgrub bam// theg pa 'dzin la mi stong
ngam// bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor mi zin na// da lta bzhin du 'jigs pa dang// shi nas dmyal bar shog ces smras te mna' bor ro// de nas khrag 'thung chen pos cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa las rab tu

gsod byed ma dang/ tshangs pa mo dang/ gzhon nu mo dang/ dbang mo dang/ grub mo dang/ bskyod chen mo dang/ rdo rje ra gdong chen mo dang/ mi mo rlag par byed pa chen mo dang/ phag mo gsod byed ma dang/ gtum

par mdzad ma dang/ brlan par mdzad ma dang/ phag chen mo dang/ nag mo ral pa chen mo dang/ rdo rje 'dzin ma chen mo dang/ rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang/ rdo rje rgan byad chen mo dang/ rdo rje yid 'phrog par byed ma

dang/ rab tu gcig tu za ba mo dang/ rdo rje srin mo'i cha byad chen mo dang/ sngo gnag chen mo dang/ ljang nag chen mo dang/ be con chen mo dang/ zhi ba bum sna chen mo dang/ las la grub pa mo dang/ bka' nyan

par byed ma dang/ tsham ngam gyi gzugs dang/ drag shul ma dang/ nyul ba mor tshul ston ma de dag la sogs pa ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams rab tu gus par bka' nyan te/ rdo rje bran mor bka' nyan te// rdo rje
bran mor dam blangs nas// ci 'dod las rnams bdag cag bgyid// ces mna' bor te 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang/ mtshon cha dang/ gnas pa'i gzhir bcas te phyi'i snam bu la gnas pa'i las byed par
gnas so// de dag gi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa bshad de// dkyil 'khor phyi rol gru bzhir bcas// dbus su zla gam rak+tar bcas// bA su ta yi maN+Da la// dri chu rak+ta'i tshom bur bri// hrIHlas dbus su bco

brgyad gzugs// yang na dbu gsum phyag drug pa// thod pa b+han d+ha dmar chen bkang// brgyad dam nyi shu dgu ru ldan// yang na lnga dang ldan pa la// lnga pa'i yi ges byin gyis brlab// zad 'phro phud dang ldan pa
la// u ts+tshuSh+ta yi sngags kyis bzlas// thod pa dmar blugs btung bya zhing// ming ngam b+h+yo 'am ru lu yis// mngon sum phyin par bos nas ni// kha nas rak+tas rab gtor te// he ru ka yi las rnams
kun// gong nas 'byung ba'i las bzhin bya// sgeg mo na chung de dag la// dbang gi chags pas 'dod spyad de// ta ma la yi phur bus gdab// ci 'dod las rnams grub par sbyin// chags dang gsod dang rgyags
pa che// mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis// tsau ra ka ra'i 'khor rnams kyang// bzhi yi las la 'jug par ni// ming tsam 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bskul na rtse gcig las rnams 'grub// de nas kun du
bzang mo chen mos ming tsam du chos thams cad gnas par mkhyen to// gsang ba sgyu 'phrul chen po 'di bsdu ba chen po mdzad do// de nas sems dpa' rnal 'byor mchog/ kun kyang sems dpa' rnal 'byor
mchog/ chos kun ming tsam rnal 'byor yin// ming tsam rnal 'byor ma yin par// sems dpa' rnal 'byor 'ga' yang med// de nyid dus gsum rang bzhin te// de nyid kun du bzang mo mchog/ sgyu 'phrul drwa
ba'i rgyud dag las// sems ma rdo rje de dag las// gsang ba'i nges don gang yang med// ces chos thams cad 'dus pa chen mor mkhyen to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi he ru ka 'dus pa chen mo'i
dkyil 'khor te le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//// a hoHrgyu nyid stong pas 'bras bu mngon sum pa// byin gyis brlab tu med pas byin gyis brlab pas 'grub// sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyid kyang sems can yin zhes
rgyal bas gsungs// de nyid mi mdzad med par shes pa kun gyi nang na rab tu bsngags// chags pa mi gtong chags pa mngon sum dgongs pa yin pas dkyil 'khor gong ma kun gyi ngang// sgrub la dga' bas

bsgrub tu med phyir bsgrubs pas 'grub ces rgyal bas rab tu gsungs// pho mo med phyir pho mo snang la dga' ba spyod brtson rgyal bas 'grub ces bsgrub pa kun gyis gsungs// stong par rtogs la spyod la g.yel
ba rnal 'byor min zhes rgyal bas gsungs// med la gtod cing dge sdig 'chol ba sdig can yin par rab tu gsal// dge sdig yod phyir brtson pas 'grub ces theg pa kun las 'byung// bag dang mi ldan
rang bzhin med par gnas pa la// gtso mchog mi bkur khungs phyin chos la mi brtson sems can yin par mngon sum gsal bar snang// de bas sgyu 'phrul gsang ba mchog 'di bu rnams gang zhig nyan brtson
pas// 'grus pa bslabs pa bag dang ldan pa lobs pa dang por ngo shes bya// skad cig gzugs la 'phangs pa med par gus ldan gsang ba'i sdud pa yin// rdo rje slob dpon mchog la dad pas sangs rgyas ma
lus kun la mchod pa chen po yin// lam la mkhas pas rdo rje slob dpon bkur ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ rnal 'byor dang/ rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu 'dun pa chen po skyes
te// mchod pa chen po bkur stis mchod// dkyil 'khor dang po phun sum tshogs// gnyis pa gsang ba'i mchod pa la// gsum pa rol pa gleng slong ba// khros pa'i sprin las bdud rnams btul// don gcig sgyu

'phrul bka' stsal pa// tshogs kyi mchod pa dgyes pa che// dus gsum rtag tu ma byung ba// lam la mkhas pa yin par bsngags// brtson dang ldan pas rab mnyan dang// gsang pa'i sgrub pa 'di bsgrub pa// kun
kyang kun du bzang po yin// bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa sel ba zhes bya ba sgyu 'phrul chen po rdzogs so////
bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ye shes bla ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na// sgyu

'phrul bla ma chen po ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma ste// rnal 'byor kun gyi gsang mchog bde// gnas gsang ba na bzhugs nas su// snying po bla ma 'di skad bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba bla ma'i longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje'i bdag nyid can/ ma lus

mi lus lus pa med pa thams ca da kyang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ shin tu gsang ba bla ma chen po'i dbyings 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na// gzhi tshad med pa'i ye

shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal las khang nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan bla ma chen po dpag tu med pas rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur

pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che bla ma'i glo 'bur bzhis mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes bla
mas kun du 'khyil ba/ ye shes bla ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang/ kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa/ spags pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes

rin po che bla ma'i phreng ba dang/ chun 'phyang dang/ shar bu'i rgyan dang/ gzugs dang sgra dang/ dri ro reg bya la sogs pa mi sgrib par gsal bar rang byung la/ gsal ba'i rgyan khyad par can bla mas bklubs pa/

tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang med pa kun yang bla ma chen po nang du gyur pa/ shin tu gsang ba bas khyab bdal ba'i bla ma chen

po'i gzhal yas khang na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i khri/ mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang/ stobs glang po che'i khri dang/ rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang/ dbang rma bya'i khri dang/ thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang/

rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang/ gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan brtsegs pa ni/ ye nas gsang ba bla ma'i phyir// yum gyi gzhal yas phyogs bcur 'bar// ye nas pha rol phyin

pa'i phyir// thogs pa med pa'i khri rkang brtan// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan 'bar zhing// gdod nas dri ma med pa'i phyir// rnam par dag pa pad+mo gdan// re ba yid bzhin
skong ba'i phyir// yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi gdan// ma bsags lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan// yon tan chen po'i gdan stengs na// sku mdun dang rgyab med

par thams cad tu zhal bla ma tha le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pas thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las sna tshogs par snang ba/ thabs dang shes rab kyi

zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/ bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po bla ma dang/ btsun mo dam pa sra ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po bla ma dang/ btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings

kyi bla ma dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po bla ma dang/ btsun mo dam pa mnyen pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po bla ma dang/ btsun mo dam pa dro ba'i dbyings kyi

bla ma dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po bla ma dang/ btsun mo dam pa bskyod pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma la sogs pa ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal kun kyang mthing ga dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/
le brgan dang/ ljang gu'i mdog bla mar 'tsher ba ste/ gnyis su med par 'khril bas chos kyi dbyings kun tu mtha' yas par bla ma chen po'i spyod pas khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang

bu'am mngar gyi sgrom bu bzhin kun du bde ba chen pos khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong dbang bla ma dang/ btsun mo gzigs par bya ba'i bla ma dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje thos dbang

bla ma dang/ btsun mo gsan par bya ba'i bla ma dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje snom dbang bla ma dang/ btsun mo mnam par bya ba'i bla ma dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje myang dbang bla ma dang/ btsun mo myang bar bya ba'i

bla ma dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje sogs shes bla ma dang/ btsun mo sgron ma'i bla ma dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje gcod shes bla ma dang/ btsun mo gdug pa'i bla ma dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje 'jug shes bla ma

dang/ btsun mo char 'bebs bla ma dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje 'dus pa'i bla ma dang/ btsun mo rgyas pa'i bla ma dang/ 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yas bla ma dang/ btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang/

'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yon bla ma dang/ btsun mo chad par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang/ 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg gsang bla ma dang/ btsun mo bdag tu ma yin pa'i bla ma dang/ 'joms pa chen po rdo rje

reg 'dus bla ma dang/ btsun mo mtshan mar ma yin pa'i bla ma dang/ de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par gsang ba dgyes pa'i dbyings bla ma na zhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor bla ma de nyid kyi gsang ba bla ma 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo// e ma'o de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid

dbang sgyur dkyil 'khor bla ma'i ngang// ngang nyid rnam dag bde mchog gsang ba'i dbyings// dbyings nyid mnyam sbyor bde mchog rin chen gter// mi zad gter ldan bdud rtsi gsang ba'i bla// bla med byang

chub thig le ya mtshan dkyil 'khor snang// rang snang ba nyid ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan rnam dag snang ba ni// sku gsung thugs yon phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor

lo bla ma rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do// rdo rje gsang ba bla ma'i nges don du'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las dbyings dang ye shes gsang ba'i bde ba'i bla ma nges pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste

dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das yid byed pa bla ma rdo rje kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i tshul rdo rjes btsun mo bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo'i bla ma la 'jug par gyur to// gsang ba'i bla ma'i
tshig 'di ched du brjod do// oM chos kyi chos nyid bya ba'i dbyings// kun du bzang mo bde ba'i yum// ma g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul bas// phyag rgya sna
tshogs so sor gsal// nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu// ma chags pad+ma'i gdan bting ba// dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas// rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la// phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag
ldan// dbang med skal ngan bsal ba'i phyir// nang gtan phyi rim lcags dang ldan// rgyal ba yongs kyi gsang ba'i chos// sus kyang gting dpag bka' ba ste// kun du bzang po nyid kyis gzigs// hoHde nas

btsun mo bya ba kun du bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do// o~M sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso// kun du bzang po rdo rje yid// ye shes brgyad kyi rang bzhin te// shar phyogs mngon dga'
bsam yas nas// nI la lta bu'i gter 'byin pa// gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi lde mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye ste// byang chub mchog gi nang gtan bkrol// ma chags pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'gro don

byang chub sems bskyed de// 'gro lnga skye bzhi dbang du bsdus// sku gsung thugs gnas dbang bskur ro// zhes gleng ngo// de nas bya ba mo kun tu bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i mchod pa 'di ched du phul lo// o~M
rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'jam 'di// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags kyis// bla med 'phrul gyi lde mig ste// dgyes mchog rdo rje gsor nas ni// bdud rtsi char chen dbab tu gsol// zhes ched du gleng

ngo// de nas yang yid byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos bdud rtsi bla ma'i char pas snod bcud kyi 'dzam bu'i gling tshim par bya ba'i phyir gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do// o~M rdo rje bla ma'i dgyes rab
'di// gsor nas bdud rtsi'i char dbab phyir// 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i gnas su gsor// mi dmigs bde dang spro ba 'di// kun du bzang mo dbyings su bskyil// zhes ched du gleng ste// gnyis su med pa las

nyid kyi spyod yul thams cad gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma khyad par du spags pa rdul phra mo snyed 'thon nas sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzad pa ni/ la la ni gsang ba bla ma'i dkyil

'khor du bzhugs te yan lag thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis rlob/ la la ni 'gro ba drug 'dul ba'i don du thub pa chen po drug tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ lha yi gnas na brgya byin mgon// lha ma yin la thags
zangs ris// mi la bdud 'dul shAkya mgon// yi dwags gnas na kha 'bar bde// byol song seng ge nyid du smra// dmyal ba la ni gshin rje mgon// sku dang cha lugs tshul ston cing// la la lhums zhugs sku la
bltams// la la tshul bsrung rab tu byung// la la bsnyen rdzogs dka' thub byed// la la dam nod 'gro ba sgrol// la la bcu drug chos la btsud// la la mer 'bar chur yang 'brug/ la la nam

mkha' sgra ru 'bar// la la rdo rje brag tu sra// la la gso gsod 'pham rgyal byed// la la bcing sgrol 'gug sgrol byed// la la bdud 'dul ngan song sbyong// la la dkyil 'khor mchod sprin 'khril// kun kyang

chos kyi 'khor lo skor// de ltar rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ theg pa dang po bcu drug mgon// gnyis pa bzhi yi lta spyod bsrung// gsum pa bcu gnyis nges par bstan// bzhi pa gnyis kyi

lta spyod sbyangs// bzhi pa'i theg pa mdor bsdus na// bla med theg pa'i dbyings su btsud// theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul che// mang

la 'brel bas drwa ba'i don// thun mong min pas gsang ba'i don// theg pa'i bcud de snying po'i dbyings// zhes ched du gleng ste/ snod bcud kyi 'jig rten rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang bar gnas sgyur ba dang/
phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// de nas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang// snyigs ma med par gsang ba bla

ma'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par sangs rgyas nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub
sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu can dang mA ma kI// me long gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing// thams cad ma lus chos so
cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// e ma'o phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye nas dben// srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing// snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan

gnas// phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi btsal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas
chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// de nas dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa las ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sna
tshogs snang ba rang bzhin gsang// gsang mchog snying po bla na med// thams cad gsang ba'i dbyings su nges// bla ma mchog gi snying po las// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// ces brjod

pas thams cad dbyings su nges par mkhyen to// de ltar yin na yang 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pas 'gro ba'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i ye shes bskyed pa'i
phyir rdo rje bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang// gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i//
bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin// sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa bor// bcings med rnam par grol med

pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad// spros kyang 'phel 'grib med pa'i dbyings// de ltar yin na yang de ltar ma rtogs pa rnams la// kun rdzob kyi phung po byang chub

kyi sems bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du sems kyi ngo bo bskyed pa'i phyir/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do// stong zhing dben pa'i sems nyid ni// rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med de// ci yang med la cir

yang snang// mi bskyod rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyang// sems kyi sgyu 'phrul chen po yin// gcig dang du mar mi dmigs te// mngon shes drug gis thams cad byed// bla

ma'i ting 'dzin chen po yis// dkyil 'khor chen po byed par bstan// rgyu lnga rkyen bzhis bsdus pa la// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor che phra bsgom// bzhi yi rim pa tshul bzhin byed// rgyan dang phyag rgya'i tshul rnams

kun// til 'bru'i nang du ri rab bskyed// sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor ngang// stangs dpyal gnyis kyi phyag rgya yang// ri rab til 'bru'i tshul bzhin du// dpe byad rgyan gyis brgyan spras pa'o// nges pas

bzhi bcu rtsa lnga bsgom// dbyings dang ye shes stangs dpyal gnyis// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// hoHgzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad de// yul la kun du bzang mo'o hoH// tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan
te// yul la khams gsum byams ma'o hoH// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te// yul la na bza' dkar mo'o hoH// 'du byed don yod grub pa ste// yul la dam tshig sgrol ma'o hoH// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa'

ste// yul la yangs pa'i spyan can ma hoH// mig la sa yi snying po ste// yul la dkar mo sgeg chen no hoH// sna la nam mkha'i snying po ste// yul la me tog dpa' phreng ma'o hoH// lce la spyan ras dbang phyug
ste// yul la chos kyi dbyangs can no hoH// rna bar phyag na rdo rje ste// yul la las kyi gar mkhan ma'o hoH// kun 'dus sgrib pa rnam sel te// yul la me tog char 'bebs hoH// kun shes kun tu
bzang po ste// yul la gsal ba'i sgron ma'o hoH// gcod shes byams pa'i bdag nyid de// yul la gdug pa'i sprin 'phro hoH// 'jug shes 'jam dpal gzhon nu ste// yul la tsan+dan char 'bebs so// g.yas
gnyis stobs chen khro bo ste// yul la gdong mo 'jigs tshul hoH// g.yon gnyis gshin rje'i gshed po ste// yul la sder 'phro 'jigs tshul hoH// gsang ba rta mgrin dpa' bo ste// yul la dur khrod bdag mo

hoH// lte bar bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste// yul la gtum mo 'jigs tshul hoH// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i gnas drug tu// thub drug phyag rgya chen po'o// kun tu sku dang kun du gsung// kun du thugs kyi phyag rgya

yang// lus ngag yid la de bzhin hoH// sems nyid sgyu 'phrul drwa ba ste// sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul chen po las// drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu lnga// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nges pa las// snying po'i dkyil 'khor bla
ma yin// zhes brjod pas sems can thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dbyer med par dgyes te mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings na bzhugs so// gsang ba'i
snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i ngang du sems kyi rang bzhin cir yang 'grub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang
bzhin gcig dang du mar dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma 'di dbyung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs
so// o~M ye shes bla ma rol ba yis// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar brtags na// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen

por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan rdo rje'i khyams// kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// seng ge

glang chen rta dang khyung// nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang// g.yas nas mthong thos mnam pa dang// myong dang

btsun mo tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni gcod byed dang// snang byed sogs byed 'jug byed rnams// btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas// bar khyams la ni thub drug dag/ rgyud drug sbyong ba'i phyag rgyar
gnas// de bzhin thig le chen po dag/ mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dag/ bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa dag/ btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor
lo rin po che// pad+ma'i ral gri nor bu 'bar// ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs mdog/ mnyen lcug
'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas

lhun gyis grub hoH/ zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul rnyed du gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba bla ma 'di sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las 'di dag phyung ngo// a hoHbde mchog ngo mtshar byang chub sems chen
po// thig le mnyam sbyor sgyu 'phrul bla ma'i dbyings// rnam dag thig le byang chub sems kyis rol// ngo mtshar rmad byung bla ma chen po'i dbyings hoH// dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs gsang ba'i
dbyings// ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor bla ma bsam mi khyab// mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab gsang ba'i dbyings// ye shes kun gsal dkyil 'khor spros med bla ma'i ngang// ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig

tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i bla ma chen po las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas ye shes rgyal po de btsun mo bla ma'i dbyings dang gnyis su med par gyur nas/ bde ba chen po

byang chub kyi sems rim par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa rtser chib nas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa phyogs bcu dus bzhir dgos par bzhed nas sku gsung thugs bla ma'i dbyings nas 'di dag phyung ngo// dang
po bla ma'i lung bstan pa// mtshon du med pa'i byang chub sems// ye shes snying po gsal ba dang// sgom pa rnam gsum dus gcig rdzogs// byang chub sems kyi thig le la// ma bkag lhun gyis rdzogs pas

na// de ni thig le chen po'i don// de ni de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// de ni kun du snang ba'i ngang// de ni rgyu yi rim par ldan hoH// gsang ba bla ma'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba bla ma'i nges don las// gsang ba gsung

gi dkyil 'khor grags// b+h+rU~M bi shwa bi shud d+he badzra swA hA/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra tsit+ta o~M// a a a badzra pa ta sa ma ya o~M// hU~M badzra d+h+r-ika/ mUM d+hA tu I shwa ri/ o~M dzi na dzika/ lA~M dwe Sha ra ti/ swA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ mA~M mo ha ra ti/ a~MHa

ro lika/ pA~M ra ga ra ti/ ha pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ tA~M badzra ra ti/ k+Shi hi rA dzA ya/ hU~M lA se sa ma ya s+t+waM/ trA~M a gar+b+ha ya/ trA~M mA le sa ma ya hoH/ hrIHha ho pad+ma ban+d+ha ma/ hrIHgI tir hoH/ ha~M dziM ku ru pa na hrIH/ AHnr-i t+ya rA

ga yA mi/ mai d+hA ri Ni swA hA/ dzaHd+hU pa pra be sha/ th+l+hIM ni sa ra ma bA ya swA hA/ hU~M puSh+pa a be sha/ hU~M sa rA dzA ya swA hA/ ba~M d+hU pi su k+Sha Ni/ mU~M shrI A ra~M gA ya swA hA/ hoHgan+d+he tsit+ta/ o~M mu ne kr-iM swA hA/ o~M mu ne hU~M drU~M swA hA/ o~M mu

ne pra~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne sru~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne k+Sha~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne ye swA hA/ hU~M ya mAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ o~M ma hA badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ hU~M pradz+nyAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ o~M ma hA rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/

hU~M pad+mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ o~M bi g+h+nAn+ta kr-ita hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA karma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ o~MHe h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoHsa ma ya

s+t+waM/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHo~M A~MHhU~M swA hA/ badzra sa ma ya/ badzra sa ma ya/ badzra sa ma ya/ badzra sa ma ya/ badzra sa ma ya/ o~M A~MHhU~M swA hA/ o~M ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad po che// skyon bral byang

chub sems chen po// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor bas// phyag rgya bla mar bdag sbyor cig/ o~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ o~M badzra sa ma yas+t+wa~M/ badzra sa ma ya hoHdzaHhU~M ba~M hoHzhes gsungs pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen
pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du grags/ rab tu grags// kun tu grags so// grags pas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas yang

ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal dag gnyis su med par rol pa mdzad pa bla ma la thim par gyur te/ de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// o~M chos

dbyings mnyam pa chen po las// ye shes gsal ba rnam par dag/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// skye med chos la dbang sgyur shog/ o~M ma hA gu h+ya ma shU n+ya tA d+harma dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ hU~M dag cing

gsal ba'i rang bzhin te// skyon med sems nyid rin po che// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur shog/ o~M ma hA gu h+ya ma hA A' dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ swA~M khams gsum re

skong rgyal po ste// yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi mchog/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// 'gro ba re skong rgyal por shog/ o~M ma hA gu h+ya ma hA sa man+ta A be sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ a~M nyes pa'i skyon

bral dri ma med// skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub ste// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// srid gsum nyes dmigs sel bar shog/ o~M ma hA gu h+ya ma hA pra ti pra be sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ hA dbyings kyi

dkyil 'khor mthar phyin cing// grub pa las kyi bye brag las// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// skye 'gro dbyings su sgrol bar shog/ o~M ma hA gu h+ya ma hA kr-i ta a nuSh+ThA na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/

a ni stong dang mi stong gnyis// dbu ma la yang mi gnas shing// stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis// mi 'gyur dbyings la dbang sgyur shog/ o~M ma hA gu h+ya ma hA A be sha shu n+yA tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M

bder gshegs sku yi ngo bo las// mi shigs rdo rje rgyal ba'i gtso// sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// rdo rje sku yi gtso bor shog/ o~M ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ a~M bder

gshegs gsung gi ngo bo las// mi shigs rdo rje chos kyi dbyings// sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// rdo rje gsung gi ngo bor shog/ o~M ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ hU~M bder

gshegs thugs kyi gtso bo las// mi shigs rdo rje rdo rje'i thugs// sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// rdo rje thugs kyi byin rlobs shog/ o~M ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ swa~M mi 'gyur

ba yi zhing khams nas// ma bskyed pa yi 'bras bu lags// ma bsags pa yi longs spyod 'byung// cir yang grub pa'i ye shes kyis// rang dbang thabs kyis sgyur bar shog/ swa~M ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU

dza badzra swa b+hA pa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ zhes gsungs pas gsal la 'bar bas thim par gyur to// e ma ngo mtshar rab 'byam gyi// ngo mtshar ya mtshan gsang ba'i chos// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// sna tshogs sgra
rnams dbyings su gsal// gsung gcig yan lag dkyil 'khor ni// bsam gyis mi khyab khyab mchog dbyings// thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog hoH// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i bla ma chen po las dkyil
'khor bsdu ba dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor bla mar lhun gyis grub pa'i dgongs pa rtser

chib nas rdo rje bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du gsungs so// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying po phyag rgya 'da' dka'o// mi bskyod nyi ma'i

dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zur du spros pa las// sbyar ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// hU~M dang mu~M gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol nas thugs kar bkan// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam

sbyor ba// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// hU~M bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil cing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas
nas thugs kar bkan// mu~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus na// ston pa rdo rje sems
dpa' dag/ yum mchog yangs ma'i spyan dang ni// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// o~M bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil

cing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// la~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta// shar gyi
'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas// bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad dag/ yum mchog kun tu bzang mo dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// swa rtse 'bar ba

rin po che// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru sbas bzhi nas thugs kar bkan// ma~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud
