de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas// bder gshegs rin chen 'byung ldan dag/ yum mchog khams gsum byams ma dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru

sbas bzhi nas thugs kar bkan// AM bsgreng rtse mor pad+ma 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// pa~M bsgreng rtse mor dril
gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas// bde gshegs snang ba mtha' yas dag/ yum mchog na bza' dkar mo

dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// ha bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi
sbas nas thugs kar bkan// trA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas// bde gshegs don

yod grub pa dang// yum mchog dam tshig sgrol ma dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rin chen myu gu g.yas phyogs na// sgeg cing 'gying ba g.yon phyogs na/ sa snying dkar po rdo rje'i rigs// yum
mchog dkar mo sgeg chen dang// dkyil 'khor bar khyams shar phyogs na// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// ral gri 'byin pa g.yas phyogs na// phreng ba bgrang ba g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar
khyams lho phyogs na// nam snying ser po rin chen rigs// yum mchog dpal gyi phreng ba dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// pad+ma dkar po g.yas phyogs na// pi bang 'gyed pa g.yon

phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams nub phyogs na// spyan ras le brgan pad+ma rigs// yum mchog chos kyi dbyangs mkhan dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas phyogs na// bar gyi

cod pan g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams byang phyogs na// phyag na mthing ga las kyi rigs// yum mchog gar gyi cod pan dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// mdzes pa'i klu shing g.yas
phyogs na// bdug spos 'dren pa g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams shar lho na// byams pa dkar ser bder gshegs rigs// yum mchog bdug pa'i sprin 'phro dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du
'khril// gser gyi 'khor lo g.yas phyogs na// me tog 'thor ba g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams lho nub na// sgrib sel dmar ser rin chen rigs// yum mchog me tog char 'bebs
dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rin chen snye ma g.yas phyogs na// sgron ma 'degs pa g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams nub byang na// kun bzang dmar ljang las kyi rigs// yum

mchog gsal ba'i sgron ma dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// ut+pal sngon po g.yas phyogs na// tsan+dan 'thor ba g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams byang shar na// 'jam dpal dkar ljang

rdo rje'i rigs// yum mchog tsan+dan char 'bebs dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// thub drug phyag rgya chen po ni// rgyud drug gnas nas 'dren pa ste// gseg par phyag rgya tshul 'dzin pas// sku mdog

ser pos mi rnams 'dren// pi bang phyag rgya tshul 'dzin pas// sku mdog dkar po lha rnams 'dren// go cha mdung thung phyag rgya yis// sku mdog mthing nag lha min 'dren// rin chen 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// sku

mdog sngon po yi dwags 'dren// po ti brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis// sku mdog ser nag byol song 'dren// me 'bar chu 'bebs phyag rgya yis// sku mdog sngon po dmyal ba 'dren// sgo bzhi phyag rgya tshul gnas

pa// rdo rje gnod pa g.yas phyogs na// lcags kyu 'phen pa g.yon phyogs na// stobs chen khro bo chen po yang// yum mchog rdo rje lcags kyu dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// nr-i mgo gdengs pa

g.yas phyogs na// zhags pa 'phen pa g.yon phyogs na// khro chen gshin rje gshed po yang// yum mchog rdo rje zhags pa dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// sbrul mgo gdengs pa g.yas phyogs na//
lcags sgrog sdom pa g.yon phyogs na// khro chen rta mgrin dpa' bo yang// yum mchog rdo rje lcags sgrog dang// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rgya gram gnon pa g.yas phyogs na// dril bu

'khrol ba g.yon phyogs na// khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang// yum chog rdo rje dril 'khrol dang// byang gi sgo nas dbyings su 'khril// kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i

dkyil// gnyis med dbyings kyi gsang chen spro// bde mchog ngo mtshar thugs kyi dkyil// spro bsdu rdo rje thal mo dag/ bsgyur bas rang sems ye shes gsal// de nyid shes rab thabs su rdzogs// sgyu 'phrul dra

ba nges pa'i bla ma chen po las phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas ye shes rgyal po de rdo rje bkod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig rgyan rnam par spros pa'i dgongs pa la cig char bzhugs te/ rdo rje

gsang ba'i tshig 'di brjod do// shin tu phra ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/ dpe dang tshad du mi gzung zhing// gzhal yas phyag rgya la sogs te// mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom// shin tu phra bas rnam sbyangs te// rig
pas rgya khyon tshad med pa// gzhal yas phyag rgya la sogs pa'i// mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang// tshogs chen gnyis las 'grub pa yi// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan

rnams// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam rdzogs te// rags dang phra dang 'bring la sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa rang gar bya// tsa ka li dang tshon rtsi dag/ bya dang mi bya med pas na// de la dgag par ma gsungs
so// 'gro don 'tsham pa de bzhin te// sna tshogs mchod pas rgyas par mchod// bdag nyid chen pos mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus kun// dga' ba chen

pos tshim pa yin// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i dgongs pa yis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus dang// rigs drug 'gro ba mngon du 'gyur// lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad// gang na'ang yod pa ma yin te// rnam
dag ye shes sbyor ba yis// dbyings la dbyings nyid sgom pa yis// kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de nas dad ldan gus 'jug pa// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu

dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// snying yang yon gyi mchog yin te// bla ma mnyes phyir gus ldan dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes

pa yin// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos// skyon rnams ma lus nges par 'byang// dad ldan brtson 'grus bskyed byas na// phan pa'i dbang nod theg tshad sbyin// des na dbang phyug rgyal po yis// dbang
gi rim pa rnams bstan to// 'gro la phan phyir las rnams sbyin// grub pa sa 'dzin rgyal po sbyin// mi 'gyur rab 'byam bde chen no// gang 'dod rim gyis sbyin par bya// blo dang ldan pas theg

tshad nod// yang na sras kyi dam pa ste// chung ma zos par rdzogs dbang sbyin// sems kyi rnam pa nying gu blud// sgo 'byed bde bas gyen du bskyil// de nas dbang phyug chen po des// mi 'gyur sgron mar sku bskyod

cing// sems kyi thig le sgo phye ste// tshangs pa chen po'i dbyangs bzhed nas// go 'byed rdo rje'i ljags brkyang ste// dad ldan skyes bu dbang bskur ba// rdzogs pa chen po'i bde dbang ni// che mchog gong na med pa
na// gsang ba'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang dang// thabs mkhas byin brlabs che bas na// las rnams kun gyi dbang dang ni// khams gsum dbang du bsdus pas ni// slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang ngo// hU~M thabs
mkhas thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis// rigs kyi bu mchog dbang bskur phyir// gsang ba'i dbu rgyan 'di bcings pas// rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad// 'jig rten che ba kun gyi bla// che ba'i che ba zil

gyis gnon// sangs rgyas che ba'i mchod gnas ni// rnal 'byor chen po khyod nyid yin// o~M sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya badzra rat+na ma ku Ta trA~M trA~M/ badzra gu h+ya sid d+hi hU~M/ hU~M thabs mkhas byin brlabs chen po ni// sangs

rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te// byin brlabs chen po rnam bzhi po// dbang bskur gnang phyir gtad pas na// rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad// sems can kun la snying brtse phyir// mu stegs rtag chad yan chad

nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad spyod la// khyod kyis mi bya gcig kyang med// rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa yis// sems can kun gyi re ba skong// o~M sa ma ya gu h+ya e ba~M ma ya a/ slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang

ni khams gsum kun la dbang yid bzhin du sgyur te/ hU~M nga ni rgyal ba kun gyi bla// thig le byang chub sems chen po// nga ni khro rgyal kun gyi rje// ye shes rol pa'i 'byung gnas gter// nga ni spyi dpal bla na

med// skyon bral thabs kyi rgyal po yin// sems kyi dkyil nas drangs pa'i chu// khyod kyi lce la phab pa 'di// snying gi dkyil du gzung bar byos// rigs kyi bu khyod deng phan chad// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs

mchog zung// sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo yin// byang chub sems dang mnyam pa'i phyir// sems dpa' kun gyi mchod gnas yin// rigs kyi bu khyod deng phan chad// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// bstan pa phyi

nang zab mo kun// sems kyi dkyil du bsdus nas kyang// rdo rje lce yis sgo phye ste// bdud rtsi sman mchog dam pa 'dis// dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos// sems kyi thig le dkyil 'khor du// zhi khro 'byam
pa'i gter sgoms la// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur cig/ dbang can thams cad bkol bar byos// skye 'gro kun la snying brtse'i phyir// gdul ba'i phyag rgya 'di yang spyod// dug gsum rtsa ba

gcad par byos// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ rnam dag chen po nyid kyi lam// byed spyod thabs tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa// 'gro don byang chub sems kyi dbyings// sems kyi chu 'di btung bar byos// rnal

'byor chen pos dam du zung// hU~M de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// mnyam pa'i don la gzhol ba'i phyir// ye shes rgyal pos 'di skad gsungs// snying gi dkyil du rnam sbyang ba// hU~M nyid ring pos mtshams sbyar

te// thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings// dge sdig las kyis mi bcos shing// sgom dang sgrub pas mi 'byangs pa'i// rnam dag sems nyid rin chen gter// rdo rje snying po ye shes kyis// khro rgyal kun gyi

gtsor gyur cig/ shrI ma hA su kha badzra bo d+hi hU~M ho// o~M a~M/ mi 'gyur pa yi ye shes gnas// ma btsal phyin pas bde ba'i mchog/ ma bltas gsal bas ye shes spyan// gong na med pa'i kun gyi rje// ye shes rang

gnas bdal pa la// mi 'gyur g.yung drung sa thob shog/ o~M ma hA gu h+ya bru~M dz+nyA na maN+Da la// dz+nyA na gu h+ya sid d+hi swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ gzungs dang ting 'dzin stobs dang mi 'jigs pa// 'gyur ba med pa'i sman

mchog thig le lnga// mtshan mchog rdzogs pa chen pos lus brgyan cing// o~M sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya At+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa ho ha/ khyung gi gshog pa g.yas g.yon gdengs pa yis// klu rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa

ltar// srid gsum yon tan mchog tu rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas kun la mdzes pa'i cod pan mchog/ mchog tu che bas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon// o~M sarba ta thA ga to ma hA gu h+ya badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa ho// hU~M bde ba

chen po'i rang gnas la// yes shes rgyal po stangs dpyal du// 'gyur ba med par longs spyod cing// thabs dang shes rab 'phro 'du yis// skye 'gro sras su 'dzin par shog/ o~M sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya a nu rA ga

ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M// dbyings nas nyi shar mkha' la rdzogs sras 'gyur/ rgyu 'phrul drwa ba bla ma chen po las rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig dang dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas

bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po des thugs rje chen po gdung ba'i dam tshig lu gu rgyud la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig sta na chen po'i phrin las mdzad do// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// zhing bcur ldan pa'i longs spyod la// gsung gi 'phro 'du rnam sbyangs te// lnga yi tshom bu yang dag gsal// sgo lnga byin rlabs 'dren pa'i mchog/ ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i
lam// gtsug tu snang mdzad sems dpa' che// skur skyed byin rlabs rmad po che// pho nya mang po'i 'phro 'du yis// zhing bcu gnas nas blangs nas su// nyi zla steng du de bzhag ste// shes pa gsum
po dbyings su bstim// rang rgyud 'khor ba'i sa bon las// ljang gu ni ru 'phang bstod de// ni ljang hU~M du gnas bsgyur nas// yas 'dus mas 'dus hU~M la 'dus// hU~M ni bde gshegs ye shes lnga// dkar la

gsal bar skur bskyed de// bde chen 'od zer 'phro bas brjid// rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa// yab yum bcu yi byin rlabs nyid// le brgan hU~M ni dbyings su sbyor// kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i mkha'// sangs rgyas
sems can gnyi ga'i yum// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas gtso// sras su gyur pas bde ba'i mchog/ zhing gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// gnas ni kun bzang yum gyi mkha'// sa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i

sa// mi ldog nyi zla'i gdan stengs su// mkhas pas sku yi phyag rgyar bskyod// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan// rtag tu sku mchog g.yung drung sbyin// ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// de nas ye shes rgyal po

des// gsang mchog bde ba'i mchod sprin gyis// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rdul snyed na// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed// de kun gsang mchog mnyes bya'i phyir// nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo de// 'dzum

pa'i mdangs kyis dbyings su thim// 'khril nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa mdzad// bcwa brgyad phrag gnyis hU~M spros pas// klong du hU~M chen gcig tu 'khyil// kha dog rnam bzhi yang dag ldan// rigs bzhi lha mo rnam
spros te// stong khams bkang nas mchod pa byed// la la gsang mchog dbyings su 'khril// la la 'dod lnga'i mchod pa byed// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang// bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs dang// rin
chen do shal se mo do// dbyibs legs rin chen phung pos mdzes// bsam rdzogs rin chen sdong po yis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod// la la 'gro ba re ba skong// la la bdud 'dul ngan song

sbyong// kun kyang gsang ba'i mchod 'bul byed// nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang// gnyis su med par 'khril nas su// 'khril nas ga na'i mchod pa byed// stong khams nyungs 'brur gzhug tshul du// ga na'i
mchod pa chen po yis// thams cad mnyes pa chen por gyur// de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang/ gnyis su med par 'khril nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o bde

gshegs spyod pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs spyod la rang bzhin gsang// ma chags pa yi ngo bo las// chags pa chen po'i spyod pa 'byung// spyod pa chen po rnam gnyis la// rtogs nas chags pas su spyod pa// yang dag
chags pa chen po ste// 'di ni tshangs mchog rgyal po yin// sems kyi spyod pa rnam pa gnyis// zhing bcu mnyes pa'i las bya'o// zhes ched du gsungs so// de lta bus phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de
bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing khams kyis bsdus pa thams cad mnyes pa chen pos thim par gyur to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las thugs rje gdung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa ye shes rgyal po de mchod pa bla ma'i rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad gsungs so// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor bla ma dgongs pa'i mchog/ bro gar

'du 'phro'i phyag rgya yis// 'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar nges// glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// chos kyi sems dpa'i dngos grub len// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis// yid bzhin sems dpa'i dngos

grub len// rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'od 'bar bla ma'i dngos grub len// A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad grub cing rdo rje nges// rgyu 'bras dbyings su sbyor shes shing// bla ma'i dgongs pa gang

sbyor ba// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du nges// skye ba rnam bzhi rgyud sbyangs nas// mtshan rdzogs sa la gdon mi za// zhes gsungs pas tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis rdzogs par gyur to// de nas nyid kyi bla ma'i

mdzad spyod la dgyes pa chen pos glu 'di blangs so// o~M phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che// bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs// snang stong thig le kun du rdzogs// ho/

o~M rdo rje bsod nams thig le che// rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa// rdo rje rgyal po thig le che// ho/ o+o~M~M mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs
'phro// mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po// ho// o~M sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che// yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang// 'dus

pas rdzogs chen thig le che// ho/ o~M phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed du// rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed// sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyi// skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub// ho/ o~M thams cad ma lus

sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyi kun tu khyab// sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che// ho/ o~M thams cad thig le bla ma'i don// sgyu 'phrul bla ma thig le'i dbyings// dbyings

nyid byang chub sems chen po// snying po bla ma nges pa'i don// thig le gnyis las g.yos pa med// ho/ sgyu 'phrul drwa ba bla ma chen po las tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis mnyes pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de
nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po'i 'jigs pa chen po'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'du mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu lta ba dang/ rmongs pa'i

dbang gis gab pa'i gsang ba chen po ni ma rtogs/ sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par zhen pas chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don ni phyal bar bor// bram ze'i ngan sngags mang po ni blo'i gdeng du blangs nas snying rje chen

po'i las dang ni bral gnas su ming btags nas zhe sdang sgrol ba'i las ni rgyun du byed/ thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i don ni ma rtogs/ 'dod chags spyod pa'i las dang skad cig tsam yang ma bral/

rang rig pa'i ye shes ni blo la nub/ don dam pa la kun tu gti mug pas ni rgyun du khebs/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan ni ma rtogs/ nga rgyal khengs pa'i dregs pa'i las ni rgyun du byed/ tshad med pa bzhi'i

las dang ni bral/ phrag dog gi tshub mas ni rgyun du khrid de/ bdag tu rmongs pa dang rtog pa la zhen te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bral bas rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs te/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas

mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba rdo rje dmyal ba chen por bskal pa chen po stong phrag drug cur skyes so// de las thar nas nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so// las

kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo de las thar te sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dgas srin po chen po lus gcig/ mgo bo brgya pa mgo bo sna tshogs pa/ lus brgya pa mgo gcig pa lus dang yan lag mang po 'dug pa

mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs shing gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul mang po ston pas klu'i ris nas 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus nas sa bon rtsub mos mang po 'debs so// de nas sngon legs par spyad pa'i
'bras bus bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis sku'i dbyibs legs par brgyan pa ye shes phyin ci ma log pa'i spyan gyis gzigs te/ las ngan pa'i srin po de nyon mongs pa'i bag chags sbyang ba dang/

khams gsum gyi sems can bde ba la gzhag pa'i phyir thugs rje chen po'i ye shes skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po ye shes kyi rgyal po de nyid

'jigs byed chen po rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po sprin rnam par spro ba sgyu 'phrul bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi bla ma chen po'i dbyings nas nyid kyi gsang ba'i bdag mo

khro mo'i rgyal mo chen mo mngon du phyung ste/ hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad de/ gnyis su med pa'i dgyes pa chen pos thim nas gsang ba bla ma'i sprin las/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra dz+wa bi Sha kro d+ha

badzra dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT ha la ha la hU~M zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad dur khrod bdal ba chen po'i rang bzhin khrag gi rgya mtsho dba' rlabs 'khrug pa'i dkyil na/ keng

rus chen po ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung du 'khyil ba'i dbus na 'og rdo rje rgya gram mig mangs ris su bris pa/ phyogs bzhi ngos bzhi 'bar bar khyams gsum rdo rje rin po che'i glo 'bur du mdzes pa/ sgo bzhi

rta babs mu khyud du bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che rgya gram mthing ga 'bar ba'i rtsig pa dra ba ris su brtsigs pa/ steng yid bzhin gyi rin po che 'bar ba/ rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i bla re mig mangs su bris pa/ rtse mo

dbyibs bla mas 'og min gyi gnas na srid pa'i rtse mo man chad bum pa'i tshul du dbyibs rdo rje rgya gram mig mangs gcig tu 'khyil pa/ ye shes rdo rje rgya gram gyi cho 'phrul bla ma'i 'od 'bar bas phyogs bzhir

'phros shing 'khrugs pas khams gsum thams cad bdal ba/ rgyal mtshan bla ma chen po dang/ ru mtshon bla ma chen pos phyogs bzhi grwa bzhi nas bsgreng ba/ gsang ba bla ma'i rtsig pas phyi rim bskor ba/ rdo rje rin

po che'i phyi rol gyi shing ljon pa bla mas phyogs mtshams gtibs pa/ phyi dang nang med pa kun du yang bla ma chen po'i nang du gyur pa/ khams gsum thams cad rdo rje ra ba'i rtsig pa 'chor ba med pa'i gzhal yas

khang na khro bo dang khro mo'i rol pa'i phyag rgya stong gi 'jig rten rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par gyur to// de nas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'ur 'ur dang chem chem dang/ shig shig dang/ thor thor dang/
gtogs shig dang/ choms shig dang/ sod cig dang/ drol zhig dang/ sbyongs shig la sogs pas 'jig rten na dbang che zhing dpa' brtul che zhing brtul zhugs can rnams brgyal bar gyur to// de nas dgyes

pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid dur khrod bla ma chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na rdo rje ye shes kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi

pa la nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang mchod pa bla ma chen po mdzad de gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas 'di phyung ngo// hU~M badzra du tri nan sUr+ya tsan+d+ra pad+ma maN+Da la de ba tiSh+Tha na~M zhes brjod pas ye shes rin po che'i 'khor

lo rtsibs bzhi pa 'od 'bar ba'i steng du dur khrod gdug pa'i tshogs seng ge la sogs pa bla ma chen po'i khri btsugs te/ gdan bla ma nyi zla dang pad+ma spel bar bting ba'o// de nas cho 'phrul bla ma chen pos btul
ba/ bsam gtan bla ma chen po spags pa tshad med pa/ dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes bla ma chen pos dregs pa thams cad dus gcig tu btul ba'i snam rten bla ma chen po la mtshon pa dang/
dmigs pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyag rgya bla ma 'od 'bar ba bzhugs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po chen po sku mthing nag cir yang 'gyur ba/ rdo rje ljags kyis gsung 'brug stong gi sgra

sgrogs pas stong khams thams cad dus gcig tu 'jig pa/ ye shes me'i thugs kyis snang srid kyi bud shing dus gcig tu bsregs pa/ steng 'og med par kun tu skyi bung zhes byed pa/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad

pa/ zhabs rnam pa brgyad du gtams pa/ phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spyan 'bar ba nyi shu rtsa bdun mnga' zhing rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje mthing ga
khyung gi gshog pas 'jig rten gyi khams yog par bkab pa/ khros pa'i rgyal mo mthing nag 'bar ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs

stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du ma hA de ba dang/ 'dod pa'i lha gan rkyal du brtul ba'i steng du nyid kyi gzugs kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das bud+d+ha he ru ka/ sku mdog ser nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir

gyur pa dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa'o// bder gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so// lho phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la

khri dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gshin rje gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi tshor ba'i phung po las bcom ldan 'das rat+na he ru ka sku mdog sngo nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna

tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// nub phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du chu bdag gi rgyal

po dang 'khor lo nag po b+h+r-ing gi ri ti gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du shes kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he ru ka sku mdog dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna

tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gnod sbyin stobs

bzangs gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du byed kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das karma he ru ka sku mdog ljang nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad par gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/

dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// de nas dreg pa chen po la sogs pas gdug pa'i sems kyis gtum pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs
bstan pas mgrin gcig tu 'dug pa'i nga ros gtum pa'i brlang tshig tu smras pa/ thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci 'di ltar byed dam zhes zer zhing shin tu gtum pas rngam mo// de nas bcom ldan

'das dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid sku gzi brjid chen po'i mdangs su gyur te/ thugs rje chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i gsang sngags bla ma'i rngam pa'i gdangs skad chen po 'di

dag phyung ngo// hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i gdug pa'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung nas nang grol kun drangs yan lag kun bcad

btubs te sha zos/ khrag 'thungs rus pa kun 'chos so// de nas 'jigs byed chen po de nyid kyis hU~M hU~M hU~M b+h+yo e a ra li dzA dzA zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas pa

yungs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so// de nas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad kyi rje bo'i yang rje bo// dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo// srin mo chen mo

mi srun mo dang/ tshangs ma dang/ khro mo dang/ dbang mo dang/ 'jug sred mo dang/ gzhon nu mo dang/ dmar po dang/ bdud rtsi mo dang/ zhi ba mo dang/ be chen mo dang/ srin mo dang/ za ba mo dang/ dga' ba mo

dang/ ra ro khrag 'thung mo dang/ gcig pu spyod ma dang/ yid 'phrog ma dang/ grub mo dang/ rlung mo dang/ gsod byed mo dang/ me mo dang/ phag mo dang/ rgan byed mo dang/ sna chen mo dang/ chu lha mo dang/ nag
mo chen mo dang/ ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang/ bum sna sngo nag chen mo dang/ gsus 'dzin sngo nag chen mo la sogs pa dang/ yang bran dang/ g.yog dang/ yang g.yog la sogs pa 'khor zhing gi rdul kyang

bsdus so// de nas yang dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid dgyes pa bla ma'i gsang ba chen po sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par 'du mdzad de sku gsung thugs bla ma las 'di dag phyung

ngo// o~M AHhU~M/ badzra pad+ma pra be sha pad+ma hU~M a la la ho zhes brjod pas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nas gsang ba rgyas par byas nas khab len gyi rdo la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du

bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po'i sku la mi srun mo la sogs pa brgyad 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das ser nag chen po'i sku la tshangs ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das sngo nag chen po'i sku la
bdud rtsi mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dmar nag chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das ljang nag chen po'i sku la me mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril
lo// de nas dgyes pa chen po de dag gis hU~M zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i tshogs bsdus te shin tu bcum par gyur to// de nas dgyes te ha ha zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i tshogs rnam par shes pa

brgyad las dkar po la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi rol shar phyogs nas 'khor bar khro bo'i gzugs kyis snying rje

'jigs tshul gyis stan la gnas so// de nas dgyes te he zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i yul brgyad las seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te 'thon nas yang 'khor

lo 'bar ba'i bar khyams su snying rje 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis stan la shin tu rngam pa'i stabs kyis gnas so// de nas dgyes te phaT ces phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par bsgrags pas phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus pa

na 'gro ba rnams kyi don ma lus par mdzad pa thub pa chen po drug bcom ldan 'das drug 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad cing 'gro ba drug 'dul ba dang/ yid chos dbyings nas rol te sbor byed nyi zer zhags pa
can la sogs pa brgyad du gyur te// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum pa la zhing skam gsher spel ba'i gdan stengs su rang gi lag cha dang shin tu rngam pa'i stabs kyis shar phyogs nas 'khor bar gnas so// de

nas dgyes te phaT ces brjod pas nyid kyi phyin ci log bzhi las rdo rje srings 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i sgo bzhir snying rje 'jigs

tshul gyi stan la shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du gnas so// de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las/ bud+d+ha rol pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dus gcig tu phaT ces brjod

pas thams cad khros nas 'byung mo thams cad kyang rang gi gnas su yud tsam gyis phyin par dgye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po de nyid thugs rje chen pos bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i

dgongs pa cig char zhugs te sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo// o~M badzra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hi a~M a~M zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po'i

snam logs nas 'thon to// 'dam khu blud de dran pa rnyed do// de nas khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun ya mtshan chen por gyur te cho 'phrul chen po mdzad pa mthong ngo// de dag gi dus su 'jig rten drug na gnas
pa'i dregs pa chen po rnams dus gcig tu btul bar mthong ste/ shin tu zhum zhing breng nas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ 'bangs su mchi 'bangs su mchi// 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na// mgo dang lus kyang
brgyar 'gas shing// snying yang gas shing gtubs gyur cig/ rul myags tshig nas rlag pa dang// dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog/ ces 'bangs su mchi bar rang rang gis dmod btsugs

so// de nas de dag kun dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bzhag go/ de nas yang de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ rang rang gi chung ma dang/ bu mo dang/ rang rang gi ma dang/ sring mo rnams dkyil 'khor du
phul te/ bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang// ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams// dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol// dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes su gsol// bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad
kyis// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par su bgyid pa// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar// de yi dgos pa rdzogs par bgyings/ ces dmod btsugs so// de nas de'i ma dang/ sring mo

dang/ chung ma dang/ bu mo rnams yud tsam gyis phyin par 'ongs nas las kyi dngos grub stsol ba las// de nas khrag 'thung ye shes chen pos ming btags/ lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje bran dang pho nyar dbang
bskur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i don phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsal zhing 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes rgyal mo de nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su
med par gyur nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje bla ma las 'di dag phyung ngo// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa las// mkha' la bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shar// khri btsugs nyi dkyil
gdan stengs su// de la lha tshogs gdan du bting// hU~M 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus su// khri bshams nyi dkyil ya bdud gdon// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// byang chub sems las sku bskyed pa// dpal chen

bla med he ru ka/ dbu dgu phyag kyang bcwa brgyad de// spyan yang 'bar ba nyi shu bdun// dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gsol// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du gtams// rdo rje mthing ga khyung gi gshog/ 'jig rten
khams kyang yog par bkab// sbrul nag 'jigs su rung ba dang// dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// dbu gsum dang la byung ba ni// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rnam par thar pa'i dbu
gsum gyis// khams gsum mya ngan zlo ba'i zhal// dbu gsum bar nas rngam pa ni// g.yas sngo g.yon ljang dbus mthing zhal// thabs dang shes rab sems kyi dbu// srid gsum dbyings su rdzogs pa'i

zhal// dbu gsum mtha' nas rngam pa ni// g.yas mthing g.yon mthing dbus mthing zhal// khams gsum re ba skong ba yi// lung dang man ngag sems kyi dbu// 'gyur ba med pa'i mthing nag zhal// skye shi rtsa ba
gcod pa'i tshems// dbu dgu rol pa'i byin brlabs las// g.yas gsum glog stong lce 'byin cing// g.yon gsum 'brug stong sgra sgrogs pa// dbu gsum rdo rje ser chen 'beb// spyan dgu dang
la gzigs pa ni// chos dbyings kun du bzang po dang// kun du bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings la// 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis gzigs// spyan dgu bar nas gzigs pa ni// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
kyis// srid pa'i sems can thams cad la// byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan gyis gzigs// spyan dgu mtha' nas gzigs pa ni// g.yas gsum zhe sdang khros pa'i spyan// gzigs pas bdud dang mu stegs
sgrol// g.yon gsum byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan// gzigs pas mtha' yas bde la 'jog/ dbu gsum ye shes rol pa'i spyan// gzigs pas skye 'gro gnas su stobs// dbu dgu rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan

dgu// lnga dgu bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yang// bud+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa lngas brgyan// stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis// khyab bdal chen po'i rtags su bsnams// bcwa brgyad phyag na rol pa yis// stong pa bcwa brgyad dbyings su

sbyor// zhabs brgyad nga rgyal dregs pa 'joms// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// rdo rje mthing ga gshog pa brkyang// bcwa brgyad phyag na bsnams pa yis// rdo rje glo snying zhing chung g.yas// b+han d+ha zhing chen

stir chen g.yon// nang zhags nyi ma khyung chen g.yas// zhing chen zla ba 'ug pa g.yon// me dang rgya mtsho ga'u g.yas// rlung dang rin chen ri rab g.yon// yon tan bcwa brgyad dbyings su rdzogs// dang po rdo rje dung
chen ni// khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas kyang// bdud dang mu stegs kun 'joms pa'o// gnyis pa stir chen glo snying ni// srid pa'i sems can thams cad kun// dam tshig sta na dbyings su sgrol// gsum
pa stir chung ril mid ni// dug gsum rnam par sgrol ba'i rtags// bzhi pa stir chen nang zhags ni// rgyud lnga'i sems can dbyings su 'dren// lnga pa nyi zla zung du 'dzin// byang chub sems las g.yos pa

med// drug pa khyung dang 'ug pa ni// mkha' 'gro thams cad 'khol ba'i rtags// bdun pa me dpung rlung gis 'thor// srid pa'i bag chags thal bar rlog/ brgyad pa ri rab rgya mtsho rnams// thams cad ma lus

g.yeng gnas shing// 'byung ba lnga la mnga' brnyes pa'o// dgu pa rin chen ga'u ni// dngos grub sprul pa 'byung ba'i rtags// dgu gnyis zung du ldan pa las// stong pa bcwa brgyad dbyings su rdzogs// dur khrod

rgyan gyi brgyan pa ni// thod skam 'bar ba phreng ba yis// zhi ba phyogs gcig mya ngan zlo// mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku brnyes pa'o// thod rlon 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'di// khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas su// sprul

pa'i sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// thod pa phyed tshal phreng bas ni// dug lnga bdud rtsir sbyor ba ste// longs spyod sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// zhing chen rlon pa'i na bza' ni// chos dbyings mnyam pa chen

po ste// chos kyi sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// stag lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs ni// phrin las rnam bzhi'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje'i sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// sbrul nag chun 'phyang mang po ni// ye shes thams cad

'byung ba'i rtags// rtags chen sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// zhabs brgyad lha brgyad brdzis pa ni// nga rgyal can rnams tshar gcod pa'o// sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo ni// kro d+hi shwa ri yum gyi gtso// mthing nag

'bar ba'i ral pa can// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su// b+han d+ha rak+ta gtso la stobs// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs

na// khri dang nyi dkyil nyi zla'i gdan// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// gzugs kyi phung po gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung bud+d+ha he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas ljang g.yon sngo dbus ser

zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// 'khor lo dgra sta zhags pa g.yas// b+han d+ha rnge'u chung kha T+wAM g.yon// ser nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// bde gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang// 'khril ba chen

po'i tshul du bsam// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na// khri dang nyi dkyil gshin rje'i gdan// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// tshor ba'i phung po gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung rat+na he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug

zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// rin chen gshol dang gtun shing g.yas// b+han d+ha dgra sta rnge'u chung g.yon// sngo nag dur khrod rgyan gyis

brgyan// rin chen khros pa'i rgyal mo dang// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// khri dang nyi dkyil klu yi gdan// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// 'du shes phung po gnas gyur

pa// khrag 'thung pad+ma he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus ljang zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// pad+ma rnge'u chung spu gri g.yas// b+han d+ha kha T+wAM so phreng

g.yon// dmar nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// khri dang nyi dkyil gnod sbyin gdan// de yi steng du
bsam bya ba// 'du byed phung po gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung karma he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dmar g.yon ser dbus ljang zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// ral gri
zhags pa rnge'u chung g.yas// b+han d+ha thod dbyug kha T+wAM g.yon// ljang nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs// 'khor lo 'bar
ba'i phyi rim na// me dpung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa las// mkha' las skyes pa'i phra men ma// shar phyogs su ni bsam bya ba// sa bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// kun
gzhi gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor sngo nag go'u ri ma// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// spyugs par glu blangs ha has bzhad// sti ra dbyug pa g.yas pa

na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// skye shi ma la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho phyogs ngos su bsam bya ba// gsod skyen bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// rnam shes gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor ser nag tso'u
ri ma// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// spyugs pas glu dbyangs ha has bzhad// thabs kyi mda' drangs g.yas pa na// shes rab bzhu bdungs g.yon pa
na// ya ma ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// nyi ma bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyon mongs gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor dmar nag pra mo ha// ral pa kham nag gyen du

'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// chu srin rgyal mtshan g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// sUr+ya ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang gi phyogs su
bsam bya ba// zla ba bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// reg bya gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor mthing nag be ta li// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// spyugs

pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas pa na// stir chung mgo gcod g.yon pa na// tsan+d+ra ye la brkyang bskum zhugs// shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba// me lha bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// lta byed phra

men gnas gyur pa// rnal 'byor dmar nag puk+ka si// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing// dur khrod g.yang gzhi slag pa gyon// spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// sti ra chen po g.yas pa na// tshems
bar rgyu 'dren g.yon pa na// ag+ne ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba// bden bral bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyan byed gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor mthing nag sma sha

ni// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing// srog chags chen po g.yang gzhi gyon// spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// sti ra chung ngu g.yon pa na// tsit+ta phyung ba g.yas pa na// ni ri ti la brkyang bskum
bzhugs// nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba// rlung lha bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// snom byed gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor ser nag tsaN+Da li// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs

shing// 'jigs su rung ba'i slag pa gsol// spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// sti ra chung ngu g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha bcad pa g.yon pa na// ba ya be la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang shar mtshams su bsam

bya ba// dbang ldan bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// myong byed gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor ljang nag g+has ma ri// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing// sti ra chen po'i shun pa gsol// spyugs pas glu

blangs ha has bzhad// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yas pa na// rtse gsum 'khrug pa g.yon pa na// i shwa ra la brkyang bskum bzhugs// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rim du// smug nag 'bar ba'i bar khyams na// gsang ba'i
mkha' las skur bskyed pa// shar gyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// dri za bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// kun gzhi yul las gnas gyur pa// phra men thogs med seng ge'i gdong// rnal 'byor ser nag seng ge
ma// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// phyag gnyis bsnol nas shin tu 'gying// sti ra chen po sprug cing gsol// in+d+ra ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho yi phyogs su bsam bya ba// grul bum
bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// rnam shes yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men dpa' bo stag gi gdong// rnal 'byor dmar nag byA g+h+r-i ma// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// phyag gnyis gyad kyi 'dor

tshul gyis// stir chung bskyur nas 'bru tshugs lta// ra tri'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// yi dwags bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyon mongs yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men
rtog 'dul wa yi gdong// rnal 'byor dmar nag sri ka ma// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// phyag gnyis stir chen nang grol 'dru// tri 'di gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang gi phyogs
su bsam bya ba// gnod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// reg bya yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men btang snyoms spyang mo'i gdong// rnal 'byor mthing nag shwa na ma// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi

gyon// phyag gnyis rol pa chen po yis// sti ra phyed mar btsal nas gsol// yak+Sha'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// lta byed yul la

gnas gyur pa// phra men gzi brjid bya rgod gdong// rnal 'byor dmar nag kri ta ma// mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// zangs gri rnon po g.yas pa na// rgyu zhags drang ba g.yon pa na// rak+Sha sa la
brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyan byed yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men gsal byed dur bya'i gdong// rnal 'byor rnal ma kang+ka

ma// mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung stod smad g.yas g.yon na// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phrag la bkal// rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po
bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// snom byed yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men sa le bya rog gdong// rnal 'byor dmar nag kha khwa ma// mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// zangs gri dmar po g.yas pa

na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang shar mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// myong byed yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men rdzogs byed 'ug pa'i

gdong// rnal 'byor ljang nag hu lu ma// mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na// stir chung spyi 'joms g.yon pa na// rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// 'bar ba'i bar
khyams tha ma la// thod skam 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// zhing chen bsnol ma'i gdan stengs su// shar gyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// nyul byed yul la gnas gyur pa// spor byed chen mo mi zad ma// sna tshogs
'gyur ba'i sku mdog ma// zhing chen rol pa'i slag pa gsol// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// spyugs pas blu blangs srid gsum 'bar// ha ha gad mos ye shes rol// nyi zer zhags pa g.yas pa na// b+han

d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho yi phyogs su bsam bya ba// mi mgon thub pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed chen mo mdung thung 'phen// rnal 'byor ser nag nyul chen ma// ral pa

kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mi yi g.yang gzhi gos su gyon// spyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum sbyangs// ha ha gad mos mi rnams spor// rdo rje mdung thung g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du

brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// chos kyi dbyings las gnas gyur pa// spor byed rdo rje dril 'khrol ma// rnal 'byor mtshon du med pa'i sku// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// chos nyid

dbyings kyi na bza' gsol// spyugs pas glu blangs stong khams spor// ha ha'i gad mos dbyings su sbyor// gsung bsgrags dril bu g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum

bzhugs// byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba// lha min thub pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed thod phreng skar mda'i gdong// rnal 'byor sngo nag nyul chen ma// srog chags chen po'i g.yang gzhi gyon// ral pa kham nag
gyen du 'bar// spyugs pas glu blangs khams gsum sbyangs// ha ha gad mos lha min spor// rdo rje skar mda' g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// shar
lho mtshams su bsam bya ba// lha 'dul thub pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed khyung thogs gnod sbyin ma// rnal 'byor mthing nag nyul chen ma// 'jigs byed g.yang gzhi gos su gyon// ral pa kham nag gyen du

'bar// spyugs pas glu blangs stong khams grags// ha ha gad mos lha rnams spor// rdo rje khyung chen g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho nub mtshams su bsam bya
ba// yi dwags thub pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed me khyer glog phreng 'dzin// rnal 'byor dmar nag nyul chen ma// yi dgas mgrin rings g.yang gzhi gyon// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// spyugs pas

glu blangs snang srid sbyangs// ha ha'i gad mos yi dwags spor// rdo rje glog phreng g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba// byol song thub
pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed 'jigs chen slog sha rdebs// rnal 'byor smug nag nyul chen ma// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// slag chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gyon// spyugs pas glu blangs stong khams

grags// ha ha'i gad mos byol song spor// rdo rje slag sha g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang shar mtshams su bsam bya ba// dmyal mgon thub pa gnas gyur

pa// spor byed gshin rje ral gri skra// rnal 'byor sngo nag nyul chen ma// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// gshin rje g.yang gzhi gos su gyon// spyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum sbyangs// ha ha'i gad mos dmyal

ba spor// rdo rje ral gri g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi la// phyin ci log bzhi gnas gyur pa// shar gyi sgor ni bsam bya

ba// phag chen po yi gdan stengs su// rta gdongs srin mo'i g.yang gzhi gsol// rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// phag chen po yi gdan stengs su// stobs chen khro bo chen po

dang// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o// lho yi sgor ni bsam bya ba// ra gdong chen mo'i gdan stengs su// phag gdong chen mo'i g.yang gzhi gyon// lcags kyi dril

zhags g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rlon pa g.yon pa na// ra gdong chen mo'i gdan stengs su// khro chen gshin rje gshed po dang// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su// rngam pa'i tshul gyis bltas pa'o// nub kyi sgor ni
bsam bya ba// bum rna chen mo'i gdan stengs su// dred gdong chen mo g.yang gzhi gyon// lcags sgrog me 'bar g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rlon pa g.yon pa na// srin po bum rna'i gdan stengs su// khro

chen rta mgrin chen po dang// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o// byang gi sgor ni bsam bya ba// gsus po che yi gdan stengs su// spyang gdong chen mo g.yang gzhi gyon// dril

bu thal chen g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rlon pa g.yon pa na// gsus po che yi gdan stengs su// khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir ltas pa'o// ho badzra gu h+ya

tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po'i de kho na nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las bdud btul ba dang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi che ba'i yon tan phyogs bcur gsal ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas

dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di yang dag par grags shing dam tshig rjes su 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa rtser chib nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo// bru~M bi

shwa kro d+ha badzra dz+wa la maN+Da la tsakra hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la du tri tsakra nAn/ sUr+ya tsan+d+ra pad+ma de ba tiSh+Tha nAn/ hU~M hU~M ha ha hU~M hU~M badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ hU~M badzra d+ha ra ma

hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba ta thA ga to bud+d+ha/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ o~M trA~M rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da

sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ trA~M sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ o~M hrIHpad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ hrIHshwa pad+ma ba mu ka ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M

phaT/ ha karma ma hA shri he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ka ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ karma ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ badzra ke'u ri ha/ badzra tse'u ri ha/ badzra pra mo hA+e ha/ badzra be tA li ha/ badzra puk+ka si ha/

badzra g+hasma ri ha/ badzra sma sha ni ha/ badzra tsaN+Da li ha/ badzra sing ha mu kha he/ badzra byA g+h+r-i mu kha he/ badzra sri la mu kha he/ badzra shwa na mu kha he/ badzra gr-i d+ha mu kha he/ badzra kang+ka mu kha he/ badzra gA ka mu kha he/ badzra hu lu ka mu kha he/

badzra Ar+ya te tsa ti pa tsa/ badzra a mo g+ha hU~M/ badzra A lo ka ba~M/ badzra b+ha smi pA la ya ba to ho/ e h+ye hi pri ta ar+ya ni tsa tu ra ba ya phaT/ badzra be yo gi pra ti Ar+ya ni tsa tu ra thA a hU~M phaT// badzra mu a ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni pa

shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya pa ni shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a suM ba a ni ba shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni tra~M su pa shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu tri ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ badzra mu ni a du
pri ti a ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ e h+ye hi A na ya ho/ o~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHbadzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hU~M phaT ces gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyis stong gsum gyi dkyil 'khor

khyab par dus gcig khyab par grags pa dang/ dam nod pa bka' nyan gyi tshogs ma'i srin mo la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang so so'i srog gi snying po phul lo// badzra ma nu rAk+Sha si/ badzra pra ma ni/ badzra rau tri/ badzra baiSh+Na be/ badzra bing ga laM/

badzra ke ma ri/ badzra in+d+ra na/ badzra su ra ya tra/ badzra so hu mya/ badzra a mr-i ta/ badzra da na ta/ badzra rAk+Sha si/ badzra bak+Sha si/ badzra ra ti ha~M/ badzra ru ti ha~M/ badzra e ka tsa ra~M/ badzra ma no ha ra~M/ badzra sa na d+hi ha~M/ badzra ba ya bya/

badzra ma hA ma ra ma na/ badzra ag+ne ye/ badzra tsa mun+t+ri/ badzra bu tra na/ badzra ba ru Ni/ badzra ma hA kA la/ badzra tIk+Sh+Na ba~M/ badzra laM po d+ha ra/ ye shes rgyal po dgongs su gsol// khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/ thugs rjes khro

dpal rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che/ de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// o~M badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ o~M badzra sa ma ya hoHbadzra sa ma ya phaT/ a li u li ta li ta pa li da~M sta~M kho na rau tri kha ra~M yo ga ni

kha ra~M hU~M ha he phaT ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu kun/ tshig cing 'phar bas thams cad khyab// gsung gi khro tshogs chen po yis// kun du khyab cing gang gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das

dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir nges par brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chad bzhis brgyan bar khyams dang// gru bzhi sgo

khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum gyis mdzes// thod sprul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po 'khrug/ khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ gtum pa dom gyi spar bas ni// dbang
phyug lha chen la sogs pa// dregs pa chen po gtum tshogs mnan// gdan du byas te sku bzhugs pa// smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang// dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbu dgu phyag ni bcwa

brgyad dang// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs// stag lug sbrul dang nyi mar chas// sti ra che chung nang zhags dang// khyung dang yid bzhin nor bu dang// stong gi
'jig rten khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang// ral gri dgra sta bshol la sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs dang// btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya

dang// spor byed chen mo brgyad rnams dang// dbyug pa mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// sgo bzhi'i phyag rgyar mdzes pa dang// lcags kyu la sogs thod pas mdzes// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// bcu gnyis dang
ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag char chas// ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas// zhes gsungs pa dang/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi

khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis gang zhing khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po de nyid don yod pa'i 'bras bu chen po dam tshig chen pos gzung ba'i phyir 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig rdo rje

'di gsungs so// bla med mi spong bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya// rtsa ba'i dam tshig chen po ni// gdong chen bcu yi don

rtogs kyang// rtsa ba gsum po mi 'da'o// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis ni// gti mug 'dod chags zhe sdang dang// nga rgyal phrag dog mi spong ngo// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chu// dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor

ro// spyi dpal bcu yi mnga' brnyes kyang// yan lag bcu po mi dor ro// gzhan yang yan lag dam tshig rnams// 'da' bar mi mdzad rdo rje dam/ sa ma ya ni rdo rje che// mi 'da' rgyal ba nyid kyi dam// bsam
rdzogs lhun grub che mthar phyin// srid gsum dag pa dbang chen sgyur// mi 'jigs kun tu bzang por spyod// theg pa mtha' yas 'dul ba'i thabs// ji snyed sdom pa mtha' las pa// ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis

rdzogs// nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang// tshe thung bsam pa log pa dang// mya ngan sdug bsngal chen po dang// dmyal ba nyid ni rdo rje byed// dgu rdzogs bcur ldan gsum gyis sbyangs// bskang ba la sogs
mtha' yas mchog/ ces gsungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba bla ma chen po las 'jigs byed chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang dam

tshig rdo rje'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid chos thams cad man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i ngang du snyigs ma

med par byung btab pa'i phyir sku gsung thugs bla ma chen po'i thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po 'di phyung ngo// byang chub sems kyi bde chen la// rgyu rkyen rten dang len bcas
pa'i// skyon med thig le chen po las// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang// rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge tshig la
rab brten te// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las
byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i thig le dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// byed pa rigs kyi gtso bo ste// byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i

tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams// bdag nyid chen po lhag par rdzogs// thugs kyi ye shes lngas blta zhing// snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes chen por rol// ye shes dgyes pa
mchog tu 'bul// zad med zag pa med pa yi// bsod nams ye shes sgyu mar rol// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i
dbyings// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// ma lus bdag gis dbang sgyur ro// dbang sgyur ye shes rol pa yis// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor
rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa chen po yis// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus
'byung// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor ma lus sgrol// bya ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor

bas// rang byung kun nas lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// rgyu rkyen rten dang ldan pa yi// thams cad byang chub sems kyi dbyings// byang chub

sems kyi bde chen gyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad dbyings su thim// thig le chen po bla ma las// sgyu ma byang chub lam du bstan// skyon dang yon tan thams cad kyang// byang chub thig le nyid kyi ngang// spyod pa

rnam pa nyid kyi yang// thig le chen po'i lam du nges/ sgyu ma rol pa'i dkyil 'khor yang// thig le chen po'i dbyings su sbyor// sdom pa rnam pa bcu gsum dang// spyi yi dam tshig mtha' yas pa// thig le chen
po'i ngang du gsal// snod bcud 'jig rten ma lus pa// thig le nyid kyi rol pa'i dbyings// tshogs chen rnam pa gnyis po yang// byang chub sems kyi dbyings su nges// gzhal yas khang dang rgyan rnams

dang// cho 'phrul byang chub sems su thim// khro tshogs bdud 'dul rol pa yang// byang chub sems su nges pa yin// 'gro drug sems can gsum po yang// ye shes drug dang sku gsum du// nges pa'i thig le chen

po yin// lnga yi rten dang rkyen bzhi yang// dbyings kyi ma dang dus kyi sring// thig le chen po'i ngang du 'dus// snga phyi gsum dang yod med khams// sku gsung thugs su nges bstan pa'i// thig le byang chub sems
su nges// phung po khams dang skye mched kyang// phyag rgya bzhi bcu gnyis po yang// thig le nyid las gzhan na med// bzhi yi las dang gcig po yang// thig le sems kyi ngang du gsal// 'gro ba'i

don du 'byung ba yi// dgu dang stong phrag brgya bcu bzhi// byang chub sems las gzhan na med// bde skyid sdug bsngal mang po yang// rtogs pa bde chen dbyings kyi don// ye shes ye shes rol pa yang// rdo rje
snying po'i dbyings su nges// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dang// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams// nyag gcig yab tu nges par rdzogs// thar pa'i lam mchog dbyings kyi yum// kun du bzang mo la sogs
kyang// thig le ma yi ngang du gsal// gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang// bzhugs gnas khyad par mang po yang// ye shes chen po'i gnas su bsdu// mchod pa'i rgyan dang longs spyod kun// rigs pa'i

byang chub sems chen po// cho 'phrul chen po'i ngang du 'dus// rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi ngo bo dang// chos so cog gi rang bzhin rnams// byang chub sems su nges pas na// dkar nag las kyis ma gsungs so// byang
chub sems kyi bde chen ni// ci yang med las cir yang snang// cis kyang ma bcos g.yung drung sku// cir mi mdzad la thams cad sgrol// dmigs pa med par kun la khyab// ma bskos rgyal po yang dag pa// ma

sbyangs ye shes snying po che// ma bsgoms cig car don nyid rdzogs// ma bsgrubs rgyal ba kun gyi gtso// ma sbyangs skyon dang yon tan med// tshig dang yi ges mi mtshon te// sangs rgyas nyid kyis rnyed par
dka'// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rnyed nas rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod// spyod pas 'gro ba sgrol ba ste// de la nyes pa'i skyon mi mnga'// zhes gsungs pas/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas stug pos brgyan pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba bla ma chen po las man ngag snying po byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig
pa'o//// de nas yang ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa'i phrin las chen po 'di ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ched du sku gsung thugs yon tan

phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la// khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga
la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje'i phur pas gdab// rdul du byas nas tshogs la 'bul// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// bcings gyur bskyod nas
phyogs bcur g.yos// myos 'gyur gas te tshig par 'gyur// ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i gzi brjid lhun chen la// chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje gsum yang

dbang du 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab// chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul// ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du
sbrel bsdams nas// ci 'dod de bzhin byed par 'gyur// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'du 'phro'i gzi chen la// dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang

mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag/ nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab// rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar brtag/ ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel
bsdams nas// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro// yid bzhin nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin
bya// gtum chen rngam po'ang lha ner 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// gtum chen 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag/ lhan ner gsal ba'i phur pas gdab// 'bar ba lha ne'i tshogs la 'bul// ya yi tshogs kyi
dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// 'bar ba lha ne'i byin gyis khyab// thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur// a/ thams cad rdzogs pa chen po ste// las su ma gyur gcig kyang med// las kyi
khyad par rdzogs pa yi// srid pa gsum du bsdus pa rnams// byin gyis ma brlabs gcig kyang med// rdzogs pa chen po'i phrin las kyis// sbyangs pas bsam rdzogs lhun gyis grub// ho/ slas dang byi mo bran

mo'i tshogs// lhag ma kha chu 'dod pa sbyin// rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrubs te// gang 'dod las de byed par bsgo// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// ji ltar 'dod pa thams cad
kun// thams cad ma lus byed pa yin// mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// 'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed// lbos mo chen mo la sogs
te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// rmongs par 'dod na rmongs par byed// myos par 'dod na myos par byed// seng gdong chen mo la sogs te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la za bar
byed// rdul cha tsam yang med par byed// bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la 'byin par byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// a/ spor byed chen mo la
sogs te// nyul byed chen mo brgyad rnams la// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la nyul bar byed// ma lus gnas nas spor bar byed// slas dang byi mo bran ma'i tshogs// bro gar glu

tshig chen mos ni// sbad cing gtad par bya ba ste// thams cad ma lus byed pa yin// ljon shing dang ni lcug phran tshal// sdong gcig dang ni me reg tu// dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang// khros pas ka li rab tu

bya// zhes gsungs pas phrin las rnam pa bzhi sti ra'i rnga dang bcas par phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dul bar gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po 'jigs byed chen po de nyid dam tshig sti

ra'i rnga bla ma rdung zhing sti ra rngam pa'i mdangs 'di phyung ngo// e yi tshogs chen 'byam pa ru// sti ra'i rnga chen sgra bsgrags pas/ hU~M ha he phaT sgra 'byin cing// yig 'bru brgyad kyi byin brlabs kyis// ru lu hU~M b+h+yo'i

gsung sgrogs pa// khro bo rngam pa'i sgra skad kyis// srid pa gsum char bshig nas kyang// stong gsum bsgral ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o// sti ra rnga chen 'di brdungs pas// gnod sbyin srin po kun bsgral te// mu stegs

kun gyi snying yang 'byin// sti ra'i rnga chen 'di bsgrags pas// stong gsum khro bo'i tshogs kyis bkang/ kun kyang rnga brdung di ri ri// rnga sgra chen pos stong gsum bshig/ rnga sgra chen pos bdud dpung bsgral// rnga sgra

chen pos srid gsum sbyangs// rnga sgra chen pos dgra bgegs 'dul// rnga sgra chen pos ngan song sbyangs// rnga sgra 'brug gi sgra bsgrags pas// na rag dmyal khams stongs par byed// rnga sgra tug chem ri rab

rnyil// sti ra rnga chen sgra phyung bas// phyin ci log rnams snying yang 'byin// rnga chen 'brug gi sgra sgrogs shing// rnga thabs glog stong 'gyur ba bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskang// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i

dam tshig bskang// rnal 'byor rnam lnga'i dam tshig bskul// sti ra rnga chen 'di brdungs pas// nyan thos mdo sde gnas nas spar// rang rgyal lta ba dbyings su sgrol// sti ra'i rnga chen 'di bsgrags pas// lha dang mi

yi theg pa yang// bla med theg pa'i dbyings su btsud// sti ra rnga sgra 'di bsgrags pas// stong khams sti ra'i rnga sgras bkang// kun kyang rnga brdung di ri ri// rnga thabs glog stong lce 'byin cing// rnga skad 'brug stong
sgra sgrogs pas// byin brlabs lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs// stong gsum 'khrug cing srid gsum 'thor// rnga thabs g.yab mor bor ba dang// kha dang ka yi ru mtshon gyis// thams cad gnam lcags chen pos

btab// ka la chen po la sogs te// rdo rje chags 'og ldegs pa'i rnams// dus gcig tu ni tsit+ta 'byin// sti ra chen po'i rnga sgra yis// srid pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bskyil// dus gcig tu ni dbang chen rdzogs// rnga
sgra rin chen khang pa brtsegs// bsam rdzogs che la dbang thang thob// rnga sgras g.yo ba med par byed// chos la 'dzud pa'i sgra yang 'byin// rnga sgras ci 'dod dgongs pa rdzogs// byang chub sems

ltar de ma thag/ ces gsungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sbyor bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen

po man ngag gi snying po dang bcas pa de la shin tu rngam pa'i mdangs kyis dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so// hU~M gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu

ba bzhin// mche ba zang yag za byed che// ho/ hU~M rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir// tug chem ri rab 'bum rnyil skad// a la la yi gad rgyangs che// spyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che// ho/ hU~M khro bo'i shes rab
'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun du 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le che// ho/ hU~M/ khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen
'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che/ ho// hU~M bdud rnams kun gyi bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud ste bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs

kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po bdal ba che// hU~M rdo rje brag chen sra ba po// rdo rje chu bo sdud chen po// rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che// ho/ hU~M stong gsum khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
tshogs// 'jigs byed mtshon du med pa'i sku// sna tshogs gsung dang sna tshogs thugs// 'jigs byed rngam pa'i ye shes gter// ho zhes blangs pas stong gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs byed chen po
rnams dbyer med pas mnyes par gyur to// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba bla ma chen po las lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las dang yongs su mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i

don// gsang ba kun gyi bla ma ste// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i rgyal po yin// nges don chos kyi snying po las// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang// dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// sgyu
'phrul drwa ba las 'phros te/ sde snod kun dang rgyud kun yang// 'byung nas gtan la nges par 'bebs// 'gro drug sems can gsum po yang// sta na chen po'i dbyings su bstan// ling ga pad+mar bcas pa

yang// ga na chen po'i dbyings su sbyor// snang srid kha dog mang po yang// ga na chen po'i lam du bstan// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa// de nyid nga yin dbang yang
rdzogs// rtag tu byang chub sems la gnas// tshe 'di nyid kyis mngon sangs rgyas// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar// bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub// ces gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus

gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes te/ mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings na lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen

po las/ gdeng chen po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ lung gi spyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges
pa'i bla ma chen po'i le'u las/ thams cad ma lus par 'phros pa de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya gar+b+ha ta ta bi nish+tsa ya/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rnam par nges pa/ bcom ldan dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus
na// de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/
ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes

rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzad pa/ rtse mo phyogs

bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad dang/ so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun tu 'khyil ba/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rin po che'i dbyibs dang kha dog

la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa/ sbags pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po che sna tshogs pa'i phreng ba dang/ chun 'phyang dang/ shar bu'i rgyan dang/ gzugs sna tshogs dang/
sgra sna tshogs dang/ dri sna tshogs dang/ ro sna tshogs dang/ reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la mi sgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab par bklubs pa/ rnam

par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang med pa/ kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang/ stobs glang po che'i khri

dang/ rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang de/ dbang rma bya'i khri dang/ thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang// gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la sku

mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du zhabs thal le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun du snang ba dang/ thabs dang shes

rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che'i phyag rgya 'bar ba can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po

dang/ de bzhin gshes pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang/ de dag kun kyang mthing ga dang/ dkar po dang ser po dang/ le brgan dang/ ljang gu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/ btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings dang/ sra ba'i

dbyings dang/ mnyen pa'i dbyings dang/ dro ba'i dbyings dang/ bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med par chos kyi dbyings kun du mtha' yas par khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper

na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba

dang/ btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang/ mnyan par bya ba dang/ mnam par bya ba dang/ myang bar bya ba'i tshogs dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed dang/ byang chub chen

po rdo rje mnam byed dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang/ btsun mo 'das pa dang/ da ltar dang/ 'byung ba dang/ ma byon pa'i tshogs dang/ 'joms pa chen po reg pa dang// 'joms pa chen po reg byed
dang// 'joms pa chen po reg bya dang// 'joms pa chen po reg shes dang/ btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang/ chad par ma yin pa dang/ bdag tu ma yin pa dang/ mtshan mar ma yin pa la la sogs pa de lta
bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba

'di nyid sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs dang/ yon tan dang/ phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo// e e e ma'o// de bzhin nyid dbyings nyid dbang sgyur// ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i ngang// rang snang ba nyid
ting nge 'dzin// gzugs brnyan sgyu ma rnam par dag/ gsal ba ni sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las sel med pa'i yon tan yid bzhin rin po che mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas

nyid do zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid kun du bzang pos thams cad ma lus
pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rje btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun du bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to// zhugs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pas

de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o rdo rje phung po yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang
chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI// me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing// thams cad ma lus chos so
cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi brnyes so// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas btsun
mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos/ bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// kye ma phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye nas dben// srid pa gsum nyid

dag pa'i zhing// snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas// phung po lnga nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal ba'i chos mi btsal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal
kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes so// zhes brjod pas/ thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i sems

ye shes su bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sags rgyas kun gyi gsang// skye ba med las thams cad skye// skyes pa nyid na'ang skye ba med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi
chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na'ang 'gag pa med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi
gsang// gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na'ang gnas pa med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// dmigs pa med las thams cad
dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na'ang dmigs pa med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong// 'gro 'ong nyid na'ang 'gro 'ong med// ces
brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang mnyes pas khyab par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas ched du brjod
pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin gsang// ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang// gzhan du min la shin tu gsang// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad dang/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na'ang/ 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa las 'gro ba lnga'i ris bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa

la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang// gnas
dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin// sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa
dor// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad// ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo// gsang

ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye shes su bskyed pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po'i byin

brlabs zhes bya'i rigs pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las 'thon to// 'thon nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snrel zhi dang yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi
phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re re thub pa bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul ba rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de// bltams pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ dka' thub
mdzad pa dang/ sangs rgyas pa dang/ bdud btul ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ cho 'phrul chen po ston pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs par ston pa'i thub pa dus bzhi kun tu

mkhyen pa dang/ thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kun tu mkhyen pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis thams cad kun tu gzigs pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun tu gsan pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho gas kun tu

don spyod pa dang/ zag pa med pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po drug dang// kun tu sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu zhal
bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i grangs med pa phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to// thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha

dang/ mi'i theg pa dang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang/ bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad

cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungs so// gsung ngo// gsung bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang// 'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ 'dzin
pa dang/ 'phrul pa las 'dogs pa dang/ las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang/ las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos/ gos par mi 'gyur/ gos su med par ston pa'i mthar thug go/ de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis// phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor// mi mthun bde sdug myong bar
'gyur// rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med// yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go/ bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// log par

rtog pa tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab pa'ang yod ma yin// log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de// gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med// log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang// gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// rnam par dag
pa'i dbyings nyid tshul// nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun// rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/ theg pa bzhi yis nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur
gnas// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// rang bzhin med las cir yang 'grub// sangs rgyas mya ngan yod mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// ma rig smin mdzad 'dul ba'i phyir// byung nas mya
ngan 'da' bar ston// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang// dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// phyogs bcu rnams su rab grags pa// gsang ba'i snying po las

'phros te// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi// 'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs// chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam// ston pas don dang mthun phyogs su// ming dang
tshig tu btags nas bstan// ston min tshig la dngos po med// ces ched du brjod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang/ gsung

dang/ thugs dang/ yon tan dang/ phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo// a ho/ srid rtsa nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'phros// rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang// gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor
la sogs pa// log rtog nyid las gzhan g.yo ci yang med// stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs// dmigs bya dmigs byed med par dran dbang sgyur// ngo mtshar sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin

las zhing khams las// gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o zhes brjod pas// thub pa drug gi sprul pa grangs med pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa
yang de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo bar// chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi

ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// a rab tu brtan gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas// bsdus kyang

'phel 'grib med par bstan// de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun// spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// brtan byung ye shes rgyu yin no// a A/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta

Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa hA/ k+ShaH/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ 'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rab tu
g.yos// kun du rab tu g.yos nas/ chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid tsam du gyur to// hoH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ni stong dang mi stong gi// dbu
ma'ang dmigs su yod ma yin// thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun// yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas// a nyid sna tshogs bar snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra yi ming gis thams
