cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges// e ma ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming// tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas// sna tshogs don chen smra zhing ston// dngos med yi
ge'i rang bzhin sems// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang// dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis// rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// ye shes sems dpa' sku

gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid// yi ge mgo nas k+ShaHla rdzogs// sems kyi rang bzhin yi ge ste// yi ge'i dngos po yod ma yin// dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi

'khor lo che// sku gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyi// ngo mtshar 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa// dbyings la dbyings kyis bris pa ste// yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod// mgo ni ma nor lam yin te// tig ni shes rab ming

du smra// shad ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod// a ni skye med de bzhin nyid// A ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid// tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid// Ta ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid// Da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid// D+ha ni sgyu

'phrul snang bdag nyid// Na ni kun du sgyu 'phrul nyid// tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid// ta ni drwa bas brtan pa nyid// da ni drwabs lhan ne nyid// d+ha ni drwa bas 'khril ba nyid// na ni drwa bas kun du 'gyur// ka

ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog/ g+ha ni ljags kyi thugs kyi mchog/ nga ni thugs kyang 'jig byed pa'o// tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog/ tsha ni snyan gyi sku yi

mchog/ dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog/ dz+ha ni ljags kyi sku yi mchog/ nya ni sku'ang 'jig byed pa'o// pa ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog/ pha ni snyan gyi gsung gi mchog/ ba ni shangs kyi gsung gi mchog/ b+ha ni ljags kyi

gsung gi mchog/ ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed// ya ni skye ba rnam par dag/ wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin// ra ni 'jig pa dag pa ste// la ni stong pa dag pa'o// sha ni rtag pa med pa ste// Sha ni chad pa'ang yod

ma yin// sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa// ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid// k+Sha ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs// i ni rdul snyed lha rnams su// I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin// u ni rdul snyed mi rnams su// U ni rdul snyed

byol song rnams// e ni rdul snyed yi dwags su// ai ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams// o~M ni thams cad 'jig par byed// auni thams cad zhig pa yin// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen 'di// sku gsung thugs kyi phreng
bas bsdus// zhes brjod do// a hoH// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang/ gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyis gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs

dang/ yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo// a hoH// thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo// 'bras bu rgyal ba smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis// 'dus ma byas

nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i dam/ 'da' bar mi mdzad dpang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin/ hoH/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge

'khor lor gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yi ge 'khor lo sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par 'phro ba 'di ched

du brjod do// rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te// yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// dra ba'i dkyil
'khor mngon rdzogs pas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing// longs spyod 'byung ba
ngan song sbyong// cir yang gzhan du 'gyur ba 'grub// nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing// 'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang// chur 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin te// 'jig rten khams 'di 'dor ba

dang// thams cad stongs shing ltung bar 'gyur// dgug dang btang dang bcing dang grol// gso dang gsad dang pham dang rgyal// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// de nyid ye shes rang snang ba'i// ming tshig
gzugs sogs yid bzhin gyis// mun la snang 'byung ji bzhin du// 'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul// ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// ma nyams shes shing
yo byad ldan// 'grub 'gyur mi ldan med cing brlag/ dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod// 'phel 'grib med par 'byung ba
ste// dngos po med las dngos po sprin// sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par// rtog pa'i dbang sgyur ting 'dzin yin// gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa// de yis chos
kyi dbyings mi shes// de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa// 'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min// kha dog
ma yin dbyibs ma yin// gnas su ma yin gang yang min// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyis phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu// thabs las thabs 'byung thabs bsam yas// tha dad med la tha
dad pa'i// nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol// 'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya'i mchog/ gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas

su// sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtan na// dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu
'phrul bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa'i bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la
nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor

pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan par khyams ldan// kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor

bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung// nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang// g.yas na

mthong thos snom pa dang// myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang// thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams// btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas// bar khyams la ni thub drug
dang// mdun dang rgyab na byed pa dang// bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu
'bar// ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i// mnyes lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal
'tsher lhun stug gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// sku yi phyag rgya che
mchog ni// de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang// 'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// mthun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston// ston nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul// tshul nyid
dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// de tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la// so so 'dra bar snang ba ni// de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang// las 'phro'i dbang gis so sor
snang// dper na me long chu zla bzhin// de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la// sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan// dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i gzugs// gzhan
yang theg mchog rim pa bzhin// 'og min bla med gnas mchog tu// sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste// sku yis chos rnams mjal

bar ston// me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du// dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel// 'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na// byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med// me long bzhin du sku la snang// de nas sa bcu

rim gyis 'byang// bla med byang chub yang dag 'thob// chos sku dpag med brjod du med// longs spyod zad med rin chen gter// sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs// spyod

yul kun tu maN+Da la// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog/ de la sogs te bsam yas mchog/ skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung sku// nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas// zad

mi shes pa'i gter du 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa rig pa'i sku// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs// zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi
phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed gcig gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil
'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo// a ho// dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab// ye shes rang rig dkyil

'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang// mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings// ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnam 'phro spros pa med// ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po

de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo// b+h+rU~M bi

swa bi shud+d+he/ hU~M badzra d+h-ika/ o~M dzi na dzika/ swA~M rat+na d+h+r-ika/ A~M A ro lika/ ha~M pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ mU~M d+hA twI shwa rI/ lwa~M dwe Sha ra ti/ mA~M mo ha ra ti/ pA~M rA ga ra ti/ tA~M badzra ra ti/ k+ShI~M hi rA dza ya/ trA~M A gar+b+ha ya/ hrI~M ha hU~M/ pad+ma ba da ma/

dzI~M ku ru pA Ni hriH/ hU~M lA' s+ye sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ trA~M mA l+ye sa ma ya hoH/ hrI gI ti rA go\u0f85ha~M/ A~M nr-it+ya rA ga yA mye/ mai d+hA ra Ne swA hA/ th+l+hIM nis+sa ra~M b+ha ya swA hA/ hU~M sa rA dzA ya swA hA/ mu~M shrI a~M rA gA ya swA hA/ dzeHd+hu pa pra

bi sa/ hU~M puSh+pa a bi sa/ ba~M dI ba su khI nI/ hoHgan+d+ha tsit+ta~M/ hU~M ya mAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ o~M pad+man+ta kr-ita phaT/ hU~M pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ hU~M bi g+h+nAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ o~M ma hA badzra d+ha ra~M ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa la nI hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA rat+na d+ha

ra~M ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa la nI hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra~M ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa la nI hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA kar+m+ma d+ha ra~M ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa la nI hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra tsit+ta o~M a a a badzra b+ha dra sa man+ta AH/ o~M mu ne hrI~M swA hA/

o~M mu ne hU~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne sru~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne gra~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne k+Sha~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne ya swA hA/ o~M e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHo~M A~MHhU~M swA hA/ ba ba ba ba ba/ pa pa pa pa pa/ dza dza dza dza dza/ pa pa pa pa
pa/ sa sa sa sa sa/ pa pa pa pa pa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ pa pa pa pa pa/ ya ya ya ya ya/ pa pa pa pa pa/ o~M A~MHhU~M swA hA/ ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad po

che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ o~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ o~M badzra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ o~M badzra sa ma ya hoH/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ zhes brjod pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig

rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du khyab par grags so// rab tu grags so// kun du grags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang/ bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par

mdzad do// de nas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen pos bdag nyid chen po'i ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul drwa ba

las phyung ngo// o~M ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M ma hA pra t+ya bek+Sha NA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA pa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/

o~M ma hA kr-i t+ya a nuSh+Tha na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bA' ka badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba

At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ zhes brjod pas thim par gyur/ gsal bar gyur/ 'bar bar gyur to/ e ma
ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung// gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab
kun du khyab// sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags// thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya'i mchog/ rgyud mchog sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// bde ldan gsung gi don 'byung ba'ang// thams cad pad+ma'i ngang gyur
na// grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra// ji skad brjod kyang gsung mchog yin// theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang// log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad// byang chub rdo rje'i gsung du bsdus// bsdus nyid
phyogs bcur rnam par grags// grags nyid ma chags ngang du gsungs// gsung ba nyid na brjod du med// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing so sor 'jal// dper na de bzhin sbrid sangs
bzhin// gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad go/ 'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin// theg pa mtho dman thams cad kyang// de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te// 'dul ba'i thabs su so sor thos// ji ltar gsung
rab kun brjod kyang// de bzhin nyid las gsungs pa med// yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung// ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang// thugs rje gsung gi byin brlabs kyis// 'gro don sna tshogs so sor

gsal// gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog/ de bzhin gsung gi 'gro don rnams// de bzhin ngang las ma yos kyang// dper na brag ca'i sgra bzhin no// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor
bsdus pa dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod

do// sgyu 'phrul drwa bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying po phyag rgya 'da' dka'o// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga

gnyis zung du sprad pa las// sbyar bas phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// o~M dang mU~M gnyis rtse sbyar te/ 'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtse sprad pa// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi sbas

nas thugs kar bkan// hU~M bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// mu~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil
'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// o~M bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril

ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// lA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs
kar bkan// swA bsgreng rtse mor rin chen 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// mA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril
gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// A~MHbsgreng rtse mor pad+ma 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril

ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// pyAM bsgreng rtse mor dri gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs

kar bkan// hA bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// tAM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi

ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen snye// gzugs
mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang// pi wang gar mkhan mchog nyid de// me tog phreng dang spos mchog dang// mar me byug pa la sogs pa'i// las la 'khril zhing chos la brtan// dbu rnams 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i

tshul// gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// sgo bzhi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// nr-i mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon// thod sbrul chen pos gnon pa dang// rdo rje rgya gram las kyis

gnon// lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta ho// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang// 'dud tshul 'khril ba gong ma bzhin// thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te// mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin no// gseg bar dang ni pi wang

dang// go cha po ti rin chen sgrom// me dang chu ni rab tu bstan// yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings// kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+mo'i dkyil// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna

tshogs te// yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid dam// yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid// phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs mchog ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor na// ma bskyod ma bsgul thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i
ngang du gnas// yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gsum 'phror 'gyur// de ltar ldan pa'i gtso mchog gis// rgyal ba rgyal mchog de bzhin du// bcu
gnyis drug gi 'od 'phror 'bar// de la sogs te bsam mi khyab// phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su// 'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston// theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang// phyin ci log na thams cad
dang// zhi khro tshogs chen thams cad la// so sor mthun par kun tu ston// dper na gang mkhan nyid 'dra ba// lus las ma bkod sna tshogs ston// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// 'di zhes
gcig ces brjod du med// gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro// bskyed dang spro ba'ang de bzhin nyid// mdor na bsgul bskyod thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// gnas nyid mi gnas gnas pa

min// de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las// yan lag dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs nas phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor

dam pa ste// sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya// 'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang// bdud rtsi lnga ni rab bsnyams la// rig pas thig ni gdab par bya// lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi// rtsibs

bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi yi// bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya// sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la// tsa na'i 'bru tsam pad+ma'i gdan// yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge la// phyag rgya til 'bru tsam

du bri// bcos bu ras ni sna tshogs dang// rgyan phreng bro ba'i btung bas bskor// glu tshig bro gar rol mo yi// sprin dpung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod// yum dang 'jo ma sems ma yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las
bzhin mchod// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan par// zhal du gyur pa'i me bos la// bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis// las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu sbyin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin de// shin
tu phra la sbyangs pa yis// bsam yas dag la'ang de bzhin bya// rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas

zhing// mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yi// sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi// mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang// kun 'byung rin chen phung por 'bar// dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil// rin chen khang pa
sna tshogs dang// rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal// gru dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra// bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung rgyan se mo do// bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams
dang// rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi// lha dang lha mo rdul rnyed kyis// bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul// skal ldan
gsal ba'i khyad par gyis// rim gyis yang na cig car du// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom// gsal ldan ma'am byin brlabs la// stong gsum
yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// mnyes nas grub pa'i dam tshig mchog/ bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid gsum
'gro ba thams cad la// dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba brtan pa yis// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang// khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon
du 'gyur// lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad// gang na'ang mi gnas mi dmigs pa// mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' sgom// kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de nas

slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na// dkyil
'khor thams cad mchod pa yin// nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos// nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtog nas// phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang// rim pa bzhin

du sbyin par bya// snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung// yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas// phyag rgya chen po'i 'phang du ni// dkyil 'khor mdzub gang tshad du bya// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya// yang na sa gzhi rab

mnyam la// dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya// yang na lus gang tshad du ste// yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad// phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang// gos rgyan mdzes pa'i yid 'ong grogs// thig gdab cho ga phun sum

tshogs// mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya// yang na khru ni bcu drug dang// nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom// sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang dgod// yang na rgyang

grags dpag tshad tsam// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom// ma mthong rmongs la bstan phyir mtshon// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar

bya// 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du bgyi// ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog/ yi ge'am brda'am snying po'am// phyag rgya'am sku gsung thugs ldan par// byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// 'grub 'gyur sangs
rgyas kun gyi dam// sa la sogs la phyag rgyar byas// rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur// dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs na// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi
dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo// rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs
pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi// rin po che dang 'byung ba kun// de dag rdzas yod ma yin te// rang sems bsod

nams brtan pa yin// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad po che// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu yi ngang du byung// shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag

rgyar gyur pa'i phyir// ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog/ rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang// byin brlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te// bya byed nus pa'i gzi byin gyis// sgyu ma rdo rje

btsan po mchog/ cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing// yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// ma nyams 'jug la rab brtson pas// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu

bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang bsgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha'
yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas pa// rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang// 'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas

kun// mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang// rgya chen gsung las don 'byung ba// mthun pa'i shes rab snang ba'o// gcig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi
gzigs te// rang 'byung ye shes gnas med snang// log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing// ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus
snang// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor na// stangs dpyal gnyis sam yang na lnga// byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na// 'dod pa'i yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur// skal ba mnyam pa'i ye shes de// gnyer na nye bar

'byung ba yin// ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges// dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur// zhes ched du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// bde ba'i
'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun// rdo rje'i lam nas pad+mor bskyil// rtsa nas bstim zhing dkyil 'khor bsgyur// nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ trA~M gi phyag rgya'i
tshogs mchog las// rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// gsang ba gsang chen gsang mchog las// gsang ba kun la mnyan par bya// gsang ba'i don nyid brtag pa las// gzhan du smra bar bya ba
yin// gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim// oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po// sku

gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// hU~M gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog

las// las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// o~M khyod ni rdo rje las yin gyis// las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig/ pho nya mang po'i 'du 'phro kun// khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin// smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal

yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hrI yi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// o~M chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis// dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos// rab 'bring tha

ma'i blo can la// mthun pa'i gsang bsgrags gzhan du min// bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hU~M o~M swA A~MHhA rnams las// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom// o~M

phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing// dbang rnams thob par ma byas

par// nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing rlag par 'gyur// dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang// go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang// gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang// snying po lnga yis dbang

bskur na// dus 'di phyin cad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song thams cad med pa dang// tshe ring bde skyid phun sum tshogs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// zhes brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid

nges pa las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos/ sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i rgyal po sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa
'di brjod do// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum par// rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun// rnam
smin o~M du shes par bya// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// rnam smin mU~M du shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor

nyid du bsgom// yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor sgom/ gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig/ bro gar tshogs kyi sprin phung gis// hU~M du shes pas rab spyad na// ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes// lha mo klu mo

rigs ngan mo// dbye'am yang na mi dbye bar// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen po// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus
la// dgyes mnyam tshogs kyi sbyin pas bstim// bsgrub pa'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor de// dkyil 'khor rdo rje lce yis blang// mkha' 'gro gsal 'bar tshe la sogs// yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur// zhing

'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// nyi zla'i steng du mkhas pas bzhag/ nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed bsgom// hU~M du gyur pas rnam par dag/ dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar// skur 'gyur 'od zer 'phro bas

brjid// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba sgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// ye shes skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu mar snang ba mig yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang// rdul cha tsam yang gos pa
med// snod bcud rgyu rnams dag rtogs shing// mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis// dkyil 'khor kun du bzang po'i zhing// byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas// yan lag ma nyams yo byad

ldan// cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yis// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// lnga dang lnga yi sbyor ba yis// tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo

bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom// de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i rigs te sku gsung thugs// khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// rigs kyi rigs te

rigs kyi mtsho// thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen dang// pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs// ci bgyi la
sogs tshogs rnams kyis// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni// mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ngang gnas shing// spyod pa ci la'ang thogs med pa// thams cad ye nas
dbyer med pa'o// rdo rje rigs su thams cad dkyil// 'od 'phro 'bar bar rab tu bsgom// chags med tshul du bstim par bya// gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che// yang na sku gsung thugs nyid de// thams cad
ma lus sku gsung thugs// ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'phro// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// rig 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar bar

'grub// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// rdo rje rigs su skye ba'i gnas// sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni// thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom// chags
pa med pa'i tshul gyis su// 'od zer rnam pa mang po 'phro// gnyis su med par bstim par bya// dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis// de bzhin gshegs dang yum du
bsgom/ sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom// so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang// ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal// gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang// ma nyams blo ni rab ldan pas// dang po dam

mnos bzhin du bya// le lo sgyid snyom med pa yis// the tshom med par bsgrub byas na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang mchog dam pa thob// bsgrub pa'i zhag dang tshes grangs ni// rgyud

las smos pa bzhin du bshad// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te/ rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu

'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bro gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis// 'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos grub thob par

'gyur// rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis// yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grub// A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad thams cad

'grub par 'gyur// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzugs// 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can du gang gyur pa// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhingadu grags// mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi// skye ba rnam
dag 'dzin mod kyang// khyad par sa la gnas 'gyur yin// pha rol phyin pa kun tu rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab thabs kyi mchog/ shes rab mchog gi mchog 'gyur ba// sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum// rgyu
'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs// mkha' dkyil dag pa'i dbyings nyi zla// ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal bsgom// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas kun// ma lus par gyi bsgom par 'gyur// dus bzhi
phyogs bcu gang nas kyang// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan nas ma tshol cig/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas// dkyil

'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang// skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med// ces ched du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
las tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus

nas// dgyes pa chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin tu gsang ba'i snying po sprin bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di
brjod do// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yag dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang// rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge sgra rtags ming tshogs las// brten
pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor
dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo
rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams// kun du bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yis// thugs kyi ye shes lngas bltas shing// snying po thig le mnyam sbyor ba// bde ba'i ye
shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes la mchod pa dbul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu mar rang snang ba'i// rol mo dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi
dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba'i// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin// dkyil
'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis
'byung// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mchog/ sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom la mnyam sbyor gyis//
rang byung kun ngom lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad
kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor ma

lus bsnyen pa yi// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// 'das dang da ltar byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// brnyes nas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs// 'byung dang ma
'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi// 'bras bu lam du 'gyur ba yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'di las gsang ba'i nges don

med// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes so// kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i mchog/ thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung// snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan// lus dang
longs spyod gtong la sbyin// gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya// rmongs la phyar bas gal te byin// dus min par ni srog zad nas// bsregs dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de
bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu gsang ba man ngag gi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyi dkyil

'khor la dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che// bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs// snang stong thig le kun du rdzogs hoH// o~M rdo

rje bsod nams thig le che// rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa// rdo rje rgyal po thig le che hoH// o~M sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che// yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// ye nas
lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang// 'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che hoH// o~M mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro// mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs sku

gsung thugs chen po hoH// o~M phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed// sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis// skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub hoH// o~M thams cad ma lus sku

gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab// sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che hoH// zhes ched du bsgrags so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa'i
le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe
na/ bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pa dang/ brtags pa la mngon par zhen pas yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag/ gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas// rgyu dang 'bras bu

la rmongs pas srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so// de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang/ 'di bas shin tu grang yang ci ma rung snyam

pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa dang// pad+ma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyen pa/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang/ shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad du 'jig

rten gyi khams brgyud cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su nyams su myong ngo// de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang yi dwags ltogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang/ 'dod pa'i dngos

po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang// gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su gyur pa dang/ yong med par yang gyur cing shin tu rid cing skams pa dang/ lus dang yan lag dang/ dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa/

bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so// de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas// yi dwags srin po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus gcig la
mgo brgya pa dang/ mgo sna tshogs pa dang/ lus brgya la mgo gcig pa dang/ lus sna tshogs pa dang/ yan lag mang po dang/ yan lag sna tshogs pa dang/ gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang/ 'khor

rab tu mang po dang// 'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro sgra skad sna tshogs pa sgrogs pa dang/ gzugs dang/ nga ro dang/ dri dang/ kha rlangs kyis thams cad skyi bung zhes byed pa dang/

rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung nag dang/ grang ba dang/ tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs bcu kun du khams 'khrug par byed pa/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa/ myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i
rigs dang/ lha ma yin gyi ris dang/ lha'i ris dang/ tshangs pa'i ris dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dge rgyas dang/ 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus so// de sngon bsten pa'i stobs kyis thams cad mkhyen
pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dul bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chen po'i rdo rje bkod pa/ sgyu 'phrul dra bas 'jig rten drug gi/ phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen
po gzi brjid chen po bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi

sprin 'byung ba chen po rnam par spros pa'i// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i rgyal po ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las khro mo dbang phyug ma chen mo mngon du phyung ste/ hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi

mdangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas ni gnyis su med par dgyes pa'i 'khril bas thim nas/ byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ hU~M hU~M hU~M bi shwa badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la ha la hU~M hU~M phaT/ ces

brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa khyab par gyur to// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed 'then par gyur pas/ 'jig rten drug
gis phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos so// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// shig shig/ rab tu
shig shig/ kun tu rab tu shig shig go/ gtor gtor/ rab tu gtor gtor/ kun tu rab tu gtor gtor ro// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang/ gzi brjid che ba

dang/ mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad brgyal rab tu brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa skyi bung zhes byed pa 'bar ba

chen po'i khrag 'thung// sku smug gnag cir yang 'gyur ba/ dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/ dur khrod chen por dgyes

nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na king rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng/ 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i klong dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang/ dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du

bzhugs so// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprin phung gi tshogs thams cad de dag kyang la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rjer gyur te shar phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po cher gyur

te lho phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+mar gyur te nub phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu las su gyur te/ byang phyogs su bzhugs so// de dag kun

kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang/ rngam pa'i nga ro dang/ 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ gshin rje la sogs pa khyo shug gi gdan byas
pa la bzhugs so// btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so sor sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// rigs lnga'i he ru ka las gcig tu bstim ste bsdus nas/ gcig gis mang po 'dul
ba'i ngo mtshar bstan te/ de nas dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gtum po'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po sna tshogs pa bstan nas mgrin gcig tu gdug pa'i nga ros glang po'i gtum tshig tu smras

pa/ thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes 'dzer cing shin tu gdug pa'i sems kyis khros nas rngam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas

nas thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shin tu khros nas rngam pa'i skad kyis/ hU~M hU~M hU~M ha ha ha khA hi khA hi khA hi zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa chen po'i tshogs chen po de dag gi snying

dang dbang po kun phyung/ nang grol kun drangs yan lag kun bcad gtubs nas khrag kun 'thungs nas rus pa kun 'chos so// de nas hU~M hU~M hU~M b+h+yo e A ra li dzaHdzaHzhes brjod pas/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi

khams nam mkha' dang bcas par yungs 'bru gcig tsam gyi nang du chud par bsdus so// de nas 'byung po ma lus pa'i rgyal po'i yang rgyal po dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje

mo'i yang rje mo srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang/ tshangs ma dang/ 'khrug mo dang/ dbang mo dang/ 'jug sred mo dang/ gzhon nu ma dang// dmar mo dang/ bdud rtsi mo dang/ zhi ba mo dang/ be con mo dang/ srin

mo dang/ za ba mo dang/ dga' ba mo dang/ ra ro khrag 'thung myos pa dang/ gcig pur spyod ma dang/ yid 'phrog ma dang/ grub mo dang// rlung mo dang/ gsod byed ma dang/ me mo dang/ phag mo dang/ rgan byed ma
dang/ sna chad mo dang/ chu lha mo dang/ nag mo chen mo dang/ ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang/ bum sna sngo nag mo dang/ gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo la sogs pa/ bran dang yang bran dang/ g.yog dang/ yang
g.yog dang/ 'khor zhing gi rdul snyed bsdus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed chen por snang bar byas nas/ de

dag kun dgyes par rol pa'i dkyil gyi 'khor sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo// o~M A~MHhU~M badzra pra be sha a la la hoHzhes
brjod pas 'byung mo'i rgyal mo rnams shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur nas/ dper na khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po
dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje'i sku la srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ dga' ba mo dang/ gsod byed ma dang/ nag mo chen mo dang/ dmar ser chen mo dang/ sngo nag chen mo
dang// ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje'i sku la tshangs ma dang// 'khrug mo dang// dbang mo dang/ 'jug sred mo dang/ gzhon nu ma rnams 'khril

lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po che'i sku la bdud rtsi mo dang/ zhi ba mo dang/ be con mo dang/ za ba mo dang/ srin mo rnams 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+ma'i

sku la khrag gis myos ma dang/ gcig pur spyod pa dang/ yid 'phrog ma dang/ grub mo dang/ rlung mo rnams 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu las kyi sku la me mo dang/ phag mo dang/

rgan byed ma dang/ sna chad mo dang/ chu lha mo rnams 'khril lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis hU~M zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs bsdus nas shin tu
bcum par gyur to// de nas dgyes te ha ha zhes brjod pas byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las dkar mo'i tshogs dang/ rkun mo'i tshogs dang/ rmongs mo'i tshogs dang/ thal byed ma'i tshogs dang/ sbos mo'i

tshogs dang/ gtum mo'i tshogs dang/ sme sha can gyi tshogs dang/ ma tshogs ma'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du bcas nas 'thon to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan
shar phyogs nas 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis rang rang gi lag cha dang bcas nas 'khod do// de nas shin tu dgyes te he he zhes brjod pas seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ stag gdong chen mo'i

tshogs dang/ wa gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ khyi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ bzhad gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang// kAng ka'i gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ dur bya'i gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ 'ug pa'i

gdong chen mo'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol shar gyi phyogs nas 'khor bar rngam pa'i mdangs kyis

'khod do// de nas shin tu dgyes pas phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus par khyab par byas nas phaT ces brjod pas/ rdo rje sring 'gro ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje gdong mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i

tshogs dang/ rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor shin du rngam pa'i gzugs kyis gnas
so// de nas dgyes pa'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phaT ces bsgrags pas thams cad khros nas/ ma mo thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas ga la ba der yud tsam gyis phyin par bkye'o// de nas

bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun thugs rje chen po bdud rtsi chen po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di

phyung ngo// oM badzra ma hA a mr-ita ma hA kro d+ha a~M a~M a~M zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gi snam nas bton nas/ mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtsho

chen por chud pa las/ snam nas khro bo uts+tshusma kro d+ha phyung nas 'dam khu kun 'thungs pas dran pa slar rnyed de/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya/ phyag stong

brgyad brgya/ zhabs brgyad brgya/ sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil na bzhugs par mthong ngo// de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs

bsam gyis mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul lo// de nas de dag shin tu 'dar zhing rab tu bred cing zhum pa'i nga ros smras pa'i tshig/ 'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su nan tan ma
bgyis na// mgo dang lus ni brgya 'gas shing// snying yang 'gas shing gtugs 'gyur cing// rul myogs tshig nas brlag pa dang// dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog/ ces 'bangs su mchi bar mnas bor
nas dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bzhag go/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa// bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang// ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams// dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol// dpa' bo
lha rjes bzhes su gsol// bdag cag so so'i 'khor bcas kyis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yang// gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar// g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan
pa'i// sems kyis blangs te spyi bo yi// gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur bar bya// de yi dgos pa ci yang rung// ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub// gal te dpa' bo'i spyan lnga 'dir// smras pa bzhin du ma bgyis
na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying// bkas gtubs dum bur rul bar mchi// zhes smras so// de nas de dag gi chung ma'i tshogs dang/ sring mo dang ma dang bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dkyil 'khor du yud
tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kun// dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi// dpa' bo chen po bdag cag rnams// las kyi dngos grub stsal
du gsol// zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gis dbang bskur nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bkod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid
nges pa las khro bo rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sprin rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis grub

par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo khrag 'thung chen mo btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa de dag gis/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo// o~M

sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba dush+tAn+ta ka

ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro

d+hI shwa rI sarba duSh+tA~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI dz+wa li nI hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA sur+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI bi da ma hU~M phaT/ o~M hrI sha ta sa man+ta pad+ma o~M ma hA sA ra swa ta ma hA pad+ma/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI kha hA~M hU~M phaT/

o~M sarba a mo g+ha karma ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri bi shwa hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra gI rI ye gau rI ha/ badzra tsau rI ha/ badzra pra mo hA ha/ badzra bait+ta lI ha/ badzra tsaN+Da lI ha/ badzrapuk+ka sI ha/ badzra g+hasmarI ha/ badzra sma shA' nI ha/ badzra sid+ha mu khI he/

badzra byA g+h+ra mu khI he/ badzra sr-i gA la mu khI he/ badzra shwa nA mu khI he/ badzra grid+d+ha mu khI he/ badzra kang+ka muM khI he/ badzra kA ka mu khI he/ badzra ul+lu ka mu khA he/ badzra Ar+ya te dza te ra dzaH/ badzra a mu kA hU~M/ badzra lo kA ba~M/

badzra b+hasmi sa ma la ba to hoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ o~M ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M/ e h+ye hi a na ya/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHo~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hU~M/ o~M khro la

khros pas zhi mdzad pa// thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M// o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoH/ o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya

phaT/ a li u li tA li ta pA li da~MSh+ta~M/ gau na rau tri kha~M ra~M/ yo gi nI khA hi hoHhU~M ha he phaT b+h+yo/ zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad kun tshig/ rab tu tshig/ kun tu rab tu tshig go/ 'bar/
rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ro// thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang// rab tu gang/ kun du rab tu gang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i
tshogs chen po'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod

do// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/ gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i 'phro
ba mang pos 'khrug/ khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ gtum pa dom gyi sbar ba yis// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung// smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang// dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu

gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon// rngam pa'i sgra skad 'jigs par sgrogs// sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zlas brjid// stong gi 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang

pa dang// ral gri dgra sta gshol la sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams// btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang 'khril// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang// sgo bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes shing// slas dang byi
mo bran mo'i tshogs// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang// ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas// zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil
'khor kun du gsal bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos mnyes
pa'i mchod pa chen po 'di ched du brjod do// de la mchod sbyin dam pa 'di// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral// de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje// gnyis su med par
bsgral bar bya// 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul// bza' dang bca' dang btung
dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// bde gshegs yon tan rmad po che// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// lha srin
la sogs smos ci dgos// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// phyag rgya chen por rdzogs gyur cing// gsal ba yid gnyis med pa na// dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur// zhes brjod pas mnyes pa chen
pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mchog sbyin dam pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes
pa chen pos sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po 'di ched du brjod do// bla med theg pa rab nges na/ nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang// byas la mi sog tshogs 'gyur
te// tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs// bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu// 'dul ba'i dbang gis tshul khrims dang// ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ yod med dbu ma'ang mi
dmigs shing// sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul// srog med srog gcod bcad du med// srog kyang skyes bu'i log rtog tsam// bden pa gnyis kar dbyer med pas// 'phrul dga'i tshul te tha dad min// gzhan dang

ma byin med pa'i phyir// blangs med thams cad nyid kyi dbyings// chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu la// ming dang tshig tu brtags pa brdzun// brdzun nyid la ni brdzun spyod pa// brdzun zhes btags tsam yod ma yin// ma

chags pa la chags pa dang// chags pa nyid na chags pa med// de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po ste// shin tu chags pa chen po yin// bla med mi spong bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyan mi gcad// yang dag lam

du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don nyid smra mi bya// 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te// bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog/ gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang// nga rgyal phrag dog mi spong ngo// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri

sha chen// dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor ro// yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste// ye nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad// bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga// rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur// mi spong mi dor lnga
gnyis ni// yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka'o// mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yis// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas// 'das nas sangs rgyas ma yin no// rtsa ba nyams

pa'i phyal ba dag/ gso la nye bar mi brtson dang// skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed// nyams gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang// rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// sgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur// yid du mi 'ong sna

tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'dud// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing ngan song ltung// dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// rtsa ba'i dam tshig
lnga la ni// gcig la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la// gcig la'ang bcu phrag gnyis su dbye// dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// srid gsum

'gro ba ji snyed pa// rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed spro// gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi// sgrub byed dam pa ma lus 'grub// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ rgyal ba'i
rigs mchog 'dzin pa de// 'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur// dam pa mchog dang dam pa yis// sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlob// bde gshegs nyid kyi yul la bzhugs// 'jigs
med kun du bzang por sbyor// ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs// ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis grub// nyams na bskangs pas rdzogs pa dang// de la sogs te mtha' yas
mchog/ ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil

'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la// khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje
phur pas gdab// rdul du byas nas tshogs la dbul// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// bcings 'gyur bskyod na phyogs bcur g.yo// myos nas gal te 'tshig par

'gyur// ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i gzi byin lhun chen la// chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du

bcas par byas// rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab// chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul// ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// 'gug 'gyur rdo rje'ang phyi bzhin 'brang// ci
'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'du 'phro gzi byin la// dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas
lnga la// mtshan ma'i ming du bcas par bya// yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag/ nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab// rdo rje gzi byin 'bar bar 'gyur// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud
du sbrel bsdams nas// gzi byin 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen 'phro// yid bzhin nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// dang ba'i yid kyis mchod

sbyin bya// gtum po rngam po lhan ner 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag/ lhan ner gsal ba'i phur pas gdab// 'bar ba lhan ne'i tshogs su dbul// ya yi tshogs kyi
dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdams// 'bar ba lhan ne'i byin gyis khyab// thams cad g.yo ba med par byed// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// lhag ma'i mchod sbyin 'dod pa
sbyin// rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrags na// gang 'dod las ni byed par bsgo// sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka/ shin tu gdug cing gtum bag can// thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i// dbang dang byin brlabs
rmad po che// lha chen la sogs dbang bsdus nas// 'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas// so so'i las rnams bskos pa de// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa// ma thogs myur du mngon par phyung// dam bcas

bzhin du ma byas na// ji ltar rang gi mnas bor ba'i// sdom byas de las 'da' ma byed// sdom byas de las 'das gyur na// mgo lus snying yang tshal pa bdun// yak+Sha khro bos gtubs par 'gyur// de bas rnal
'byor sngags 'chang gis// ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos// las de mngon du ma byas na// rang gis khas blangs mnas bor bzhin// rul myags tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro// rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur

pa'i// las rnams yongs su bya ba dang// 'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyongs// phra men ma yang dngos grub thob// bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos// zhes bsgo'o// khro bo bsgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo 'di

yin no// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen po yis// thams cad thams cad ci 'dod par// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// mdzod lha chen po la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen
pos ni// thams cad kun la za bar byed// rdul ca tsam yang med par byed// 'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed// sbos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen pos
ni// lhan ner 'dod na lhan ner byed// rmugs par 'dod na rmugs par byed// seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la za bar byed// rdul cha tsam yang med par

byed// bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la 'byin par byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// slus dang byi mo bran mo yi// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// sbad

cing gtang bar bya ba ste// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// ljon pa dang ni lcug phran tshal// gdong gcig ma dag me reg drug/ dad pa'i dga' bas chags pa dang// khros pas ka li rab tu bya// zhes brjod

pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sbyong bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de
nas bcom lda 'das dgyes pa chen po'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu rngam pa'i gdangs kyis glu 'di blangs so// hU~M gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi

gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// mche ba zang yag za byed che hoH// hU~M rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir// gtum chen ri rab 'bum bsnyil skad// a a ha la'i gad rgyangs che// dbyug pa'i 'thor rlung

g.yeng ba che hoH// hU~M khro bo shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun du gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun du 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le che hoH// hU~M khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i
dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che hoH// hU~M bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs

pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po thig le che hoH// rdo rje brag ste sra ba po// rdo rje chu bo sdud pa po// rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che hoH// zhes ched du glu 'di blangs

so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo la bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la sngags kyi rgyal po brtan
par gzungs/ 'di ched du brjod do// kye kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// gzung 'dzin spros la 'chel ba yi// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor zin// sa rnams khyad
par bkod pa yang// gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byam kun// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya gsang chen nges pa

'di// rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa// de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'// sgro dang skur pa zhi ba yi// gsang ba'i snying po de kho
na// nyid de nges pa'i dbyings nas phyung// de ni nges par lung bstan te// sras ni thugs las skyes pa yin// sa rab rig pa 'dzin la gnas// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med

par dgyes nas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings sku gsung thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so// 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa las mtshan nyid

dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi spyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par spros te 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu'i
mchog go/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa dang yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so/// rgya gar skad du/ badzra satwa mA yA dza la

gu h+ya sarba A dar+sha nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba thams cad kyi me long zhes bya ba'i rgyud// o~M rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ a~M
snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i bdag/ kun gyis dbang bskur gter 'dzin pas// dgyes shing spyan gdangs gus bcas pas// rgyal ba
kun la bstod bskor nas// spyan sngar gus 'dug 'di skad gsol// e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung// rtog pa kun gyi rgyal po ste// cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud// dri med zab mo brtag dka' ba// 'dul

ba mdo sde chos mngon dang// dam tshig bsgrub dang grub pa dang// sku gsung thugs kyi cho ga'i rgyud// ma lus gtan la 'bebs pa 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags// sgyu 'phrul gang gis bstan pa de// dra

ba'i rgyud de gang phyir bstan// lung ni gang phyir brjod pa nyid// gang phyir spyi zhes bya bar bshad// gsang ba zhes ni ji lta bu// snying po'i don ni ci yi phyir// de kho nyid ces ji ltar brjod// nges pa zhes pa ci yi

phyir// mtshan 'di gang zag gang la gsungs// mtshan gyi dri ba dris pa'o// thun mong khyad par tshul nyid kyi// ston pa zhes ni ci yi phyir// gnas dang 'khor ni ji lta bu// dus dang sdud pa ji lta bu// mi bskyod pa ni

ji ltar bya// rnam par snang mdzad ji ltar brjod// rin chen 'byung ldan gang gi phyir// snang ba mtha' yas gang gi phyir// don yod grub pa ji lta bu// spyan dang nam mkha'i dbyings ma dang// gos dkar mo dang mA

ma kI// sgrol ma zhes pa gang gi phyir// sa yi snying po ci yi phyir// nam snying spyan ras gzigs dbang dang// phyag na rdo rje gang phyir brjod// sgeg mo phreng dang glu gar ci// byams dang sgrib sel kun bzang

dang// 'jam dpal zhes pa ci yi phyir// dus bzhi bdug spos me tog dang// mar me dri chab gang phyir brjod// rnam rgyal gshin rje gshed po dang// rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ci// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags

sgrog dang// dril bu zhes pa gang phyir brjod// yid dang chos bzang gnyis ci phyir// gtso bos bdag la nges par gsungs// gang phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i// nang dang gsang ba'i gleng gzhi las// ston pa bstan
pa gnas dang 'khor// dus dang sdud pa ji ltar brjod// grags pa thun mong gleng gzhi las// ston pa 'khor gnas dus ji ltar// bstan pa sdud pa ji lta bu// skyes bu chen pos bshad du gsol// 'di ni gleng
gzhi'i dri ba tshigs su bcad pa'o// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// gleng bslang gnyis su ci phyir 'gyur// gang gis gang la gleng bslang zhing// thabs dang 'bras bu ci yin ston/ thun mong thun

mong ma yin pa'i// sems lnga ye shes lnga yi rim// gang dang 'brel pa bshad du gsol// 'di ni gleng bslang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o// skyes bu chen po ston pa'i gtso// sgyu 'phrul drwa bar mnga' brnyes

shing// phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi rje// gzi brjid phung po phun sum tshogs// blta bya gang la ci yi phyir// gang gis rtogs pas ji ltar 'gyur// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ci// rtogs pa'i sgo ni du ru

gsungs// gtan tshigs tshul dang 'bras bu ci// 'di ni lta ba'i dri ba'o// thun mong spyod pa ci yi phyir// thun mong thun mong gang ci'i phyir// shes rab tshogs dang thugs rje dang// rtogs dang phyogs gcig spyod pa

dang// 'brel dang rig 'dzin spyod pa ci// gang gis gang la ji ltar spyad// de yi 'bras bu gang phyir 'gyur// gang du de dang mi ldan pa'i// spyad pa'i skyon nyid bdag la gsungs// 'di ni spyod pa'i khyad par gyi dri

ba'o// thun mong spyi dang khyad par gyi// rang bzhin nyid dang lhun grub kyi// dkyil 'khor zhes pa gang ci'i phyir// de nyid phyi nang gsang ba dang// 'dul thabs gnyis su ji ltar 'gyur// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor
rim gsum gang// lhag pa ting 'dzin zhes bya ba// gnyis la sku gsung thugs sbyor dang// phyi nang gsang ba'i rim pa ci// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ji lta bu// gang phyir gzugs brnyan zhes brjod

cing// gang gi gzugs brnyan gang la snang// phyi nang gsang bar ji ltar 'gyur// lhag pa zhes pa gang phyir te// gzugs brnyan zhes pa ji lta bu// gnyis dang gsum dang drug bstan cing// don dam kun rdzob byang

chub sems// phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar sbyor// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis ci zhig/ gang gis gang du gang tshogs nas// ji ltar spyad pas ci zhig 'grub// 'di dag bstan pa'i dgongs pa ci// gnas skabs gang

dang 'brel par 'gyur// yan lag rtsa ba gang dang 'brel// dkyil dang 'khor du ji ltar brtag/ gsungs shig skyes bu mchog chen po// gang dang nges pa ma rnyed par// kun gyi spyod par ma gyur pa// legs par
gsungs shig rgyal mchog che// 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi dri ba dris pa'o// gang gis gang la gang dag tu// ji ltar dbang bskur phun sum tshogs// bdag gis ji ltar shes par bgyi// gang dang gang du ji ltar

'brel// skyon dang yon tan ji lta bu// 'bras bu rim pa bshad du gsol// 'di ni 'jug pa'i cho ga du// las kyi rim pa ji lta bu// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// thabs
dang shes rab gnyis med pas// bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol// 'di ni dbang gi don mtha' dag la dri ba dris pa'o// gang la gang gis brten pa yi// dam tshig ces pa ci yi phyir// rtsa ba dam
tshig du zhig bstan// gang phyir rtsa bar brjod par bya// yan lag du zhig bstan pa gsungs// 'di dag lam dang bsnyen bsgrub dang// gang zag gang don ji ltar 'brel// bsrungs dang 'das pa'i skyon yon

ci// phyi nang gsang bar ji ltar gsungs// lta dang spyod dang sgrub pa dang// shes bya ting 'dzin dam tshig tu// grub dang mi spong bsrung ci zhig/ rgyal mchog skyes bus bshad du gsol/ thun mong thun mong ma yin

pa'i// mchog dang mchog gyur ma yin pa'i// bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji lta bu// gang gis gang du ji ltar bsgrub// dgug dang bcing dang gso dang bsad// dbye dang bskrad dang pham rgyal ci// gter dang mig rnon

rkang mgyogs dang// rig 'dzin go 'phang ji ltar sgrub// rgyal ba mchog gis bshad du gsol// 'di sgrub pa'i dri ba dris pa'o// phrin las rim pa gang ci zhig/ gang gis gang du brtsam par bya// thab dang rdzas
dang phur bu ci// ting 'dzin 'dug stangs hom khung ci// gdul bya rim pa gang ci zhig/ khyad par rim pa ji ltar bshad// 'bras bu yon tan ji ltar 'gyur// gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal mchog gtso// the

tshom legs par chod par mdzod// 'di ni phrin las kyi dri ba dris pa'o// rmad 'byung skyes bu gang zhig gis// dang po lam tshul ji lta bu// phyi nang gsang ba'i lam ci phyir// stong pa'i rnal 'byor snying rje che// phyag

rgya cig dang spros bcas ci// rnam smin dbang sgyur phyag rgya dang// lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan nyid ci// mthar phyin rnam pa du zhig gsungs// phyi nang gsang ba mthar phyin pa'i// 'bras bu bdag gzhan don nyid

ci// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i don ci ltar// gang dag rtog pa'i rgyal po ste// sgyu 'phul drwa ba bla na med// kun lam 'bras bu thugs chud pa// cho ga rgyas par bshad pa'i rgyud// skal ngan rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i// gsang
ba gsang chen mdo sde dang// 'dul ba chos kyi phung po dag/ nam mkhar mtha' thug bshad pa kun// gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros pas// ji snyed bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i lam// ma lus kun gyi snying po

'di// theg pa dman dang ma sbyangs dang// rigs chad dbang dang man ngag bral// ji ltar bltas kyang mi snang ba// skyes bu mchog gi spyod yul bas// rdul snyed sbyangs pa'i gang zag la// gsang phyir gsang
ba'i thabs dag gis// dngos grub mtha' yas grub phyir bstan// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa'i// rten dang brten par bcas pa'i chos// ji ltar grags dang grags gyur pa'i// thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig
kyang// rkyen stobs nus pa so sor snang// khyad par rim par gang gnas pa// rang bzhin gdul bya bde gshegs dang// 'khrul pa'i dbang gis so sor snang// ma bcos ngang la tha dad

med// rang snang las kyis tha dad pa'i// bye brag rnam par bstan pa kun// de bzhin nyid la dgod bya'i phyir// rgyal mchog bde chen yongs gang bas// dri ba'i don 'di lung bstan cing// thabs dang shes rab

'brel gyur pa'i// gsang ba'i don la dgod du gsol// sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sem sa dpa' gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dri ba rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba bshad pa rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so//// de nas gsang
bdag rdo rje 'chang// skyes bu mtshan dpe rab ldan cing// dpag med rgyal bas rab bskor zhing// rang 'byung dag pa'i gzhal yas na// thabs dang shes rab 'khril sbyor zhing// kun kyang de dang mthun pa
ste// 'dzum zhing steg pas sos 'debs shing// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bka' stsal pa// dpag med rgyal bas gsungs pa dang// gsung dang gsung 'gyur thugs kyi rgyud// thog ma bar dang mthar dge
ba// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// cho ga rgyas par dris pa'i mchog/ nyon cig da ni sems dpa' bshad// chos rnams ma lus gnyis med pa'i// rang rig byang chub sems nyid de// tha dad med pa'i
rang bzhin nyid// rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin// rang bzhin mtha' thug med pa'i chos// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis// thugs su chud cing mngon rtogs pa// phyi nang gsang ba'i sems dpar

bshad// rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu'i don// nus pa'i rim pa stsal snang ba// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i don// sgyu 'phrul zhes ni bzhir bshad do// tha dad min las tha dad pa'i// ngo bo thabs dang
bdag nyid dang// byin brlabs shugs kyis 'brel pa ni// drang ba'i don zhes bshad pa yin// ma brjod grags pa'i bstan pa nyid// sgro skur med dang zhal nas gsungs// dri ma med pa'i lung nyid de// las

dang ye shes spyi nyid dang// rdzogs pas rdzogs phyir lung nyid de// bstan pa spyi yi bdag nyid ni// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid pas// gcig dang du ma mi gnas kyang// so so'i bstan pa rgya mtsho'i rgyud// 'di
ston 'dis ston 'di phyir ston// don kun 'di la yongs rdzogs pas// lung gi spyi zhes bshad pa yin// gang phyir gsang ba zhes bya ba// sku dang gsung thugs bdag nyid de// rang bzhin ye nas ngo bo

dang// thabs dang 'bras bur gyur pa nyid// gsang ba'i don du 'di brjod do// ngang gis dman dang ma sbyangs dang// dbang dang dam tshig bral ba dang// rang brtags bsgribs pas sa'i khyad par// de dang de
yi dbang gis na// ro myang bral phyir gsang bar bshad// rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu yi// chos rnams thig le chen po'i don// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// ma lus ro gcig dbyer
med pa// ji snyed theg pa'i khyad par dang// bstan pa'i bye brag gnas pa rnams// 'dir 'dus thabs 'dis mtshon pa dang// rtsa bar gyur pa kho na yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// byang chub

sems nyid bde ba che// rang 'byung ye shes thog mtha' med// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid de// rgyal ba'i byin brlabs rab snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab che ba rnams/ 'di las ston pas snying po ste// snying po
dang ni 'od bzhin no// rgyu dang 'bras bu bcud 'dus pas// snying po zhes ni bshad pa yin// gang phyir thams cad byang chub sems// mtha' dbus yongs su ma chad pa// dngos po gsum gyis khyab gyur

pa// yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin no// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// de bzhin nyid du rdo rjes rig/ bdag dang gzhan don nus pa rdzogs// 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid do// gang phyir dngos gnyis tha

dad par// log par brtags pa'i snang ba rnams// mun la snang dang gser 'gyur ltar// ro gcig thabs kyi de kho na// de phyir de kho na zhes brjod// dngos po sna tshogs dbyer med pa'i// tha dad don min don

gcig min// de nyid gsang ba'i nges pa ni// gzhi dang lam dang ngo bo dang// nges pas nges pa gsum du bstan// gang du theg pa bzhi gsungs pa// 'gro ba 'dren phyir ma nges pa// ro gcig theg par nges gnas

pa// nges pa'i theg pa bla na med// rang bzhin ma bcos rang byung las// bya byed ngang gis bral ba yi// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul// rang snang sgyu 'phrul drwa ba 'o// rang bzhin mtha' dbus med pa

las// rgyu rkyen las kyis so sor 'khrul// de nyid byang chub sems nyid de// mtha' dbus med par mnyam par gnas// de ltar so sor snang ba'i rgyud// nam mkha' dang ris phye ba ltar// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul drwa
ba yi// lam gnyis 'brel bar mngon bsgoms pas// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// bde chen thig le mngon snang ba// 'jug dang grol ba'i lam nyid de// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i lam du brjod// rang
bzhin yongs kyis khyab pa yi// dngos dbang thabs kyis 'brel pa yis// rim pa ji bzhin stobs gyur pas// khyad par thabs kyi sgyu 'phrul yin// thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems// chos kun rang gi ngo bo

nyid// zab mo bstan pa spyi yi lung// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud// bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas// shes rab sbyangs dang snying rje ldan// dad dang brtson 'grus
dam tshig dang// cho gas dag par sbyangs pa yis// dbang po rab kyi spyod yul yin// rdo rje gsang ba'i theg pa 'di// ngo bo nyid dang byin brlabs dang// mtshon dang rdo rjer grub pa ste// rdo rje theg

pa bde ba che// rang bzhin ngan dang dman pa dang// phyin ci log dang mi mos dang// dbang dang dam tshig med pa la// gsang phyir gsang ba'i theg par gsungs// thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis// snod

dang bral ba'i slob ma la// gsang ba'i snying po bstan gyur na// bdag dag gzhan kun sdug bsngal zhing// sreg dang sgrib par yun rings gnas// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba rdo rje me long gi rgyud chen po las mtshan gyi don

gyi bshad pa dang po'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i don/ thun mong ma yin 'khor dag la// phyogs bcu rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang// dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba yi// rdo rje

pad+ma 'brel pa yi// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur nas// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// nyon mongs lta dang shes bya rnams// skad cig yud la bsal byas te// thun mong khyad par gsang ba yi// lam gnyis

nges par ston pas na// ston pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/ de yi gnas mchog bshad bya ba// 'byung dang bzhugs dang rten pa dang// mtshon pa byin gyis brlabs phyir ro// thabs dang lam gyi khyad par gyis// kun
bdag rdo rje 'chang chen nyid// gtsang ma ris dag spangs pa yi// 'og min gnas mchog chen po der// yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas// skal med skye bo gdul ba'i phyir// sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs
rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas// gtsang ma rigs dag rnam spangs pa// 'jig rten las kyis mthar gyur pa// 'og min 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad

pa'i// yon tan khyad par spags pa na// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga la// bcu gsum sa yi dbang phyug ldan// rdo rje 'chang chen dpag med dang// til 'bru'i tshul du rab tu bzhugs// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin

nyid// thog ma tha ma dbus med pa'i// rang bzhin don gyi 'og min ni// rgyal ba kun gyi pho brang phyir// 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i// rgyal ba kun gyi bsten pa'i gnas// de dag nye bar mtshon pa yi// yid

dang mtshan ma las gyur pa'i// bsgoms dang bris dang byas la sogs// de dang 'dra ba'i gzhal yas khang// rgyal ba sngags dang byin brlabs kyis// der gnas don phyir mtshon pa'i gnas// thun mong thun mong
ma yin pa'i// bsod nams ye shes khyad par can// bsags pa sna tshogs las byung ba'i// rdzogs longs spyod pa chen po ni// gtsang ma ris dag spangs pa yi// 'og min chen po'i gnas mchog na// rigs
bdag phyag rgya lhun grub sku// gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs te// gdod nas theg mchog mdzod nyid phyir// sgrib pa mtha' spangs gdul bya la// skad cig gcig

gis spang bar mdzad// chos rnams sna tshogs ji snyed pa// dngos po tha dad med phyir zlum// khyab dang spags dang tshad med dang// ye shes bzhi phyir 'khor lo bstan// chos dbyings 'du 'bral med pa'i phyir// mu
khyud zlum por kun nas bskor// sku gsung thugs dang byin brlabs dang// thugs rjes ma khyab med pa'i phyir// yon tan rgyas pa'i dbyibs su bstan// rang 'byung ye shes mtha' bral bas// phyogs bcur 'gro
'ong mi gnas pa'i// tshad dang bral ba'i sems kyi phyir// gzhi rtsa tshad med 'khor lor bstan// gdod nas byin brlabs ngo bo'i phyir// ma bsags lhun rdzogs mdzod nyid de// 'gro ba re 'dod skong ba'i

phyir// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// sna tshogs dngos dang dngos med pa'i// chos kun ngo bor rang gnas te// bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir// phyi dang nang bral sgrib pa med// thun mong la
brten thabs kyi 'bras// ye shes thabs kyis 'phags pa nyid// gdul bya'i blo la mngon snang bas// glo bur bzhi ni lhag par mdzes// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// gdul bya'i rim pa mtho dman
kun// stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug/ de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar// thabs mang bsam gyis mi khyab pas// lam brgyad rim par bgrod pa yis// 'bras bu yon tan kun rdzogs pas// rta babs rgyu
