'bras bcu drug bstan// zhen dang spong ba'i lam bral bas// 'dod yon ye shes lnga rol te// bdag mchod kun mnyes las byung bas// 'dod yon lha mos 'khrigs par bstan// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa
yis// ma chags thabs dang ldan pa dang// che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pas// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// las dang thugs rje smon lam gyis// byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che// smon lam dbang gis de dag

tu// thos pa rgya mtsho bsag phyir gnas// de tshe dus kyi tha bral yang// ngo bo dus bzhi mnyam pa'i dus// dus kyi mtha' la mngon rtogs pas// thun mong min pa'i dus su bstan// de tshe phyogs bcu rgyal ba
yis// bskal pa bye bar lung bstan pa// 'dul ba'i dus bab gsang ba'i bdag/ lag na rdo rjes bsdu ba mdzad// dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs phyir// 'khor gyi nang na skal mchog ldan// gsang ba'i rdo
rje 'chang bsdus nas// 'dul ba'i 'khor la bstan par mdzad// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// sku gsum sku gsung thugs nges pa'i// de bzhin nyid du thabs gang gis// gshegs shing gshegs dang gshegs
gyur pa'i// thar pa gsum dang ye shes dang// pha rol phyin pa drug ldan pa// zhing khams yon tan bsam mi khyab// bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i// rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi mtshan// gang phyir rdo
rje thugs chud pas// las dang spyod pa dka' thub dang// srid pa'i ri bos mi bskyod pas// de ni mi bskyod mchog tu gsungs// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis// ji snyed sku gsung thugs snang ba// mos

dang thabs kyi khyad par gyis// rnam par snang phyir snang mdzad mchog/ rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ni// tshogs rnams 'dus pa'i ngo bo ste// yon tan rin chen ltar 'byung bas// rin chen 'byung bar gsungs pa
yin// dpag tu med pa'i gsung gi sgo// dbang po thabs kyi bye brag gis// don rtags gsung dang yi ge'i sgo// mtha' yas snang phyir mtha' yas mchog/ dpag med thugs rje mdzad pa yi// 'gro 'ong med
pa'i thugs rje yis// 'gro ba skyob pa'i don mdzad pas// don grub ces ni rnam par bstan// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dag kyang// tha mal lnga nyid gnas dag cing// de las thabs des mngon byas pas// der

dbang sgyur te nyid snang ba// rgyal po nyid du brjod pa yin// steng 'og gnyis las mngon gyur pa'i// sbyor dang 'ju 'dul rlung gi rim// gang de thabs las mngon gyur pa'i// bde ba'i gzugs dang tshor ba

dang// 'du shes dang ni 'du byed dang// rnam shes zag med bde ba'i ros// dbang sbyur ye shes rgyal por bshad// gang phyir snang dang bsgoms dang bris// phyag rgya rtsa bcud thig le'i mdog/ dkar dang dmar

dang ser ba dang// sngo dang ljang dang rims ldan pa'o// rgyal ba kun gyi bde skyid cing// spyod dang de la 'byung ba'i yum// thams cad de las skyed pa lnga// tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang// dbang sgyur rgyal mo lnga rang

bzhin// sra dang gsher dang drod dang bskyod// nam mkha'i khams kyis gang phye ba// steng 'og thabs las mngon gyur pa// yul dang shes pa dbyer med cing// thugs rje shes rab 'brel pa yis// 'khor ba dang

ni mya ngan 'das// gnyis med gzigs pa spyan gyi mchog/ zag med stong pa'i klong chen gyis// skyed dang sdud dang gnas pa'i phyir// mtha' dbus bral ba'i de bzhin nyid// nam mkha'i dbyings zhes gang brjod

pa'o// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// las dang lta ba nyon mongs dang// shes bya'i dri ma mtha' yas pa// rtogs pas sbyong zhing sreg pas na// gos dkar ma ru brjod pa yin// gang phyir las dang ting 'dzin

dang// ye shes thugs rje bar med chus// gang dag 'khrud dang tshim byed pas// chu ni mA ma kI ru bshad// gang phyir rtogs dang thabs dag dang// ting 'dzin thabs kyi rlung dag gis// bgrod pa med pa'i zhing
khams su// sgrol bas sgrol ma nyid du bshad// snying po rang 'byung ye shes nyid// kun brten gnas dang khyab pa'i phyir// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la// sa yi snying por brjod pa yin// rang

byung snying po byang chub sems// nam mkha' lta bur bsam brjod med// mtha' dbus sgro skur gang 'das pa// de ni nam mkha'i snying po nyid// gang phyir thugs rje dpag med pas// 'gro ba chu bo rgal gyi bar// skyo
ba med par gzigs pas na// spyan ras gzigs dbang pad+ma'i gtso// rtogs dang dbyer med rdo rje yis// mtha' yi bdag rtogs mtshan ma dag/ 'joms pas phyag na rdo rje ste// thun mong nyid dang khyad par

gyi// gsang ba'i rnam par shes pa gzhi// thun mong yul dang khyad par ni// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las// mtshon dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis// lha mo bzhir ni mngon snang ba// byang chub sems dang

bde ba dang// thabs kyi bde bas rab sgeg pas// lha mo 'di ni sgeg mor bshad// grol dang ma grol 'khor ba yi// phyi nang sgra yi bye brag kun// brag ca lta bur brjod mdzad pas// bar chad med pas phreng ba

ma// tshim pa'i ngo bo gang bstan pa// dri dang ldan pa'i khyad par nyid// dbyangs nyid tshim zhing yid bde bas// de nyid rdo rje gIrti ma// ro yis khyab cing gar sgyur ltar// bde ba chen po bzhi yi gar// khyab dang
mdzes dang tshim pa dang// mi gnas bkrol bas gar mkhan ma// rgyan dang chags pa'i sgra dag dang// yid kyi phreng ba bde ba'i gar// lha mo bzhi yi rang bzhin no// ma rtogs 'gro ba mtha' yas la// rang
bzhin thugs rje mdzad pa yis// yongs la phan 'dogs skyob pa ni// 'di ni byams pa zhes bya'o// rtogs goms mthar phyin khyad par gyis// las dang nyon mongs lta ba'i rim// sel ba 'di ni sgrib
sel lo// thabs dang shes rab gnas rtogs na// gang phyir spong len mi gnas pas// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// dbye ba med pas kun du bzang// bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin pa kun// zag pa med pa'i
shes rab kyis// lta ba'i dra ba gcod pas na// zag med shes rab 'jam dpal sku// dbang po yi ge theg ler bcas// gnas dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis// mngon du snang phyir brjod pa yin// dus bzhi

rim pa gnyis brgyad de// de nyid 'grol dang brod skyed dang// spyod yul dag phyir brjod pa ni// dri dang bde bas ngag tshim zhing// yid ldog med pas rdo rje dri// phyi nang khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor la// me tog thig

ler bder bkod pas// rdo rje me tog bla na med// phyi nang sems la gnas bcas pa'i// mun pa bsal phyir shes rab dang// ye shes snang ba bla na med// rdo rje gsal ba'i mar me ma// phyi nang dkyil 'khor ma
lus la// rang 'byung ting 'dzin bde ba yis// thams cad khyab par gnas pa'i phyir// khyab byed rdo rje dri chab ma// de bzhin nyid la dgongs pa yis// 'khor ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa// byang
chub snying por tshar bcad pas// rnam par rgyal ba zhes su brjod// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// gnyis 'dzin rtogs pa'i gnyen po ste// rtogs goms de yis 'joms pas na// ya mAn+ta kr-ita gshin rje

gshed// gang phyir 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las// thabs dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul las// 'joms dang sgrol bar mdzad pas na// rta mgrin rgyal por de bshad do// 'khor ba'i bdud kyi dug lnga la// ye shes lnga ru

gsal goms pas// gnyis med rtsi ru gang 'khyil ba// sgrib zad bdud rtsi 'khyil par ba shad// gang du lus dang bcas pa yi// dbang po yul dang rnam shes reg/ rang rgyud bcad pa'i ye shes nyid// sgo ba rnam
pa bzhi ru gsungs// rang rgyud rtag chad bzlog pa dang// gzungs dang lha dang bde ba dang// thig le rig par bcas pa nyid// gang phyir gnas nas dgug pa dang// gang du'ang 'gro bar mi nus dang// de las
'da' bar dka' ba dang// bstims nas bde bas dril bu ma// gzung dang 'khyud dang bsdam pa dang// gnyis su med pas bde chen po// rang lus snang srid brtan g.yo la// rtogs dang goms pa'i tshul gyis
sbyar// de dag ma lus dran byed pa// rig pa'i rgyal po kun dbyer med// kun gzhi rdo rje mi phyed pa// kun du bzang por de bshad do// ma lus 'dus byas ma byas chos// ma lus zag med khyab pa'i
dbyings// rtogs dang shes dang gang gyur pa// kun du bzang mor de bshad do// mi shigs thig le bde chen po// ye shes lnga ldan dwangs ma'i bcud// rang 'byung lus can kun gnas pa// ston pa rig pa'i

gsung can nyid// d+harma tsakra chos kyi gnas// 'od bzhi e sogs tshul du ni// lus sbas pa yi tshul dag gis// lus can kun la khyab par gnas// rang 'byung thugs kyi bde ba nyid// rgyu ba bral ba'i snying

po ste// bar ma ar+tha byang chub sems// nam mkha'i ye shes thugs kyi klong// ma na ma ta dran rtog yid// rnam shes rgyu ba'i dran rtog rnams// ye shes nam mkha'i gsal 'dod pa// dran rtog rig pa 'khor du
gnas// zag med rnam shes bsam mi khyab// ma lus nam mkha'i ye shes su// bde chen rig pa'i mi rtog par// bsdus te nyams la gnas par mdzad// bde ba chen po ma skyes pa// nam mkha' lta bur mi phyed
pa// nam mkha'i ye shes dbyer med sku// dus gsum kun gyi ngo bor gnas// 'di zhes nye bar bstan pa ni// e sogs bzhi yi tshul gnas te// phyi nang bar khyams gdong bar bcas// gsang ba'i 'og min
rgyan rdzogs pa'o// thig le ba~M dbyibs spros pa med// brjod med bstan pa bsrung mdzad cing// byin brlabs bde chen mi rtog pa// 'khor la snang bar mdzad pa'o// ma ni ma nu ma ta ste// sdom
byed dran rtog yid kyi dngos// las can rnam shes de dag gis// gsal bar go bar 'khor du brjod// chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid// thig le bcu drug sems lnga'i dngos// mi rtog lhan cig skyes pa'i
don// byin brlabs mngon sum tshul gyis gsal// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thig le zag med skyes pa'i dus// bsam med lhan cig skyes pa'i tshe// bde ba chen po'i dus su 'dod// shes pa rten
dang brten par bcas// thabs kyi rim pa la brten nas// rlung gis bsdus pa'i don gyis ni// rang rig thabs kyi rgyal por gsal// gang dang gang la gang du ni// gang gis gang tshe gang gsungs pa// brjod
'byung rtsa bar de gyur pas// gleng gzhi zhes ni bstan pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dbyer med ye shes gcig gi ngang// rdo rje 'chang chen kun bzang las// sna tshogs sku ni rnam par

'phrul// de tshe rgyal ba thams cad kyang// lha la rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// lha min ston pa phrag dog rje// mi la thub pa'i dbang po ste// byol song sgra yis 'dul mdzad pa// yi dwags drag pos gdung ba sel// dmyal
ba sdug bsngal chos kyi rgyal// gdul ba'i sprul sku ngo bor shar// la la lha las 'pho ba dang// la lar lhums zhugs bltam pa dang// dka' thub bdud btul sangs rgyas nas// 'khor lo bskor te mya ngan
'das// gnas la nges pa yod min te// dmyal ba yi dwags byol song dang// mi dang lha dang lha min te// so so'i gnas te gang yin pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba ston pa'i gnas// lha rnams dang ni mi rnams

dang// lha min yi dwags dud 'gro dang// dmyal ba so so'i 'gro ris dag/ rang rang mos dang las dbang gis// 'dul tshul tha dad dbang gis 'khod// rang rang mos pas phrad pa'i tshe// rang rang brda skad tha

dad pas// rtogs dang grol bar gang gyur pa// rang rang ji bzhin ston pa'i dus// bstan pa'i theg pa sna tshogs te// rang rang zhen pa mtha' yas phyir// tshul dang mos pa'i dbang gis na// theg pa sna tshogs

tshul du snang// theg gcig mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul// gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// dgu dang brgyad khri la sogs pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul gyis snang// sku dang gsung thugs las dag gis// 'dul

dbang thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de tshe 'gro ba so so yang// rang gi gzhi rtsa don rig nas// rim pa lnga'am thabs gcig gis// rig 'dzin sangs rgyas sa la gnas// rang rang
cha 'dzin sprul pa'i lus// sar gnas 'khor gyi dang po yis// de dag zhus pa'i rim gsungs pa// blo dang tshig dang yi ger bsdus// rgyud ces bya ba rgyun du grags// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi

rgyud// lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam par// sgrub pa phrin las lam rim ni// phyi dang nang dang sbas pa ste// rang bzhin gnas dang mngon byed pa// thabs kyi rgyud ni gsum du gsungs// phyogs bcu dus bzhi

mngon rdzogs pa'i// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa dang// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// bskyed rdzogs thabs rim gang bstan pa// sgyu 'phrul drwa bar 'dus pa ste// de ltar grags pa'i chos rnams kun// rtog

pa'i cho ga kun bshad pa'i// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul drwa ba ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog/ thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba

gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las gleng gzhi rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gang zag thabs ni thun mong du// blo yi yul du gang gyur pa// de ni thun mong

yul nyid de// gang zag thabs dang ston pa nyid// de yi spyod yul ma gyur cing// thabs chen gsang ba dang ldan pa// de ni thun mong ma yin pa'o// de nyid skye bo 'khor gnyis don// rnam gnyis tshul du snang bar
mdzad// phung po khams dang skye mched nyid// rgyal ba yab yum sems dpa' dang// sems ma nyid du lhun gyis grub// gsang yul dbang po rnam shes reg/ ma lus 'joms phyir khro bo ste// rtags sogs mtshan
ma las skyes phyir// yum ste las kyis mi gnas bshad// yid chos bzang po bzang mo nyid// chags sogs nyon mongs drug po nyid// thub pa sprul pa drug tu bshad// de nyid phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi// phung po
'byung ba rnam shes yul// dbang po dus dang lus chos bzhi// mtshan ma nyon mongs yum nyid de// de nyid sems phyir ma skyes pas// lhag pa'i bden gnyis 'brel ba las// byang chub sems lnga rnam par
'phrul// dngos po snang grags chos thams cad// skye ba med dang 'gag med dang// gnas pa med dang dmigs med dang// 'gro 'ong med pa nyid du snang// bdag phyir ye shes gsal snang yang// gzhan phyir de
dag ma rtogs pas// rang bzhin ngo bo ye nas gsang// shin tu gab sbas gsang ba'i don// de nyid legs par bshad pa'i tshe// ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba la// ma rig log rtog rkyen dbang gis// 'khor

ba'i sdug bsngal de bor snang// de nyid bde gshegs snying po ste// dngos med dngos po'i snying po can// 'gro ba rnams ni smin bya'i phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las// sprul pa rnams ni rnam par
'phrul// sku dang gsung thugs sna tshogs kyis// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bskor// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang// ston pa 'khor gyis gcig la gcig/ yab dang yum dang gnyis med

dang// gang la gang gis gleng bslang ba// brda dang dgongs pa'i tshig gis te// bstan pa'i tshogs ni snang bar 'gyur// 'phen pa rlung gi sbyor ba yis// thabs des yum la gang bskul bas// gnyis med 'brel
pa'i chags pa'i 'od// sa ya bcu gsum sku gsung thugs// bde chen lha ru gsal byas shing// nam mkha'i ye shes mngon phyung nas// bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i ro// skye dang dga' dang gnas pa dang// 'gro
'ong nyid las shes par 'gyur// gang gis gang la gang bslang bas// gang rkyen dbang gis de dag las// ye shes gsal bar gang snang bas// snang srid lus dang dngos por bcas// nam mkha'i ye shes cir

yang snang// nang gi gleng bslang thabs chen yin// gang phyir thabs kyis shes rab la// chags pa'i glu dang sbyor bas bskul// shes rab thabs la lan bskul ba'ang// sha da pa yi glu gar dang// sngags sbyor ba

yi rim pa yis// phyag rgya bzhi yis mngon sbyar bas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rgyu ba rlung gi sbyor ba yis// dgug dang bkug pa'i thabs nyid de// dbab dang gzung dang bskyil ba dang// zlog

dang gzung dang sbyar ba yis// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen po// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// thar thug rim pa las byung ba'i// kun kyang sems lngar snang ba ste// thabs las byung ba'i thig le

dang// shes rab gsang ba'i thig le dang// gnyis med bde ba las byung ba// sems lnga rim par snang bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor zhing// sku dang gsung thugs las byung ba// bye brag brgyad
cu kun 'dus pa// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lngas// thabs dang rang bzhin 'brel pa yis// 'gro ba kun la rgyas btab pa'o// snod bcud bde ba'i rang bzhin

gyis// ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas// g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin// skye ba'i gzhi dang thabs dag dang// skyes nas mthar phyin ye shes lnga// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// ji lta ba
bzhin rnam par gnas// 'gro ba mos pa'i khyad par gyis// gzugs dang kha dog sngags dang 'od// dkyil 'khor la sogs so sor gnas// gang zag blo dang 'tsham par bstan// rten dang brten can las byung

ba'i// rang 'byung bde chen mi rtog pa// lus med lus la gnas pa yi// khyab pa gnyis med gang ba'i tshul// gang phyir zag med bde ba yi// ting 'dzin bde ba khyad par can// rang bzhin brtags dang snang ba
dang// byin rlob nus pa'i lha yis ni// phyi nang snod bcud sku gsung thugs// ma lus sbyor ba gsum las byung// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dag/ rim par bsten dang sbyor ba dang// 'phen dang sdud

pa rlung gis te// dwangs mar ye shes rlung gis 'jug/ steng dang 'og las byung ba yi// bde ba'i thig le rim pa dag/ dwangs snyigs rlung gi khyad par gyis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu nyid// rkyen gyis nus pa

phrad pa ltar// rgyu gcig nus pa so sor snang// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// lam ni rtsa dang thig le dang// rlung ni phyi nang dwangs snyigs dang// lam dang rgyu ba'i tshul las byung// gang phyir med dang

nus pa med// stongs dang log pa'i nus mthu yis// rang lus 'jig dang sdug bsngal zhing// dbang po ma tshang dman par gyur// gang phyir thun mong thun mong min// sems lnga ye shes lnga bstan pa// rang bzhin
ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan du// gzungs ma rigs la rten bcas pa'i// sems lnga yun ring thung bcas pas// bdag gzhan chos rnams ma lus pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te// dngos po ma yin dngos med

min// bdag gzhan gnyis ka gnyis med min// rang 'byung bde chen sgyu ma nyid// rdo rje brtan po rang snang ba// ye shes sgyu ma lhun gyis grub// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po
las gleng bslang ba bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// kun gyi shes bya yul bshad pa// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gcig dang tha dad kun bral ba'i// mtha' d
ang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sgro skur kun bral mnyam pa las// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par las// sna tshogs chos ni rnam par 'phrul// gzhi dang rtsa ba las 'das pa'i// rang bzhin dbyer med de bzhin
nyid// dngos med dngos po yul 'das la// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// ngo bo sna tshogs rang snang ba// gnyis med thabs chen rdo rje nyid// e ma'o gnyis med bde chen las// sna tshogs gnas dang

longs spyod dang// rigs dang kha dog tshe tshad dang// bde sdug dbang po bye brag dag/ rang bzhin sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul// sgyu ma chu zla 'ja' tshon ltar// byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gnas// las dang rkyen

gyis gang snang ba// rang rang zhen pa'i tha dad kyis// dbang po khyad par sna tshogs pa'i// rtog pa'i nus pa sna tshogs mthong// rang bzhin gzhi rtsa med pa'i dbyings// lhan cig skyes dang kun brtags pa'i// ma
mthong log zhen brtas pa yis// 'khrul 'khor log pa'i stobs su snang// 'khor ba ma bsal dag pa yi// zhing dang spyod yul longs spyod dang// ting 'dzin dbang stobs rdzu 'phrul dang// mngon shes ye shes
dpag med pa'i// sna tshogs sku dang gsung thugs dang// yon tan phrin las rang snang ba// bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub pa'i don// sna tshogs yid bzhin nor bu ltar// ma bsags lhun gyis grub

pa'i sku// sna tshogs kun dang dbyer med pa'i// kun la yid bzhin mthun par snang// kun kyang rang 'byung byang chub sems// bden pa dbyer med don du snang// gang phyir nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// gang la

de ltar snang ba las// yang dag gcig tu gzung du med// ma bcos rang 'byung zhi ba nyid// rnam par dag pa'i snying po ste// 'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings su mkhyen// sgro dang skur ba
kun bral ba'i// thams cad rang snang snying po las// sna tshogs ma lus rnam par 'phrul// dngos dang dngos po med min zhing// gang de de nyid yul 'das pa// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med pa// phyogs ris
mtha' dbus rgya dpag med// gang gis gang la khyab pa ltar// mkha' sogs rdul bral 'byung ba'i bcud// zag pa med pa'i snying po nyid// lus can kun gyi dbang po dang// dwangs mar 'brel bar gang snang
yang// mthong ba log pa'i stobs kyis sgyur// bdag gzhan med pa'i rang snang yin// ma lus thams cad dbyer med pa'i// thabs dang shes rab bcud lnga'i rgyun// longs spyod thabs su bcas pa nyid// 'gro

ba kun la khyab par gnas// gang yang thabs dang shes rab kyi// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i rang bzhin nyid// rang bzhin dbyer med byang chub sems// bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid// 'das dang da ltar ma byon gyi// rgyal
ba rig 'dzin mtha' yas dang// ma lus kun gyis rtogs bya ba// phyogs med khyab pa'i ngo bor gnas// gang snang ma lus de bzhin nyid// ma bcos ma byas zhi ba ste// gcig dang du ma las 'das pa// sangs
rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// mtha' bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// ma lus gnas pa de dag kyang// rtogs pa'i khyad par dbang po yi// mthong tshul dag dang ma dag gis// rang bzhin yul du ma gyur
pas// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa'i// dbang dang man ngag 'brel pa yis// de nyid mthong rtogs don phyir bshad// gang phyir rdo rje slob dpon nyid// yon tan yongs rdzogs nus pa can// dad dang brtson
'grus brtul zhugs can// shes rab khyad par gang ldan la// dbang dang dam tshig man ngag dang// rgyu rkyen 'brel ba'i nus pa yi// bde ba gsal ba mi rtog pa// thabs kyis phun sum tshogs par
'gyur// gsang ba'i gsang chen snying po nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ste// phyi nang bdag gzhan ma lus pa// thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid// thabs bral kun la rgyas btab pas// mun pa'i
tshogs su gyur pa yin// mun snang dug dang gser 'gyur rtsi// thabs mkhas rang bzhin nges 'gyur ltar// gang de'i lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis// de ma thag tu de bzhin 'gyur// dbyer med nam

mkha'i rang bzhin du// kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas la sogs// ma lus tha dad med pa ltar// thabs mkhas ma lus de bzhin 'gyur// tha mal pa dang log pa dang// dka' thub can dang rkyen rtogs dang// phyi nang

can dang tha dad can// gtsang sme can dang phyogs rtogs nyid// mnyam nyid lta las gang 'das pa// ngo bo nyid dang thabs dag dang// dbang po la sogs log pa yis// de nyid gnod pa'i stobs su 'gyur// gang
la gang gis zin pa'i nad// thabs dang brtson 'grus lags pa yis// de ltar brtson pa'i khyad par gyis// de nyid ma spangs rnam par dag/ gang phyir de nyid nges pa la// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par

gyis// tha dad chos su gang snang ba// dngos la de ltar gnas pa min// rdo rje skye med shes rab ste// me long thabs nyid sna tshogs snang// gnyis med 'brel ba'i mnyam pa nyid// ma lus dbyer med dam par
bshad// de nas rtogs sgo bshad bya ba// gang la gang gi don med pas// lta dang spyod dang lam 'bras dag/ 'di nyid don gnyer gzhan med pa'o// gang gis de dag de don du// tshig dang sngags rdzas
dka' thub kyis// gang bstan de yi byin brlabs kyis// bdag gzhan phan par gang 'dod pa'o// gang las gyur pa de zhig pas// lus sems 'byung ba'i bag la gnas// phyin cad phan gnod chos med
pas// dka' thub 'bad rtsol mi dgos so// gang phyir byed pa'i rgyu bzhi dag/ mnyes dang dag pas bde bya'i phyir// las dang dka' thub drag shul gyis// grol zhing thar bar 'dod par snang// bden bzhi bcu
drug tha dad lam// khams gsum mthong sgom spong tshul gyis// rang don zag pa kun bral nas// rang don nang du mya ngan 'das// rkyen rtogs bag chags sad pa yis// 'byung med bcu gnyis rang brtags
nas// ma rig 'khrul 'khor rgyu 'bras zad// yid bzhin bde ba mchog gi sa// tha dad med pa'i rig pa'i sems// bden brdzun khyad par cir bltas pa// gsal la mi rtog snying po nyid// bdag gzhan nus

pa'i stobs su snang// chos rnams sgyu ma mig yor dang// brag ca chu zla 'dra ba yi// de nyid mtha' dbus bral ba ni// bden gnyis 'brel pa dbu ma'i tshul// rdo rje dam pa gsum bkod de// dngos po sgyu ma las

grol nas// dag pa'i rten 'brel la brten nas// ye shes sgyu ma mngon sum shar// gang phyir las dang bya ba dang// khrus dang gtsang sbra la brten nas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthu stobs kyis// sgo gsum rdo rje
'dzin pa'i sa// de dag las mthun khyad par nyid// de kho na nyid bzhi rtogs nas// las dang ting 'dzin 'brel goms pas// rdo rje 'chang ba'i sa la gnas// ting 'dzin rig pa gtsor byas

nas// sngags dang phyag rgya bsam pa yis// cha lugs ji bzhin mngon sgyur te// goms pas bdag gzhan don grub pa'o// thabs dang grol ba'i khyad par gyis// dbang po yul dang rnam shes dang// snang srid phyi

nang snod bcud kyi// spyod yul ji ltar 'gyur ba kun// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// gsang ba'i thabs kyis rgyas btab pas// ma lus rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// snang srid dpa' bo thabs chen de// rang
bzhin dbyer med dag pa yi// sna tshogs 'phrul pa rang snang bas// ma lus gnyis med ye shes yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thabs dang rig pa gang zin pa// gzhan gyis dor ba'i 'khor ba'i

chos// ye shes bdud rtsi'i ngo bor 'gyur// ma lus gcig dang tha bral ba'i// ji ltar mthun pa'i snying po la// so so'i don ltar mi gnas pas// bskyed pa lha dang gzhal yas dang// rdzogs pa nam mkha'i ye

shes dang// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa ru// snang ba rkyen gyis sgyur ba ltar// ma lus de yi ngo bor 'gyur// de dag bltas pa'i khyad par gyis// rang re'i mos dang bsam pa dang// nus pa'i rim pa cir snang

yang// nam mkha' dang ba'i rang bzhin las// nyi zla gza' skar sprin khu rlangs// rang 'byung rang dwangs 'gyur med ltar// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// dngos dbang don las ma g.yos pas// de dag de
ltar nyid snang bas// de nyid nam mkha'i khongs su 'du// de nas gtan tshigs bshad par bya// ma lus 'gro ba thams cad la// byang chub snying pos kun khyab pas// kun gyis mthong goms bya dgos pas// so
so thun mong gtan tshigs dang// thun mong ma yin la sogs pa// rgya mtsho klong dang chu bo ltar// ma lus 'dul shing 'byung ba yin// thun mong bzhi sogs gang yin pa// log lta phyogs 'dzin dgag pa

dang// dngos dbang thabs dang 'brel mtshon phyir// thun mong gtan tshigs brjod pa yin// gang phyir gtan tshigs thams cad kyis// rang las 'phrul phyir me long nyid// ma lus gcig dang tha dad min// gang
gi mtha' las yongs grol te// dbus su gzung med gtan la phebs// gcig dang du ma bral ba'o// rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu ste// thabs de gdod nas dag pa gsum// ma lus rang snang rtogs pa

nyid// mtshan nyid de yi mtshan nyid do// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// ma lus rtogs pa bzhir shar te// de nyid rtogs pa bzhir snang ngo// ma skyes ngang las gang
snang ba// chu dang rlabs bzhin gcig pas na// de dang der gcig dbyer med pas// dngos po lo rgyus nyid kyis shes// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// rtsa ba chags sdang lnga nyid de// gzhi rtsa ma
bcos skad cig ma// de nyid rang spyir gang snang ba// rtogs pas spyi dang rang mtshan shes// snod bcud rgyud rnams mtha' yas dang// mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis// dngos po snang grags chos
rnams kun// ma bcos de bzhin nyid du gnas// ma lus snying po thig le dang// lnga bdag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis rgyu// sa ya bcu gsum rtsa yan lag/ ro dang gnas skabs kun las grol// dang po gnas dag
gnyis pa gnyis// gsum pa ma lus khyab byed pa// nyams su myong byed gtan tshigs so// thig le gnas dang yig 'bru dang// de yi byin brlabs 'dres pa yis// bde ba chen po mngon du snang// chu las chu

bo tha dad de// rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs dang// lam dang zhing sa'i 'bras bu ltar// thabs kyi khyad par snang ba yin// dwangs ma lnga las gang byung ba// ji snyed lus sems rtsa thig le// khams lnga'i ro dang bcud
snang ba// ye shes chen por gtogs pa yin// gsum dngos brgyad sogs kha dog grangs// gnas pa gang yin de snod de// so so'i bcud kyi khyad par las// byang chub sems nyid gsal bar snang// don dam
kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i// bden bzhi dbyer med dwangs ma nyid// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis snang// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thig le gcig dang du ma nyid// bral ba'i ye shes chen po
nyid// gcig dang du ma las grol ba'o// bcud 'dus thig le gnyis ro rgyu// rlung dang gdams ngag rkyen ldan pas// 'bras bu lhan cig skyes par snang// rang la gnas pa thabs kyis gsal// thabs dang shes
rab 'brel ba'i ro// rtsa yig bcas pa bcud 'dus pas// thabs dang rlung gi gdams pa yis// ma lus lhan skyes mngon sum gsal// bde dang stong nyid mi phyed pa// rang rig bde chen ma skyes gzugs// ma

lus 'od dang rnam pa ltar// dbyer med tshul dang rang snang ba'o// bde bas bskyed pa'i rtog pa lnga// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa nyid// ma lus ye shes chen po nyid// ye shes lnga yi rgyas btab pa'o// dbang po snod
bcud bcas pa yis// yab yum 'drel par bcas pa'i bcud// sems lnga'i rgyud du rang snang ba// mnyam pa bzhi yi tshul du gsal// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// phyi nang gsang ba mthar thug

pa'i// gtan tshigs mtha' yas bshad pa ste// rdo rje me long bshad pa'i rgyud// gang gis rtogs pa de nyid ni// ma lus rang snang sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rang snang ba// zag med rang 'byung ngang
las 'char// chos rnams 'bras bur lhun rdzogs pa'i// bdag dang gzhan don lhun rdzogs pa// ma bcos ji bzhin ngang bzhag las// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung// gang dag gang la

gang brten pas// lhun gyis grub pas 'bras bu nyid// ma bcos sgyu ma lhun grub nyid// dus bzhi phyogs bcu ma lus par// lhun grub 'bras bur rang snang ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba me

long gi rgyud chen po las lta ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// spyod pa'i khyad par ma lus pa// 'di dag bshad par bya ba
ste// rang bzhin thabs dang mngon gyur las// spyod pa ma lus bstan pa yin// e ma'o rang rig snying po las// bde sdug gnas dang longs spyod dang// tshe dang kha dog la sogs pa// la lar mngon par chags

pa ste// la lar drag shul zhe sdang spyod// la lar ri bos non pa nyid// la lar ldongs pa'i mun pa nyid// la lar phrag dog snang ba yin// la lar ser sna 'thab rtsod de// la lar 'chal dang bya ba btang// rtsol
dang mi rtsol la sogs pa// de la sogs pa mtha' yas rnyed// chos dbyings mtha' yas mu med pa'i// nam mkha' dbyings ni mtha' yas par// spyod pa'i khyad par de nyid do// rang 'byung thabs kyi spyod pa
nyid// ji ltar bsam zhing brtags pa ltar// rang bzhin dbye ba med pa'i phyir// sgo gsum byed spyod bsam mi khyab// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// ma lus sangs rgyas gnas gyur kyang// ma
rtogs thabs dang bral ba'i phyir// bde sdug sna tshogs bsam mi khyab// thabs chen dag dang ldan pa la// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog chen po dag/ byang chub lam du bde bar

bshad// thabs dang mi ldan skye bo yis// thabs dang bya ba sna tshogs kyis// mdzad spyod dka' ba sna tshogs pa// mi dang lha las thar pa med// dper na dug dang ldan pa la// thabs kyi khyad par ji bzhin
du// rtogs pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du// bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs rgyun// rang bzhin gnyis med dag pa las// brtags pa'i bye brag khyad par gyis// mi mthun bde sdug sna tshogs myong// ma

bcos dbyings las g.yos pa med// gang dag thun mong ngo dag las// las dang bya ba sgo nas ni// spyad dang spyod dang spyod 'gyur phyir// 'di skad spyod pas spyod par gsungs// rang bzhin rgyal ba'i spyod pa

yis// chu dang rlabs ltar khyab gyur kyang// spong len bya ba sna tshogs las// spyod pa thabs kyis zin pa med// gang phyir thabs dang shes rab dang// sgra dang rtogs pa sna tshogs kyis// thun mong yul du ma gyur
pa// thun mong ma yin thabs spyod de// la lar thun mong nyid du ste// thar pa dang ni ma thar pa// kun du rgyu dang mu stegs dang// bud med dang ni ma rabs dang// rgyal po dpa' bo dka' thub
can// byis pa la sogs tha dad de// la lar dgod dang drag po dang// gshe dang 'jigs dang zhi ba dang// la lar de bzhin chags chen po// g.yo sgyu spyod dang g.yem par ston// zhi dang rku dang phrag

dog spyod// 'dod dang longs spyod gzir ba dang// glu bro gar dang 'jo sgeg dang// de bzhin 'jigs dang sdigs pa dang// ma rungs pa dang rnam par 'tshe// zhing khams rdzu 'phrul spyod pa dang// ngo mtshar cho

'phrul du ma dag/ gang dang gang gis mdzad pa dag/ skye bo ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// mdzad pa mtha' yas rnam par ston// zhi la tshangs dang khro la khro// thar pa na chung mdzes dang rol// gdud dang rmongs dang

sdug bsngal ba// rang rang ded dpon mtha' yas pa'i// sku yi rol pa mtha' yas ston// byin gyis brlabs dang rang snang dang// brda dang rig pa ting 'dzin dang// tshig tu chags sdang rmongs pa dang// shin tu

rgyal dang phrag dog dang// 'jam dang dal dang snyan mi snyan// rtsub dang drag dang sbom phra dang// ring thung rol mo lha klu dang// mi dang mi min 'byung po'i sgra// khyim bdag dbang chen legs dpon dang// chags
can gtum po la sogs pa'i// sna tshogs rol pa mtha' yas pa// dag dang ma dag tshul gyis ni// gsung gi rol ba mtha' yas snang// la lar byams dang sdang ba dang// g.yeng dang mi g.yeng rmongs dang
ri// sdud dang mi sdud yal ba dang// grol dang ma grol rno rtul dang// ma rig ye shes la sogs pa// thugs kyi rol ba mtha' yas pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis snang// mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa

nyid// lung dang rigs pa man ngag gi// tshad ma dag gis gang btsal ba// shes bya khong du chud par 'gyur// de nas chos rnams ma lus pa// bdag gzhan phyi nang dbyer med pa'i// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul
gyis snang// mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa nyid// dran dang shes bzhin brtan po yis// dus gsum rgya mtsho gting lta bur// mi g.yo gsal ba'i ngang gyur nas// sgo gsum mnyam par sbyor ba yis// dang po

rtogs pa'i spyod pa ste// de bzhin nyid la gsal brtan te// stong pa shes rab spyod par bshad// de nas phyogs bcu ma lus pa// rang 'byung byang chub sems nyid phyir// gang snang rang rgyud dngos med de// sgyu ma
mig yor brag ca dang// smig rgyu chu bur la sogs pa// gong ma'i stobs dang 'di nyid stobs// mnyam par sbyor bas bsgom par bya// gang la ma bltas mngon byas dang// ting 'dzin rim pa gnyis med

pas// kun la snying rje'i spyod pa dag/ dam pa 'di ni spyad par bya// rang bzhin ched du dmigs pa dang// khyab dang shugs las gang byung ba'i// snying rje'i spyod par rnam par spyad// de nas sgyu ma lta
bu nyid// rang nyid phyogs med snang ba yis// cir yang bsgyur du rung ba'i phyir// rig pa dbu mar gang gsal ba// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan du 'bar// sa bon gang las thabs cho gas// 'phro 'du zhu nas
mngon gyur pa// rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bor snang// de nyid gcig dang lnga gsum gyis// brtan 'bar mdzes par gsal gyur te// mdun dang gzhan du skabs dag sbyor// gcig dang nges med rim pa dang// 'khor
lo zhes bya bzhi ru gyur// gang gis gang de ma brten par// 'phro 'du bsgoms pa don med de// skyon bral gsal brtan 'dris pa yis// gang bsgoms gsal bar mngon du 'gyur// tha mal zhen rtog zlog pa
dang/ lam gyi 'brel par bya ba dang// dngos grub 'bras la myur 'jug pas// rtags kyi lha ni bsgom par bya// de ltar brtan 'gyur gsal ba la// bdag gzhan phyi nang ma lus pa'i// sgo gsum sku
gsung thugs gsal bas// thun mong spyod pa rnam bcad la// sgo gsum mnyam bzhag rjes thob med// gang gis de ltar gsal bya'i phyir// phyogs gcig spyod pa brtsam par bya// de nas rtsa ba goms pa

dang// bslab bya khyad par mthar phyin ltar// gang de rim par bstan 'phel phyir// yan lag spros pa rnam par bsgom// lhag pa bcu gcig dgur ldan pa'i// gcig las rgyas bsdus phye ba yis// 'khor lo'i rtsa
ba lha dag kyang// yab yum gnas dgod gsal bar bsgom// de dag lhag pa'i lha dgu dag/ yan lag tshul du spros te bsgom// 'dul ba gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis// mdzes pa'i tshul dang gdug pa

'dul// lha dang zhal phyag dbu grangs kyang// rtsa ba yan lag spros tshul gyis// dkyil 'khor grangs dang gang sbyar ba'i// rim par spros shing bsgom par bya// grangs dang grangs med tshul dag gis// dpag tshad

rgyang grags mkha' dbyings su// zhi dang khro la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs sna tshogs bsgom// dang po'i bar dang tha ma'i bar// rig pa'i ting 'dzin gsal brtan nas// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa

yi// tshom bu rim par bsgom par bya// dgon pa'i rim pa'am nags tshal dang// chu 'gram ri rtse dur khrod dang// skyon bral yon tan rdzogs pa ste// dgra dang phyogs mtshams skyon med pa'i// brtag pa'i rim pa
ldan pa yis// shis dang 'thad pa'i sa phyogs su// gzhal yas rim brtsegs mdzes ldan pa// rgyan dang bcas pa ldan byas la// ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i shes rab thabs// mi ldan gong ma'i 'od
kyis spyad// bdag dang gzhan gyi nus pa yis// mnyam nas tshogs la 'jug par bya// yo byad lnga ldan thogs med par// cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin brtsam// bro glu gar dang ting 'dzin bcas// bar

chad med par bsgrub par bya// gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs par// sgyu ma'i lus de ma brtan na// yid kyis rdo rje gsum gsal bas// rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin de// phyin cad 'jigs bral khyung bzhin no// de

bas 'brel pa'i spyod ldan na// dbang sgyur zag med sa thob ste// brgya dang stong sogs 'jig bral zhing// gling dang 'jig rten brgya stong du// 'dul ba'i cho 'phrul mtha' yas snang// 'jigs pa med cing mi

ldog sa// dpa' bo rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gzhan don spyod pa'i khyad par dag/ 'dul ba'i dbang ni sna tshogs kyis// rnam par brtse ba sna tshogs spro// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// shes rab phyi yi spyod

pa ste// cho ga rgyas par bstan pa yin// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nang du 'jug pa'i rim pa yi// spyod pa'i khyad par cho ga dag/ de nas rim pa 'di dag bshad// lus can 'gro ba thams cad la// tsakra

bzhi dang sku gsung thugs// spor dang 'bar ma 'khyil pa dang// 'brel dang ma 'brel khug pa dang// 'dzin dang 'dzag dang gnas pa dang// de bzhin khyab dang 'khrul pa'i rtsa// gang du rgyu dang gnas 'dzin

pas// rtsa zhes de la mngon bshad de// de dag rgyu dang lam 'bras dang// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// bde ba chen po skyed par byed// gong dang 'og gi rang bzhin las// spyi dang khyad par kha sbyor

'byung// sa bon khyab byed 'khor lo yis// thams cad khyab cing 'dzag pa'i rtsa// dwangs snyigs rlung dang 'brel pa yis// gang de pho mo'i bcud rkyen gyis// zag dang zag med bde ba skyed// lus kun khyab par

gnas pa nyid// dwangs ma thur gyi rlung dang 'grogs// gang na sgra sbyor 'khor lo can// des kyang kun khyab rgyu ba can// 'khrul zhing 'khor bas 'khor lo ste// gsung gi 'khor lo ngag gi rten// rdzogs dang ma

rdzogs gang mi gsal// sgra sbyor dag dang ma dag gyur// bde dang snyan dang mi snyan dang// bya dang dri za bung ba dang// chags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs byed// mdog dmar lus khyab klu la sogs// u tha'i rlung dang

'grogs te gnas// d+harma tsakra srog gi rten// ma lus gzhi rtsa kun gyi srog/ rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dang ldan// dngas ma lnga 'dus kun gyi gtso// phyi rim rin chen sul mang 'dra// mi shigs thig le bde chen

po// rin chen phung po za ma tog/ sna tshogs ye shes lnga yi bdag/ thung ngu a yi rang bzhin can// srog gi rlung dang 'grogs te gnas// phyi rim pad+ma 'dab brgyad de// chos nyid ye shes yon tan dang// rang rgyud
bzhi la yan lag brgyad// thun mong phyi yi rim pa yin// 'di la rtsa gsum rim pa ste// zag pa'i rtsa dang mngon shes rtsa// chos nyid rim pa gsum du gnas// rlung yang gcig gam gnyis yin

te// de las bye brag dpag med pa'o// gnas pa dang ni rgyu ba'i rlung// gnas pa srog dang ye shes te// rgyu ba bzhi ni mngon par brjod// phyi nang can dang gyen thur can// de re'ang dwangs snyigs khyad par

gyis// rim pa brgyad du mngon snang yin// gnyid dang 'gro ba'i sa bon gyis// chags sdang dran rtog kun gyi gzhi// gang du gnas dang gnas ma yin// rgyu zhing 'pho ba rlung gis te// bde dang sdug bsngal ji snyed
pa// myong zhing skyed par byed pa yin// 'di ni gnas dang mi gnas kyis// srog dbang dran pa dbang sgyur bas// gnas dang 'pho ba pha rol dag/ gnas pa srog gi rlung can no// gang du 'khrul pa 'dzed pa

ni// ma lus 'gyed cing spro ba yi// gyen thur 'dzeg cing 'gengs 'byung ba'i// sgo gnyis lus kun khyab pa'i rtsa// drug cu rtsa bzhi snying po can// phyi rim bzhi yi rgyun du 'khyil// dbus nas 'khyil ba thig le'i

rtsa// 'phen pa bde ba'i rlung dang 'grogs// gang du'ang 'khrul cing sprul pa'i phyir// sprul pa'i 'khor lo shes rab nyid// de 'og gru gsum 'bar ba'i rtsa// gyen du 'bar dang thur du 'phro// 'od kyis 'bar ba'i

sa bon can// rtse mo'i 'og mas reg pa'i khams// gtum mo ste 'og 'bar ba'i rtsa// skyes bu chags pa slaung ba ltar// 'di dag bde ba bskyed pa ste// gnas sa tshad dang bcas par gnas// de 'og g.yo ba rlung

gi rten// 'byed dang 'dzums pa'i las can nyid// de dang de gnyis gang ldan pas// lus kyi dwangs snyigs 'dis 'byed pa// bye brag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis rtsa// 'dus pas sku gsung thugs yin te// lte ba thur du

'dzag pa'i rtsa// rtsa gsum 'dom pa'i bde ba'i gnad// rgyu ba rlung ni thig le'i rten// 'gyed cing 'dud pa g.yas g.yon te// bcu drug 'dus pa'i srog rtse gong// rtsa gsum mgrin par 'dus pa ni// sgra sbyor
'khor lo ngag gi gnad// de nas dngas ma'i thig le la// ma lus 'dus pa'i tshul du gnas// rig pa'i rtsa la bcud 'dus pas// thogs med gsal ba'i mngon shes 'byung// phyi rol zag pa'i rtsa nyid
la// bde ba chen po'i bcud 'dus pas// bde chen nyams nyid skye bar 'gyur// chos nyid thig le mi g.yo ba// dngas ma 'dus pa'i bcud thim pas// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa yi// zag med ye shes bde ba

che// nam mkha'i dbyings ni rgya che ba// thog mtha' med par khyab par 'gyur// 'di nyid rtogs dang ma rtogs las// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// spyod pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur// thabs kyi khyad par
phyag rgya lnga// bskyod pa rlung dang 'bar ba me// thig le chu dang 'dzin pa sa// bde chen nam mkha'i phyag rgyar gsal// bde bas bde ba'i don mthong bas// rtsa dang thig le rlung dag dang// bde ba

rang rig ma skyes pa// de nyid bde chen mi rtog pa// rang rgyud bral bas zag pa med// rang rgyud med pa'i bde ba nyid// dngas ma'i thig les kun khyab pas// phyi nang dbang por bcas pa yis// bde ba sgyu ma'i
rang bzhin 'char// ma lus bde ba chen po nyid// de la de yis rgyas btab pas// bde ba mi rtog lhan cig skyes// phyag rgya gcig tu gsal bar gnas// gang du 'khor lo rtsa bcud ldan// sa bon yi ge bde ba

dang// khams lnga ye shes ro ldan zhing// stong dang bde ba'i thig le 'dres/ rtag tu dran par gnas pa nyid// re re'ang de ltar gnas pa'i phyir// 'khor lo rtsa bcud thig ler bcas// lha dang ye shes sku

gsung thugs// rang lus snang ba snod bcud kun// spros bcas phyag rgya'i grangs su gsal// bcud lnga ye shes kho na'i phyir// dwangs snyigs dbyer med thig le'i don// so so'i kha dog dbyibs tshul dang// sbas
pa'i sku gsung thugs dag la// dbyer med gsal ba'i rig pa yis// ma lus bde chen mngon du gsal// de nas bde ba chen po nyid// gar thabs rlung gis dbang bsgyur nas// ma lus bde ba'i rig pa

'char// gtsang dang 'dzem ba bral gyur nas// bshung ba lnga dang 'dod pa lnga// thig le bcud dang dwangs mar bcas// thig le chen por 'dres pas na// mi 'gyur 'chi med tshe la gnas// rang rig bde ba chen po

nyid// thog ma tha ma med par gnas// thig le rgyu ba rlung dang bcas// zag med dwangs ma'i snying por thim// mngon shes lnga ldan zag pa med// dngas ma'i snying por lam mthar phyin// de nas gsang ba bshad bya
ba// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dag/ thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor ba'i// bden gnyis nyi zla'i khyad par las// ma lus thams cad gsal bar snang// gang du thabs dang bral ba yi// gnas dag bde sdug

btang snyoms dang// longs spyod tshe dang kha dog dang// bdag dang bdag gir zhen bcas pa'i// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg dang dran pa sna tshogs kyis// zhen dang 'ching ba'i rang bzhin gyis// rang
bzhin bzhi ni gsal bar 'gyur// de las tha mal 'khor ba'i lam// thog ma med nas lus gnas pa'i// bde chen nam mkha'i snying po nyid// lus gnyis rtsa bcud ma lus pa// thabs dang shes rab sku
gsung thugs// srin bu 'khyugs pa'i yi ge ltar// dbang po gnyis dang 'brel te gnas// thabs dang man ngag ldan pa yis// rgyal rigs rje'u dang bram ze dang// dmangs rigs chos ma gar mkhan ma// rdol
ma nyo tshong ma nyid dang// ma dang sgyug mo sring mo dang// mthar sgeg lus 'tshong ma la sogs// dngos grub skye ba'i zhing du bshad// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug dang// bcwa brgyad bcud ldan rab

yin te// nyi shu la sogs 'bring du bshad// rtsa lnga tha ma'i tshad yin te// gzhan la dngos grub med par gsungs// las dang bya ba ma lus pa// cho ga'i sbyor ba rab tu brtsam// gnas pa 'byung ba'i bcud bzhi
la// 'byung bzhi gsal rkyen gang phrad pas// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las// lhan cig skyes pa gsum gcig las// nyams su ye shes lnga shar ba// ma lus bde ba chen por 'gyur// gnas bzhi rtsa
bcud thig le las// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// phyag rgya bzhir ldan mnyam sbyor bas// dwangs snyigs rlung gis ngos bzung nas// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa dag/ bdag po gdung can sbyar ba

yi// 'phro 'du btang dang bzung ba dang// bzlog pas nyi zla dbyer med myong// dang po 'jig pa la sogs nas// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang bdag par// lam lnga sems lnga mthar phyin pas// stobs kyi khyad par
gsal bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// 'og min nam mkha'i shar sgo nas// nyi zla dus gcig shar ba la// dus tshod gza' yis gang bzung ba// nyin mtshan med pa'i ye shes nyid// 'phen
pa rlung gi sbyor bas 'byung// rnal 'byor rig par snang ba yi// khyab pa nam mkha'i 'jig rten na// bde chen mdzes pa'i me tog la// bcud kyi khyad par gang gnas pa// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa

yi// shel dang byu ru'i bung bsdus nas// rnal 'byor bcud kyis rgyas 'gyur nas// bcu gsum sa la lhun gyis grub// 'khyud pa'i gar thabs las byung ba'i// bde ba chen po mi rtog pa// skad cig cha las byung

ba yi// zag med ye shes snying po ste// ma lus dwangs ma'i blo snang ba// zhen bral stong rtog mi gnas pa// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa ste// ma lus khyab par gnas pa yin// 'du shes zad pa'i rang bzhin te// skye

dang 'grib pa'i thig le nyid// bco lnga rdzogs pa'i tha ma nyid// sbyor ba kun zad stong pa'i ngang// de nyid byin brlabs las gyur pa// phyogs dus snod bcud ngo bo nyid// thig le rdul bral zhen pa med// sgyu ma
gzugs brnyan brag ca sogs// ma lus bde chen rang bzhin du// thun mong dran rtog rang 'gags nas// bde chen sgyu ma mngon sum snang// bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs// bcud lnga zhu ba'i ye shes

ro// thams cad rtse gcig dran pa nyid// dbyer med thabs dang shes rab ste// dran pa gcig tu myong ba nyid// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis// sa ya bcu gsum grangs med pa'i// thig le bde ba nyid snang
ba// rang rang ma 'dres thig le la// sku gsung thugs dang dran pa dang// ye shes lnga yi rgyas btab ste// ma lus thig le'i tshogs su snang// rang 'byung bde chen rig pa'i lha// gcig dang grangs
las 'das pa yang// nyi zla gnyis kyi gdan la bzhugs// khyab pa thig le'i gur nang nas// bzhugs nas bdag po rten bdag can// rtsa bcud 'brel pa'i rgyan dang bcas// ka ba gsum dang pho brang bzhi// lde

mig gnyis la 'byed pa bzhi// sgo bzhi phye bas gzhal yas khang// lha dang bcas pa mngon du 'gyur// dgon pa dur khrod ldan pa yi// gsang ba'i 'og min 'bar ba nyid// rim pa phyi nang bar ldan par// nyi zla
pad+ma'i gdan stengs nas// dus gsum thig ler ro gcig pa'o// bde chen gnyis su med par bzhugs// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// tshom bu'i tshogs kyang de bzhin te// thun mong dam tshig ting

'dzin dang// byang chub shes rab snying rje lnga// gzhan du thabs dang shes rab dang// spyad dang glu gar rgyan dang bcas// ma spangs rol par longs spyod pas// ye shes nyi zla rgyun 'char ba// rlung sems ye shes
bcas pa nyid// rgyu ba med pas zag pa bral// nam mkha'i mthar thug bar nyid du// zag med bde ba rgyun mi 'chad// de nyid tshad med dkyil 'khor te// bde chen mngon du gang bar snang// de dag lam la
zhugs pa yi// phyi nang gsang ba ma lus pa'i// spyod pa'i khyad par thams cad kun// 'dir ni rgyas par bstan pa yin// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa// skabs la bab

pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gang yang rung bas spyod par bya// dang po rtogs nas mthar thug pa'i// phyi nang gsang ba'i lam spyod la// spyad bya yul zhes gang 'dod de// thams cad blang dor med par spyod// thabs kyi
lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis// pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin nam// mun snang gser 'gyur thabs bzhin du// thabs la mkhas pas spyad par bya// skyes mchog thabs dang ldan pa yis// zhing dang spyod yul dag pa
la// chags bral bde bar gang spyad pas// nam mkha' dbyings kyi longs spyod la// bde ba chen por longs spyod cing// lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gang dag thabs dang mi ldan zhing// don med
lam la ma 'brel bar// sgra dang tshig la brten pa yis// gsang ba'i spyod pa gang brtsams pa// gang bsgrub snang bar mi 'gyur gyi// nus med g.yul du zhugs pa ltar// bdag gzhan gnyis ka brlag pa

dang// mthong ba'i chos la sdug bsngal zhing// ngan 'gro log pa'i gnas su 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las spyod pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga
pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang// lhag gnyis ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang// byang chub sems dang tshogs nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor

don ni bshad par bya// gang phyir dbang yul rnam shes kun// gzhan snang tha dad ma yin pa'i// ma lus rang rig byang chub sems// ma bcos rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// ma lus kun gyi snying po ste// phyogs bcu

'das dang ma byon pa'i// rgyal ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yin// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// sna tshogs rang bzhin dbyer med pa// de nyid rang bzhin chos sku yin// de

nyid 'jig rten brtan g.yo ste// ji ltar snang grags thams cad kun// nges pa'i rang bzhin bzhi bcu gnyis// rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs skur bshad// de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs te// kun tu sku dang gsung
dang thugs// yon tan phrin las bsam yas mchog/ rang bzhin sprul sku bsam mi khyab// ji snyed 'gro ba ma lus kyi// lus can snying la gang gnas pa'i// rang 'byung zag med ye shes gzugs// mi
shigs thig le bde chen po// nam mkha' lta bur kun khyab pa// mi gnas chos sku'i rang bzhin yin// de nyid rtsa ba'i rang bzhin las// ma lus snod bcud rang bzhin can// rtog pa ma lus dkyil 'khor

te// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid// de nyid thig le phra rags par// snang ba'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// de yis de 'dul snang ba'i rgyu// sprul pa rang bzhin zhes bshad do// gang 'dir phung po 'byung

ba dang// rnam shes dbang po yul dus dang// nyon mongs rtag chad yid chos bcas// gang la mngon par mi snang yang// rang bzhin ma bcos dkyil 'khor te// kun la khyab par snang ba yin// rang snying dwangs

ma lngar ldan pa// dwangs ma'i phung po 'byung ba dang// dbang po'i yul du bcas pa yi// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid// sku gsung thugs su rang snang ba// ma lus kun la rgyas btab bo// bcud 'dus thig

le chen po nyid// nyi zla 'dres pa'i rang bzhin nyid// bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba// ma lus 'dus pa'i tshul dag gis// thabs kyis mngon du gyur na yang// gnyis med thig le bde ba'i ro// 'gro ba kun la
rang bzhin snang// de dag yab yum sku gsung thugs// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid// 'du 'bral med par ye gnas pa'o// gang phyir rgyal ba thams cad kyi// zag med ye shes rang snang ba// dpag med
yon tan rgya mtsho nyid// ye shes 'og min pho brang ste// zag med yon tan rgyan ldan pa'i// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i pho brang dbus// mi 'jigs phung po'i gdan stengs na// bdag po kun bzang 'khor lo
bskor// bka' sdod skyes bu mdun na gnas// gzhan yang rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// rang rang rigs lnga gang gyur pa'i// rnam thar dbu dang ye shes phyag/ so
so'i bzhugs tshul ldan pa yis// mdun rgyab phyogs bcur 'khod pa nyid// yab yum 'brel pa'i tshul gyis gnas// rang 'byung ma bsgribs ye shes phyir// zag med tshogs gnyis las byung ba'i// nam mkha'i
khams dang rgya mnyam pa'i// 'jig rten grangs med rdul dang bcas// bkod pa phun sum tshogs par gnas// gang de zag med ye shes kyi// phyag dang zhal dang thabs ldan pas// zhal mthong rigs la dbang
sgyur bas// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur// rgyal ba de dag ma lus pa'i// gsung mchog brjod du med pa nyid// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa// brda dang don dang byin brlabs dang// gsang ba la

sogs ci rigs par// dam pa'i chos sgra rgya mtsho sgrogs// zag med ye shes rgya mtsho yi// byin brlabs cho 'phrul mngon shar ba// a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ a~M aH/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/

tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya// ta tha da d+ha na/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ 'di dag rab tu phyung ba yis// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtsho

dang// kho ra yug dang lhun po dang// 'bab chu lteng ka mtshe'u bcas// de na gnas pa'i 'gro ba rnams// rang rang longs spyod bde sdug bcas// phyi nang snod bcud bcas pa rnams// ma lus g.yo zhing ldeg par

byed// sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed// de dag sbyangs nas mi gnas par// gsung gi ngo bor byin brlabs te// de dag stong nyid la thim pas// ma lus stong pa nyid du 'gyur// a ni stong dang mi stong gi// dbu ma
dmigs su'ang yod ma yin// ji snyed snang grags chos rnams kun// yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas// gang phyir de yi rang bzhin yang// rang bzhin cho 'phrul ting 'dzin dang// gsang ba bris par gang snang

ba// rig pa'i khyad par snang ba yin// rtsa ba dang ni rgyan zhes dang// lha yi yi ge mngon snang bas// rang bzhin sku gsung thugs nyid de// khyab pa'i tshul gyis ma lus snang// gang du thugs rje byin brlabs

dang// ting 'dzin rig pa'i cho 'phrul te// rang rang khyad par mngon snang yin// 'di dag rang bzhin sna tshogs pa// gang du ji ltar gnas pa kun// yi ger ma gyur med par gnas// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi// ye shes rgya mtsho'i gsang ba'i thugs// mthar thug med pa'i nam mkha' bzhin// zag med rgyas pas kun khyab can// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa// gcig dang du ma med tshul gyis// ye shes
ma bsgribs gsal ba yis// nam mkha' dbyings ltar gsal mkhyen pa// dus gsum chos dang 'gro ba dang// zhing khams rgyal ba dpag med dang// ri dang rgya mtsho rdul bcas pa// snga phyi ma
bsgribs da lta nyid// me long lta bur mngon du snang// dpal ldan nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// ye shes lnga yis kun khyad can// kun mkhyen stobs bcu mtha' thug med// nam mkha'i dbang phyug bde chen

po// mngon shes rgya mtsho pha rol byon// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// sad dang sangs pa'i bdag nyid can// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ bde ba chen po sgyu ma nyid// rang 'byung thugs las gzhan
pa min// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te// gdul bya gang gi ngo dag tu// sna tshogs mngon par 'phrul pa yin// gang du khro gtum gdug ldan pa'i// srid gsum dregs pa'i

bdag po dag/ thugs rje khros pas gdul ba'i phyir// khro bo'i de bzhin gshegs par mdzad// sku ni ri rab lta bu nyid// zhabs dang phyag ni rdul snyed de// gang de gdul ba'i khyad par gyis// zhal gsum phyag

drug zhabs bzhi dang// dbu dgu bcwa brgyad phyag la sogs// nyi shu rtsa gcig dbu la sogs// de bzhin g.yo rdul mi g.yo ba'i// phyag zhabs zhal yang de bskyed de// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa des// ji snyed

phyogs bcu 'jig rten du// cho 'phrul bzhi la sogs pa yi// mdzad pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs kyis// dregs pa che dang dbang phyug dang// tshangs pa khyab 'jug brgya byin dang// dri za gshin rje gnod sbyin

bcas// gdug pa'i nga rgyal rgyu 'bras can// rgyu 'bras rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir// ma lus pa dag ma btang bar// nga rgyal khro gtum zhum pa yis// ji skad smras kyang rang rang gi// nyon mongs rgya mtsho ma skams

par// thugs rje zhe la mnan tshul gyis// de dag mngon du btul bar mdzad// la lar dpal chen khrag 'thung ste// la lar rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid// la lar rin chen khrag 'thung ste// la lar pad+ma de bzhin

gshegs// la lar sna tshogs las su bcas// rang rang btsun mo tshogs dang 'khril// rigs kyi mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// mdog dang cha lugs de bzhin te// de bzhin sras dang bka' nyan dang// pho nya yang

sprul la sogs pa// rdo rje ba spu bu ga nas// pho nya bye ba drug cu dag/ phyogs bcu kun du rgyas bkye ste// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa yi// gdug pa'i tshogs ni de dag kun// ma lus dus gcig btul nas

ni// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod// de dag gsung yang sna tshogs te// sprul pa 'gyed pas gsung gcig tu// khams gsum sgra yis gang bar mdzad/ hU~M hU~M hU~M bi shwa kro d+ha dz+wa lA maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la

ha la hU~M phaT/ phaT phaT phaT/ trata trata trata/ kro Ta kro Ta kro Ta/ ha la ha la ha la/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ da ha da ha da ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/

gardza gardza gardza/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ phaT dz+wa la ra~M/ zhes pa'i sgra yis thams cad gang// ji srid nam mkha'i mtha' thug par// ri dang gling dang rgya mtshor bcas// 'khor yug stong gsum 'jig rten bcas// ma
lus g.yo zhing sgras bkang ste// gdug pa'i tshogs de 'khor bcas pa// gang gi dbang du ma btang bar// gdug pa dus gcig btul bar mdzad// de tshe de yi 'khor g.yog kyang// zhum pas smras shing gsol
btab nas// rang snying phul nas dam mnos te// dmod btsugs rang gi lam la bzhag/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang// la lar gti mug rmugs par mdzad// la lar chags la chags chen po// la

lar g.yem la g.yem par ston// sdang la drag shul spyod pa ste// nga rgyal can la ri bos gnon// zhi las slong dang zhi ba nyid// gsal dang zhe la gnon pa dang// chags khro dang ni sdang khro dang// rmongs khro gnon

khro la sogs pas// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// rang gi mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// gdul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs su// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// thugs kyi sprul pa snang bar mdzad// gang phyir
spros med goms pa nyid// de nyid ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor te// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// ji snyed phyogs bcur gnas pa kun// rang rig rgyal por gnas pa nyid// 'di nyid pho mo ma ning dang// mtshan

med la sogs gang yang min// dngos dang dngos med las 'das pa'i// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// rig pa skye ba med pa'i ngang// 'di nyid gsal bar bsgom par bya// o~M d+harma d+hA tu swa b+ha ba At+ma
ko\u0f85ha~M// skyes dang ma skyes la sogs pa'i// tha snyad ming la mi gnas shing// blo yi sbyor ba las 'das pas// 'di ni de bzhin nyid ces bshad// 'di la rim pa med pa ste// skyes bu mchog gi yul du
gsungs// ma lus rang rig rdo rje nyid// khyab pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha' ste// rnam dag rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// dam pa'i ting 'dzin chen po nyid// gang gis ma lus mngon gsal nas// phyi nang chos
rnams thams cad kun// goms nas spros med de bzhin nyid// de dag ting 'dzin thun mong nyid// mi shigs thig le dwangs ma'i bdag/ bzhi 'dus lnga bdag gnyis su med// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa

nyid// thabs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// ye shes lnga yi ro dang bcas// bde chen skye ba med pa'i don// zag med khyab pa mngon du smin// ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs can nyid// phyi nang med pa'i rang
'byung ste// gsal dang bde ba'i rang bzhin can// thabs dang thig les dbang bsgyur nas// lus can kun la gsal bar skye// gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dwangs ma nyid// rten can brten par bcas

pa nyid// rang 'byung thig le bde ba nyid// phyogs cha med par gsal khyab pas// bde ba chen po'i lus su 'gyur// rang 'byung snyingapo dwangs ma'i lus// 'byung ba zag med snying por thim// thig le spros pa med

pa ste// thams cad ma lus khyab par snang// rang lus rtsa bcud phyi nang kun// snyigs ma dwangs mar smin byas te// dwangs ma ye shes snying por gsal// de nyid rgyu ba med pa yi// rang 'byung thig le spros pa

med// dwangs ma zag med stobs las snang// gang phyir skyes dang sprul pa dang// brtags pa'i gzungs ma las byung ba// dbang po gnyis ni bsrubs pa las// skad cig bcu drug mtha' yi tshe// nyi zla 'dres pa'i
gar thabs las// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa gsal// sems lnga rdzogs pa'i snying po nyid// brjod med rang snang bstan pa nyid// ma lus sku gsung thugs gnas pa// 'khyud pa'i gar gsum bsdam pa
yis// gnas dang 'byung ba ma lus pa// rang rig ye shes gzugs su snang// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// byang chub sems kyi thig le ste/ rten dang brten par bcas pa nyid// rang nyid gsal bar
byin brlabs nas// ji ltar snang srid chos thams cad// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal// ma lus bde ba chen po'i rigs// dam pa'i sbyor ba snang bar 'gyur// 'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi// ting 'dzin
dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// gang phyir mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor pas// dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa'i// rang rig skye med de bzhin nyid// ma bcos rang rig 'od gsal ba// de bzhin nyid de dang por

bsgom// de nas snying rje nam mkha' ltar// gsal la stong pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom// yang na sgyu ma brag ca dang// chu zla'i tshul du bsgom par bya// de nas rang nyid yi ge nyid// gsal la brtan zhing gom pa

yis// ma dag pa ni sbyang byas te// dag pa'i mkha' lnga bsam par bya// e ya~M ba~M su la~M// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dag/ rig pa rang snang tshul du bsgom// de dbus rin chen khang pa dag/ mdzes pa'i tshul dang

ldan pa ste// rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo lte bar bcas// mu khyud zlum po thog mtha' med// gru chad glo 'bur bar khyams dang// sgo bzhi rta babs them skas dang// lnga brtsegs pha gu drwa phyed dang// 'dod yon ka ba za
ra tshags// mi sgrib gsal ba'i rgyan dang ldan// mi 'jigs la sogs lnga dbus gdan// nyi zla pad+ma la sogs pa// lnga dang gsum dang bzhi gcig go/ rim pa 'tsham pa'i gdan stengs su// sa bon cho ga las
byung ba// gtso gzungs mthing ga rdo rje 'dzin// 'khril sbyor 'dzum pa'i byin brlabs te// dbang bskur cho ga lnga ldan pas// sbyor bskul sras bskyed so sor dgod// chos dbyings dkar po 'khor

lo 'dzin// mnyam nyid rin chen ser po lho// sor rtog pad+ma dmar po nub// bya grub ral gri ljang gu byang// btsun mo rigs mthun dril 'dzin 'khril// 'khor lo'i rtsibs mchan shar lho nas// sa snying dkar po

myu gu 'dzin// sgeg mo dung mdog me long 'khril// nam snying sngon po ral gri 'dzin// phreng 'dzin mA le nam mkha' mdog/ spyan ras le brgan pad+ma dkar// gI ti pi wang dmar mo mdog/ rdor 'dzin ljang gu las
kyi rigs// phyag gnyis brkyang nas gar mdzad ljang// gru chad bzhi la rim pa bzhin// byams pa dkar ser klu shing 'dzin// sgrib sel dmar ser glegs bam bsnams// kun bzang dmar ljang rin chen
snye// 'jam dpal dkar ljang ut+pal bsnams// btsun mo rigs dang mthun pa ste// spos dang mar me me tog dri// 'khril zhing 'dud pa tshul bzhin bzhugs// sgo bzhir rim pa ji bzhin du// stobs chen gshin

rje gshed po dang// rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil ba bzhin// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// mthing nag ser nag dmar nag dang// ljang nag rdo rje thod dbyug dang// thod sbrul rdo rje rgya gram dang// yum

yang so so'i phyag mtshan bcas// sgo bzhir rngam tshul 'khril sbyor bzhugs// khyams kyi mdun dang rgyab tu ni// kun bzang yab yum nam mkha'i mdog/ phyag rgya ma nges sna tshogs te// mnyam bzhag ye shes

'phro ba'i steng// rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan pa'o// thub drug dkar ser mthing ga dang// dmar nag ser nag dud ka ste// phyogs bzhi steng 'og shar nub tshul// pi wang go cha gseg par sgrom// pi ti me chur shes

par bya// mi bskyod byed po la sogs pa// rdo rje 'chang bas rnam par brgyan// gzhan dag rang rang gis yin te// ya mAn+ta kr-ita rtag pa'o// thub drug kun bzang brgyan pa nyid// sku gsung thugs 'bar byin

brlabs ldan// rdo rje 'phro 'du snying por ldan// cho ga'i rim pa shes par bya// dwangs ma bcud ldan ye shes nyid// ma bcos de bzhin nyid yin te// ye shes nam mkha'i ngang dang 'brel// kun la khyab pa'i snying rje

yis// khyab byed bde ba'i snying po nyid// tha mal rtog pa gang dag nas// bde ba chen por byin gyis rlob/ 'byung lnga dwangs ma'i snying po nyid// thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu yin te// d+harma tsakra chos kyi dbyings// mi
shigs thig le kun gyi gnas// nus pa'i khyad par phra rags bzhi// thig le'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang// 'du shes 'du byed rnam shes nyid// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid// rgyal po lnga ru bshad pa
yin// 'byung lnga dwangs mar bcas pa ni// dgyes pa bskyed phyir btsun mo ste// mig sogs bde ba'i rnam shes dang// de yi ngo bo yul bcas ni// gnas pa rtsa bcud thig ler bcas// nang gi
sems dpa' yab yum nyid// so so'i rtsa bcud gnas pa'i rten// dbang po dus bzhir bcas pa nyid// phyi yi sems dpar bshad pa ni// gnas dang dus kyis phye phyir ro// gang de dwangs mas bskyed pa

yis// lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad bcas// sgo bzhi yab yum shes par bya// bde chen yid chos rang rig nyid// kun bzang ro yi bde ba nyin// nyon mongs drug gi yul rnams su// sprul pa'i thig ler rang shar

ba'o// 'dul ba bzhi yis don mdzad pa// sprul pa'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// kun kyang dwangs ma'i rang bzhin las// ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pa// gnas dang ngo bo lngas brgyan pa// ye shes lnga yis rgyas btab
pa'o// sa bon sku ste yi ge gsung// bde thugs sku gsung dkyil 'khor ldan// 'phro 'du rtsa ba'i thig ler bcas// ma lus kun la 'di gnas pas// yan lag nyid du 'di shes bya// stong nyid rdo rje la sogs

pa// sngon byas rang rgyud med pa yi// rigs brtags gzungs ma blang bar bya// rang rgyud sgo gsum dag byas la// lha yi rnal 'byor lus su bya// rdo rje snying po ge sar nyid// phrad pa sa dang gsher ba chu// drod me
bskyod pa klung nyid de// bde ba'i dwangs ma nam mkha' nyid// b+h+ru~M dbyibs b+ha ga bde ba'i gnas// sna tshogs 'dus pa'i gzhal yas khang// nyi zla pad+ma nus pa'i gdan// che ba'i yon tan rdzogs par

ldan// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ro// lnga phung 'byung lnga dag pa yi// rang bzhin de dang mnyam sbyar bas// ye shes phra rags gnyis su med// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// dbang po yul dus rnam
shes bcas// rang rang bde bar skyes pa'i lha// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyid// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med cing// rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob nas// thabs lam bde ba'i gnyer dag gis// brtags pa
rang gi rtog pa zlog/ dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo la// bzlog bya ngas kyang mi dmigs so// bde ba'i thig le sa bon la// thabs bzhi rlung gi gar thabs kyis// dga' ba'i tshad ldan nus pa bcas// dngos

'di lhan cig skyes par brtan// bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// bde ba chen por ro gcig phyir// ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas// bcud 'dus bde ba'i thig le ni// yon tan

kun gyi ngo bo bas// che ba'i yon tan kun rdzogs pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor gnas// de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang// rgyal ba kun gyi rgyal po yis// ma lus lhag pa'i lhar brlab phyir// gsung gi snying po

brjod par mdzad// b+h+ru~M bi shwa bi shud+d+he/ hU~M badzra d+h+r-ika/ o~M dzI na dzika/ swA~M rat+na d+h+r-ika/ AMHA ro lig/ hA~M pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ mu~M d+hA twI shwa rI/ lA~M dwe Sha ra ti mA~M mo ha ra ti/ pyA~M rA ga ra ti/ tA~M badzra ra ti/ k+ShIM ha rA dza ya/

trA~M A gar+b+ha ya/ hrI ha hU~M pad+ma ba da ya// dzIM ku ru pa NI hrIH/ hU~M lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ trA~M mA l+ye sa ma ya hoH/ hrI gA tI rA go\u0f85ha~M/ a nr-i t+ye rA ga yA mye/ mai d+ha ra Ne swA hA/ th+l+hiM nis+sa ra~M b+hA ya swA hA/ hU~M sa rA dzA ya swA hA/ mu~M shrI a ra~M

gA ya swA hA/ dzaHd+hU pa pra be sha/ hU~M puSh+pa a be sha/ ba~M dI ba su khi ni/ ho gan+d+he tsit+ta/ hU~M ya mAn+ta kr-ita dzaHphaT/ hU~M big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita hU~M phaT/ hU~M pad+mAn+ta kr-ita ba~M phaT/ hU~M pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita hoHphaT/ o~M ma hA badzra d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa

la ni phaT/ o~M ma hA rat+na d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/ o~M ma hA pad+ma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/ o~M ma hA karma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra tsit+ta hU~M/ a a a badzra b+ha dra sa mat+na hU~M/

o~M mu ne kri~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne hU~M drwu~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne sru~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne bra~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne sha~M swa hA/ o~M mu na ye swA hA/ o~M e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA ke ru NI ka tr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ o~M AHhU~M swA hA/ ba ba

ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ o~M AHhU~M swA hA/ o~M sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gnyis med pa'i/ gsang ba zab mo sku gsung thugs// gdod nas bdag dang dbyer med pa'i// da lta

nyid du dbyer med shog/ o~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ o~M badzra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ o~M badzra sa ma ya hoHdzaHhU~M ba~M hoHzhes brjod pas/ sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mdzes pa dag/ gnyis med ro gcig 'dres nas kyang// stong

gsum dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// o~M AHhU~M swA hA/ mu~M mA~M lA~M pA~M tA~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ trA~M trA~M trA~M trA~M/ d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri/ AHAHAHAH/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHrab ldan pas// gtso

bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga// 'brel ba sum cu rtsa gnyis dang// rdo rje khro bo khro mo dang// sgo bzhi rab 'byam la sogs pa// dkyil 'khor rgyas par snang bar mdzad// 'khor lo nyis brtsegs rtsibs su bcas// khyams
dang sgor bcas lha yi rim// rang rang phyag mtshan gdan dang bcas// bzhugs thabs tshul bzhin gnas pa'o// de nas rgyal ba de dag gis// dkyil 'khor chen po de dag la// dbang bskur byin brlabs bya

ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i sngags ni gsung bar mdzad// o~M ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M ma hA pra t+yA bek+Sha NA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M ma hA

sa man+ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M ma hA kr-i t+ya a nuSh+ThA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA wAka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba

ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ zhes brjod ye shes sku
gsung thugs// rtse gcig thim par gsal bar 'gyur// tsit+ta 'og min 'bar ba'i gnas// rin chen 'bar ba rdzogs pa'i mdzod// mi shigs thig le za ma tog/ rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas// tsit+ta'i

khams lnga'i snying po la// bde ba'i thig le phra rags nyid// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid du// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal por brjod// gang de dwangs ma ye shes lnga// gang du mi phyed rdo rjer gsal// dug lnga ye shes
bskyed pa dang// btsun mo dga' bde'i ngo bor brjod// khams lnga 'dus pa'i ye shes nyid// rang 'byung ye shes bde ba'i thugs// rnam shes bzhir bcas thig le nyid// thugs kyi sems dpa' nyid du
bshad// de yis gang la dbang sgyur ba'i// yul bzhi thig le bde ba'i bcud// sgyu ma'i bde bar gang 'char ba// yul bzhi rim par bshad pa ste// dbang sgyur gnyis med gang yin pas// yab yum 'brel ba'i
ngo bor bshad// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa'i rten// so so'i nus par bcas pa nyid// gang la de dbang de yi phyir// 'di ni phyi yi rim par bshad// gang de khams lnga'i bde ba yis// mnyes dang thig le
bkod pa dang// nam mkha'i ye shes gsal ba dang// de nyid khyab pa'i rang bzhin te// zag med bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mnyes par mdzad// dgug dang bcing dang mnyes dang
gsal// thabs lam bcud du 'brel bar gsungs// gang de thabs chen gsal byas pas// lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad spangs// bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba// ma lus 'joms las khro bo'o// bcud las
'das pa'i hU~M gsum nyid// byed pa bral ba'i ngo bo nyid// yul gsum bral bas chos kyi dbyings// ma lus rnam dag kun tu bzang// dngas snyigs snying por 'brel ba yis// nyon mongs sa bon drug bcas

pas// thig les btul nas bstan pa 'chad// sprul pa'i sku ru bshad pa yin// kun kyang ye shes lnga yi ro// khyab par gnas pas rgyas btab cing// snang srid bde chen sku gsung thugs// dran pa rtag tu gsal

bzung ba'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// gsang rtse sna tshogs 'dus pa'i dbus// phyi nang rim pa'i dbu rtse can// ngo bo byin brlabs 'phags pa ste// yon tan byin brlabs kun gyi gnas// gsang ba'i

pad+ma'i rang bzhin du// rdo rje gnyis med thig ler blta// nyi zla zil pa'i thig le nyid// phan tshun 'dres pa rlung gis phye// gsang ba'i khams lngas ye shes rol// snyigs ma'i phung po lnga dag nas// dngas ma lnga yi
rang bzhin gsal// rgyal po de bzhin gshegs par gsal// gsang ba'i 'byung ba lngar bstan pa// dbang yul phrad pa'i skabs las shes// rigs mchog yum gyi phyag rgya lnga// snyigs ma bral
ba'i dus na blta// thig le thugs kyi bde ba rnams// rang rang thig le bde bar gsal// ye shes rnam shes dngas ma rnams// bde ba chen po gsal bar shes// dam tshig bde ba'i chas kyis sgegs// sgo gsum
'brel cing thig ler chags// gang du bde ba'i sgra bsgrags te// bskyod cing 'pho ba'i gar gyis mnyes// thugs gang thig le brten pa'i gnas// gang yul bde bar dbang byed pa'i// rten dang bcas pa'i bde
ba yis// rang rang thig le skyed par byed// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thugs dang thig ler bcas pa nyid// dgug 'dzin 'khyud cing gnas pa dang// thig le rlung dang stod smad bsdams// bskyod
dang 'bebs pa'i thabs yin te// tshim dang thig le dor ba dang// ye shes gsal bas bde sems rgyas// rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar brtags// gsang yul dbang po reg pa dang// rnam shes gang yin ta krita

de// bde ba'i rang bzhin ma skyes pas// rtag chad mtshan ma bdag med pa// sgo ma'i rang bzhin gsang ba'i sngags// shes skyob don phyir gsang ba'i sngags// shes pa gsum 'das sgrib zad pa// rang rig byed
pa yid ces bya// rgyun gsum zad pa'i chos dbyings nyid// rtogs bya kun tu bzang mor bshad// 'khor ba'i sa bon nyon mongs bcas// zil pa'i thig sngon lam bzhin du// thabs sbyor thig le'i 'phro 'du
yis// gsang ba'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis ston// sa bon thig le ma skyes gzugs// bstan pa rim pa gsum du bstan// 'dod pa'i yan lag gsum brgya dang// drug cu rtsa bzhi la sogs pas// tha mal zhen pa

ral grol nas// rdo rje ze'u 'bru 'brel bskyod pas// rang 'bar thig le gzugs su chags// yab yum lnga phyi thabs kyis gzung// nyi ma zla ba shar ba'i 'od// rtse nas rtse ru phyin pa yis// 'khor ba'i mun pa
kun bsal nas// ma lus lhan cig skyes par gsal// de nyid gsang bar shes par bya// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// bzhi bcu rtsa lngar gnas pa yi// thugs kyi rang bzhin snying po nyid// rang rang

mtshon pa'i rtags yin te// rgyas dang bsdus pa'ang de bzhin du// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar// dril bu pad+ma rin po che// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rim bshad pa'o// gzhan gang gnas su rdo rje shes// dang po thugs

dang g.yon 'khyud pa'o// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje che// ut+pal klu shing po ti snye// gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang// pi wang gar sgyu pog me dang// byug pa so sor rim shes

bya// nr-i mgo rdo rje thod rgya gram// lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta hoH// 'od 'phro mnyam bzhag rdo rje thal// ye shes rtse lnga chos khams dril// thugs la brtan pa nyid du gsungs// thub chen nges par phyag
gnyis shes// gseg par go mtshon pi wang brdab// sgrom stob po ti chos 'chad tshul// me dpung bum par shes par bya// gzhan yang mthun pa skabs kyis brtag/ mi mthun khyad par rgyas par bstan// rdo rje

rin chen pad+ma dang// rgya gram dril bu brgyad shes bya// rdo rje lcags kyu mda' se gol// rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan so// pad+ma 'khor lo ral gri lce// rgya gram khu tshur go cha mche// gzhan yang skabs dang mthun pa

ste// rang rang don nyid rtse gcig pa'i// thugs kyi rtags su shes par bya// dngas ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas// gcod dang mi phyed dga' ba dang// ma gos bde ba bskyed pa nyid// rnam par mi rtog rim par
shes// yon tan bskyed dang tha mal gcod// de bzhin ma gos ye shes nyid// so so yon tan cha las byung// rang rang rtsa bcud thig le'i dbyibs// so so nyid ltar rang gnas te// bde ba'i thig le nyid du

shes// rang 'byung dwangs ma'i thig le nyid// 'brel ba'i tshul gyis kun snang ba// khu ba rtsa yi dbyibs gzugs nyid// rang rang las dang rtog pa dang// snying po phyag mtshan dbyibs bzhin pas// bde chen thugs
su gsal brtan pa// thugs kyi dus su shes par bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thig le gsal ba'i rang bzhin las// thugs mtshan che ba'i ye shes nyid// dpag tu med par rang snang ba// bde

ba chen po'i thig le'i 'od// ma lus de der snang ba nyid// ma lus gnyis med thig le yi// bde ba chen po'i ye shes lnga// de las phye bas mtshon pa'i sgo// thugs kyi rang rtags bsam mi khyab// bde ba'i thugs
las gzhan ma yin// gang phyir dkyil 'khor 'di dag kyang// thun mong gnas su bsgoms pa dang// mi shigs thig le'i snying po la// sku gsung thugs nyid gsal bar bya// don dam thig le pad rtse la// rim
pa ji bzhin gsal bar bya// de nas gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bshad// cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin gyis// rang snying rgyu yi sa bon hU~M// dag pas rim pas gsal ba

la// rang rgyud 'byung lnga nyon mongs lnga// rang 'byung lnga ru snang ba'i phyir// 'byung ba lnga nyid bsgom par bya// e ya~M ra~M su~M ke~M ra~M// so so las rnams byas nas ni// nam mkha' gru gsum zla gam rlung// khrag gi

dba' klong 'khrug pa dang// gti mug ro dang nga rgyal ri// zhe sdang me nyid bsgom par bya// mdog kyang rim par shes bya ste// las dang rang bzhin shes bzhin brtag/ b+h+ru~M las dur khrod gzhal yas khang// 'khor

lo rtsibs bzhi thod phreng dang// bar khyams gnyis ni sgo dang bcas// thod phreng sbrul gyi za ra tshags// zhing gi gdung dang ka ba ste// sprin nag dur khrod rgyan dang bcas// khro mo bdud rtsi lha mo

dang// thod pa lnga gsum rtsig pa can// nyi zla'i rgyan can bsam byas la// dregs pa gnod sbyin srin po dang// dri za gshin rje bzhon par bcas// de bzhin gsal bar bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
yi// cho ga las byung rim pa yis// gnyis med gsal bas de brtan phyir// dbang bskur byin brlabs rim bzhin bya// sbyor ba'i thig le 'phros pa yis// gdug pa ma lus btul nas ni// rang rang rim pa

gsal gyur nas// hU~M gis phyogs phyogs gdan la bzhugs// ha brgyad sa bon las byung ba// dkar mo'i tshogs dang rkun mo'i tshogs// rmongs mo dang ni thal byed ma// spos mo dang ni gtum mo dang// sme sha

can dang ma tshogs ma'i// so so'i cha lugs rngam 'thon nas// sprul pa bzhi po la thim zhing// rang rang las mdzad snying po sgrogs// 'dus te phyogs phyogs gnas par bya// he brgyad sa bon las byung ba// stag

dang seng ge wa dang khyi// bya rgod kang ka 'ug pa dang// pho rog la sogs phra men rnams// 'phro 'du las dang phyogs mdog mtshan// rim pa ji bzhin de bzhin bsam// phaT bzhis rta dang phag gdong dang// sbrul

dang spre'u gdong rim pa bzhin// las dang sku mdog phyag mtshan yang// rim pa bzhin du gnas pa yin// de dag 'khor lo dbus dang lnga// yab yum phyag rgya 'brel par gnas// rtsibs mchan gru chad bzhi dag

la// gnas kyi ma mo dgod par bya// bar khyams dang por phra men brgyad// phyogs mtshams rim par dgod par bya// sgo bzhir sgo ba rngam tshul gnas// bar khyams tha ma dag la ni// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i
tshogs// sku mdog phyag mtshan bzhugs tshul nyid// rim pa bzhin du bkod par bya// rin chen thod pa'i dbu rgyan dag/ gnas skabs dag tu 'tsham par bya// sku gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te// yan lag

dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// gang phyir nam mkha'i ye shes nyid// spros med dam pa nyid du 'dod// bde ba'i thig les kun khyab la// chos nyid snying rje kun du snang// thig le rang snying sa bon rgyu// zag pa med

pa'i snying po yin// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po can// thig le gong 'og kun dang 'brel// gnas pa khong stong tshul dag gis// ma lus kun la khyab pa yin// dz+ha~M sgo g.yo ba'i sa sgo can// bskyod dang las kyis

khyab byed pa// lus khyab gnas dang las dag ni// khyad par so sor snang ba yin// de steng ti la ka'i rang bzhin// 'bar ma brgyad dang ldan pa nyid// zhu dang 'bar ba'i las byed pa// drag mo zhes kyang 'dod pa
yin// thig le sgo nas 'dzag pa'i bcud// gsher dang 'dzag pa'i ba~M snying can// sdang dang bebs pa'i rang bzhin can// lus can gnas pa gsal bar bya// gang la gang rten de yi brten// thig
le rtsar bcas bde ba'i rten// de nyid bskyed dang gnas gyur pa// brten pas sa yi dkyil 'khor nyid// 'khor lo gzhal yas rang bzhin te// rim pa gong 'og 'brel pa can// lus la gnas pas dur khrod
de// kha dog rtsa dang bcud bsdus pa'i// rgyan dang gdan du ldan pa nyid// gang la rten pa'i thig le nyid// gnyis med bde ba chen po'i lha// sa bon yi ge bde ba yis// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa
nyid// gcig kyang khams lnga'i bde ba'i ros// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis gnas// lus la thig le chen po gnas// gnas dang bcud dang bde ba nyid// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// nam mkha'i ye
shes dpag tu med// 'jug pa bzhi dang rim pa brgyad// thig le gcig gis khyad par 'phags// nyon mongs zad pas zad byed de// dngas ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar nyid// yul dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin
las// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang// gnas kyi thig le bde ba can// dur khrod ma brgyad gsang ba ste// gnyis med phra men nyid du bshad// thig le thabs dang bcas pa nyid// dkyil 'khor

'jug pa'i sgo dang 'brel// snying po thig le nyid du sbyor// gang dang lhan cig skyes pa las// bde ba chen po skye ba med// ma lus bde ba chen po nyid// khyab pa rgya yongs ma chad pa'o// ma lus 'dus pa'i bde ba'i
ro// sa yang bcu gsum 'dus pa'i mkha'// rang 'byung khyab pa chen po'i gzugs// kun 'dus thig le chen por gsal// rnam thar gsum ldan e yi gzugs// bde ba bskyod dang thig le bskul// 'phro dang

sdud dang bsdams pa'i rlung// rdo rje pad+ma 'dus pa'i sa// rten dang bral ba bde ba'i sa// shu kra'i thig le gang gsher ba// gsang ba chu yi rang bzhin yin// de dag phyag rgyas gang sbyar bas// bde ba'i drod ni rang

'bar skye// b+h+ru~M las gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ sna tshogs 'dus pa'i snying po can// khyad par 'phags pa'i 'og min te// yon tan rdzogs pa'i dngos gzhi can// dga' bzhi

'jug pa'i sgo dang ldan// 'bab 'dzeg thig le'i skas dang ldan// bde ba nyi zla rgyal la bzhugs// thig le 'dres pa bde ba'i ro// nyi zla 'brel ba'i bde ba'i lha// 'thung dang rngub pa'i thabs chen gyis// 'khor
ba'i sa bon zad byed pas// za byed khro bor de bshad pa'o// dpag med thig le'i rang bzhin gang// sa ya bcu gsum pho brang na// bde ba chen po ye shes gzugs// sku gsung thugs dang lhan cig
bzhugs// 'du shes gsum ldan byin brlabs te// gsang ba'i ye shes lnga ldan pas// dbang thob rnams la rgyas btab po// gsang ba thig le chen po ni// rang 'byung bde ba chen po nyid// rnam

rtog rgyu ba chad pa yi// rdo rje pad+ma'i bar na gnas// 'og sgo snying po pad+ma ni// rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor te// gsang ba sku gsung thugs nyid du// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med gnas// ma lus 'dus

pa'i thig le nyid// gnyis med bcud du gyur pa na// de yi bde ba chen po nyid// khyab pa'i tshul gyis gang bar bzhugs// ye shes rgya mtsho lhan cig skyes// gsang ba'i thig le bde ba'i ro// nyi zla 'dres pa'i
tshul gyis snang// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad// de nas rgyal ba thams cad kun// gdul bya'i bsam pa'i khyad par gyis// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par// rdo rje khro bor snang gyur
