te// bskyed cing gdug pa 'dul ba yi// drag po lha yi sngags dag dang// de yi gzhal yas snang bar mdzad// b+h+ru~M bi shwa bi shud+d+he/ dz+nyA na kA pa la rat+na pany+tsa hU~M/ ma hA de ba s+thi ra ba~M// sUr+ya tsan+d+ra maN+Da la hU~M// de steng so

so'i sku nyid dag/ gsal ba'i rim pa dgod par bya// o~M bud+d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/

o~M rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha

pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri sarba duSh+tAn+ta hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA badzra d+ha ra kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la nI hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri bi da ma hU~M phaT/ o~M shrI sha ta sa man+ta pad+ma ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri

khA hi hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri bi shwa hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra gau rI ha/ badzra tsau rI ha/ badzra pra mo hA ha/ badzra bait+ta lI ha// badzra puk+ka sI ha/ badzra g+hasma rI ha// badzra sma shA nI ha/ badzra tsaN+Da lI ha/ badzra si~M ha mu khI

he/ badzra byA g+h+ra mu khI he/ badzra sr-id+gA la mu khI he/ badzra shwa na mu khI he/ badzra gr-i D+ha mu khI he/ badzra kAng+ka mu khI he/ badzra kA ka mu khI he/ badzra ul+lU kA mu khI he/ badzra Ar+ya te dza teng dza badzra a mu khA hU~M/ badzra lo kA ba~M/ badzra

b+hasmi sa ma ya ba to hoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ badzra ma nu rAk+Sha si/ badzra brah+ma NI/ badzra rau tri/ badzra bai Sh+Na be/ badzra kau mA rI/ badzra in+d+ra ye/ badzra

sUr+ya ye/ badzra ping+ga le/ badzra sau me/ badzra a mr-itA/ badzra daN+Da nI/ badzra rAk+Sha si/ badzra b+hak+Sha si/ badzra ra ti haM/ badzra ru d+hi ro ma t+ya~M/ badzra e ka tsa raM// badzra ma no ha raM/ badzra sid+d+hi ka~M/ badzra b+ha ya be/ badzra ma hA ma ra Ni/

badzra ag+na ye/ badzra bA rA hI/ badzra tsa muN+Di/ badzra pU ta nA/ badzra bA ru Ni/ badzra ma hA kA lA/ badzra tsa kA lA/ badzra kum+b+ha kar+NA/ badzra lam+bo d+ha rA/ ru lu ru lu hU~M/ e h+ye hi A na ya/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHra~M/ o~M badzra kro

d+ha ya ma ya hU~M/ o~M khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa// thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya

phaT// badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoH// a li u li hA li ta pA li// da~MSh+tA gau na rau tri/ kha ra~M yo gi ni khA hi hoH/ hU~M ha he phaT b+h+yo ra~M/ gsang sngags drag po mthu yis ni// phyogs bcu tshig cing rab tu tshig/ kun tu rab tu
tshig par 'gyur// 'bar dang rab 'byam kun tu 'bar// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor khro tshogs kyis// gang zhig rab gang kun tu gang// 'khrugs dang rab 'khrugs kun tu 'khrugs// 'thor zhing rab 'thor kun

tu 'thor// 'gul zhing ldeg pa de bzhin te// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang ba yi// sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa// thul zhing brgyal nas myos gyur te// de dag bde bas bslang
byas te// bde ba chen po dgyes pa'i gar// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug bar// rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs kyis byed// rdo rje gsang ba rang bzhin las// thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgyur// gdod
nas thig le'i rang bzhin nyid// ma bcos thig ler gnas pa nyid// ma lus thig ler rgyas btab pa// nam mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin nyid// ma lus bde ba'i thig le nyid// khyab pa chen po'i rang bzhin

te// mtha' dbus bral ba bde ba che// snying rje chen por brjod pa yin// kun gyi rgyu ni thig le ste// ma lus sa bon rtsa ba nyid// mi shigs snying ga'i pho brang nyid// ye shes rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang// nam

mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid de// rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs gnas so// nyon mongs gdug pa'i gdan khri nyid// gdul bya thub pa nyid du bstan// phung po nyon mongs lnga dag pa// rgyal po lnga yi rang bzhin te// rang

snying dngas mar bcas pa nyid// dbang phyug lnga ru brjod pa nyid// rnam shes yul du bcas pa nyid// rten dang brten par bcas pa yi// bde ba phra men bcu drug nyid// phyi lta nang lta dkyil 'khor nyid// dgug
dang 'dzin dang thig les bsdams// thig le'i rang bzhin gnyis su med// dbu ma'i thig le bcas pa'i lam// dbang phyug nam mkha'i dbang mo tshogs// dbab pa nye ba'i tshul bzung nas// thig le dbab
pa'i thabs bzhi yis// phab pas rang rgyud dngos po bsreg/ dran 'byung rig pa'i 'phro 'du tshogs// bde ba chen po'i don la 'jug/ gnyis med thim pas dkyil 'khor 'bar// sku gsung thugs su kun gsal
bas// gnyis med thim pas mnyes par mdzad// rang bzhin bde ba'i dkyil 'khor kun// rig pa nyams myong dbyings la thim// dran rtogs 'byung ba nyon mongs kun// tshigs pa gsum du shes
par bya// ye shes bde ba chen po nyid// 'bar ba gsum du shes par bya// byang chub sems kyi bde ba yis// ma lus gang zhing khyab par gyur// thig le gong 'og steng 'og nyid// thig le gong ma nyid 'og
tu// 'og ma nyid ni steng du 'bar// gcig gnyis lus kun khyab par 'thor// lus dang rtsar bcas 'gul ba dang// ldeg cing 'bar ba'i bde bas gang// bde bas dbang sgyur tshim pa'i sgra// ma lus khyab par

sgrogs par byed// sku gsung thugs kyi b+ha ga nyid// bde ba chen po nam mkha'i dbyings// 'byung bzhi rdo rje pad+ma nyid// reg pa 'dus pa'i bde ba nyid// re dogs rgyu ba chad pa nyid// de bzhin nyid du blta bar
bya// thig le 'dres pa'i bde ba yis// sa yang bcu gsum khyab pa'i yid// ma lus mkha' ltar dri med pa'i// rang 'byung phyogs med kun du snang// thabs dang shes rab bde ba yis// 'byung bzhi rim pa'i

dwangs ma ste// sa bon bde ba'i rgyu zhes grags// b+ha ga pad+ma'i snying po nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// bzhugs gnas bde ba chen po'i rten// sangs rgyas rin po che yi snod// phung po lnga dang nyon

mongs lnga// ye shes lnga yis zil gyis mnan// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ni// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid// thig le phrad pa'i dus nyid na// ye shes lnga yi ro dang

ldan// gdul bya 'joms pa'i khro bo lnga// 'byung lnga dbang phyug rnam par bstan// myong dang yul bcas rnam shes yul// phra men nyid du shes par bya// phyag rgyar bcas pa'i sbyor ba bzhi// sgor bcas nyid du shes
par bya// sgal tshigs 'dzug pa'i thig le nyid// dbang phyug bde bar shes par bya// gnyis ka phyogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid// bde ba chen po spyan drangs pas// rtog pa bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jug/ rim pa

gnyis med brda mjal mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi thig le nyid// gnyis su med par thim par mdzad// rnal 'byor dbang phyug pho mo kun// bde ba chen po mnyes par gyur// sangs rgyas gab tse snying po la// ma
lus bde ba'i rang bzhin ldan// thig le gnyis med bde ba'i ro// ye shes lnga ldan zag pa med// phyi nang gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs
las// lhan cig skyes pa gsal bar 'gyur// sa ya bcu gsum gnyis 'dus pa'i// thig le rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid// gnyis med 'khril ba zhes bya ste// rang rig bde ba chen por thim// sangs rgyas rin chen

de yi dbyig/ kha sbyor snying po za ma tog/ sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang las// ma lus thig le gnas par mdzad// sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang ni// bde ba chen po'i gnas nyid de// rdo rje snying po rtsa
dang 'brel// gnyis med bde ba'i thig ler gnas// gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i bcud nyid de// gsang ba yon tan rdzogs pa'i mdzod// snying po'i lam la gnas par bya// rdo rje nyi ma'i

snying po la// rdo rje zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// gnyis med thig les gang ba yi// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'char// brten las byung ba'i rten can nyid// gang la gang gis mnyam sbyor bas// thabs chen thabs

las byung ba yi// bde ba chen po 'bar bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid// rang rang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// gdul bya'i ngo la dgongs mdzad de// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad// rdo rje
rdo rje dril bu dang// 'jig rten khor yug bcas pa 'degs// de bzhin 'khor yug bcas pa 'degs// de bzhin 'khor lo dgra sta dang// kha T+wAM rab tu 'khrol ba'o// nor bu rin chen rgyu zhags dang// rdo rje

dgra sta rab tu rdebs// chags mchog pad+ma chen po dang// dril bu rnga yi sgra sgrogs pa'o// las ni ral gri gshol chen dang// 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pa ste// bar ma rdo rje dung dmar 'khrug/ sti ra chen por

brdebs pa'o// btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo yang// 'khril bas pad+ma rak+ta stobs// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni// byis dbyug mda' gzhu rgyal mtshan dang// byis snying rdo rje za rdeg tshul// byis snying dung dmar

byis rgyu dang// mgo lus 'brel ba'i tshul du gnas// steng 'og phyi nang bsnol ba dang// byis ldag khog pa dral zhing lta// rgyu mgo zhig khur rgyu gri dang// rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags

sgrog dang// dril bu 'khrol bas slong bar byed// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang// ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas// kun kyang mdzes pa'i

rgyan dang bcas// zhal 'dzum steg mig 'khril tshul can// dbu skra ral pa lcang lo bcings// sha da pa yi glu len cing// dmar la rdul ldem chags pa'i tshul// snam zhing che la rked pa phra// nu 'bur stod smad bye

zhing 'gying// dmar la klan zhing 'dud tshul can// gus dang steg pa'i ngang tshul 'chang// so so'i gdan la 'khod pa ni// srin mo smug nag thod rlon 'chang// tshangs pa dmar ser pad+ma bsnams// lha chen dkar

ljang tri shU la// gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'chang// gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'phen// brgya byin dkar mo in+d+ra gdengs// rdo rje ser mo tsan+dan 'thung// bdud rtsi dmar mo pad+ma bsnams// zla ba dkar
mo puN+Da rI// be con ljang gnag dbyug to 'phyar// srin mo dmar mo dung khrag 'atung// za ba ljang nag ba su 'dren// dga' ba dmar mo ka tar 'chang// stobs chen dkar mo gshol 'dzin ma// rdo
rje ser mo spu gri gcod// 'dod pa dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs// nor srung dkar mo bum pa 'dzin// rlung lha sngon mo ba dan 'phyar// gsod byed dkar mo ral gri so// me mo dmar mo gsal shing

'chang// phag mo nag mo mche zhags can// rgan byed dmar mo zhing chung za// sna tshogs dkar mo thod khrag 'thung// chu lha dmar ser sbrul zhags 'dzin// rdo rje nag mo lcags kyu 'dzin// rdo rje ser mo ra mgo

zhags// rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom// rdo rje ljang gnag dril 'khrol 'gying// so so brjid pa'i stabs ldan pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// rnam par spro ba'i rgyas pa'i phyir// sku dang gsung

dang thugs nyid dang// yon tan phrin las khro bo'i phyir// lnga bcu brgyad ldan bye brag lnga// sngags dang phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin dang// sku mdog bzhugs tshul rim pa dag/ rigs rnams ji ltar 'gyur ba brtag/ de
ltar bsams dang bris pa dang// brjod dang mos pa'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar 'tsham par bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos// rngam pa'i zhal gdangs spyan zlog cing// mche gtsigs phyogs

bcur gom pa yis// 'jigs pa'i stang stabs gar mdzad pas// 'jigs byed bcu ni rnam par 'phrul// o~M o~M o~M o~M o~M o~M o~M o~M o~M o~M/ ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ kro kro kro kro kro

kro kro kro kro kro/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/ hU~M kA ra bi dza ya/ nI la daN+Da/ ya mAn+ta ka/ ar+ya a tsa la/ ha ya grI ba/ a pa rA dzi ta/ a mri ta kuN+Da li trai lo kya bi dza ya/ ma hA ba la/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT

phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ 'di dag mngon du phyung ba yis// ri bo sa gzhi 'gul byed cing// rgya mtsho ma lus 'khrug pa dang// sngags kyi sgra chen grag par 'gyur// hU~M mdzad rnam rgyal dbyug sngon
can// gshed po mi g.yo rta mgrin dang// gzhan 'joms bdud rtsi khams gsum rgyal// stobs chen khro bo 'di dag gis// rang rang 'gegs kun rnam par gzir// ma lus 'jigs shing 'joms par

mdzad// gardza gardza/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ khro bo'i
rgyal po 'di dag kyang// blo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bskal pa'i me ri nang rol du// bri'am bsam mam dmigs bya ba// mthing ga dkar po mthing nag dang// ljang sngon dmar gnag dud ka
ljang// dkar ljang dung dmar mdog tu snang// kho mo lus dang grib mar gnas// 'khor lo nr-i mgo rdo rje stir// drang srong 'bar bar bcas pa dang// gshi rje'i rkang bzung zhing dbyug

'phyar// ral gri bden bral stir dbyug gshog/ ba dan brgyad thogs be ra~M nyid// rin chen nr-i mgo gsum gyi dbyug/ rdo rje rtse gsum nr-i mgo dang// thong gshol gtun shing g.yas g.yon thogs// yang na zhal
gsum phyag drug ste// blo ldan rnam par bsams nas ni// bgegs dang gdug pa rnam par 'jig/ pho brang 'khor dang rnam par bsgom// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rang lus rten dang brten pa

yi// dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal bar brtag/ lte ba snying ste sku gsung thugs// thig gis cha chen cha chung bcas// gnas bzhi dngas ma 'byung ba ste// khog pa dur khrod gzhal yas khang// ka ba gdung dang rta

babs dang// bla bre rdo rje ra ba dang// 'khor lo drwa ba dra phyed dang// nyi zla skar khung rdzing bu dang// bskyed shing g.yas g.yon 'khor lo brtsegs// cod pan nyi zla pad+mar bcas// rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gzhal

yas khang// rang 'byung tsit+ta'i 'khor lo na// thig le ye shes lnga bdag nyid// ma lus thig le 'dus pa'i ros// cho 'phrul bstan dang gdug pa 'dul// so sor 'khor lo dgod pa yi// ting 'dzin rdzogs pa'i

tshul du bsgom// 'byung bzhi dwangs ma yum nyid de// bde ba'i dngas ma nam mkha'i khams// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rang bzhin khams lnga'i rang bzhin bcud// zla ba nyi ma gnas pa yi// shrI ra

tsit+ta'i thig le la// nang gi gdug pa 'joms pa dang// spyod yul bde bar sgyur ba dang// thig le so sor dgod par nus// phye bas rim pa'i 'khor lo ste// bsdus pas thig le chen po nyid// thig le ye shes

lngar ldan pa// thabs nyid dwangs ma yum du bshad// rnam shes thig le nyams myong nyid// tha mal 'joms pas khro mor snang// gnas kyi thig le rtsar bcas pa// phra men nyid du shes par bya// gnas bzhi 'jug

pa'i sgo nyid de// sgal tshigs la brten bde ba'i bcud// 'phro zhing sdud pa dbang phyug ma// gnas rten bcu yi thig le la// 'joms pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar byed// nyams myong skye dang rnam pa med// spyod
yul dag pas nang du bshad// zla ba nyi ma la brten te// sku gsung thugs kyi lam rgyud de// thig le g.yo dang 'bar ba dang// re dogs med dang rnam par dran// bde ba'i yan lag bzhi ru 'gyur// 'khyud pa

gar gyi phyag rgya bzhis// rdo rje snying po'i pad+mar 'brel// bskyod pa rlung dang mnyam sbyor bas// nyi ma zla ba dus gcig 'char// de nyid kun du khyab pa las// ma lus lhan cig skyes par 'gyur// bde ba chen po
gnyis med pa// kha sbyar bsrub pa'i thabs las skyes// thabs las byung ba'i gsang thig le// ma lus 'dus pa bcud kyi ro// rten la brten can nyams myong ba// lhag pa'i ye shes thabs las

skyes// chos dbyings la sogs ye shes lnga// thugs nyid mtshon phyir mtshan ma ste// gang la rten dang 'bar dang 'dzag/ bde ba'i rlung dang nam mkha'i khams// de bzhin btsun mo dgyes skyed pa// mi phyed gnyis
med lhan cig pa// gang de thabs las byung ba yi// dngos gnyis yul dang dbang po'i tshogs// lhan cig skyes pa'i thig le nyid// ma lus bde bar rang snang ba// gnyis med 'dus pa'i stobs las

byung// gnas yul phyag rgya'i thig ler bstan// dgug dang 'khyud dang bsdam dang 'bebs// ye shes 'jug pa'i sgo yin te// sgal tshigs brgyud pa thig le'i rgyud// dbang phyug mar ni shes par bya// ba spu thig

le 'brel pa nyid// phra mo bsam mi khyab snang ba// grangs las 'das pa'i phyag rgya ste// bsam byas nam mkha'i zhing du sbyar// sku bzhi las byung gsang thig le// khams gsum bcud 'dus bde chen po// yungs
kar lhung med brtan pa las// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis snang// thig le bde chen thabs sbyor ba// thob dang gom pa'i rang bzhin las// zhen pa'i 'du shes bral 'gyur bas// rang dbang med pa'i rtags

'byung ste// sbar zhing mnan pa'i cho ga bya// snang dang rig pa sna tshogs chos// bde ba chen po'i thig ler brten// nyi ma'i snying po lta ba ltar// bltas pas mthong ba med pa'i don// ma lus bde chen rgyan du

snang// de nas gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// ji snyed ma lus chos bstan pa// rang 'byung ye shes chen po ste// de nyid dngos po sna tshogs mchog/ ji snyed brtan g.yo snang

ba'i chos// chen po rags pa gnas pa'i chos// ma lus kun la mthun snang ba// rang 'byung thabs kyi ngo bo nyid// de dag gdod nas ma skyes pa'i// rdo rje shes rab stong nyid de// gang yang dngos min ngo bo

nyid// shes rab yum gyi rang bzhin no// ji snyed nam mkha'i mthar thug pa// rang 'byung byang chub sems kyi gzugs// ma lus kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// dpag med mthun par snang ba ste// me long dang ba'i rang
bzhin nyid// sna tshogs gzugs dang 'brel pa bzhin// ma lus rig pa'i thig le las// ma lus sku yi dkyil 'khor snang// ji snyed rab 'byam ma lus pa'i// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dang// zin dang ma
zin gnyis ka'i sgra// nges pa dang ni ma nges pa'i// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul sna tshogs pa// brjod dang bsam dang 'phrul pa dang// byin brlabs mtha' yas rang snang ba// byang chub sems kyi gsung mchog
ste// nam mkha'i sgra dang brag ca ltar// rang rgyud med pa'i rig pa nyid// bsam pa mtha' yas ji snyed par// ma lus gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid// rang rgyud brtan po min par gnas// gang du
nam mkha' mtha' klas par// bskal pa mtha' thug med pa'i bar// nam mkha'i char dang chu bur dang// sprin dang chu rlabs phung po ltar// ye shes bde dang sdug bsngal dang// nges dang ma nges dam pa

dang// dman dang chags dang chags bral dang// zin dang zhen dang ma zhen dang// rnam pa rnam med brtags pa'i chos// dran rtog rig pa gang yang rung// ma lus rig pa rang snang ba// snga ma dran pa'i rnam

pa'am// rmi lam sgyu ma'i nyams myong ltar// sna tshogs snang yang rang rgyud min// gang yang rang rgyud kun bral ba'i// ma lus dkyil 'khor bshad pa rnams// rang rgyud med pas gzugs brnyan te// thabs dang
shes rab gnyis med pa'i// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rang 'byung ye shes skye 'gag med// ma lus mi phyed rdo rje'i gzugs// rnam pa mthar thug med pa nyid// yon tan lhun grub rang snang
bas// de yi brnyan ma rang bzhin 'char// mtha' bral rang 'byung dkyil 'khor ni// cir yang snang la mi dmigs phyir// yang dag brtan par mi gnas pas// ma lus gzugs brnyan dkyil

'khor shar// bde chen rang 'byung lhun grub nyid// yon tan rdzogs pa'i nor bu ltar// dpag med chos su snang ba'i phyir// bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan te// skye bo dag dang ma dag pa'i// gdul bya mtho

dman rim pa la// rig spyad spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir// dang po nas bzung mthar thug par// rang rang bsam pa de bzhin du// de dag ngo la de ltar snang// gzugs brnyan phyi yi rim pa ste// thun mong yul du gyur
phyir ro// ma lus tha dad med pa yi// phyi nang snod bcud rdzogs pa'i lus// bcud ldan bde ba mdzad pa'i gnas// mi shigs thig le kun gyi dngos// rang 'byung bde ba chen po'i gzugs// dwangs snyigs

'brel pa'i nus mthu las// zag pa yod dang med pa yi// dngos po gnyis kyi chos su snang// rgyu yi thig le'i rang bzhin la// nus pa'i khyad par so so yis// 'byung ba dang ni yum nyid dang// bde ba chen po la
sogs pa// thig le nus pa'i stobs las snang// ma lus 'khor lo'i snying po nyid// thig le 'bar ba bde ba'i gzugs// rtsa yig bye brag bcas pa ni// bcud 'dus thig le ros gang ba// ma lus rten can
dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus snod bcud kun du snang// thabs chen gsang ba'i rim pa nyid// khams bzhi las brten thig le nyid// g.yo dang 'dzag cing gnas dang thim// bye brag gsum las rgyud pa yis// gru
dang sgyu ma'i 'khrul chu la// zhugs dang 'thungs pa'i spyod yul lam// me long dang po'i ri bo yi// rtser phyin ma lus bltas pa ltar// bde chen gzugs brnyan nyid du snang// rim pa bzhi yi thig le

nyid// bde ba'i 'du byed gang bskul ba// gnas bzhi'i thig le'i bye brag gsal// mu tig phreng ba brgyus pa ltar// 'dzag dang 'bar ba'i thig le nyid// til 'bru 'bras bu smin pa ltar// ma lus til gyi phung

po ltar// thig le'i lus su gnas pa yin// nyams myong gsal bar 'bar ba'i tshe// 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu ldang// 'phar dang sgra 'byin dpa' bo'i gar// rnam par rol pa'i tshogs su snang// snang srid bde

ba chen po nyid// tha mal nub cing brtan gyur na// thig le nam mkha'i stobs kyis sbyang// rtse gcig nam mkha'i mthong stobs kyis// thig le stong par thim pa na// ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs su nges// snang
srid snod bcud ma lus kun// bde chen rig pa'i gzugs brnyan du// rgya mtsho mjings nas bltas pa ltar// ma lus de ltar snang ba yin// rig pas nyams su myong ba dang// spyod yul dag pas nang du

bshad// rang 'byung bde ba chen po nyid// gsang ba'i gang zag gdul ba dang// gsang ba'i nyams myong mngon bstan phyir// thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yi// cho ga'i bya ba kun ldan cing// dbang bskur byin

brlabs sbyang ba dang// brgya phrag gsum dang drug cu dang// drug cu rtsa bzhi rdzogs pa yis// chu skyes snying po rdo rje can// nyi ma me shel 'od 'byung ba// rang 'byung rlung gi phyag rgyas bskyod// nor bu chu 'dzag rang

dbang med// ma lus rig pa'i thig ler bsdus// rgyu ba'i rlung ni chad pa na// rig pa stong pa'i thig ler thim// a ta la rten thig le'i rim// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i rang bzhin las// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par

snang// gsang ba'i thig le la rten pas// ma lus bde chen 'khor lo sgyur// lus kyi thig le dang por te// de nas rig pa'i thig le yin// de nas ye shes thig le nyid// tha ma chos nyid thig ler thim// de nas
dus gsum 'du 'bral med// bde chen nam mkha'i khams nyid de// zab cing rgyu ba med pa yi// rang rgyud zhen chags kun bral ba'i// bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan shar// ma rtogs khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan
te// rtogs pas nyams myong gzugs brnyan nyid// mthar phyin ye shes gzugs brnyan 'di// dman dang yan lag ma tshang dang// dbang dang man ngag med pa dang// dka' thub can dang ma smin dang// skal med

yal ba'i yul min pas// gsang ba'i gsang chen dam pa nyid// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor nyid// tha mal brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir// cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya//
dkyil 'khor chen po rtogs 'od kyang// ji bzhin mngon du ma gyur la// lhag par 'di yis rtogs 'gyur bas// lhag pa zhes ni bstan pa yin// gang gis gang la gang mtshon pas// lhag par

mtshon par nye ba dang// gang la brten te gang bsgrubs pa// lhag par myur du 'grub pa'i phyir// 'dis ni lhag pa nyid du brjod// gang las gang de thabs 'di yis// mngon par lhag pas lhag pa'o// rgyal ba
kun gyi sku gsung thugs// thabs de gang gis mngon ston cing// dngos gzhi nyid ma yin pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan nyid du bstan pa yin// gang la brten pa'i thabs nyid kyis// de nyid 'dra bar snang ba

ltar// ma mthong mos pa'i gdul bya la// de dang 'dra ba'i thabs nyid de// dngos min 'dra phyir gzugs brnyan no// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin no// dpag med ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i// ye shes rang 'byung lnga
yi gzugs// zag med gdul bya'i ngo la snang// de yi yon tan gzugs brnyan gyis// zag bcas mos pa'i gang zag la// sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa nyid// 'dra bar mtshon phyir gzugs brnyan no// gang phyir
chos dbyings ngo bo la// tha dad dbye ba mi gnas kyang// mos dang drag po'i dbang gyur te// gang gis gang de mi 'dul bas// thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i phyir// longs spyod sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor

bstan// zhen pa can dang nga rgyal can// thabs dang drag pos tshar bcad phyir// de ltar so sor 'tsham pa ste// lhag pa gzugs brnyan gnyis su bshad// gang du bkra shis yid 'ong ba'i// steng 'og phyogs bzhi
bar mtshams dang// legs pas yid 'ong bar chad med// phyi nang ri bo dgon pa'i mchog/ rang gi sa gzhi legs brtags la// pra dang nyams kyis ltas brtags la// ma dag mtshan ngan spang byas la// dag

cing nyams dga' blang bar bya// sa gzhi byin brlabs bkra shis pa// gal te rtsod pa gzhi bya'i phyir// snang dang mi snang bdag po la// mgu bas bar chad med par bslang// gang de dbang du bya ba'i phyir// cho
ga'i yan lag kun brtsams te// mchod dang mnyes pas tshim byas la// sa gzhi bdag gis dbang du bya// thun mong skyon bsal dag byas nas// mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs shing// dngos grub myur zhing nyams
dga' ba'i// phyi nang dag pa chen por sbyang// rang bzhin byin brlabs kun gyi dngos// gdod nas ma bcos gnas pa la// lhag pa'i bden pa dbyer med pas// lha dang gzhal yas ngo bor brlab// gang de'i

bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal btab la// rdo rje khro bo'i 'khor lo spro// hU~M bzhi sngags dang bcas pas bsrung// de dag legs par gzung ba'i phyir// ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad
de// las kyi bya ba kun rdzogs nas// rgyal ba kun la gsol btab la// 'dod pa'i don rnams grub pa'i bar// dngos grub gter du ming gis gzung// gang phyir bshad pa'i cho ga yis// ma dag

pa dang ngan pa dag/ rtogs dang ting 'dzin cho ga yis// mnyam pas re dogs med par gnas// dkyil 'khor phyi nang bshad pa bzhin// tshad ni rjes su mthun pa ste// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// yang na

sor bzhi tshad du ste// yang na mdzub gang tshad du bya// yang na lus gang tshad du ste// yang na lus ni gsum bzhi nyid// yang na bcwa brgyad nyid du'am// nyi shu lnga yi tshad du bya// yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad

de// rang gi rig pa rjes mthun par// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i tshad// tshad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor te// yid 'ong byug bdug nyi shu lngas// mdzes shing legs par byas nas ni// gang dang 'brel
pa'i cho ga brtsam// gzhan du longs spyod ma byas pa'i// ras bal dur khrod rgyu las byas// gsar zhing grims la 'jur mdud med// byin brlabs lnga dang sku gsung thugs// thim pas ye shes thig skud
de// rig pas thig ni gdab par bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// gsang ba'i 'phro 'du de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor yid 'ong pho brang sa// ma nor gsal bas thig tu bshad// gang gis gang mtshon

de bzhin te// kha dog lnga dang phung po dang// khams dang skye mched rnam shes sogs// ye shes dkyil 'khor mtshon phyir ro// rtogs pas 'khor ba'i rgya dral phyir// tshon zhes kyang ni brjod pa nyid// ma mthong

rmongs la stan phyir tshon// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya// gser dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya// pad+ma in+d+ra nI la nyid// rin chen lnga dang ldan pa yis// mkhas pas 'byor ldan ci bder bri// yang

na 'bras dang sA lu la// kha dog bsgyur bas de bzhin no// dman dang 'byor pa chung ba yis// 'byung khungs lnga yis bri bar bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rgyal ba bcu nyid thim pa yis// ye shes

rin chen phyi nang med// dag pa'i ngo bor blta bar bya// o~M a~M hU~M swA hA/ sarba pany+tsa rat+na sa ma ye hU~M/ 'bru bcu spung zhing 'bun pa yi// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab// zhi ba'i da kyil 'khor ma lus la// ye

shes rin chen rtsig pa ste// drwa ba drwa phyed rta babs dang// rdo rje zla phyed 'dod yon dang// rin chen sa gzhi skyed shing dang// rdzing bu dril bu g.yer khas spras// rtag tu bri zhing bsgom par bya// gdug pa 'dul ba'i

dkyil 'khor la// thod pa sna lnga sna gsum dang// thod skam rtsig pa'i rim pa bzhin// tshangs dang lha dbang la brten pa// mchog chen brgyad ni yin par 'dod// lhag ma rnams kyis thog phub ste// gza' brgyad

nyi zla'i glo skar ldan// sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng ba nyid// drwa ba drwa phyed rnam par spras// phyi nang rgyu 'bras gdug pa dag/ gdul phyir rta babs bzhir bshad de// sor phreng thod pa'i phreng ba

dang// dbang po nyi zla'i phreng bas sgras// khro mo sha lnga bdud rtsi dang// dur khrod 'dod yon ldan pa'o// dur khrod sa gzhi khrag dang bcas// skyes bu gsal shing phyogs mtshams brgyad// rak+ta'i mtsho brgyad rba

rlabs 'khyil// thod tshal brgyus pa dur khrod rlung// 'jigs pa'i sgra dang me 'od ldan// zhing 'phan phyogs mtshams brgyad dang bcas// lha chen thod pa sbub stengs na// tsit+ta'i tog las 'od zer 'phro// he ru ka

yi dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus bri zhing sgom par bya// ma lus 'gro ba'i re skong bas// rin chen phreng dang rgyan du ldan// mi 'jigs stobs sogs kun ldan pas// stobs ldan theg par gnas pa yin// spyod la
skyon gyis ma gos pas// pad+ma 'bar bas mdzes par snang// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// nyi zla mdzes pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bde chen don las mi 'da' bas// 'khril sbyor dgyes pa'i tshul du

bzhugs// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// yongs rdzogs sku yi rgyan du gnas// lam dang byang chub yan lag rnams// rdzogs phyir phreng ba la sogs tshul// thugs rje 'khor ba mi gtong bas// chu srin klu
phrug bzung ba bzhin// thugs rje bar chad mi mnga' bas// 'brel ba bar chad med par gnas// brtson 'grus 'khor ba spong ba'i phyir// ri dwags dag ni mnyam par gnas// zag med spyan gyis kun gzigs
pas// dge sdig spyan gyis gzigs par bstan// ma lus zil gnon stobs rdzogs phyir// bya khyung dag ni gnas par bstan// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byas shing// nyon mongs tshad pa'i gdung sel
bas// thugs rje gdugs kyi 'khor lo bstan// ma lus gcig tu 'dus pas na// tog stong 'od zer 'bar ba ste// gdul bya'i bsam pa'i don phyir bstan// lha rnams so so'i rnam pa ni// sku mdog sna tshogs
bzhugs tshul dang// gdan dang phyag mtshan rgyan du bcas// pho mo'i tshul dang bcas pa rnams// de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang// gdul bya gzigs pa'i tshul nyid kyis// gtso 'khor phyi nang lta tshul
gyis// bzhugs thabs rim pa so sor bstan// rang rang snying po gang yin pa// kha dog so sor phye nas ni// gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir// rim pa bzhin du gsal bar bya// rang rang thugs mtshan
gang yin pa// kha dog dbyibs dang bcas pa nyid// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir// rim pa ji bzhin dgod par bya// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor yang// dung chen ras chen la sogs pa// sku
gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo nyid// rim pa bzhin du gsal bar dgod// de bzhin nyid la dmigs med de// stong zhing mi dmigs rig pa nyid// gang la rtog dpyod mi gnas pa// chos dbyings de
bzhin nyid du bsgom// bden gnyis dbyer med mnyam pa nyid// ye nas khyab kyang ma rtogs pas// phyogs med snying rje nam mkha' ltar// rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya// rang 'byung ye shes rnam pas
ni// yig 'bru rnam pa gsal ba las// zhen 'dzin sbyangs nas yig 'bru yi// 'phro 'dus 'byung lnga rim gyis bskyed// bru~M gyis gnyis med 'od sbyangs nas// gzhal yas khang ltar yin par bsgom// rnam pa'i
gang yin de dag dang// rang rig sa bon gnyis med las// 'bras pas gang yin gtso bo nyid// bskyed cing dbang bskur byin brlabs nas// 'khor yang mi phyed 'dres par bsgom// yongs rdzogs smin cing

brtas pa la// dzaHhU~M ba~M hos gnyis med de// 'dod pa mthar thug bar du bsam// las kyi bya ba kun zin nas// thun mong mchod pa sna tshogs dang// kun bzang mchod pa la sogs pa// lha mo brgyad dang bcu

drug gis// mchod pa'i rim pa brtsam par bya// rin chen sna lnga rta glang dang// 'bru dang bang mdzod khang khyim dang// bu dang chung ma bran khol dang// gnas dang zhing dang na bza' dang// rgyan phreng bza' btung

longs spyod dang// rdzing dang chu mig 'bab chu dang// mtshe'u dang khron pa lu ma dang// ri dang de'u dang skyed mos tshal// kho ra yug dang lhun po dang// skye bo mang po bro glu dang// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa

yi// mchod pa sna tshogs rgyas par mchod// dpa' bo sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga// bcud dang rol mo snang ba dang// sna tshogs dri dang byug pa mchog/ dag cing legs par dbul bar bya// thar pa la sogs zhing gi

mchog/ dngos dang lha spyod ting 'dzin gyis// bsgrub bya ma lus kun bsgral te// rdo rje zhing du bskyed par bya// lha mo mi mo rig pa mo// cho ga'i sbyor ba rang rtog bzhin// dngos dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// bde

ba chen po rol mo yis// phyi nang nam mkha'i khams bkang ste// rin chen lha mo yo byad dang// reg pa nyams myong bde ba yis// rgyal sras zhing gi rdul snyed la// gnyis med dag pa'i tshul gyis mchod// rol mo
glu dbyangs bcas pa yis// dkyil 'khor rim pa bstod par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pa yis// mtshan ma legs par snang ba na// sbyang dang byin brlabs dbang bskur dang// mchod dang brtan pa'i cho ga

dag/ rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya// dkyil 'khor de yi phyogs bzhi ru// rnam bzhi las kyi me thab la// dus bzhir rang rang rdzas dag gis// lha bzhi tshul gyis mchod par bya// de nas gnang thob dbang phyug
nyid// dkyil 'khor zhugs shing nus ldan nas// thugs rjes 'khor ba bsgral ba'i phyir// skal ldan slob ma gzhug par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo

che// mngon du mthong zhugs bsod nams gang// 'dir zhugs pa nyid de bzhin no// gang du sku gsung thugs ldan pa// gang du mos pas spro bskyed phyir// rgyal ba kun kyang 'phrul mdzad de// sgo gsum byin gyis

rlob par mdzad// rnal 'byor cho ga rdzogs pas kyang// gdul bya zhi dang khro ba la// so so'i mtshan ma nyid bstan phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa dag/ bris dang brdungs dang blugs pa dag/ so so'i gnas su
legs par dgram// ma lus sku gsung thugs dkyil 'khor// 'di las ma gtogs lha gzhan med// gang du dbang dang 'brel pa ni// bco lnga'i rim pas byin brlab phyir// bzhi dang brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor

la// yab yum bcwa brgyad gnas par bya// bcu gnyis bcu drug dkyil 'khor la// bzhi bcu gnyis dang ldan par bya// nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga la// rgyas pa'i cho ga rim par dgod// 'di dag lugs dang 'bur

dang bzo// bri dang sgom pa dag kyang rung// 'di ni phyi yi dkyil 'khor ro// zab mo'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// sor bzhi mdzub gang la brten te// phyi rol rnam pa'i rjes
'brang min// mthong dang brtan dang goms pa ni// rim pa bzhin du gsal bas 'byung// brgyud pa lam gyi rim pa yis// mthar phyin nyams su myong bar 'gyur// dbang bskur thabs kyi rim pa yis// byin

brlabs man ngag yid ches bya// 'di ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor te// de bzhin gnas skabs gzhan du yang// thun mong tshogs la sbyang ba'i phyir// 'byung lnga rgyu dang bdag nyid dang// mkha' dag byin brlabs so
sor gdon// rang gi cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar brtsams pa 'grub par 'gyur// bsod nams tshogs zhes bya bar bshad// gzhan yang stobs ldan rnal 'byor pas// gang 'dod mngon du bsgrub pa'i
phyir// 'chi med tshe yi dkyil 'khor dang// mtshan ma pra yi dkyil 'khor dang// dug 'joms bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang// cho 'phrul ro langs la sogs pa// gang bsgrub don phyir gang bshad pa// de nyid
bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// las bzhi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// rigs dang mthun pa'i sa gzhi la// thab khung so so'i mtshan ma can// phrin las dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// slob dpon nus pa stobs ldan

pas// rdo rje lus su brtan bya'i phyir// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa// sku gsung thugs su mngon gsal ba// rnal 'byor skal ldan spyod yul te// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// de nas gzhan
yang bshad bya ba// mtshan ma rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis// mthong bya don la sgrib pas na// de dag sbyang ba'i cho ga bshad// tha mal zhen pas brtags pa'i don// lhag pa'i bden gnyis rtogs

bsgoms pas// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du bsreg/ dkyil 'khor lha yi mtshan ma dag/ rnam pa ji snyed gnas pa dag/ rang rig rnam par 'phrul pa nyid// mtshan ma thig le'i ngang

du sbyangs// thig le rim pa'i snang tshul te// phyi nang med pa'i byang chub sems// dngos dang dngos med kun sbyangs te// rang rig byang chub sems kyi me// phyogs bcur 'bar zhing dbyings la sdud// rnal 'byor
las rung goms pa yis// gzhan don rtsom pa'i don byed na// dang por nyes byas gsum sbyang phyir// rnam gsum khrus kyi rim pa brtsam// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// bar chad bgegs dang dbral
byas la// bkug bcings bstims la rnal du gzhag/ bsrung dang byug bdug rgyan gyis brgyan// 'khor ba'i sa bon kun bkod de// las kyi cho ga thim pa dang// dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du rim pa yis// 'khor
ba'i sa bon sbyang bar bya// de tshe sdong bu gnas bkod de// sdong bu re la lha rnams kyi// snying po tshang bar gdags pa dang// gsol gdab gnang byin sras su bskyed// 'jug dang dbang bskur las rdzogs
nas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te// las bzhi me yi las byas nas// rtog tshogs lha gsum dbyer med pa'i// rang rang gnas su dag pa la// sbyin sreg glu bro gar gyis mchod// las kyi bya ba kun zin

nas// thig le chen po ngang la bsdu// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te// ma lus byang chub sems nyid de// de rtogs bya phyir bshad par bya// chos rnams ma lus thams cad
dang// dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad kun// tha dad dbye ba mi gnas te// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rang 'byung mtho dman med pa yi// sku gsung thugs dang lus ngag yid// ma lus gzhi rtsa
snying po ste// rang 'byung byang chub sems la 'dus// de nyid rang rig 'od gsal ba// dngos po ma yin dngos med min// gnyis ka ma yin gnyis med min// mtha' dbus cha shas kun bral ba'i// zab cing
yangs la rgya che ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul de// rtog ge rnams kyi yul min pas// gsang ba'i gsang ba byang chub sems// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi
gsang// skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid las skye ba med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na
'gag pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid la gnas pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi
chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi

gsang// 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong// 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med// ma skyes rig pa'i byang chub sems// dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin du// rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid// g.yo dang mi g.yor
bcas pa yi// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus la// rang 'byung sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rang bzhin gnas dang rtogs pa dang// bsams dang dmigs dang goms pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma

dang// lha dang lha min gsang ba dang// sha za 'byung po mi'am ci// grul bum yi dwags klu rnams dang// rgyu ba'i srogs chags ma lus dang// rtsa shing gel pa 'bras bu dang// phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa// ma

bcos don gyi lha nyid de// byang chub sems su khyad par med// lha zhes gzhan du bstan pa yang// tshig gi tha snyad tsam du zad// byang chub sems la gnyis med par// rtogs pa'i don la gcig tu bstan// snying

rje chen po'i rang bzhin gang// gnas pa'i don dang ma phrad pas// ma lus snying rje'i gnas gyur pa// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// mi 'gal don du rab sbyor ba// kun rdzob byang chub sems su brjod// ji

snyed rnam par bcas pa'i chos// ma lus mtha' yas bstan pa kun// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul te// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ji bzhin du// sna tshogs snang bzhin dngos po med// de dang ji ltar gnas kyang

rung// byang chub sems las gzhan min yang// thun mong yul phyir phyi ru bshad// rang lus phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la// rang 'byung 'khor lo drug gnas pa// g.yo ba ya~M gis skyod byed pa// 'gro ba kun gyi lus
la gnas// 'phen dang sdud pa'i rang bzhin can// snyigs ma'i dus su'ang bde ba 'char// smin pa gru gsum smad na gnas// rnam thar sku gsum rtsa mdud can// 'bar zhing thig le 'bebs dang gnas// rang

lus bde chen smin byed pa// de la gang rten bde ba'i gnas// sangs rgyas rin chen gab tse la// thung ngu a snying lte bar gnas// 'khrul zhing 'dzag dang gnas pa'i rtsa// rdo rje dbu ma'i lam dang 'brel// khyab

cing rgyas pa'i snying po can// sum cu gnyis gnyis rtsa yig ldan// d+harma tsakra snying po'i gnas// rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad kyi dngos// dwangs snyigs shes pa brgyad kyi rten// rgyu ba bzhi yis shes par bya// dngas ma
'dus pa'i thig le nyid// a la brten pa'i hU~M gis sdud// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// bde ba mngon shes chos nyid la// rim pas mthar phyin 'byung bar 'gyur// bcu drug sgra sbyor thig le
can// 'dab ma A li ldan pa yis// ma lus sgra skad bdag nyid can// khyab pa gsung gi bdag nyid can// sde tshan bcu dang ldan pa nyid// 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i lam yin te// thabs dang shes rab bskul ba
yis// bde ba 'byung 'gyur the tshom med// sum cu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor na// thig le de yi mnyam pa'i dbyings// ma lus 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cing// lus can kun la khyab par gnas// kun gyi dngos yin
kun gyi gtso// ma lus kun 'dus gnyis su med// spyi gtsug 'dus pa'i snying po nas// rkang mthil gsang ba'i gnas yan chad// sku gsung thugs kyi ka bas bzung// snod bcud rgyud rnams rang bzhin
bcud// dwangs snyigs 'dres pa thabs kyis 'byed// g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin// skad cig rim pa skye 'gyur ba// khams lnga 'dus pa'i ro yi stobs// sems lnga rim pas shes par 'gyur// 'di

nyid gsum du bshad pa ste// skabs kyi rim pas sbyar ba nyid// rtsa dang thig le bde ba yis// phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul du bshad// de nas rgyal rigs rje rigs dang// bram ze gdol pa gar mkhan ma// yid 'ong

na tshod dar la bab// nus dang chags pa che ba dang// bka' blo bde zhing yid mi 'khrug/ lus ran sha mdangs dkar dmar phyed// skad snyan dran pas yid 'phrog ma// bcwa brgyad bcu drug bcu bzhi dang// bcu

gnyis ldan pa'i bu mo la// sbyor ba tshang zhing rtags byung nas// tha mal spangs pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa ya bcu gsum gnyis ldan pa'i// gsang dbang 'dus pa'i khams lnga las// gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel

ltar// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// nyi ma zla ba rtse phrad pa'i// ma lus 'dus pa'i rtse 'khor lo// 'byung 'jug gnas pa rlung dang 'grogs// ldang bas tha mal shes pa 'gag/ g.yo bas nyams nyid rtse
gcig pa// smon pas yid gcig 'dres pa ste// 'jug pa dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHste// shes pa bde bar 'jug pa nyid// gnas pas yun ring gnas pa ste// mthar phyin 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis// brjod bral thig le'i

bstan pa mtshar// tha mal zhen pa nub gyur nas// zhen pa ldog cing rig pa thim// rnam shes brgyal ba la sogs 'byung// yid 'ong gzi ldan phyag rgya ma// mthong bas lus sems bde ba dang// phrad pas sdug
bsngal nyams par 'gyur// 'dris pas bde ba brtan po 'byung// thabs dang ldan pas spyad gyur na// bskal par sbyangs pas mi 'byongs pa'i// rnam rtog zhen pa log gyur nas// da lta bde ba chen por
smin// thob pa brtan 'dod rnal 'byor pas// mthong dang thos dang lhan cig gnas// 'khyud dang phrad dang spyad pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes skye// dbang dang mi ldan skal ngan dang//

dman pas mi rtogs yul min pas// gsang ba zhes ni bshad pa yin// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rim pa'i ting 'dzin mthar phyin nas// sku dang gsung dang thugs ldan pa'i// tshom bu gsum par ldan pa yi//

sum cu'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// gang du rgyas pa'i dbang gyur la// rig lnga ye shes lngar ldan cing// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// bdun cu'i rim pa bsgom par bya// mos chung gsang bar spyod 'dod pas//

tshom bu gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor te// bcu'am yang na bcwa brgyad pa'i// tshom bu tha ma bsgom par bya// 'dir ni dkyil 'khor kun 'dus pa'i// tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// gang du gdug pa 'dul ba yi// dkyil

'khor rim pa de bzhin te// rim pa bsgyur ba'i khro bo ni// rim pa ma 'dres tsam du bsgom// rnal 'byor yo byad tshogs pa yis// dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin spyod tshogs pa// ma lus tshogs pas tshogs zhes bya//

dang por dad dang brtson 'grus dang// dam tshig lta sogs sngon song zhing// rim bzhin ting 'dzin mthar phyin pas// nus pa yod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// skal ldan drod tshad mnyam pa'am// mi ldan 'phro 'dus
sbyangs pas 'grub// rab tu dben zhing yid 'ong ba// ri rtse gsang 'dab chu gling ngam// dur khrod ri bor nags 'dab ste// skye bo 'dus dang rnam bral zhing// bar chad bral ba'i sa phyogs der//

rnal 'byor rgyal po lta bu'i phyir// rin chen yid 'ong mdzes brgyan pa'i// 'khor khang phyi nang bar ldan pa// 'chag sar bcas par brtsam par bya// rnal 'byor pho mo grangs mnyam pa// lta spyod ting 'dzin dam tshig tshang//

bro gar 'du 'phro yo byad dang// glu tshig sgra yi yo byad dang// bza' dang btung ba'i yo byad dang// rgyan dang bgo ba'i yo byad dang// A li kA li mnyam sbyar zhing// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i ngo bor bzhugs//

lha dang mi dang yo byad dang// gnas dang spyod pa kun tshogs pas// de dag tshogs su bshad pa yin// thabs dang shes rab 'brel gyur nas// yab yum gsal ba'i ting 'dzin la// mtha' thug med pa'i rgyal ba rnams//

nam mkha'i char bzhin kun bkug la// yab yum gnyis med 'dres pa la// dbang bskur byin brlabs rgyan btags te// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang// bza' btung lha la lha rol zhing// 'od kyis ma lus tshim pa dang//
'gro mang bde ba thob par bya// bro lnga gar lnga stabs tshig lnga// bro gar rtse 'jo brjod pa yis// rigs kyi 'od zer 'phro 'dur gsal// 'gro ba'i phyi nang
mun bsal te// rig 'dzin sa nas sa ru sbyang// glu lnga tshig lnga rigs lnga yis// phyogs phyogs bltas te brjod pa ni// 'gro ba kun gyis bde thob cing// chos kyi dung chen sgra yang sgrogs// phyi nang

rgyan gyi yo byad ni// rin chen ze'u prog rna cha dang// lag gdub rkang gdub mgul do dang// na bza' rgyan gyis gang brgyan pas// yid 'ong ting 'dzin gsal ba dang// 'gro bas blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur// rlung
dang nus pa'i stobs ldan zhing// sgo gsum bag chags zad 'gyur te// byin brlabs rlung la dbang thob pas// A li kA li mnyam sbyar ba// bcu drug rdzogs pa'i dus sbyar bas// bdag po gdung can phrad pa'i

tshe// nyi zla dus gcig shar ba'i tshe// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// spyod yul nus pa kun bzlog nas// mthong lam rang gi mtshan nyid skye// zla ba'am zla phyed dus mtshams sogs// bde chen nyams myong rgyun

mi 'chad// mthong ba'i don la mnyam bzhag pas// brtan zhing nges pas gdeng du gyur// sku ni phyag rgya chen po ste// bde chen zag med ting nge 'dzin// bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang// bde ba chen po rgyun mi

'chad// sprul pa'i longs spyod mdzad pa yis// 'jig rten khams mang 'gro ba dag/ de tshe 'gro ba'i dbyings su sbyor// rdo rje lus thob de phyin cad// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung yin// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu

drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// ye shes thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ gang zag rim par 'jug pa
rnams// dang por dngos don mthong ba yis// tshe 'dis sa la bgrod bya zhing// bsam byas lhun grub nyid thob phyir// lta spyod ting 'dzin rim 'brel bas// bar chad med pa'i lam la 'bad// gnas skabs
rim pa ji snyed kyang// tha mal pa dang log spyod dang// mos pa la sogs yul min te// nus dang grub pa thob pa yis// gsang ba lam dang 'brel par bya// rnal 'byor chen po lnga la gnas// rim nas rim par

brtan gyur te// gsal ldan mi g.yo thob pa la// nyam nga med pa'i stobs ldan pas// pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin te// spyod pa so so gnas pa yis// rtsa ba spros bcas rnal 'byor te// bsgrub pa dus kyi tshogs la
gnas// yan lag tshogs kyi spyod par gsungs// gang phyir dkyil 'khor nges bstan pa// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa dkyil// ye shes bzhi 'phros 'khor lo'i tshul// 'jig rten 'das pa dkyil nyid

de// 'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor du bshad// rig pa'i don nyid dkyil nyid de// cho 'phrul rang 'byung 'khor du gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil nyid de// rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo dang// khro bo khro mo 'khor
du bshad// lha yi ting 'dzin dkyil nyid de// spyod pa yo byad 'khor du bshad// gang la gang gis rgyas btab pa// goms dang brtas pa'i dbang gis na// ji ltar snang grags chos thams cad// de

dang de yi ngo bor 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dkyil 'khor ma lus par bshad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dbang bskur cho ga

phun sum tshogs// thabs kyi sa la sbyor byed pa'i// rtog pa'i cho ga bshad par bya// rgyal ba kun gyi gsang chen po// ma lus pa yi rgya mtsho nyid// rgyal ba kun gyi spyi gzugs te// 'khor tshogs ye shes rgya mtsho

la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lhan cig tu// ye shes lha mo la brten nas// ye shes chen po'i dbang bskur bas// gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang chen 'gyur// ye shes rgya mtsho dbang phyug gis// dang po nas bzung
bcu pa'i bar// ting 'dzin 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rig pa'i lha mo la brten nas// ting 'dzin chu bos dbang bskur bas// sa dang ye shes zhing khams dang// rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i rim par
'phel// mthong lam rdo rje sku thob pas// nges 'byed nyams ldan rnal 'byor la// rig pa nyams kyi dkyil 'khor du// rig pa rtsal gyis gzungs brten nas// zag med rdo rje sku la sbyor// rig pa brtan thob

rnal 'byor pas// las dang skal ldan rnal 'byor pa// lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor du// rig ma'i phyag rgya mdzes ma la// dbang bskur byin brlabs brten byas nas// cho ga thabs kyi dbang bskur zhing// brgyud pa
dbang gi man ngag gis// sbyor ba nyams ldan rnal 'byor thob// ye shes rgya mtsho blo ldan zhing// thugs rje rgya mtshos 'gro ba skyob// dam tshig dbang dang rig pa'i drod// rim par brgyud pa'i
dbang thob cing// dgongs zab don la mkhas pa dang// rkyen thub sa bon gzi brjid che// las dang bya ba ma rmongs shing// ma yengs brtson 'grus bar chad med// ri dwags rgyal po seng ge ltar// gzi chen
gzhan gyis nyam nga med// byin brlabs 'dus pa'i nus pa can// tshig dang bden pa'i byin brlabs 'grub// de yis dbang bskur cho ga brtsam// dad dang dam tshig ldan pa dang// snying rje che la slob la
brtson// brtson 'grus shes rab phun sum tshogs// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// thos bsam bsgoms la rab gnas pa'i// 'gyur med brtan pa'i bsam pa yis// tha mal bsam pa spang byas te// bla ma la
ni de bzhin gshegs// 'dul dbang thabs mkhas bsam par bya// bla ma sangs rgyas des kyang ni// snying rjes nad pa bzhin bsam zhing// skyon dang mnar dang slu sems spang// rang rang nus pa ldan pa
dang// bdag gzhan don nus brtson 'grus ldan// brtul zhugs gsum dang rab ldan zhing// dngos grub don du gnyer ba yi// gsang chen rigs su nges pa dang// gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur

na// dbang dang man ngag sbyin par bya// ri bo'i phyogs sogs 'byor pa mod// ljon shing me tog rgyas pa'i tshul// tsan+dan dri bsung ldan pa'i ri// bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas// phyi dang nang dang gsang
ba yi// ri bo dgon pa yon tan gnas// ma lus 'dus pa'i dgon pa der// rnyed dang der ni gnas par bya// sa bcu mthar phyin gang zag la// zhing khams mtha' thug med gnas su// rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang chen

gyis// ye shes lha mo la brten te// skad cig ye shes dbang bskur bas// bcwa brgyad yon tan lhun grub pa// skad cig nyid la lhun rdzogs te// pad+ma spyan gyi sa la gnas// yi ge 'khor lo sa la smin// bdag
gzhan 'byed pa med pa yi// bde chen phyogs ris med par dgongs// 'phel 'grib med pa'i rang bzhin pas// gzhan don yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// sa thob goms brtan skyes bu la// ting 'dzin rig pa'i

pho brang du// rgyal tshab skyes bu mtha' bdag gis// rig pa'i lha mo na so med// rigs bral ting 'dzin stobs las grub// de la slong mas nges brten nas// ji ltar chu la ji bzhin du// ting 'dzin byin brlabs
dbang bskur bas// rnam pa dang bral dbang rnams ni// nyams myong dbang du rang shar te// thob dang brtan dang goms pa yis// 'jig rten brgya dang stong phrag bcu// 'bum sogs bdag gzhan don rdzogs
te// skad cig nyid la rag lus pas// rgyal tshab chos kyi rgyal por bshad// lam zhugs rigs phyed rtags thob la// slob dpon mthar nye lam gnas pas// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs par// rdo rje thig

tshad sbyor brjod pa'i// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gsal ldang ba// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsungs// sna tshogs rig pas dbang sgyur ba'i// sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor du// stobs ldan bu mo la
brten te// thabs dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas// rdo rje tshe la dbang thob cing// cho 'phrul mngon shes ldan par 'gyur// dang po yon tan kun ldan pa'i// rigs su nges pa'i bu mchog ste// dad brtson
brtul zhugs ldan pa yi// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i rigs can la// drod ldan gnang zhing dbang thob pa// rgyal po lta bu bla ma yis// lhag pa gzugs brnyan byin ldan du// dad mos brtson 'grus 'jug pa'i

sems// mi ldog dang brtan tshul gyis bzhugs// dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang// gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang// go cha phyag rgya rgyal mtshan dang// snying po lnga yis dbang bskur ba// rang bzhin ngo
bos gnas tshul la// rdzas thabs ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas// nus pa'i byin brlabs mngon shar nas// theg chen rdo rje rigs su 'gyur// de nas skal ldan slob ma de// tha mal 'du shes kun

bzlog ste// rang rang lhar byas gsal ba la// nus pa'i tshad dang nyams sbyar nas// nyan pa'i dbang dang bsgom pa dang// 'chad dang phrin las byed pa dang// rdo rje rgyal po slob dpon dbang// rang bzhin ngo
bos gnas pa la// ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang// thabs dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas// mi nus nus pa thob pa'i tshad// mi nus pa la bskur ba min// tshad ldan rnams la rim pas bskur// rig ma las kyi

phyag rgya mo// bcu drug bcwa brgyad ldan pa yi// dri zhim yon tan ldan pa la// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rgyal ba kun gyi bcud 'dus pa'i// rdo rje pad+ma'i rtsa 'khor lo// ye shes lnga yi ro ldan
pa// thabs dang shes rab snod kyi mchog/ thabs gsum tshul gyis rtser bstims pas// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kun// yungs kar tshad tsam rdo rje sems// rtse nas rtse ru thim pa las// gnas ngan len

pa gsum sbyangs te// rtsa bcud thig le'i ngo bo nyid// mar me 'od ltar gsal gyur pas// bde chen nyams dang rtags thob pa// da lta nyid 'byung the tshom med// rdo rje nyi ma rab ldan pa'i// bcu bzhi bcu drug rab

lon pa// phyi nang gsang ba'i yon tan nyid// byin brlabs rig ma lha mor byas// chags pa bskyed pa'i thabs rnams nyid// blo dang ldan pas mngon sum bya// de nas cho ga kun rdzogs nas// bla mas gnyis med
gtad bya'i phyir// byin brlabs sbyor ba byas nas yang// gnyis ka'i srin lag bzung nas ni// slob ma 'di la legs gtad la// gsang ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya// skyes bu 'di bzung bzang ba yin// di ring

phan chad bu mchog khyod// sgo gsum lha ru mnyam sbyor bas// tha mal dman pa'i lta ba spongs// bde ba chen po nyams myong bas// dka' thub theg pa'i lta ba spongs// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// bde
ba'i nyams myong brtan par byos// brtan pa bar chad med bsgoms pas// rdo rje 'chang gi sa la 'gro// de bas skal ldan rigs bzang kye// gtan du 'bral bar ma byed cig/ sbyor ba'i thabs dang ting 'dzin

dang// rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob pas// thig le'i las la thogs pa med// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le nyid// sa yang bcu gsum gnyis ldan pa// nyams myong brten cing

gnyis med sbyar// rlung gis brten pa'i thig le nyid// ro gcig dus mnyam tshul byung ba// drag pa ma yin dal ba min// dgongs pa nyams dang zhen chags min// A li kA li zhu ba'i sems// sangs rgyas phreng

ba gnyis su med// rdo rje pad+ma rab bskyod cing// 'khyud pa gar gyi phyag rgya las// nyi zla rtse phrad 'byor pa na// byed pa rlung gi thig le bzung// rgyu ba bcad cing thig le mnan// shes pa nam mkha'i

ngang la gtad// dbang po shes rab che chung gis// lan gsum brtan par gyur pa'am// ma thob bar du sbyin par bya// rdo rje zla 'od mdzes ldan ma// dman dang rigs ngan rnam par spangs// rdo rje dbang pos ma

phog cing// gzhan dbang longs spyod ma byas pa// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bco lnga'am rung// thabs dang zas dang spyod lam gyis// bsnyen pa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// rdo rje lce dang srin lag dang// srin lag

bcos ma la sogs pa// thabs dang byug pa'i yan lag gis// gsang ba'i pho brang rgyas par bya// 'khor ba zil gnon rtsa rnyed nas// bdag po gdung can rnam par sbyar// thig le myur bul rtags byung nas// rgyu

ba rlung gi tshad du zung// nyi zla dus gcig shar ba la// 'khor ba zil gnon thabs chen po// myong bar chu rgyun ting 'dzin thob// gal te rtsa dang bral ba na// phaT dang ldan na 'phro bar 'gyur// dngas rlung mnyam
pas zin par 'gyur// bzlog pa 'dren pa'i hU~M gis shes// sdud pa'i hU~M gis bsdams gnas pa// thig les lus la khyab par byed// dang por sa bon 'jog pa ste// gnyis pas nus pa bskyed pa yin// gsum

pas nyams myong bskyed pa yin// bzhi pas de nyid brtan par byed// lnga pas brtan pas nyams blangs pas// mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dis 'grub// rdo rje slob dpon gnang thob pa// nus ldan rab gnas cho ga
brtsam// de nas slob ma tshul bzhin gzhug/ sgo gsum mnyes pa kun bral ba'i// sdom pa'i dam tshig phog byas la// dbang bskur rim pa sbyin par bya// dbang gi nyams myong brtan bya'i phyir// gdams ngag

rjes mthun sbyin par bya// gdams ngag nyams brtan lam rim ste// lam mthar phyin pa 'bras bu nyid// drod mthar phyin dang sa brgyad dang// grags chen sangs rgyas sa dag la// rang rig rtags dang thugs rje
yis// 'dren stobs mkha' 'gro gsum du snang// mkha' dang sgra dang gzugs can gyi// pad+ma can zhes grags pa yi// sbyor dang glu dbyangs snang ba dang// gzugs tsam brtan pas grol bar 'gyur// dbang

bskur rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// ma bcos rdo rje dbyings dkyil 'khor// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yan lag ste// bsgrub dang gdug pa gdul phyir yin// dang la rtsa ba'i dbang thob nas// phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor

dbang thob bya// gdul bya mos pa'i dbang brtsan la// thun mong tsam du nges pa med// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin// bzhi pa dang ni lnga pa nyid// he ru ka yi dkyil
'khor ro// dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs pa'i// ma nor lam ston slob dpon la// mnyes dang bkur bar mi byed cing// rang rang nus shing 'jug pa la// dbang bskur gnang ba ma byin
par// gsang ba bshad dang nyan pa dang// sgom dang bsgrub pa la sogs pas// bskal pa bye ba dpag med du// 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur gyi// dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur// de ni dam pa kun brnyas
pas// nad dang sdug bsngal mang po dang// mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyis 'tshe// de nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// byin brlabs ldan pa'i bla ma yis// dad brtson brtul bzhugs rab ldan pa'i// rigs nges
skyes bu mchog nyid la// thabs kyis dbang bskur byin brlabs na// rgyal ba dang ni mkha' 'gro dang// rig 'dzin grub pa pho mo yis// tshe 'dir bsam pa kun skongs shing// byin brlabs dbang dang dngos
grub kyi// phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gang gis gang la dbang bskur bas// tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang// bde chen lam la mngon zhugs pas// dngos grub gang la thogs med de// las rnams

gang brtsams 'grub pa dang// 'dod pa'i don la rol ba yis// sa bcu rim pa mthar phyin nas// pad+ma spyan gyi sa thob ste// yi ge 'khor lo sa la gnas// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun

grub pa// dbang gi 'bras bu rang las shar// thabs chen 'di dang gang bral na// bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du// brtson pas 'bras bu tshol byed pa// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu stongs par 'gyur// gang phyir slob
dpon slob ma dang// dkyil 'khor rim pa ji bzhin du// las dang ting 'dzin byin brlabs kyis// 'jug pa'i cho ga gsum du bshad// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen

po// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i lam chen po// ma lus cho ga rgya chen po// dpal ldan rdo rje me long gi// 'jug pa'i rim pa ji bzhin du// gsang ba kun la shes par bya// rdo rje bla ma de nyid kyis// cha shas gus ldan mdzes
pa yis// me tog ldan pas 'khor lo nyid// mngon byas sku gsung bskul ba yis// dam tshig dran te dgongs par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du// gsal dang rig pa'i stobs kyis ni// rdo rje slob
ma byin brlab phyir// slob dpon dag kyang 'jug par bya// de nas slob ma 'jug bya ste// khrus byas dri zhim gos bzang gyon// dad dang gus ldan rin chen bcas// gus bcas snyan pa'i tshig gis ni// lus

dbul dag pa'i sems kyis gnas// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sbyor ba yis// bar chad sbyor bsal bsrung ba bya// cho ga gang yin lhar bskyed la// mtshan ma rdzogs par nan tan bya// rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig lnga//
'bru gsum sku gsung thugs ldan sbyin// snying gar rdo rje brtan byas la// dam tshig legs par dbog par bya// tsan+dan dkar dmar byin brlabs chu// lan gsum blud la snod dor ro// de nas

rang gis dam bsgrags te// gsang ba'i don la nges par bya// rang rang 'brel ba'i lha nyid la// rin chen dor te brtag par bya// sngags dang phyag rgyas de bkug la// bstim la dbyer med gnas pa la// rtag tu
byin brlabs gnas pa'i phyir// legs par brtan pa'i cho ga bya// mi shes rab rib bsal byas la// 'khor lo mngon pa'i nga rgyal bya// de nas lha dang dkyil 'khor gyi// dag pa rim gyis bstan par bya// de
nas bla ma sangs rgyas la// ma lus ci yod dbul bar bya// byin brlabs cho ga dag pa yi// dkyil 'khor mchod dang bsgoms pa dang// zhugs pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du
'gyur// des na rigs su nges pa yis// dang por 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan// rtsa ba yan lag kun thob nas// rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro// de nas bla ma'i bka' mnos la// 'dod pa'i dngos

grub bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dbang bskur ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje dam tshig bla na
med// sdom pa brtan po dam bcas pa// 'di dag legs par bshad par bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'das dang ma byon dus gsum du// rgyal khrims tha tshig bkas bcad ltar// rim pas
dmod bor bkas bcas pa'i// byin brlas rang bzhin 'da' dka' ba// kun gyis bsrung bya yin par bshad// gang phyir dam pas byin brlabs pa'i// dam tshig chen po 'di nyid la// 'das dang da ltar ma byon

pa'i// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa dang// rig 'dzin rnams dang mkha' 'gro dang// lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang// klu dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i lha chen kyang// dam pa 'das pas
'tshig par 'gyur// dam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di// rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa la// sgra bzhin spyod pa'i gang zag rnams// log par spyad pas tshig par 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyi bkas bcad cing// byin
brlabs dmod bor rang bzhin grub// dam pa 'di las gang 'da' ba// rdo rje can yang tshig par 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la// dbang dang byin brlabs thob pa yis// dam pa'i tshul bzhin nges spyad
na// mi mthun phyogs rnams 'tshig par 'gyur// de phyir dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// dam tshig ces ni rnam par bsgrags// bla na med pa'i dam tshig ni// ma lus rang rig byang chub sems// mtha' dbus
'gro 'ong las grol ba// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid de// gang gis don rtogs gnas gyur pa// don dam byang chub sems su brjod// ma skyes byang chub sems nyid ni// skye ba'i rang bzhin nyid

snang ba// rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ste// ma lus der snang ngo bo gcig/ rang ltar sgo gsum gsal rtogs pa// kun rdzob byang chub sems su bshad// gsang ba bshad dang dbang bskur dang// man ngag lung

dang nyams chags skong// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// dngos grub ster zhing grol byed pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa'i phyir// skad cig gdung ba mnyam mi bya// rang gi lha dang gnyis med nas// phyag
rgya bzhir gsal rnal 'byor pas// rang gi sgo gsum ma nyams par// chu bo lta bu bar chad med// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni// theg chen gsang ba nyid yin pas// snod med dman sogs log pa

la// gsang bcu la sogs brjod mi bya// dang por gsang bar srog gcig pas// byang chub snying por mi 'bral bas// rang srog rang gis gcod kyang sla// brtse gdung dam tshig bral mi bya// lam dang bsgrub pa'i

rtsa ba dang// dngos grub kun gyi rtsa ba dang// 'di dag nyams na kun nyams pas// rtsa ba zhes su bstan pa yin// yan lag thun mong dam tshig dang// thun mong min par bshad par bya// dang por gsang ba'i
lung thob nas// nus pa mngon du snang bar du// bdag dang gzhan phyir thun mong gi/ 'gal dang sgro skur kun 'das shing// kun dang bsam pa dga' byed pa// thun mong dam las mi 'gal ba// thun mong dam

tshig yin par bshad// thun mong ma yin gang zag gis// thabs chen thun mong ma yin pa// nyon mongs lnga dang spyod pa lnga// bdud rtsi lnga dang shes pa lnga// grub pa lnga yi chos rnams nyid// skyes bu rigs phyed spyod
yul te// thun mong rnal 'byor yul min pas// thun mong ma yin zhes su bshad// dang po nas bzung rtags thob par// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi// lus sems ma yengs rtse gcig pas// rnam pa dang bcas
dang du blang// sa thob goms dang mthar phyin par// ting 'dzin don la gnas pa'i tshe// 'gal ba'i sgo gsum mi 'byung bas// ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig la// rnam pa'i dam tshig ma lus 'dus// don las

langs tshe snying rje dang// rtsa ba yan lag shugs ldan yin// sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa na// 'da' ba med pa'i dam tshig ste// rgya mtsho rlan bzhin thob spangs med// bsrung med ye shes dam tshig ste// dam tshig

'di ni rmad po che// bsnyen pa rtags dang ldan par du// spyi yi dam tshig bsrung bya zhing// bsgrub pa gang yin 'grub pa na// khyad par rang rang rtog pa yi// dam tshig med par 'grub mi 'gyur// gang zag gang la
dga' ba la// dam tshig dka' thub sgo nas ni// gsang ba'i don la dgod bya'i phyir// dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas bstan// dang po las can rnal 'byor la// rtsa ba thun mong dam tshig
bstan// brtan nas nyams ldan gang zag la// thun mong min pa'i dam tshig bstan// rtogs pa'i 'jigs med gang zag la// 'da' nyams med pa'i dam tshig bstan// sa thob goms mthar phyin pa la// ting
'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig bstan// dngos grub rtogs pa kun dang 'brel// dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa 'di// thob nas dam par gang

bsrungs pa// yon tan chung yang 'grub par bshad// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// dngos grub rtog pa ma lus pa// cho ga gang dang ting 'dzin gang// bsgrub pa gang dang gang yang rung// ma nyams tshul du

rab brtson pas// myur du 'grub pa nyid du 'gyur// gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na// rdo rje 'chang nyid brlag par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan nyid// dam tshig rdo rje las byung bas// dam pa 'di la gang
brten pas// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs dang yan lag gi// bsrung bya dka' thub dam pa 'di// kun gyis 'da' ba ma yin zhing// gnas pa dam pa
nyid yin te// las dang skal ba dman pa dang// rigs dman le lo che ba dang// rang bzhin ngan pa'i gang zag gis// blun po gang zhig 'da' byed cing// dngos grub gnyis la rgyab phyogs nas// dam pa rnams
la dmod byed pa// sangs rgyas kun la nyes byas pas// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas ni// bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par mdzad// mkha' 'gro ma dang rig 'dzin dang// kha 'bar gtum 'khrug rngam pa'i

tshogs// de ma thag tu srog bcad nas// dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur// gal te 'jig par gyur na ni// 'jig rten gzhan du skye 'gyur zhing// ji srid nam mkha' 'jig pa'am// phyi yi rgya mtsho zad pa'i

tshe// thar te gzhan du nam yang min// dam pa'i bla ma spong ba dang// rdo rje mched la 'khu ba dang// byang chub sems nyid mi dran zhing// sngags dang phyag rgya yal ba dang// snod min gsang ba bshad pa

dang// gsang ba'i don la skur ba ni// 'dir yang sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing// skad cig 'gags pas de ma thag/ bar ma'i lus dang bral gyur pa'i// rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// gang du rtsa ba yan lag

bcas// bsrung dang dbog par bya ba'i chos// thun mong dbang dang 'brel bcas pa'i// thun mong spyi yi yul gyur pa// de ni thun mong bsrung bya ste// 'di ni phyi yi dam tshig go/ thabs dang shes rab sbyar ba'i
sems// thig le'i sems lnga'i lam gyi rim// rig pa ma lus gsal ba'i tshe// thig le gnyis med nyams su byung// bde ba'i thig le'i bcud bsgyur bas// tshogs drug rang snang thig le'i
grogs// ma lus thig les byin brlabs pas// thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal// thig le rig pa khar dbyung min// 'khor lo kha sbyor bde ba yis// tha mal bde bar dbang por bsgyur// rgyal ba'i

dgongs spyod thabs kyis myong// tha mal zhen pa rnam par bzlog/ thabs ldan don la gsang ba'i don// rang snying 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lnga// 'char dang nub pa'i rim pa yis// thabs chen gsang ba'i thig le

ltar// shes nas spang du med par gnas// rang 'byung gnas pa'i bcud lnga ni// rang lus rten gyi don snang ba// khyab par rgyu ba'i tshul dag gis// dwangs snyigs gnyis kyi tshul du gnas// rang lus rtog pa

dwangs snyigs dang// kha dog yan lag nying lag gis// bde ba'i ye shes lngar shes dang// bde ba chen po nyid du gsungs// khams lnga bcud las skyes pa yi// ma lus thig le'i rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga yi ro

ldan pas// rgyal ba lnga ru yang dag gsungs// thabs dang shes rab rdo rje dril// nyi zla'i rim pa'i 'od gsal ba// sems lngas mkha' la gsal ba'i tshe// rten can rten dang gnyis med pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i
ye shes snang// ma zin rdo rje lce yis blang// gnyis kyi rtog pa ma lus pa// bde chen ro gcig byin gyis brlabs// skad cig bral med bde ba'i sems// dus gsum mi 'bral brtan par gnas// rlung
dang thig le'i bzlas pa yis// thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal// bde chen thabs dang nyams kyis te// brjod dang tshig gis phebs pa min// gnyis sbyor phrad pa'i bde ba yis// tha mal zad dang bde

chen sbyor// gang gis sbyin par mi nus pa// da ltar nus pa rang gis myong// gzhan gyi brdzun pa'i don 'di ni// thabs kyis bden par mngon du bstan// tha mal zhen pa spang ba'i phyir// kha na ma tho bag tsha
bral// skyes dang nus dang gnas pa'i tshe// rang bzhin lnga ni shugs kyis grub// rang gi rtsa bcud so so las// bdud rtsi bral ba med par gnas// 'byung lnga dbang po gzugs sogs bcas// thabs ldan sbyor

ba'i byin brlabs kyis// bde chen lhan cig skyes par shes// nyi zla rlung gis zin pa yi// mtshan ma bral ba ngo bo las// zhen pa med pa'i thabs chen pos// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin las// ye shes lnga yi

ros gang bas// ma lus rgyal ba lnga ru grub// 'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi// rang bzhin dam tshig chen po yin// dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas pa// shin tu bsdus pa rnam pa gnyis// 'bring du rtsa ba lnga nyid
dang// yan lag bcu ru shes par bya// shin tu rgyas pa'i dam tshig ni// spyir ni sum brgya drug cu ste// rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid dang// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba dang// dus bzhi rgyal
mchog nyid dang ni// bsgrub med mnyam par rdzogs pa nyid// lhun grub bde gnas dam tshig dang// rnam dag byang chub gzung 'dzin bral// rtogs nas don 'dzin dam tshig dang// sems la gnas bcas dam
tshig dang// ye nas ma bcos dam tshig dang// 'dus byas rnam dag dam tshig dang// chos rnams dbyer med dam tshig dang// thams cad 'jigs med dam tshig dang// g.yung drung tshe 'phel dam tshig

dang// thams cad bsrung du med pa ste// 'di dag lta ba'i dam tshig yin// thams cad sbyor ba'i dam tshig dang// ma lus bsgral ba'i dam tshig dang// ma byin len pa'i dam tshig dang// brdzun du smra ba'i dam

tshig dang// thams cad spyod pa'i dam tshig dang// dam rdzas spyod pa'i dam tshig ste// 'di dag spyod pa'i dam tshig yin// bsgrub pa'i dam tshig rnam gsum ni// rdo rje skye gnas dam tshig dang// 'dren byed gnas

stobs dam tshig dang// lam la ston byed dam tshig dang// rab tu rtogs byed dam tshig dang// sgyur byed byang chub dam tshig dang// thams cad dbang sgyur dam tshig dang// rig 'dzin gnas stobs dam tshig

ste// bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i dam tshig yin// yum gyur dbyings phyug dam tshig dang// thabs nyid shes rab sbyor dam tshig/ shes rab thabs su sbyor de bzhin// glang po brjid gnon dam tshig dang// thams cad

mi chud dam tshig dang// thams cad bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang// ting 'dzin phyag rgya'i dam tshig ste// bsgrub pa thabs kyi dam tshig yin// tshogs kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig dang// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig

dang// tshogs kyi phrin las dam tshig dang// phra men tshim byed dam tshig ste// bsgrub pa'i phrin las dam tshig yin// yang dag don ston dam tshig dang// gsung mchog mtha' yas dam tshig dang// thams cad skad
mjal dam tshig dang// yi ge med mjal dam tshig dang// stong gsum kun grags dam tshig dang// ye shes gsung mchog dam tshig dang// bsam yas rdo rje gsung dam tshig/ mi 'gyur rdo rje'i dam tshig

ste// bdag gis shes bya'i dam tshig yin// shes bya ting 'dzin dam tshig bzhi// nam mkha' snang byed dam tshig dang// rten byed sa yi dam tshig dang// sreg byed me yi dam tshig dang// 'khrug byed chu yi dam tshig

dang// g.yengs byed chen po'i dam tshig ste// shes rab lnga yi dam tshig dang// phung po lnga yi dam tshig ni// thabs mchog lnga yi dam tshig yin// chos rnams gzugs brnyan dam tshig dang// sgra ltar shes pa'i dam
tshig dang// dri ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang// ro ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang// reg ltar shes pa'i dam tshig ni// gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yin// kha dog lnga yi dam tshig dang// phyogs lnga yi

ni dam tshig dang// dbang lnga yi ni dam tshig ste// gsum po spyir khyab dam tshig yin// bde ba'i ngang nyid dam tshig dang// lhun grub ye shes dam tshig dang// mi 'jigs rgyal mchog dam tshig dang// mnyam

rdzogs lhun grub dam tshig dang// phyogs dus dbyer med dam tshig dang// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang// chos la skyon med dam tshig dang// brjod med spros med dam tshig dang// phyogs dus gnyis med

dam tshig dang// gnyis med byang chub sems dam tshig/ 'dus ma byas pa'i dam tshig dang// thams cad rgyas 'debs dam tshig dang// thams cad mi 'gog dam tshig ste// ngo bo ting 'dzin dam tshig yin// grub

par bya ba lnga bstan pa// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig dang// rin chen 'byung ba'i dam tshig dang// pad+ma chags med dam tshig dang// don rnams grub pa'i dam tshig dang// 'jigs byed rdo rje dam tshig dang// de
bzhin sku nyid dam tshig dang// thams cad 'byor ldan dam tshig ste// sku yi dam tshig bdun du bshad// yang dag don ston la sogs pa// gsung gi dam tshig brgyad po nyid// rang la rdzogs par shes bya

ste// 'bras bu'i bsrung bas bsgrub bya yin// rang rig dbang sgyur dam tshig dang// che mchog rnam dag dam tshig dang// rang bzhin 'od gsal dam tshig dang// byang chub sdom byed dam tshig dang// thams cad

dbang sgyur dam tshig drug/ thugs kyi dam tshig nyid du bshad// byang chub zhing bkod dam tshig dang// ye shes bzhugs gnas dam tshig dang// gzhal yas khang bstan dam tshig dang// sna tshogs kun sgyur dam
tshig dang// zad med gter ldan dam tshig dang// bsgrub pa zad med dam tshig dang// zad med gter chen dam tshig ni// yon tan dam tshig bdun du bshad// thams cad byin rlob dam tshig dang// bdud sde
tshar gcod dam tshig dang// sems can don byed dam tshig ni// phrin las dam tshig gsum du bshad// spong ba rdo rje dam tshig dang// chags pa'i ye shes dam tshig dang// gti mug chen po'i dam tshig

dang// phrag dog chen po'i dam tshig dang// nga rgyal bde mchog dam tshig dang// nyon mongs lnga yi dam tshig ste// mi spong ba yi dam tshig yin// gtan du ma yengs bsrung ba ni// mnyam pa lnga yi dam tshig
dang// bden pa dbyer med dam tshig dang// sku gsung thugs sbyor dam tshig dang// lam lnga rdzogs pa'i dam tshig dang// thams cad bde sbyor dam tshig dang// rdo rje log 'joms dam tshig dang// 'khor ba
zil gnon dam tshig dang// ma bcos lhun grub dam tshig dang// thig le bde sbyor dam tshig ni// lta ba rgyun bsrung dam tshig yin// ting 'dzin rgyun bsgom dam tshig dang// bcing ba phyag rgya'i dam

tshig dang// bzlas pa sgra snyan dam tshig dang// sgo gsum mnyam pa'i dam tshig dang// shes rab bde sbyor dam tshig ni// ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig yin// tha snyad zil gnon dam tshig dang// spyod lam bde
'byor dam tshig dang// rig pa thod rgal dam tshig dang// ma bcos gnas dag dam tshig dang// rang 'byung gnas bral dam tshig ste// cig car gnas pa'i bsrung thabs yin// thams cad skyed byed dam tshig

dang// rgyud drug sbyor byed dam tshig dang// rtogs pas tshim byed dam tshig dang// khyab pa nam mkha'i dam tshig dang// gzhan don shugs grub dam tshig ni// dam tshig che ba bstan pa yin// dmyal chen dmyal ba

phal pa dang// yi dgas byol song srin po dang// gnod sbyin mnga' srin kha 'bar lce// lha dang lha min ru dra dang// rtsangs pa la sogs 'khor ba ste// chad pa'i skye gnas bstan pa yin// bsrung ba'i dam tshig
chen po yin// gal te stong pa'i don rtogs na// bskang dang nyams pa'i tshul med de// chad pa'i yul las 'das pa yin// gang zag 'ga' zhig spyod yul yin// gal te rtsa ba'i dam nyams na// bla ma grogs po

brgya dag la// bshags pa stong phrag brgya ru bya// bzlas pa bye ba phrag bdun bya// gtor ma 'bum phrag bdun du bya// sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bcu gcig bya// de nas slar yang blang ba'am// bla mas gnang nas
gnas par bya// gal te yul de mi gnas sam// lo gsum phan chad 'das pa 'am// gal te bshags pa'i tshul mthong bas// ma dad 'dod pa'i sems skyes nas// bskang ba'i tshad las 'das pa ste// bskal
pa chen po brgyad khri'i bar// bshags kyang dag par mi 'gyur te// rdo rje dmyal ba zhes bya bar// mi bzad sdug bsngal myong nas ni// ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa'i bar// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bzhin du

'khor// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// zla ba bdun du smra bcad bya// sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad du bya// bzlas pa bye ba tshad 'bum gcig/ gtor ma khri phrag gcig tu btang// de nas slar yang blang ba
dang// dag dang tshangs par bsgrags par bya// dag pa'i snod dang mi ldan par// gsang ba ston cing 'chad pa dang// dbang ma thob par bka' 'gom dang// bder gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang// tshad

dang ldan pa'i snod min la// gsang ba tshad du sgrogs pa dang// gsang ba nyams su mi len par// 'phyar bas kun la spel ba ni// tshad las 'das pa'i gang zag ste// sangs rgyas kun la brnyas byed pas// dus
gsum sangs rgyas khros pa yis// bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par mdzad// bla ma dang ni grogs rnams dang// pha ma gnyen bshes rgyal blon dang// rgyal 'bangs nyes med sdang ba ni// dam tshig
nyams pa'i rtags su bshad// zab mo dag la gegs 'byung dang// bsgrubs pas 'dod pa mi 'byung zhing// bsrung ba'i lha rnams g.yel ba dang// ma nyes ya kha 'byung ba dgadam tshig nyams pa'i rtags su
bshad// dang por bla ma'i lung thob nas// rang gis nyams pa ma tshor zhing// bde legs bsam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing// bdag gzhan bsam pa'i khyad par dag/ sngon du yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// 'grub cing
bsngags pas thob pa ni// ma nyams don dang ldan pa'i rtags// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po yin// gal te ma nyams rtags byung na// bskang gso'i cho ga myur du brtsam// gal te nyams la rtags med

cing// legs par snang na mi rung ste// bdag gi sa bon tshig pa ste// bde ba zad byas gtan du sdug/ ma nyams rtags byung myur bskangs na// sngon gyi bag chags zad par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul

dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dam tshig ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji snyed pa'i// rtog pa'i cho
ga mdor bsdus bshad// rgyud kyi rgyal po ma lus las// thun mong dag la mos zhugs pas// thun mong yo byad ting 'dzin dang// sngags dang phyag rgya 'bral goms pas// rtags dang nus pa mthar phyin
pas// gang ltar dmigs pa 'grub 'gyur te// zag bcas thun mong dngos grub yin// de las gzhan pa bshad par bya// gang du mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// dbang dang dam tshig ting 'dzin dag/ phyi nang gsang
ba'i rim thob na// mi ldog brtan pa'i rnal 'byor thob// mthong nas sgom lam ma nges rigs// ting 'dzin gang sgom bar chad med// tshe 'dis dbang bsgyur 'jigs bral te// de nas sku lnga'i bdag
nyid thob// mchog ldan mchog gis mchog thob pas// mchog gi dngos grub thun mong min// dad dang dam tshig shes rab dang// brtson 'grus brtul zhugs bzod pa thob// brtan cing snying brtse dbang rdzogs

shing// bsgrub dang lam gyi sbyor ba shes// yid thub mi ldog brtan pa can// nyams thob dang du len pa ni// gcig dang lnga gsum gang zag gis// ri bo ri sul gsang bar dang// chu gling ngam grog brag rdzong
dang// dur khrod ri phug chu mdo dang// yid 'ong bkra shis nyams dga' bar// cho ga byin brlabs rdzogs pa nyid// las kyi cho ga gang yin pa// bdag gam gzhan gyis byas pa ni// bdag dbang bkra shis phun
sum tshogs// dam tshig dbang dang lta ba dag/ sngon du bya ba rdzogs pa yis// sngon du rnal 'byor gsum thob bam// dang po yid brtan gang yin kyang// gang la yid kyis dmigs pa de// cho ga ting

'dzin 'brel pa nyid// rang rang rtog pa ji bzhin du// tha mal ba dang le lo dang// the tshom dad pa'i stobs kyis te// gal te de dag mi ldan na// sa thob kyis kyang ma yin na// gang zag skye bos smos ci
dgos// gal te dgug pa'i las bya na// bdag nyid dbang drag khro bo ste// dmar thag dud ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// gong ltar gnas pa'i 'phro 'du ni// zhags pa lcags kyu sha stag ste// dmigs pa brtan cing

rtags thob nas// mngon du gyur gyi bar du ni// rang sngags brjod pa de yi mthar// che ge mo zhig dzaHhU~M zhes// dgra dang bgegs dang lha dang gzungs// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ldan yang rung// tha mal dbang med
bzhin du dgug/ gal te de yi dgos pa dag/ myur du grub par ma gyur na// de dag legs par grub kyi bar// gang yin mkhas pas bcing bar bya// ngag dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// 'grub par 'gyur
bar gdon mi za// bdag nyid dbang drag gsal ba yi// lce la dbang gi 'khor lo bsam// yi ge gsum ldan dgu bkod nas// 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams bkang zhing// pad+ma rA ga zhu 'dra bas// gang thim
dag gi dbang gyur zhing// bden pa bdar zhing ngag gis bcing// yang na gang la gang chags pa'i// rdzas la ring du 'dod pa ltar// 'dod pa grub na dam bcas shing// yid 'ong 'dul ba'i ting 'dzin
gyis// dga' ba'i thabs kyis bsten byas na// gal te 'gro zhing 'phro 'dod na// dbang drag phyag rgyas bsdigs bcing gzir// dga' ba'i thabs kyis yid 'phrog nas// rol mo sgyu mkhan dag de yis// 'dus

pa'i gang zag chags pa can// bya ba thabs kyis bral ba ltar// bral ba med par gnas par 'gyur// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i nus pa yis// gang yang rung ba'i sems can de// sna tshogs khro bo khro mo yis// 'od
dang phyag rgya 'bar ba yis// bcings nas mdun du gnas par blta// dga' dang bsdigs pa rdzas kyi mtha'// ting 'dzin brtan pas nges par 'grub// med las dngos por nges grub cing// mi mthun brgyad
sogs nges 'grub na// yod dang snang ba'i 'gro ba dag/ dbang pos bsgyur ba smos ci dgos// gal te gso ba'i las byas na// las ni gnyis te brtsams pas 'grub// bdag nyid rtag par skyes nas
ni// dbang bskur byin brlabs kun bstims nas// mdun du shel gyi bum pa ru// thugs las chu yi lha mo bskyed// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba der gyur nas// bum par lha mo 'od du zhu// nad dang sdug bsngal byang

bar bsam// dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang// sman dang rin chen spos dang 'bru// bdud rtsi snying po cha rkyen la// mA ma kI yi sngags kyis gdab// o~M mA ma kI sarba pa ba du ru du ru swA hA// nad dang sdug
