bsngal ldan pa'i lus// bkrus pas 'tsho bar the tshom med// bdag nyid brtul zhugs bde ldan pas// sngon du bya ba sngon song bas// dgon pa bas mtha' rab dben par// ma smas ma rul tshad ldan pa'i// dur
khrod zhing chen mtshan ldan la// khrus dang byug bdug kun byas nas// pho mo la sogs yin pa yi// las de nges par 'grub par 'gyur// de dag maN+Dal gtsang ma yi// dbus su legs par bzhag nas

ni// bdag nyid khro bo gang yang rung// gsal bas tshangs pa brgya byin rung// rang sngags srog snying dza yis dgug/ phyag rgya bzhi yis dbab par bya// gal te 'dar dang rgod pa dang// ngu dang 'jigs pa'i sgra

byung na// dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya// dam chu byin la mnas bsgags te// gang 'dod las la mngag par bya// gal te 'jig rten the tshom zos// de yis zos dang brgyal ba dang// 'phral du bdag nyid 'chi
bar 'gyur// gang zhig ting 'dzin brtan pa yis// bar chad med par bsgrubs pa'i tshe// mdangs ldan yid 'ong dang po ste// dri zhim 'od chags gnyis pa yin// dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs gsum pa yin// bkrag

dang gzi mdangs nyams sod yin// zhing chen kha nas hri byung na// ting 'dzin rdo rje so yis bcad// ro langs brdabs na gser du 'gyur// lce yi ral gris de bcad na// cis kyang mi tshugs go mtshon te// lha
min g.yul yang pham byed na// dpa' bo stobs ldan smos ci dgos// de yi dbang po lnga dag la// mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub yod// rang gi rtog pa ji bzhin du// mkhas pas bsgrubs na 'grub par
'gyur// gal te bcu bdun bcwa brgyad ma'i// zhing mdzes bkru zhing byugs byas te// rgyan dang gos kyis legs par gdags// dri zhim dbang po dag pa la// bdag nyid dbang drag rnal 'byor gyis// ye shes
'jig rten gang rung ba'i// lha mo yid 'ong 'od 'bar ma// sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug bcings nas// rtags byung bar du bstim par bya// dri dang sgra dang 'od dag dang// 'dar dang 'gul dang dgod pa
dag/ dang po'i rtags ni yin par bshad// lha dang gtam dang gnyis pa ste// dngos su langs pa tshad yin pas// dam bdar mnas bsgags dbang du bsdu// gal te sbyar du sad pa na// cho 'phrul che zhing log

ston na// dbang drag nga rgyal chen po yis// dbang du bsdu dang zil gyis mnan// de dag chags pas rol spyad na// skad cig cho 'phrul bzhi thob ste// skye shi med par gnas pa dang// ma lus bde chen 'bar ba
dang// zhing khams kun du bgrod pa dang// thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// gtsang ma byis pa rma med pa// yid 'ong legs pa btsal blangs nas// dag cing bdud rtsis dri byug la// 'da'

hU ma tas legs byugs la// kha dog lnga yi gzungs kyis gdags// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang// lha mo gang rung snying pos dgug/ rtag tu phyag rgya bzhis bstim zhing// bdag nyid ha ya grI ba'am// ya mAt+na
ka la sogs pa// gang rung khro bor gsal bsgoms la// drag tu dgug cing bstim par bya// rtags byung mthar thug mngon gyur nas// legs nyes de yis smra bar 'gyur// gal te 'dar zhing mi brjod na// o~M
gyi 'od dang a mr-i tas// lce la thabs kyis dbang bskur zhing// ha ya grI bas gad mos bsdigs// legs par smra bar the tshom med// gal te gsang ba'i las byed na// gsal la brtan thob rnal 'byor

pas// dur khrod shing gcig bzhi mdo'am// lha 'dre mngon du gnas pa'i sar// bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste// dud ka nag po 'od 'bar ba// spyan bzlog mtshon cha me ltar 'bar// sprul pa'i char ltar 'khrug

par bsam// mdun du hom khong khru gang tshad// gru gsum dur sol khrag chen byug/ nang du ling+ga bdud rtsi lnga// chags pa'i rgyu dang tsha ba dang// shes pa chags pa'i rten la byas// pho nyas ming rus bcas bkug
la// bstims la phyag rgyas bcing bar bya// lcags sam nag po'i shing las byas// drag po'i phur pas gnas gsum gdab// hriHSh+tIHdrag pos g.yas g.yon nas// khros pa'i sems kyis bsreg byas nas// de

nang drag po tsher ma can// nam phyed gcer bus bsregs byas nas/ lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// gal te dbye ba'i las byed na// bdag nyid ya mAn+ta ka ste// rngam zhing gdug gtum nga rgyal can// shin tu
'jigs shing bsdigs par bsgom// nyi mas 'jigs pa'i dang rung dang// mun pas 'jigs pa'i gung ru la// gang yin de nyid bris la blan// lha dang lha min gnyis la gtad// rlung gi phyogs su de yis

bskyod// sprul pa pho nyas g.yul 'gyed cing// 'thab cing rtsod par rnam par bsam// bar du khra dang bya rog 'thab// me chu rlung gis 'bud bsams na// de ni gang yin su yang rung// 'bral zhing 'thab pa nyid

du 'gyur// rgyal po bram ze blon po dag/ gdug pa gnod pa can gyi rigs// mi gnas bskrad par bya ba'i phyir// bdag nyid a bar tsit+ta ste// drag po khros pa'i tshul du bsgom// dgra bgegs gang yang rung ba

yi// 'og tu rlung snying bcas pa bri// steng du ming rus bcas bskyon la// mdun na gnas pa'i gdul bya de// rlung lha rnga mo'i steng du zhon// pho nya sprul pa mtha' yas kyis// 'khrid cing 'tshog par rab bsams
la// gshin rje'i drung du khrid par bsam// 'dis ni dbugs med brgyal ba yang// gzhan du drag pos phyin 'gyur na// srog dang ldan pas smos ci dgos// gal te dgra dpung pham 'dod
na// bdag nyid mi g.yo mgon po ste// ji ltar gnas par rab tu bsgom// de yi gzugs brnyan bris nas kyang// cho gas de ru byin brlabs la// sngags ni bdun 'bum la sogs pa// lcags sna bdun las
bcu gnyis chad// ral gri snying por bcas pa la// gsal bar de dag rtags byung bzlas// 'od dang sgra dang sa g.yos dang// ral gri skad ni 'don pa na// phyung bas g.yul las ldog pa dang// bskor bas
dmag dpung 'bros par 'gyur// bdag nyid rgyal zhing che 'dod na// bdag nyid gsal zhing brtan gyur nas// zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal byas la// dur khrod ras la ming rus bri// sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug
bstims la// nges par brtan pa'i ltas byung nas// he ru ka yi zhabs kyis gnon// rta mgrin gad mo drag pos bsdigs// khyung gshog phyag rgya zil gyis gnon// bdag dang khyi yi sgroms nas gdon// bdag
nyid them pa'i 'og tu gnon// yang na bdag gi 'og tu gnon// rdo rje rgya gram phyag rgya yis// steng nas gnon cing bden pa bdar// bdag nyid de yi rgyal por 'gyur// dbul po gter dang phrad 'dod
na// bdag nyid las la goms pa yis// rigs lnga lhag pa'i lha gsal nas// so so'i phyag mtshan yungs 'bru tsam// dbang por mthong gi bar du ni// bsam zhing sngags bzlas bden pa bdar// mtshan ma
brtan po gsal ba na// gang na yod pa'i phyogs der dong// bden pa ting 'dzin sngags bcas mthus// 'dug gam smra'am mthong ba'am// phra mo der ni ltung bar 'gyur// de nas gter dang phrad gyur
nas// dbul ba kun las thar bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor pas// mngon shes mig dang ldan 'dod na// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor pa// rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// mig sna lnga dang bdun pa'i
zhag/ de yi zhun mar dud par bcas// 'phrul gyi 'o ma dag gis sbyar// rdo rje pra yis zhag bdun bsgrub// nyams dang drod rtags thob pa na// mig la legs par sngags kyis byug/ skad cig stong gsum bcas
pa yi// phyogs bcu mngon par shes pas mthong// gang zag rgyud ni brtag pa dang// sdug bsngal drag pos zhen bzlog cing// so so dag pa'i zhing khams kyis// yid bde grub par bya ba'i phyir// mngon shes
mtshan mas legs par bsgrub// rkang mgyogs thob par 'dod pa yis// bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms nas// brtan zhing bar chad med thob nas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste// aM las rlung gi
dkyil 'khor te// skad cig dpag tshad brgyar 'gro ba// de la gnas bsam ma yengs pas// rlung gis khyab pa ji lta bar// dpag tshad brgya phrag du ma yang// skad cig tsam gyis bgrod par
'gyur// gal te rdzu 'phrul bzhi dag gis// rig 'dzin go 'phang 'gro 'dod na// sngon du dag pa'i don thob nas// phyag rgya gsal bar gyur pa'i tshe// nam mkha' ling+ga zla ba la// hUM las rdo rje cho ga

gsum// rim par brtan pa'i dbang thob nas// dwangs ma'i phyag rgya la brten pas// rdo rje zlar bcas rlung brten pas// gang 'thad zhing du bskyod pa'i sa// rdo rje rig pa'i 'dzin pa yis// zhing khams dag pa'i
bya ba 'grub// mdun gyi nam mkhar zla ba la// oM la cho ga'i tshul gyis bsgyur// brtan pa'i 'khor lo zla rlung gis// dwangs ma'i stobs kyis lus gnas pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig 'dzin pa// zhing
khams so sor bskyod byas nas// rang gi bsam pa bsgrub par bya// nam mkha' dbyings kyi zla ba la// tra~M las skyes pa'i cho ga yis// rin chen rlung zlar bcas pa yis// ting 'dzin drag po bskyod pa'i
shugs// dwangs ma lus yid bcas pa yis// dag pa'i zhing khams kun bskyod de// lhag pa'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+mar bcas pa'i zla ba
bsgom// hriHlas sna tshogs chos mchog sems// gsal brtan rlung gis stobs bstan pas// dwangs ma'i lus yid gang yin pa// zhing bskyod bsam pa grub par 'gyur// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas
par// gsal byed sna tshogs bcas pa bsgom// a 'am ha las rang nyid kyi// las kyi phyag rgyar goms par bya// brtan nas dwangs ma rlung stobs kyis// zhing khams gang du mngon bsams pa'i// 'dod pa'i
bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'dis ni 'byung zhing dbang med cing// 'chi med rlung la dbang thob nas// cho 'phrul bzhi yis zil mnan nas// mngon shes gdug pa 'dul ba yis// las rnams mi 'grub
gcig kyang med// de nas gzhan yang chags ldan rim// skal bas dman dang sbyor bas zad// bde ba'i don 'dod dka' thub can// 'di dag don la thabs kyis dgod// thabs ldan lus kyi gong bu la// rang

rang cho ga'i thabs ldan na// bde chen gar thabs sna tshogs pa// rnam par 'phrul pa'i ro yis byed// bde chen longs spyod chos kyi gnas// sprul pa'i thig le bde ba'i ro// ma lus mkha' lnga'i rang bzhin
gyis// rang lus ma bcos gnas nyid bde// brtul zhugs thig le gsum thob nas// sgrol ma dang ni thig le dang// gnas dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i// thabs kyis
mtshon pa las byung bas// dngos grub cho ga sna tshogs 'grub// rang brten thig ler bcas pa yis// dwangs ma'i rang bzhin khyab gnas pa// bskul ba thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// ma lus bskyod cing

'gugs par byed// dwangs snyigs rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i// rlung gi thig les dbang sgyur nas// 'phro zhing 'dzag pa'i thig le nyid// rlung gis 'ching ba nyid yin te// thig le snyigs mar nyams gyur ba// thabs dang

rlung bcud stobs ldan pas// pad+ma la ni chu bzhin no// rang 'byung thig le'i rang bzhin las// rten dang zag pa snyigs ma dang// 'khor ba'i rtsa dang sa bon dang// log rtog thig le zhen bcas pa// rang byung
nam mkha'i thig les 'jig/ rang lus bde chen snying po la// nam mkha' sprin ltar mi phyed cing// dwangs snyigs bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid// thig le chu dang 'o ma dang// gnas pa rlung dang rten stobs

kyis// dwangs snyigs phye la dwangs ma bstim// rang snying lus la 'od snang ba'i// phyi nang dngos rtog ma lus pa// rlung sogs 'khor lo'i 'phen stobs kyis// der mi gnas par goms par bya// gang du sa bon

snyigs bcas pa// nam mkha'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas// gang du rgyu bar bcas pa'i yid// de ma thag par rnam par brlag/ rlung dang rtsa dang thig ler bcas// thabs kyis bskul ba'i ro ldan pas// ma lus thig

le'i rang bzhin pas// mi mthun zhen pas rnam grol bas// rang sems rten bcas thig le ni// dwangs ma'i ye shes blo ldan pa// kun khyab bde 'byung snying po can// gsang ba'i rig pa'i gter kha 'byed// phyi
nang rgyu ba thig ler bcas// snying nang bde bar 'bar gyur nas// rang lus rtags su bde chen 'bar// mngon shes rin chen rtsa la phog/ rig pa'i mngon shes lnga ru 'char// de nas mi 'gyur stong pa'i
rtsa// 'gyur med kun snang rlung la thim// dman pas mi 'grub khyad par thabs// gsang ba'i thig le 'bab zhon gyis// rtsa bcud ting 'dzin 'brel ba'i stobs// bskal pa du ma'i stobs 'gags te// dwangs

ma'i ye shes rlung du grub// phyin pa med par mthar song ba// bde chen goms pa'i stobs las gyur// bcud lnga 'dus pa'i thig le ni// ro lnga 'dres pa'i bde chen de// sgom dang mthar phyin khyad par gyis// bde
ba chen po rigs mchog gnas// de nas gang yin brjod bya ba// zab mo kun rdzogs brtul zhugs can// dbang po dar zhing smin pa yi// chags can nyi zla 'dzin nus pas// spyi gtsug thig le'i 'khor lo

dang// gsang ba'i 'og min nus ldan pa// 'byor pa'i rten can 'di nyid gnas// thabs dang rol pa'i khyad par dang// ting 'dzin rlung gi dbang thob ste// 'byung bzhi snyigs phye dwangs dus su// nyi zla 'dres
pa'i gar thabs kyis// lha mo rnams dang lhan cig tu// rol pa'i thabs kyis gang rtsen pa// bye brag brgyad cu gnyis 'dus pa'i// pad+ma'i snying po kun bkug ste// thig le dpa' bo lnga yi

stobs// mi sdod 'phro ba'i rang bzhin nyid// thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bcings la gzung 'dzin gnas par bya// de dang rtse phrad gnyis bzlog pas// bde ba'i myu gu gso byas pas// tha mal zhen
pa kun bral nas// rtog dang lhan cig gang skyes pa// dwangs snyigs phye ba'i nyams dag gis// snyigs ma bag chags zhen bcas pa// de yi stobs kyis gnas mi 'gyur// gsang ba'i thig le stobs ldan

pas// rigs ngan tha mal zhen chags dang// dran rtog ma lus pham byas te// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du// ma lus dbang btsugs rgyal bar mdzad// rdo rje pad+ma'i snying po
la// dga' ba'i rol pa'i bdag nyid kyis// thabs dang shes rab gsal ba'i ro// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba 'dus pa'i tshe// zag med yon tan gter chen de// gsang ba thabs kyis stobs las grub// bde chen

snying po thig le'i ro// dbab dang gzung bzlog 'byongs pa yis// rtsa gsum gang zhig thim pa'i tshe// bar chad med pa'i bde ba dang// thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon shes dang// skye shi med pa'i tshe 'thob
cing// mi 'gyur chos sku thig le la// rgyu ba spangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas// bde chen cho 'phrul dpag med pas// gsang ba'i zhing khams dag byed cing// gsang ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// bde chen nyams

dang dga' ba'i gar// chags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs pas// ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug par// glu ni sna tshogs len byed cing// mdzes dang ngo tsha spangs pa'i tshul// mdog dmar rlan dang ldan pa yis// rol

pa'i tshul ni sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje bcud chen zlar bcas pas// nyi ma chags pa dang bcas pa'i// pad+ma'i snying po'i spongs mdzad cing// dga' ba'i 'od dang 'khyud pa'i gar// rlung gi snying po rjod byed

cing// srid pa'i myu gu 'gog par mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba'i me long gi rgyud chen po las// bsgrub pa ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya

ba// rtag pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa// bya ba las kyi rim pa dag/ bzhir ni gsal bar gsungs pa yin// dang por zhi ba'i rang bzhin te// de 'og rgyas pas rgyas phyir ro// rgyas pas dbang du bya ba dang// dbang mi

'du ba bsgral phyir te// thun mong khyad par yon tan rdzogs// bya ba'i las la ma rmongs shing// nus pa brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rim pa ji bzhin brtsam par bya// gangs dkar 'dab dang yid 'dang ba//
zhi ba'i ljon shing me tog tshal// 'bras ldan rgyas pa'i rang bzhin no// sum mdo ngam grog gting zab pas// dbang du bsdu ba'i gnas su bshad// dur khrod mtshan gcig rgya gram gnas// 'byung
po 'du sar drag po shis// zhi la sa gzhi dkar ldan pa// zlum po sum rim o~M dang bcas// 'khor lo 'od dkar dang bcas pa// zhi ba'i thab kyi rang bzhin no// rgyas la ser po tsan+dan bcas// gru bzhi rim
gsum tra~M dang bcas// rin chen 'od zer 'phro bcas pa// thab ni rgyas par gsungs pa yin// dbang la sa dmar chags 'od can// zla gam gzhu 'dra pad+mas mtshan// rim gsum hri dang bcas pa ni// dbang du

bya ba'i thab yin no// drag po sa nag dur sol can// gru gsum rdo rje rtse gsum gdeng// thod phreng 'od nag rim gsum hU~M// drag po thab kyi rim pa yin// 'o ma can dang gser can dang// chags pa can dang

tsher ma can// phrin las bzhi ni so so yi// yam shing bsreg shing nyid du bshad// ling+ga kha dog so so ste// gnas kyang thab khung bzhi dang mtshungs// mar dkar 'bras dkar til dkar dang// nas dkar chan

dang 'o ma zho// dngul phye gtor ma dkar por bcas// zhi ba'i bsreg gtor rdzas su bshad// mar rnying bu ram sbrang rtsi dang// 'bras dang chan rnams ldog ros dang// me tog gser dang tsan+dan bcas// gser phye

gtor ma ser por bcas// 'di dag rgyas pa'i rdzas nyid de// dpal dang gzi byin rgyas par 'gyur// tsha ba'i mar dang chang skyur dang// ram bu pad+ma rak+ta dang// 'bras dmar tsan+dan zangs phye dang// gtor ma
dmar po dbang rdzas yin// tshil chen mar dang tsha ba gsum// klung chen sha khrag sran chen dang// dug gsum thal chen tsha ba'i mar// ske tshe phye gsum mi khrag dang// ming rus spel mar bcas gtor
mas// bsgral ba drag po'i rdzas su bshad// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zlum po// logs la zhi ba'i lha bkod la// de bzhin gshegs par gsal bas gdab// gser ram ser

po'i shing rnams la// mgo rtse rgya mdud gru bzhi bcas// logs la rgyas pa'i lha bsgoms te// rin chen nga rgyal bcas pas gdab// zangs sam byu ru dmar shing rnams// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zla gam// logs la
dbang gi lha bkod la// chags pa rdo rjer gsal bas gdab// lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur gsum// logs la drag po'i lha bkod de// zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal bas

gdab// o~M dang tra~M hri hU~M nyid las// 'byung lnga'i rim pa gsal stengs su// e ba~M ma ya b+h+ru~M las bskyed// gzhal yas zlum po gru bzhi dang// zla gam gru gsum ji bzhin dbyibs// kha dog rang gi tshul bzhin
bskyed// rang rang sa bon gdan stengs la// 'od bzhi 'phro 'du'i cho ga yis// las bzhi gtso bo las bzhin bskyed// 'khor mang gtso bo'i cha 'dra ba// phyag mtshan rang rang thugs rtags
la// las bzhi rtags kyi mtshan ma ste// kha dog las kyis dbye bar bshad// dbang bskur las bzhi rigs kyis brgyan// las bzhi 'od kyi 'phro 'du can// cho gas gsal bar bskyed byas la// spyan drang bstim
sogs las rdzogs bya// las dang ting 'dzin bzhi nyid kyis// las bzhi rtse gcig ting 'dzin bya// gang du dmigs pa rtse gcig pas// las bzhi bya ba'i cho ga dag/ ma lus pa dag 'grub 'gyur na// phra mo'i

las rnams smos ci dgos// shar phyogs su ni kha bltas te// dang ba'i yid ni mi g.yo bas// rdzogs pa'i skyil krung la gnas te// ma rungs gdug pa zhi bar bya// lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te// dga' ba'i 'du

shes rtse gcig pas// rin chen skyil krung la gnas pas// dpal dang gzi byin 'phel bar bya// nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te// chags dang zhen pa rtse gcig pa// pad+ma'i skyil krung la gnas te// ma lus dbang

du bsdu bar bya// byang phyogs nyid du kha bltas te// khros pa'i sems kyis so bca' zhing// rus sbal dang ni gyad stabs kyis// gdug pa bsgral te lam du gzhug/ so so'i sngags kyi rim pa dag/ snga dro zhi ba'i

las byas te// gung la rgyas pa nyid du bya// dgongs ka dbang gi dus nyid de// drag po nam gyi gung la bya// nam zla dus bzhir bsgrubs pas na// nges par las bzhi 'grub par 'gyur// o~M che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru swA

hA/ swA che ge mo puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ hrI che ge pa shaM ku ru swA hA/ hU~M che ge mo mA ya ra phaT/ ling+ga'i gnas kyang las bzhi'i dbyibs// dgug dang phur bu bzhi btab la// ril bu'am lhag ma gtubs pa de// so so lha yi

zhal du bstabs// rtse mo zhi byed yal ga rgyas// sdong po dbang la rtsa ba drag/ kha dang mngar skyur tsha ba'i shing// ro yi mchod pa de bzhin te// rgyud bzang rgyal po smad 'tshong ma/ shan pa'i khyim nas me blangs

te// las dang mthun pa'i ra skyes mnan// sa bon bzhi las rim pa bzhin// ba ba ka dang dbang chen dang// gzi byin can dang 'joms byed bzhi// sku dmog las bzhis phye ba ste// gun d+he sgrom dang zhags pa

dang// rtse gsum g.yon pa bgrang phreng nyid// rigs bzhis las bzhi byin brlabs dbu// spyan drang mchod ston las rdzogs nas// lto bar b+h+rU~M las gzhal yas su// las dang mthun pa'i lha bskyed la// rang rang

rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin// bsreg dang bro gar las byas pas// gang yang 'grub par the tshom med// zhe sdang can dang nga rgyal can// sdug bsngal gdug sems nad gzir ba// de 'dra zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// zhi ba'i
las ni rtsom pa yin// tshe thung nad mang dpal longs spyod// phongs dang nyam nga 'jigs pa dag/ dngas snyigs zad nas snying por thim// thig le mi shigs bcud 'dus pa// stong nyid thig le'i
ngang du 'gag/ rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob cing// mngon shes skye 'jig thob bral bas// bde chen nam mkha'i ye shes nyid// rdo rje thig le 'gyur 'jig med// steng dang 'og las gang sbyar bas// sku
gsung thugs kyi phobrang dag/ bde chen til 'bru bcud bzhin du// nyi zla gnas pa'i bar du 'bar// 'bab pa thig le zla ba'i gzugs// kha bcad rlung gis gzung bya zhing// 'og gis phul zhing steng gis

drang// ma lus bde chen khyab par gnas// mi rtog gsal ba mthar phyin pa// seng phrug zla ba rdzogs pa ltar// thabs dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i ye shes chen po la// ma lus yon tan rdzogs par
gnas// chags can brtul zhugs bral ba yi// lus dang dran rtogs bag chags bcas// rigs dang rigs min gang yang rung// sgo gsum ma lus bcas pa dag/ steng sgo'i gdul bya des 'dul yin// dang

por gsang ba'i rim thob pas// rlung dang thig le'i las goms nas// bde chen byang chub sems kyi ro// sems lnga'i tshul gyis gang snang ba// g.yo thob brtan pa'i nyams nyid kyis// lus dang phyi nang dran
rtogs bcas// nam mkha'i gzugs can nyid du skye// lus dang snang bar bcas pa yi// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mi phyed pa// bde chen thig le a dang gnas// thig le stong pa'i ri mo can// gsal bar shes pa

rgyu bas mngon// 'og nas bskul zhing steng nas mnan// dwangs snyigs bsre ba'i thabs la 'jug/ bde ba'i rlung can yaM gi sgo// bskyod pa'i sbyor bas gyen du phul// rgyu ba rlung gi snying po can// dpa' bo

lam nas thur du 'then// rig pa'i ye shes gnas pa'i rlung// stong nyid nam mkha'i dbyings su thim// phyi nang rgyu ba chad pa dang// rig pa thig le'i ngang la gnas// bde ba'i rtags ni 'byung 'gyur te// 'dar

dang rngul dang ba spu ldang// sgra dang lus bde rgyug pa dang// dgod dang brgyal sogs gang byung ba// brtan dang sbyang ba'i cho ga bya// mi mthun log pa'i chos brtags na// thabs kyi rim pa'i cho ga yis// gdon
dang spos dang gnon pa dag/ ji ltar rigs par brtag par bya// rang lus thig le'i nyams myong la// bar chad med par gsal 'jug pa// tha mal zhen pa bsgyur ba dang// bde ba'i dbang phyug smin pa

dang// dran rtogs rgyud sogs zhi ba dang// bde chen rgyas pas khyab pa dang// rlung dang bde ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang// dran rtog a yi ngang du gnas// 'di ni dbang gi rim pa
yin// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las// gsang ba'i phrin las bzhir 'byung ba// dka' thub can dang tha mal dang// thun mong lam las bzlog phyir
ro// 'dod chags zhen cing dbang po smin// tshad ldan yum dang bcas pa yi// bde chen dgon pa thig le'i gnas// yon tan khyad par kun tu rdzogs// gnyis med 'khril ba'i ngo bo ni// bde ba chen po 'byung

ba'i gnas// gsang ba'i b+ha ga rgyas pa ni// zhi rgyas dbang drag tshul bzhin dag/ nus pa byin brlabs gang ldan pa// gsang ba'i thig le'i tshul la gnas// pad+ma gsang ba'i thab khung du// gsang ba'i sbyin sreg
gang phul ba// lo dang zla ba ma yin par// myur du bde chen lus su 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// dngas snyigs bcud dang bag chags dang// nyi zla khu bar bcas pa ni// bde chen gsang ba

mchod pa'i rdzas// gdung dang bde ba bral ba dang// zhen rtog de nyid chags pa yi// rang gi ling+ga de nyid la// gsang ba'i phur pa bzhi rdzogs pa// gsang ba'i yul la btab pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa'i ting

'dzin la// las bzhi ma btsal rdzogs par ldan// rol pa'i tshul dang thig le gnyis// pad+ma rdo rje snying po'i rtsa// nyams dang sbyor tshul gang yin pa// gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i dus su blta// gnas pa rtsa yi tshul dag
ni// kha dog dbyibs sogs tha dad pas// mchod rdzas nyi zlar bcas kun la// gzar bu gnyis bcas thab phul bas// thig le chen por 'bab par 'gyur// gsang ba'i don la dga' ba dang// rig pa'i
brtul zhugs spyod pa dang// dbang po dar cing smin pa dang// thig le'i don la mos pa dang// rlung dang bcud la goms pa yis// rnal 'byor pho mor bcas pa kun// dran rtog phyi ma bcas pa'i yid// gdul

bya'i don du de bshad do// gang dag thabs la mkhas pa dang// dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// thabs dang sbyor ba la brtson zhing// nyi zla rtse sbyor dbang thob nas// gzung zlog 'byangs pa'i gar thabs

kyis// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa'i don// sems lnga'i tshul gyis gsal bar skye// nyi zla zhon pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang// rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob pas// khams bzhi 'dus pa'i snying po las// bde chen thig le mi
rtog pa// thabs kyis da ltar mngon du snang// thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis// skal med las kyis dman pa la// dbang dang brgyud pa bral ba yis// tshig dang rigs pas ci bstan kyang// rigs ngan
rgyal sar bzhag pa ltar// bdag phung gzhan brlag 'jig par 'gyur// gang du gsang ba'i thig le nyid// gsang ba'i lam lngar nyams skyes pas// zag med bde ba'i dkyil 'khor du// mkha' 'gro gsum la
gang brten nas// ye shes thig le rgya dpag med// rim pas mthar thug gnas su 'gyur// gang zhig 'di la 'dris goms pas// rgyu ba thig ler thim pa dang// dran rtog nam mkhar gsal ba

dang// bde chen sngon du smin pa yis// 'chi med sangs rgyas sa la sbyor// 'jigs pa kun las grol ba dang// lha mo tshogs kyis byin brlabs nas// rol rtsed sna tshogs sgyur byed cing// thabs dang shes rab
gnyis med cing// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhal mthong zhing// rdo rje dbang gis mtshams sbyar nas// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog mnyes// nam mkha'i mthar thug bar du ni// bde chen ye shes zag pa

med// ye shes rgya mtsho byin brlabs can// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med pa// rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bor 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las phrin las mtha' yas pa bshad
pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i lam la gang dga' bas// thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i lam// rim pa nyid du bshad par bya// dad dang brtul zhugs che ba

dang// theg pa chen por rigs nges shing// snying brtse dbang dang dam tshig ldan// sgrub la brtson pa'i gang zag gis// lus dang longs spyod 'tsho ba dang// bu dang chung ma rgyal srid kyis// dang por bla ma mnyes

byas la// thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa blang// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// rang byung ye shes rang snang ba// gcig dang du ma med tshul gyis// bden pa gnyis med 'brel ba nyid// byin brlabs sgra dang

gtan tshigs kyi// rang 'byung ye shes mngon du snang// rang gnas 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// rtog ge'i spyod yul ma gyur pa// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// 'phel dang dga' bde longs spyod phyir// rgyas
pa'i las la 'bad par bya// dbang chen gzi byin che ba dang// rgyal rigs blon po bram ze dang// gdug pa dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// rjes dgug dbang gi las brtsam mo// dgra dang bgegs sogs ma rungs

pa// gang gis 'dul bar mi nus pa// gzir zhing 'du shes bsgyur ba'i phyir// drag po bsgral ba'i phrin las brtsam// gang yang rung ba'i dngos po la// dang po mi mthun zhi bar bya// de nas yon tan rgyas par
bya// de nyid dbang bsdu las la sbyar// gal te dbang du ma gyur na// drag pos gzir te bsgral bar bya// gal te log par ltung srid pas// 'og min gnas su phaT kyis 'phang// nges par 'grub 'gyur gdon

mi za// dang por sngon bya'i las kyis ni// nus dang mi nus khyad par brtag/ de nas nus pa thob pa ste// de nas bde ba'i rtsal thob nas// thogs pa med pa'i phrin las 'grub// zag med lam la goms sbyangs
pas// cho 'phrul bzhi dang phrin las bzhi// gdul bya zhing dang nus mthu dang// byin brlabs rtsal gyi khyad par 'phags// mthar phyin sku lnga'i zhing thob pas// ma rtsal chu dang rlabs bzhin

du// dpag med yon tan ngo bo'i phyir// lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las yin// las dang nyon mongs gdug pa dang// sdug bsngal rtog pa ji snyed pa// cho ga thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// lhan ne lhang nger zhi bar

'gyur// nga rgyal rin chen gzi brjid kyis// dpal dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang// tshe dang lang tsho stobs ldan zhing// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// 'dod chags rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis// bdud dang

gdug pa rgyal po dang// lha dbang srin po mkha' 'gro ma// phyag na rdo rje'ang dbang du 'gyur// zhe sdang rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis// cho ga rdzas dang sngags ldan pas// chos sku rdo rje'ang 'jig 'gyur na// gzhan lta smos
kyang ci zhig dgos// rang lus bde chen kun gyi dbyings// rang lus thig le'i thabs mkhas pas// sbyor ba rlung gi goms stobs can// dkyil 'khor nang la gnas gyur pas// nyams kyis las bzhi gsal
gyur te// rim pa ji bzhin 'gyur ba dang// rang gi mngon par gsal gyur pa// nus pa brtan pas mngon du 'gyur// gzhan min 'khor lo pho brang nyid// gnas dang 'jug dang gzung ba dang// bstim zhing

gnas pa gang yin pa// de dag nyid du bshad pa yin// d+harma tsakra gzhal yas khang// rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dkyil na// e ba~M ma ya las bzhi dbyibs// kha dog las kyis gtsor gyur pa// bag chags sa bon

snyigs ma dang// rtog dang tha mal zhen pa'i rdzas// nyams myong 'gyur med bzhir gnas te// thig les de nyid zhi ba dang// rang lus phyi nang thig les rgyas// rlung dang thig le rtog par bcas// nus pas dbang
du 'dus pa dang// thig les ma bcos nam mkha'i ngang// srog dang thig ler bcas bsdus pa// a yi ngang du thim 'gyur de// rgyu ba dwangs shing 'phar ba gnon// mi 'gyur dbyings la gnas par bya// rang
lus thabs kyi ngo bo las// 'khor lo bzhi dang me rlung dang// bskyod pa rlung gis las rung bas// nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal// thig les rgyud dang lus rgyas pas// bde chen dbang thob zhen chags

bral// ting 'dzin sbyor bas gang bskul na// rim pa'i rtags dang nus pa byung// kha dog grangs dang snying po dang// dbyibs dang tshad dang thig le yi// khyab pa la sogs mtha' yas pa// bzhugs tshul de nyid de
bzhin no// 'khor lo bzhi yi thab khung du// gtum mo byin za'i las bskul bas// dwangs snyigs rtog pa'i bag chags dag/ mi shigs thig ler mchod pa phul// phyi nang rgyu ba ma lus pa// rang 'byung 'khor
lo thig le mchog/ spyod yul thun mong ma lus pa// phyi yi rnam pa lam byed pas// thun mong phyi yi lam du bshad// de nyid nang du rtsa 'khor lo// thig les nang du nyams skyed pa// rim pa 'di ni
nang du bshad// dbang thob sbyangs pa ma rtogs pa// skal ngan rigs chad yul min pa// gsang bas gsang ba zhes bshad do// dang por blo ldan gang zag ni// ma lus bden pa dbyer med la// rang bzhin rig
pa'i gtan tshigs kyis// phung po khams dang skye mched la// thabs dang shes gnyis med pa'i don// ye nas sangs rgyas rdzogs pa nyid// de nyid dus gsum ma skyes pa// gang la brten nas rtogs pa la// lam
gyi yan lag kun rdzogs te// sa bcu rim par ma bkod rdzogs// ma lus yon tan rang shar bas// thams cad ma lus ma 'da' la// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu nyid// dbang po cig car spyod yul

yin// gang su blo dang mos pa dang// rtogs chung mtshan ma dga' ba la// thun mong sgo mthun khyad par can// rim pa'i rnal 'byor bslab par bya// dang por phyi nang snod bcud kun// rang sa nyid na mi dmigs
pa// ma bcos ma btsal mi gnas pa// dngos po ci la'ang mi brtag cing// de nyid la yang mi rtog pa// 'dzin rtog zhen pa mi gnas par// bsam dang bsam bya med tshul gyis// bdag gzhan phyi nang ma lus

pa// gang gi ngo bor ma grub pa// ci la'ang mi gnas sbyor ba yis// rang sar mi rtog ngo bo nyid// bcos pa med pa'i tshul du bsgom// gal te mtshan ma'i rgyu ba dag/ chu las rnyog pa'i tshul byung na// ma bcos rang

bzhin bzhag pa yis// ma lus rtog med de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin bzhag pas dag par 'gyur// nam mkha' dag par 'gyur ba'i tshe// sprin kyang rang 'byung dag pa ltar// byung tshor dran rtog ma lus pa// chos

nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin no// gang du snang srid ma lus pa// phyi nang med pa'i sems nyid de// de nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin du// goms shing nus pa brtan pa'i tshe// de nyid rnal 'byor de nyid ni// stong pa chen po

rnal 'byor yin// sgo gsum byed spyod ma bcos pa// ma brtags mi rtog cing mi gnas// 'di ni rnal 'byor rtse gcig pas// bya ba spangs pa'i spyod pa yin// de nas de las langs pa'i tshe// sgyu ma chu zla smig rgyu

dang// 'ja' tshon dbu ba chu bur ltar// snang yang dngos por gnas ma yin// rig pa phyi nang ma lus pa// stong pa'i cho 'phrul snang du zad// ma lus rig pa'i ngo bo ste// de yang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar// zhen

chags med pa'i tshul du bsgom// ye shes sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni// dpag med ngo bor rang snang yang// byin brlabs cho 'phrul rang snang ba// de ltar ma rtogs dman pa la// rang 'byung snying rjer 'char ba'i
phyir// snying rje chen po rnal 'byor yin// 'gro ba gang dang gang dag las// snying rje chen po gang gzigs pas// sna tshogs mdzad pa'i tshul nyid kyis// de snyed spyod la mtha' yas te// don dang

mthun pa 'ba' zhig ston// tha mal pa dang thabs nyid dang// lus ngag yid kyis ci 'tsham par// don 'gyur spyod pa bsam mi khyab// gang du byams dang snying rje yis// ma khyab ming gi rnal 'byor te// theg pa

chen po'i rigs chad cing// dman pa'i rigs su gyur pa yin// rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste// nam mkha'i ris dang dbyer med ltar// ma lus rang rgyud bral ba yi// ngo bo bden

min brdzun pa min// chos rnams ming tsam dngos po med// sgo gsum 'di ltar brtan pa ni// thugs rje chen po spyod pa yin// de nas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// rang bzhin gnyis med rig pa ni// yi ge hU~M du
gsal bar bsgom// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// 'phro 'dus hU~M du gsal bar bya// rdul phran de snyed 'dus pa las// thig le mi dmigs stong par blta// ma dang a las nyi zla'i gdan// gang bsgril hU~M

bcas gsal bar bya// rang rang gsung yang 'gal ba med// sgril ma'i snying po phyag mtshan te// 'phro 'du phra mo'i rang bzhin sku// gsal la skyon dang bral bar bsgom// de nas rang rang tshad gyur pa// rigs

pa'i phyag rgya chen po nyid// zhi dang khro bo skabs nyid du// ji ltar 'thad par bsgom par bya// yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// yang na zhal gsum phyag drug bsgom// gnas gcig gnas gsum gnas lngar
yang// yan lag lha ni tshang bar bsgom// goms nas bstims te spyod yul kun// de ltar gsal bar brtag par bya// rtsa ba gcig pa'i lha bsgom pa// phyag rgya gcig pa'i rnal 'byor yin// sgo gsum bsgom
la rab 'bad pas// rnam par g.yeng ba'i chos spyod 'das// ma lus rtsa ba'i spyod pa ste// phyogs gcig pa yi spyod par gsungs// de nas rtog pa'i yan lag dag/ gnyis ka thabs dang shes rab tu// brtags

te de ltar bsgom par bya// 'od zer 'phro ba 'bru gsum nyid// yang na ye shes lnga nyid de// gnas gcig snying por gnas par bya// de bzhin gtso bo gtso mo dang// sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang// khro bo khro

mo sprul pa dang// yid chos dag la'ang shes par bya// zhal dang phyag dang lha grangs dang// tshom bu spros pas spros bcas yin// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// tshom bu lnga la khro bcas bsgom// yang na sku

gsung thugs ldan pa'i// tshom bu gsum dang bcas pa yi// khro bo khro mo 'khor du bsgom// rigs kyi gtso ste thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo tshogs dang bcas pa yi// mos pa'i tshul dang sbyor ba yis// tshom bu gcig
pa'i lha rnams bsgom// slob dpon mthar nye'i lam gnas pas// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa// rdo rje thig tshad bor tsam gyis// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal ldan pa// sna tshogs dkyil
'khor mchog tu gsungs// dang po rgyang grags dkyil 'khor te// de nas dpag tshad dkyil 'khor nyid// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom// de nas yo byad

lnga ldan pas// ting 'dzin mos pa spyod mthun pa'i// skye bo tsam du grangs mthun pas// tshom bus 'dod pa'i don bsgrub bya// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// pho mo 'dus pa'i grangs mnyam par// yo byad
'dus pa'i tshogs ldan pas// dgon par 'khor khang rab brtsigs te// rang rang thabs dang shes rab tu// brtags te yo byad longs spyad cing// rdo rje glu bro gar thabs kyis// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug
gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// tshe la dbang sgyur zag med thob// de nas brgya phrag bcu drug gis// sku lnga lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// skye bo mdza' ba kun tshogs pa// rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i
tshogs zhes bya// 'byor pa'i longs spyod tshang ba ni// bde ba'i longs spyod tshogs su bshad// lha dang dam can kun 'dus pas// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs su gsungs// thams cad spyod pa mi 'dzin

pas// tshogs gnyis rgyun du rdzogs byed pas// tshogs chen po ru nges par bshad// bar chad med pa'i lam rdzogs pas// rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa med// lha mi cha byad 'dzin mod kyi// 'byung lnga cho 'phrul dbang

sgyur thob// zhing dang longs spyod dag pa yis// gong nas gong du mnyam par sbyor// rdo rje'i cha de 'dzin gyi sku// zhing khams kun la gnas par byed// gal te mtshan mar zhen dbang gis// rtogs pa'i stobs ni

chung gyur na// byang chub phyag rgya rdo rje sku// mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa// cha lugs mngon du byung na yang// zhi ba de nyid mthong ba min// gang du sbyar ba'i yum rnams kyang// thun mong lam dang skabs gnyis

su// nus pa'i khyad par che chung gis// phrin las bzhi ru bshad pa ni// dkar mo bong chung skad che la// bzhin lus gtsug phud g.yas su 'khyil// yan lag phra 'jam skad gsal zhing// rlung khar lci bas zhi ba

bya// zla dang yan lag mang ba dang// phra zhing bshan la gzangs su ring// bzhin lus ser zhing gru bzhir gnas// rnam 'phyangs sha dang nu ma rgyas// 'phel ba'i dus su 'di dag gzung// bzhin mdog bad 'dra

sog ka la// smin dkyus ring la stod smad phyed// lus dang chu rlung dri zhim zhing// bde ba ldan zhingayan lag med// 'di ni sdud pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// nag mo gru gsum rtsid mgo ma// khro gnyer byis pa'i lus
ldan zhing// gtum zhing brlang tshig 'dzem pa med// gtsang sme'i rtog bral gsod par bshad// gang du nus pa brtan thob pa// de dag sa nas sar sbyong ba// rig pa'i skyes bu dam pa nyid// rnal

'byor rim pa'i lung ldan pa// ma skyes mnyam la dbang sgyur zhing// ma lus gsal bar mthar phyin pa'o// rang rig ye shes rgyud don phyir// rang snang rig pa mngon byas pa// rig 'dzin mchog ste lhun grub
pa'o// ting 'dzin nus pa'i mthu med kyang// sa sbyong sems dpa' bskyed du med// bder gshegs nyid dang spyod yul gcig/ rig pa'i skyes bu'i lung theb pa'o// gal te 'byung ba'i lus 'jig na// bdag nyid

sgo gsum lhar lta zhing// 'byung ba bsags pa'i lus las grol// ting 'dzin phyag rgya chen por smin// khyung phrug sbubs dang bral ba ltar// ma lus phyag rgya sgyu ma'i mchog/ rnam par smin ces de la brjod// zag
pa zad pa rdo rje lus// phyin cad 'gyur 'jig chos dang bral// bde ba chen po lung thob pas// zag bcas bslab pa'i chos dang bral// zhing la dbang sgyur sprul pa'i lus// ting 'dzin longs spyod dpag tu
med// bsgrubs pa'i nus pa gang brtan pa// rdo rje lus gyur 'jig pa med// 'jig pa lnga bral zag pa zad// dbang sgyur gsum la dbang thob pas// bde ba longs spyod dpag tu med// grangs med bskal par
don byed cing// mthong bas de bzhin gnyis med rigs// rgyal tshab skyes bu sa sbyong ba// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med cing// mtha' dbus bsam pa'i rgyun las
'das// 'jigs bral dbugs phyin mya ngan 'das// rang snang dpag med zhal mthong bas// gzhan du blta ba'i yul dang bral// ting 'dzin rig pa goms pa'i mthu// mtshan ma sdug po yul las
'das// 'jig rten stong phrag dbang sgyur zhing// gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i rigs// nam mkha' mthar thug med pa ltar// bsgoms dang nus pa'i rtsal stobs kyis// bag chags mtshan ma'i tshang tshing

la// ting 'dzin rig pa'i me byung bas// zhing khams rgya bral dpag med du// ting 'dzin rig pas gang sbyangs pa// bsgoms dang ting 'dzin rig pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lung thob pa// phyag rgya chen po'i rig

'dzin yin// de nas rig pa'i rtsal rdzogs shing// ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis// mthar phyin rig pa'i skyes bu ste// zhing khams bye ba'i dbang thob cing// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyi sras// dbang dang cho 'phrul
kun thob pa// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dgongs pas khyab// mnyam bzhag rjes thob khyad par gyis// rgyal ba'i lung mnod bka' la gnas// zhing khams dag par kun spyod kyang// rmad 'byung gsang ba'i rang
bzhin la// spyod kyang lta ba'i rang bzhin gyis// phyogs bral nam mkha' mi mthong bas// dbang dang dgongs pas mthar phyin 'gyur// dbang dang dam tshig brtul zhugs te// dang po bslab pa

mthar phyin cing// thig le rdzogs par 'dod pa yis// gsang ba nang gi don la sbyar// thun mong bya ba mthar phyin nas// lus dang spyod yul bcas pa dang// lha yi rnal 'byor ma lus pa// bde chen thig le nyid

du blta// lha dang bde bar mnyam sbyor bas// thig le bde bar snang ba nub// sku bzhi dkyil 'khor khams thig le// dngas ma lnga ru mnyam sbyor bas// ngo bo dang ni rkyen dag gis// thabs kyi rim pa bskul

las shes// bde ba'i thig le nyams myong ba// mi rtog bde ba cha shas med// mi shigs thig le kun gyi bdag/ stong nyid 'brel ba'i ri mo can// tha mal bya ba kun bral ba// spyod pa nyid du bstan pa yin// theg
le bzhu ba'i rang bzhin gyis// 'dzag 'dar thim gang bde ba ni// sa yang bcu gsum bde bas brgyan// lus kun khyab pa'i thig le shum// til 'bru bcud kyis khyab pa ltar// ma lus khyab pa'i ros gang
ba// ma lus 'od dang snying po ltar// snang srid thig le chen po nyid// bde ba chen pos khyab par gsal// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le ni// khams lnga 'dres pa'i snying po ste// mi shigs thig le bde ba'i
bcud// ma lus bde ba'i rgyas btab pas// nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal// dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ste// thig le gcig gis kun khyab pas// bde chen snying rjes gcig tu 'khyil// de nyid

bde chen phyag rgya ste// nang gi phyag rgya gcig par bshad// de nyid nges par las rung bas// thig le bde chen dang bcas pa'i// bye brag brgyad cu ma lus par// so so'i thig ler sku 'phros shing// khams lnga ye

shes ro dang bcas// sa bon thig le bde bas brgyan// mi rtog thig le thugs mchog sgra// rang lus smin nas snang bar spro// gang nas gang la spros gyur pa// de srid thig le'i phyag rgya ste// bde ba'i thig le

grangs las 'das// ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// mi phyed ro yis gang khyab pas// grangs 'das bde chen tshogs rdzogs nas// ma lus bde ba'i phyag rgyar snang// gang de de yis rgyas btab pas// de nyid

bde chen thig ler smin// rnam pa phyi nang snyigs mar bcas// bde chen thig le'i ngo bor smin// snyigs ma 'byung ba'i lus las 'das// snying po bar chad med pa'i lus// thig les tha ma'i snod gang bas// ma
lus bde ba chen por smin// de nas thabs dang ting 'dzin dang// rlung gi 'dren pa'i stobs ldan pa// rin chen lung gi thig ler zhugs// skad cig mngon shes lngar smin cing// 'gro ba ris dang thar par
'gyur// mi shigs a la thig le thim// 'byung 'jug med pa'i rlung 'thob cing// 'gyur 'jig med pa'i lus la gnas// 'phel 'grib med pa'i bde ba nyid// snang ba thig le nyid du ste// thig

le thung ngu a ru thim// gnyis med bde ba cha shas bral// 'di nas zag med rang byung ba// rkyen dang bral ba'i bde chen nyid// dper na me dang tsha ba'am// rgya mtsho dang ni rlan bzhin no// rlung dang thig le rig pa

dang// tshe dang longs spyod 'byung ba dang// 'dod lnga kun la dbang sgyur thob// bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni// ma lus zag med thig le ste// rgya bral rig pa'i thig le nyid// snyigs ma'i zag pa rlung zad

pas// ting 'dzin bde chen thig ler gsal// rig pa bde chen ror gsal bas// ci mthong bde chen phyag rgya nyid// 'du bas sgyur ba'i spyod yul lam// mun 'gyur dug rtsi ji bzhin du// rgya dang bral ba'i zhing

khams dag/ bde chen phyag rgya chen por 'gyur// gang dag bsgoms pa'i skyes bu ni// tha mal pa dang brkam chags pa// rnam pa'i spros pa ma lus pa// bsgoms dang ched du ma byas par// bde chen thig ler lhun
gyis grub// dper na chu dang rlabs bzhin nam// rgya mtshor phyin pa'i 'du shes ltar// goms pas bde chen gsal mthar phyin// rkyen dang gnod pa ma lus pa// reg dang mthong thos dran pas kyang// bde
chen thig le nyams su 'bar// bskal pa du mar gnas gyur cing// 'byung ba lnga dang spyod yul kun// rang lus bde bar bsre ba 'grub// gsang ba'i lam la goms byed na// mtshon byed rig pa'i bde ba

yis// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rtogs// mthar phyin lam gyi rim pa 'grub// dbang po dar zhing chags pa dang// bde chen mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas// e dang ba~M la gnas pa yi// byang chub rdo rje dril las

'byung// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa yis// ma lus bde bar rtogs byas la// phyi nang sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// gang zhig rtags dang ldan pa'i tshe// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi ldan pas// bde chen mchog la rol par

bya// ye shes nyi zla mnyam ldan pas// re dogs chad pa'i thig le 'byung// lhung med gnas dang thim pa dang// bdag po gdung can phrad pa las// nyin mtshan bral ba'i snang ba ltar// dus gcig nyi zla shar ba'i
tshe// ma lus bde bas khyab gyur na// g.yo ba med pa'i thig le 'char// gal te nyams pa'i ltas byung na// thabs dang nyams dang rol pa yis// rim pa bzhin du bslab par bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis

med pa'i// nyi zla 'dres pa'i thig le nyid// dngos bral lhan cig skyes pa nyid// rgyal ba kun gyi phyag rgya yin// lhan cig skyes la gnas pa'i tshe// ma lus bde chen ro gcig pas// bde chen phyag rgya gcig tu
gnas// rdo rje pad+ma'i thig le nyid// sa ya bcu gsum phrag gnyis rtsa// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis// so so bde ba'i pho brang du// thig les gang bar spros pa'i tshe// sku gsung thugs dang ye
shes lnga// nyams myong ro yis rgyas btab bo// lus kyi bde ba mthar phyin nas// rgyu rkyen rten 'brel las 'das pa'i// rig pa'i bde ba la gnas bya// gal te nyams na bsam pa'am// blta dang mnyan pa la
sogs pas// bar chad med par bsgom par bya// rig pa bde bar gang smin pas// sgo gsum bde ba chen por smin// spyod yul rlung dang thig ler bcas// goms pa'i thabs la dbang sgyur bas// rten dang

brten par bcas pa yi// thig le rlung la dbang sgyur zhing// lha mo mi mo gnod sbyin mo// mkha' 'gro rnams la dbang byed nus// thig le dbab dang 'dzin pa dang// zlo dang sbyor la dbang sgyur te// gal te

mkha' la 'phros pa'i tshe// dngos grub lam dang bral ba yin// phyin cad mchod dang nus pa sbyin// rang gi skabs ni ma gtogs pa// gzhan du thig le mi lhung zhing// dbang sgyur lam la goms par bya// nyi zla

'dres pa'i bde ba nyid// zag med snying por thim pa'i tshe// sems kyi bde bar rang snang zhing// sems kyi bde ba bar chad med// gsal byed stobs dang bral ba'i tshe// ma lus bde chen phyag rgya ste// lus
sems mnyam du gnas pa nyid// tshad dang rgya dbyings ro las 'das// dpag med bde ba'i rol mo ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgyes chen te// thig le sa bon zag pa bral// bde chen nyams myong rgyun mi

chad// rang nyid thig ler nyams myong bas// snying po'i thig le bral ba med// phra zhing rdul bral dri ma med// rdo rje thig le dril bu nyid// 'bad rtsol med par rang snang ba// bral thob med pa'i ngo bor

gnas// gang du yon tan tshogs kyis rab rgyas pa// bde chen chu rgyun lta bu'i rgyun las byung// tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub// gzhan na med de rang nyid snang bar zad// rang bzhin

gnas phyir gzhan nas 'ong ba med// zhen pa bzlog pas bdag zhal bdag gis mthong// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las lam gyi khyad par ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste
bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ma lus kun gyi bsgrub bya nyid// phyogs bcu ma lus rdul snyed kyi// che ba'i yon tan bshad par bya// mthar phyin lnga yi rang bzhin ni// rtogs dang
'bras bur gnas mod kyi// mthong dang goms dang grub pa nyid// thun mong 'bras bur yang dag bshad// yang dag mthar phyin 'bras bur ni// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu rin po
che// dpag med yon tan lhun rdzogs pa// tshad dang dmigs pa las 'das pa// bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa ste// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag med pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni// ma
lus mchog gi gter gyur pa// zad 'phel med pa'i nor bu ste// ma lus kun la mnyam du gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni// rgya dbyings tshad las 'das pa yi// dag dang ma dag ci snang yang// blang
dor phyogs ris yongs kyis med// rang 'byung 'od gsal maN+Dal la// ma lus gcig gi rang bzhin te// thugs rje'i byin brlabs tshad med pas// ma lus bsam pa skong bar mdzad// rang byung ye shes lhun
grub ni// chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo bas// ma lus phyogs med rang snang yang// zhen dang ched du byas pa med// sa dang lam la sogs pa yi// theg pa kun gyi 'bras bu ni// rang rang ltos pa'i mthar thug

kyang// che mchog lhun grub mnyam dang bral// skad cig nyid la lhun rdzogs pa'i// sangs rgyas dpag med yon tan rnams// rigs bdag rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis// nyi zla'i bde
ba mngon thob ste// rdo rje 'chang gi sa la bkod// dpag med rgyal ba thams cad kyi// 'gro ba'i gdul bya mtha' yas pas// sku gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te// bzhugs tshul dpag med rnam par snang// che
ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pa'i// sangs rgyas drug pa'i rang bzhin te// nam mkha'i mthas gtugs mtshan pa yis// bde chen ye shes rgyas par gnas// bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs pa ltar// ma lus rdzogs pa'i
ye shes nyid// sa mtha'i nyes pa kun bral ba// kun gyi yon tan bdag nyid gnas// sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas pa'i// nam mkha'i mtha' thug bar du ni// gdul bya'i rdul snyed gnas kyi bar// skad
cig 'du 'bral med par gnas// bcud 'dus thig le chen po ni// bde ba'i zag med thig le ste// a dang bde bar 'brel ba yi// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs// thig le'i bye brag brgyad cu'i
rtsa// bcud 'dus gsang ba'i thig le'i ro// ma skyes mnyam la gnas 'gyur zhing// ma lus gang ba'i tshul gyis ni// zhing khams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa// zag med thig ler ro gcig pas// nam mkha'i

gzugs can de bzhin nyid// sku bzhi 'dus pa'i khams thig le// dwangs ma lnga 'dus snying po can// gsum 'dus mi 'gyur snying po ste// bdes gang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po// thig le ro yis gang phye ba// dpag

med sku gsung yon tan thugs// bsam gyis mi khyab rang snang ba// thig le phyag rgya bsam mi khyab// phyi nang dwangs snyigs ma lus pa// rang 'byung dwangs ma'i thig le nyid// gzhan med phyogs med rang snang
ba// phyogs med bde ba chen po nyid// gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni// yon tan rdzogs pa'i ngo bo ste// bde ba chen po'i snying po las// dpag med yon tan rnam par 'phrul// bde ba chen
po'i thig le ni// 'du 'phro brel bas zag pa med// phyogs ris 'das pas ma khyab med// thog mtha' med par mnyam pa yin// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin te// thig le ro la mnyam bzhugs pas// nam mkha'i
mthas gtugs chos thams cad// bde ba chen por gsal bar myong// mtshan dang dpe byad tshad 'das pa// rang la rdzogs pa'i thig le nyid// ji snyed bde ba'i rol pa kun// rang la rdzogs pa nyid du
gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba ni// rang 'byung thig le chen po ste// A li kA li zhu ba las// nam mkha' khyab pa'i bde ba 'byung// gsang ba'i thig le kun gyi rgyu// nam mkha'i thig le gsang ba'i
ngang// khyab pa chen po phyogs cha med// lus gnas rang bzhin ma skyes pa// bde ba'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs// nam mkha' lta bur dpag tu med// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// gsang ba'i thig
le bzhugs pa'i gnas// dpag med til 'bru rdul snyed kyi// rgyal ba kun dang lhan cig tu// ma lus bde ba chen po'i ro// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyis// ma gsungs rig pas nyams btang bas// mi
'dzin longs spyod chen po'i gnas// rang 'byung nyi zla rten gyi ro// ma spangs 'dus pas 'du 'bral med// gsang ba'i thig le bcud 'dus pa// nam mkha' gang ba bde ba'i ro// gnyis med 'khril ba'i stobs

las byung// mkha' dbyings byang chub 'byor pa'i sems// ma btang ma spros thig le che// nam mkha' rgyas pa'i mtha' bzhin du// bde ba'i tshad kyang dpag tu med// yab yum gnas pa'i grangs tshad kyang// nam

mkha'i khams kyi rdul snyed de// re re'ang bde ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdul snyed nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// yab yum gnyis med 'brel ba yi// thabs dang shes rab bcud 'dus pa// gang yang mi sgrib thig

le'i ngo// snang gsum mtshan ma las 'das pa// sangs rgyas rin chen kun gyi bcud// bye ba rdul snyed grangs 'das pa'i// ma lus kun dang lhan cig tu// mos dang chags pa'i khyad par gyis// cha lugs mtha'

yas snang ba ni// la lar chags par lta ba'i tshul// de bzhin 'jam par smra ba dang// la lar 'khyud cing lta ba ste// la lar sen thabs zhal sbyor zhing// la lar mnye dang rdebs dang 'bud// 'gyed dang 'dud

dang 'gying ba yi// dkar 'dzin ston dang lte ba ston// 'o dang 'tshir dang dgod pa dag/ sna tshogs rol pa 'di dag gis// ma chags pa dag chags byed cing// chags pa myur du nyams par byed// tha skam myur du
rengs byed cing// bde chen lo tog skyed par byed// bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yi// lha dang lha mo 'khor bcas pas// steg cing 'dzum pas lhan cig tu// rol cing glu ni len par byed// e ma'o

sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bde ba che// lhan cig skyes pa mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba ste// rdo rje pad+mar bcug bskyod pas ni brtags pa'i snang ba nub// ma lus khyab pas mkha' ltar dga' bar byas kyang

dbang po rlung gis rlabs// bde ba'i sa bon zag pa rnams ni slar yang ldang bar byed// rgyu ba rnam par chad pa'i kha sbyor bde chen ni// nam mkha'i rgya mnyam yun yang de srid bar du gnas pa ste// 'dod pa'i

yon tan lnga ni lha mo khyod la tshang ba ste// bdag ni khyod la bsten cing dga' bas mig bteg ma lus rgyal ba'i zhing du blta// gang tshe 'gro ba tha mal bder spyod yul la chags par zhugs pa na// dga'

dang bde dang rtse gcig yid 'ong 'dod par rab zhugs pas// dbang po gnyis rol nyi zla phrad cing bde chen mchog skyes che// skye rga na 'chi re dogs ngo tsha mi tsha grags pa'i chos brgyad tshod kyang byis pas mi shes so// gang
zhig thabs dang shes rab bral bas gsang ba'i don 'jug pa// rgya mtsho la ni sa bon btab bzhin 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ste// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' tha skabs te// rgyal ba nyid

kyang thabs dang shes rab bral bas byang chub myu gu gtan nas skams ho// 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis// rdul snyed bcas pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// rang rang rgyan dang gos dor te// dpa' bo sgeg mo'i tshul
'dzin cing// dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed du// glu dang gar ni sna tshogs kyis// tha mal yid rtogs bcad nas ni// bde chen yid ni 'phrog par mdzad// de bzhin dkyil 'khor bsam yas

dang// zhing thabs bde ba rmad 'byung ba// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa// dpag med mtha' mas cir snang yang// rang byung ye shes byang chub sems// thig le gcig gi ngo bo las// mdzad pa'i gar thabs

sna tshogs kyis// 'dul ba'i dbang du ci yang spro// thabs la thabs kyis dbang sgyur bas// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// thabs chen sgyu
ma rmad du byung// sgyu ma skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// kun nas 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor
te// kun gyi rang bzhin 'byung gnas nyid// bya ba byed la byas pa med// zad dang 'phel ba med pa yi// dngos grub gter chen bsam mi khyab// ye shes thig le rang snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas
mchog/ mtha' dbus med pa'i ye shes ni// gcig ces 'di zhes brjod du med// nam mkha' rang 'byung rtag pa ltar// 'pho 'gyur med pas de bzhin no// nam mkha' mtha' dbus med pa
bzhin// rang 'byung ye shes thog mtha' med// ma byung ma skyes byang chub sems// ye shes nyi ma'i 'od ltar gsal// sangs rgyas sems can grol thar kun// ma lus rang rig 'od gsal bas// rang byung ye
shes rang snang phyir// mkhyen dang bsgribs pa chung zad med// mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyag gcig la// rang gi cha shas chos phral bas// nam mkha'i mtha' thug chos rnams kun// skad cig ma 'dres tshul

du mkhyen// rang rig byang chub sems nyid las// mtho dman blang dor ma dmigs pas// 'khor ba'i ngo bor rang snang yang// ma chags skyon med pad+ma 'dra// dpag med yon tan ngo bo rnams// rang 'byung rig

pa rang snang bas// ma lus ngo mtshar rgya mtsho rnams// rang snang gzhan las thob bya med// byin brlabs cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// rang 'byung nyid las rnam par spro// tshul ni rnam pa sna tshogs te// dag dang ma dag
khyad par gyis// ngo bo gcig las ma g.yos kyang// mos pas mthong tshul de bzhin no// gsung ni nam mkhas khyab par ni// phyogs bcu khyab par sgra sgrogs pa// mos pa bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// bsam yas

'dul thabs sna tshogs snang// thugs ni ma lus mkhyen pa'i thugs// phan dang bder bcas brtser ldan pa'i// mngon shes mkhyen pa'i ye shes spro// ye shes thugs la khyad par med// yon tan tshad khyad bral ba
ste// nam mkha'i nor bu gter 'chang ba// dpag med bsam pa bskang ba'i phyir// byin brlabs yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul// phrin las byin brlabs rang snang ba// 'gro 'ong med pa'i don tshul gyis// dpag
bsam bum dang rin chen gyi// bya byed med par don rnams rdzogs// ma lus spros pa rnam dag cing// rang 'byung rig pa mtha' dbus med// ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas te// bde ba chen po chos kyi sku// 'dod

pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// gnyis med ngang la kun rdzogs pas// de nyid tshad bral mnga' brnyes pas// longs spyod yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku// sku gcig thig le'i ngo bo las// 'jig rten khams ni thams

cad du// ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin du// rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa'i sku// ma byung ma skyes don rtogs pas// ma lus dbyer med rdo rje nyid// mi 'jigs gnyen po kun bral ba// rdo rje sku zhes rnam par
bstan// gang du mngon par byang chub pa'i// 'od gsal nam mkha'i mtha' dbus med// sku bzhi mtha' yis ma reg pa// dang po mngon par byang chub pa'o// ma lus dbyer ba mtha' spangs shing// de ltar kun
dang mnyam par gnas// don gyis ma lus khyab 'gyur ba// brjod med don gyi gsung nyid do// sku dang phyag rgya gzigs tshul gyis// ting 'dzin dgongs pas 'dul ba la// brjod med tshul gyis
gang ston pa// brda yi gsung du rnam par bstan// gang yang rung ba mthong thos tshe// dpa' bos bltas pas g.yul sel ltar// dngos pos byang chub nam mkhar rtogs// byin brlabs rtogs pa'i gsung zhes
bya// gang gi don du gang snang ba// gnyen po bar chad mi gnas shing// gzhan dag pham byed mi thub pa// zil gyis gnon pa'i gsung du brjod// tshig gcig brjod pas tshig mtha' yas// mos pa de rnyed rnam

grol cing// yon tan rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs// 'di ni brjod pa tshig gi gsung// ji snyed mang por rnam spros kyang// chos kyi dbyings la khyad par med// rtog la rnam rtog mtshan ma yang// mi rtog ye shes grol

ba'i thugs// gnyis med bde ba chen po yis// 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga la rol// ma lus bde bar snang ba'i tshe// 'di ni bde ba chen po'i thugs// bdag gzhan phyi nang mi mnga' yang// rang 'byung gnyis kyi

phyogs bral bas// gdul bya'i bsam pa kun mkhyen pas// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i thugs// ji snyed rig pa'i don snang zhing// ma lus kun gyi ngo bo la// skye 'jig gnyen po gdod nas stong// mi 'gyur rdo
rje thugs zhes bya// dpag med nam mkha'i zhing khams dang// che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i gdan// zag pa med pa'i rgyan rnams dang// ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa
yi// 'od zer tshogs ni rnam par snang// gzhan yang yon tan chen po ni// mtha' dbus med pa'i nam mkha' ltar// dpag cing gzhal bar mi nus te// zag med che ba'i yon tan snang// gzhan yang mdzad pa'i
phrin las ni// gdul bya'i yul ni ji snyed pa// mdzad pa'i sgo ni bsam yas te// mtha' thug med par rnam par snang// 'di dag bsdus pas bshad bya na// zhi rgyas dbang drag la sogs pas// mtha' yas bzhis

ni rnam par bsdus// lhun gyis grub par kun kyang 'grub// mdor na 'bras bu'i rnam grangs ni// bsdus pas nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po
las// lhun gyis grub pa ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// dpag med rgyal bas dbang bskur ba// gsang ba'i bdag po sngags kyi mdzod// gter

'dzin rgyal po stobs po che// rang gi lag gi rdo rje nyid// dga' zhing mgu bas gsor byas te// bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yis// rab tu bskor ba byas pa yis// 'jig rten drug tu bcas pa dag/ 'khrugs shing
rnam par g.yo mdzad de// kun tu rab g.yo rnam par g.yo// stong gsum 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas// 'od dang sgra yis gang mdzad de// rmad 'byung sku gsung thugs rnams kyi// ngo mtshar cho

'phrul rnam par snang// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad 'byung gi/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang// 'dod yon lnga yis khyab mdzad de// rgyal ba'i tshogs kun mnyes par byas// kun kyang dga' zhing mos pa

yis// zhing khams rdul dang mnyam pa yi// 'khor tshogs rnams ni bstod pa 'di// sna tshogs sgras ni glu ru blangs// oM AHhU~M a la la ho// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i thugs ni mi skye ye shes bde ba'i thugs// mi rtogs
gsal ba'i thugs ni kun la khyab par gnas// gang yang dbyer med 'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas min skye 'jig med// dam pa'i thugs la byung tshor g.yo 'gog ci yang med pas bde ho// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i

sku ni sna tshogs 'od 'bar bde ba'i sku// sna tshogs mtha' yas ji ltar snang ba ngo bos dben// de nyid 'du ba'i thabs kyis de ltar yid 'phrog tshim pa'i sku// mtha' yas sna tshogs bye brag ji ltar gsal yang

nam mkha'i ngang du bye brag med ho// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i yon tan yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo dpag med rgyas par snang// 'gro ba rnams ni yid 'phrog bltas pas chog shes

med par mdzes// rgyal ba ma lus yon tan rdzogs par snang la de dag mtha' thug med ho// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i gsung ni zab cing rgya cher nam mkha' 'dra// ma lus go zhing tshim mdzad rdo rje'i sgra 'byin snyan sgrogs

pa// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas mos dang 'thad pa de bzhin rnam par snang ho// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i phrin las sna tshogs bya ba lhun gyis grub// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed 'gro ba ma lus kun 'dul ba// thabs dang
shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'di ni rnam par rol ho// de nas rgyal mchog skyes bu yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa// bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa la// gsang ba 'di ni gtad par

mdzad// nga yi gsang ba'i snying po 'di// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa kun gyi rang bzhin te// ma lus kun gyi thabs su snang// gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa ste// dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul thugs

kyi rgyud// chos rnams ma lus kun snang ba// gsang ba'i me long thabs kyi rgyud// rgyal ba rdul snyed kun 'dus nas// dam pa 'di la bsngags par mdzad// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i rgyud chen po// zab mo'i lung gi nges
don 'di// rigs chad dman pa'i gang zag gis// thams cad la ni me long ltar// bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang bas// ston pa gnyis la rgyab phyogs shing// brtags pa'i phyi rol chos la zhen// slob
dpon la ni brnyas byed dang// rdo rje spun la sdang sems che// zab mo'i don la skur byed cing// gsang rgyud don la 'phya ba dang// ser sna rang phyogs chags pa che// dad dang dam tshig mi ldan

zhing// rgyal srid rin chen mi gtong ba'i// phyi nang gnyis lta'i gang zag la// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// lus sems bral bar byed gyur kyang// gsang ba'i glegs bam mi bstan na// dbang dang dngos grub
nams kyang min// rmongs pas gal te byin na ni// de nyid mnar med dmyal bar ltung// dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// phun sum tshogs pa kun gtong zhing// dam pa'i yo byad ldan gyur pas// lus dang srog

la'ang mi lta na// dman pa'i longs spyod nams kyang min// theg pa che la mos pa dang// brtul zhugs snying brtser gus par ldan// rdo rje slob dpon bsnyen bkur zhing// skyon dang spyo ba yongs su bzod// bskal
par 'grogs kyang yid mi 'khrug/ nyes dang legs pa ci la yang// ngo mtshar skyo ba'i 'du shes med// rang bzhin bzang dang tshul shes dang// 'grogs pas dug nad mi ldang ba'i// dam pa 'di la gsang ba
gtang// slob dpon man ngag mi ldan cing// gsang ba'i don la ma goms pas// rang rtags log pa'i tshad ma yis// gsang ba'i sbas don gtan la 'bebs// blun po mun pas chod pa rnams// log par zhen
pa'i rjes 'brangs nas// mthong ba'i chos la dmyal bar smin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di// ma lus kun gyi gsang yin pas// rtogs nas gsal bar gang byed

pa// dbang dang dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ste// bdag dang gzhan don lhun gyis grub// rdul snyed zhing la bsnyen bkur zhing// tshogs kyi bla ma bsten byas pa'i// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// de bas rgyal

sras gcig gi yul// rnyed dang bkur stis 'tsho ba yi// grags pa'i stobs ldan rnam par spangs// a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las mthar phyin

pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul drwa ba rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang// ban+de dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur
cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// slad nas bi ma la mi tra nyid wa ze mo dge slong masayang dang yang du zhus pa 'di gzhan la spel na dam tshig nyams so////
bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad

dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te// 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo khyab par gsal ba la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs 'bar ba'i

gzhal yas khang/ rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs

rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun du 'khyil pa/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs te// rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye
brag dang khyad par du gyur pa'i tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang/ chun 'phyang dang/ shar bu'i rgyan dang/ gzugs sna tshogs dang/ sgra sna tshogs dang/ dri sna

tshogs dang/ ro sna tshogs dang/ reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la/ mi sgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas bklubs pa/ rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam

par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa'i phyi dang nang med par kun du yang nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang/ stobs kyi glang po'i khri dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rta'i khri dang// dbang gi rma bya'i khri

dang// thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang// rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang/ gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du yang zhal thal

le bar gsal zhing/ mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun du snang ba/ lhun gyis grub pa'i sku gsung thugs chen po las thabs dang shes rab

kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag/ ye shes rin po che'i phyag 'bar ba can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa 'di lta
ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi
rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang/ de dag kun kyang mthing ga dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ le brgan dang/ ljang gu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/ btsun mo dam pa'i snang

ba'i dbyings dang/ sra ba'i dbyings dang/ mnyen pa'i dbyings dang/ dro ba'i dbyings dang/ bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa/ btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kun du mtha' yas par

khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang/

byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang/ btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang/ mnyan par bya ba dang/ bsnam par bya ba dang/ myang bar bya ba'i tshogs dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang/ byang chub chen po rdo

rje thos byed dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje snom byed dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang/ btsun mo 'das pa dang/ da ltar 'byung ba dang/ ma byon pa'i tshogs dang/ 'joms pa chen mo reg pa dang/
'joms pa chen mo reg byed dang/ 'joms pa chen mo reg shes dang/ btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang/ chad par ma yin pa dang/ bdag tu ma yin pa dang/ mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa de lta bu'i
tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang/ gsung

dang/ thugs dang/ yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo// e/ e/ e ma'o// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dang/ dbang sgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs dang rang snang ba nyid ting nge 'dzin gzugs brnyan sgyu

ma rnam dag gsal ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin nor bu rin po che mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig

tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rjes btsun

mo chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// o~M chos kyi chos nyid shes bya'i dbyings// kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum// ma g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// bdag
yin bdag gi spyod yul ba// phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal// nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu// ma chags pad+ma'i gdan gting ba// dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas// rnam par thar pa'i sgo
bzhi la// phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan// dbang dang skal min gsal ba'i phyir// nang dang phyi rim lcags dang ldan// rgyal ba yongs kyi sbas pa yi// sus kyang gting dpag dka' ba de// kun tu
bzang po nyid kyis gzigs// zhes brjod pas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to// zhugs nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po
dang// gnyis su med pa'i longs spyod bde ba la mnyam par gnas te ched du brjod pa brjod do// sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso// kun tu bzang po rdo rje yid// ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te// shar
phyogs mngon dga'i bsam yas na// nI la lta bu'i gter 'byin pa// gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi ldeg mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye nas// byang chub mchog gis nang gtan dgrol// mnyam sbyor pad+ma'i gdan
la bzhugs// 'gro don byang chub sems bskyed nas// 'gro lnga skye bzhi dbang du bsdus// sku gsung thugs gnas dbang bskur to// zhes brjod pas thams cad mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje nyid du gsal bar
gyur to// zhugs pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e

ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI// me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma
ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas shing// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa min// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas
nyid kyis mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur

nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye shes dben// srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing// snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan nas// phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// thams cad
mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi 'tshal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa

nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye shes sangs rgyas pa'i sems ye shes su bskyed
pa 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi
chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// gnas pa
med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na
dmigs pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong// 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med// ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad dang btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad mnyes pas khyab par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i
chos// sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin gsang// ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang// gzhan du min yang shin tu gsang// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig

pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na/ 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa la 'gro ba lnga'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas ched du brjod
pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang// gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang bdag gis so sor
'dzin// sus kyang mi 'ching bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yin// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa 'dor// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun

rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad// ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye
shes su bskyed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang

gsung dang thugs rdo rje las bton to// bton nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snrel zhi dang/ yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re rer thub pa chen po
bcom lda 'das re res 'dul ba rnam bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de bltams pa dang/ rab tu 'byung ba dang/ dka' thub mdzad pa dang/ sangs rgyas pa dang/ bdud btul ba dang/ chos kyi

'khor lo bskor ba dang/ cho 'phrul chen po ston pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa ston pa'i thub pa dus bzhi kun tu mkhyen pa dang// thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud du kun tu mkhyen pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul

gyi spyan gyis kun tu gzigs pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun tu gsan pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho gas kun tu don spyod pa dang/ zag pa med pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa drug

dang// kun tu sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang// kun tu gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa

grangs med par yang phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to// de ltar snang bar gyur nas ji snyed pa'i thub pa chen po snying rje'i go 'phang chen po thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa dang/

nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang/ bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos

kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungs so// gsung ngo// gsung bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'dzin pa 'khrul pa la dgos pa
dang/ las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang/ las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos gos par mi 'gyur ba dang/ gos pa med pa'i ston pa'i mthar thug go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/
'khor ba'i skyon dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o dkyil 'khor bsam yas par// snying po bla med ji snyed
pa'i// gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs rang bzhin rgyal// mtha' dang bral bas bdag med pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i
chos// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis// stong gi 'jig rten bsam yas par// phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor// rtog pa'i bag chags stug po yin// mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur// de nyid ji
bzhin dbyings nyid dang// rang bzhin bdag med tshul gcig ste// rang bzhin nyid la nyams pa med// yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// de nyid ngo bo nyid dbyings
pas// rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// log par rtog pa tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin// log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de// gzhan du

g.yo ba ci yang med// log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang// gzhi rtsa med de skad cig ma// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul// nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun// rnam
dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/ theg pa bzhi yis nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi
'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// ma rig smin mdzad gdul ba'i phyir// 'byung gnas mya ngan 'da' bar ston// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang// dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang// sku dang gsung

dang thugs kyi rgyud// ji snyed 'jig rten mtha' klas par// phyogs bcur kun du rab grags pa// gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi// ston
pa'i thub pa bsam yas pa// 'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs// chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam// ston pa'i don dang mthun phyogs su// ming nyid tshig tu btags nas bstan// ston ming tshig la
dngos po med// ces brjod pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis lhun gyis grub pa chen por gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi

gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo// a'o srid rtse'i nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'phros// rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang// gnas dag sdug bsngal
'khrul 'khor la sogs pa// log rtog nyid las gzhan du ci yang med// stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs// dmigs bya dmigs med med par dran dbang sgyur// ngo mtshar sku gsung yon tan zhing

khams la// gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// thub pa drug gis sprul pa grangs med pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par de
bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen
pos 'gro ba thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yod par bstan pa dang/ rigs rgyud drug tu yang bshad/ de la chos nyid kyi rigs ni thams cad kun la yang yod do// nam mkhas kyang kun la khyab par
gnas so// de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang/ nam mkhas kun la khyab kyang rnam par thar pa'i don ma rtogs na me long g.yas g.yogs pa dang 'dra ste gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so
zhes gsungs nas yang 'di skad rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so// mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po dang// rgya mtsho chen por chu klung 'bab pa ltar// bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu// rnam
pa'i theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus// a ho// bdag med gnyis rtogs pha rol phyin rdzogs pa// sa bcu rim gyis bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas sar 'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam// bden pa
gnyis kyis rab tu thob par 'gyur// phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa'i// dngos po gzugs la thogs med rab tu 'jug/ dge bshes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs// byang chub sar 'gro yid
bzhin bde ba'i mchog/ bden bzhi don rtogs rab tu spong ba yi// ye shes bcu drug cha sbyangs rab zhi ba'i// rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni// nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sa ru

'gro// theg pa gang du bstan pa ma nges pa'i// yang na kun la mthun nas 'byam par 'jug/ yang na nges med 'di zhes brtag tu med// 'di ni ma nges rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs// dge bcu spyod cing mi dge spong

byed pa// 'dod khams lha dang mi ru skye ba'i rgyu// tshad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo sgom byed pa// tshangs gnas lha sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab gyur kyang// rang rig rtogs pa'i skal
dang mi ldan na// ji ltar dmus long mdun du mdog bstan bzhin// 'di ni skal med rigs chad sa yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab pa yis// bla med theg pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang// so so

rang rig blo la snang bar zad// ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang// 'khrul pa'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la 'gyur ba med// mi dmigs rang rig goms byas bla na med pa'i
mchog/ log rtog bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin gyur na// dngos med mi sdug sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur// yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na// bde gshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong// theg
mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa ni// ngan song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas// nam mkha'i dbyings ni de nyid bsam yas par// nyi zla gza' skar mtshan ma glog 'gyu dang// 'ja' tshon sprin mang
sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur kyang// nam mkha'i dbyings la gyur cing nyams pa med// mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par// sku gsung yon tan phrin las rmad 'byung dang// 'jig rten gtso mchog ma
lus thams cad dang// 'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnam mang yang// de bzhin nyid la 'phel zhing bri ba med// ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba
las/ thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod pa dang rigs rgyud chad pa dang rigs brgyad so sor dbye ba'i mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu

gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo bar chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku
gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// a rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las/ shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs kun gang bar gsal gyur nas// bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par brtan// de las ming tshogs

gsal bar kun// spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// brten 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// a/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/
