sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ 'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos kun du g.yos nas chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du

gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ni stong dang mi stong gi/ dbu ma dmigs su yod ma yin// thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun// yi ge phreng ba nyid la

gnas// a nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa
lnga'i ming// tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas// sna tshogs don kun smra zhing ston// dngos med yi ge rang bzhin sems// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang// dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs
kyis// rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi// ye shes sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yi// yi ge mgo nas k+Sha la rdzogs// sems ni rang bzhin

yi ge ste// yi ge dngos po yod ma yin// dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che// sku gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyi// ya mtshan 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa// dbyings la dbyings

kyis bris pa ste// yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod// mgo ni ma nor lam yin te// tshig ni shes rab ming du smras// shad ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod// a ni skye med de bzhin nyid// Tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid// Ta
ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid// Da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid// D+ha ni sgyu 'phrul rnam dag nyid// Na ni kun tu sgyu 'phrul nyid// tha ni drwa bas mngon rdzogs nyid// ta ni drwa

bas brtan pa nyid// da ni drwa bas lham me nyid// d+ha ni drwa bas 'khyil pa nyid// na ni drwa bas kun du 'gyur// ka ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi

mchog/ g+ha ni ljags kyi thugs kyi mchog/ nga ni thugs kyang 'jig byed pa'o// tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog/ tsha ni snyan gyi sku yi mchog/ dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog/ dz+ha ni ljags kyi sku yi mchog/ nya ni sku yang 'jig byed pa'o// pa ni spyan gyi gsung

gi mchog/ pha ni snyan gyi gsung mchog ste// ba ni shangs kyi gsung mchog yin// b+ha ni ljags kyi gsung gi mchog/ ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed// ya ni skye ba rnam par dag/ wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin// ra

ni 'jig pa dag pa ste// la ni stong pa dag pa'o// sha ni rtag med dag pa ste// Sha ni chad pa'ang yod ma yin// sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa// ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid// k+Sha ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs// i

ni rdul snyed lha rnams su// I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin// u ni rdul snyed mi rnams su// U ni rdul snyed byol song rnams// e ni rdul snyed yi dgas su// ai ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams// o ni thams cad 'jig
par byed// au ni thams cad zhig pa yin// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi phreng ba bsdus// a ho// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil

'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo// a ho// thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo// 'bras bu rgyal ba'i smin grub

ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i dam// 'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin// a ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig
tu'o zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge 'khor lor gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las// yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las shin tu gsang ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi rgyud de'i phyi pa dang/ nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gzhan la khams bcwa brgyad du bstan/ gtsug lag thams cad la yang khams

bcwa brgyad du bstan pa yin/ lung gi spyi 'di ni shin tu zab pa'i phyir khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bstan te/ lung gi spyi yang rgyud dang gsung rab thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin// gsang ba'i dbang po dang gsang
ba'i yul gnyis ka yang/ skye mched dang khams thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir shin tu gsang bar gsungs so// dkyil 'khor de dag shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir nyid la nyid
ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// thams cad kun la rang bzhin gnas// ngang gis dag mnyam ma rtogs pas// kun la yod cing rang bzhin gsang// gzhan du min la shin tu

gsang// don nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i rgyu// mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyis gsung// 'di ni byang chub snying po mchog/ a ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// dbang po yul du snang ba'i rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i
dkyil 'khor nyid// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru 'byor// skye mched khams rnams bcwa brgyad po// sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid// thams cad byang chub sems ma
yi// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang por 'dus// rdo rje dbang po gsang ba'i thabs// dbang po yul nyid shes rab dbyings// dbang po'i thugs ni rdo rje sems// thams cad 'byung ba'i gter nyid dang// thams cad

'gro ba'i gnas nyid de// de yis ma bskyed gang yang med// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu// de las thams cad skye zhing 'byung// kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin te// bde ba byang chub sgrub pa'i rdzas// de las bskyed

cing de las spro// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i gnas// dbang po rdo rje pad+mor ldan// gnyis med byang chub sems 'phro na// mi dmigs bde dang longs spyod 'phro// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// gsang

ba'i lha mo bzhi rnams dang// mchod pa'i lha mo rdzogs ldan bzhi// 'jug dang ldang dang gnas dang smon pa'i byang chub sems// g.yo dang bskyod dang ldang dang gnas// 'gug dang 'dzin dang de bzhin te// bsdus

dang 'khril ba'i don bsgrub phyir// bsdams dang mi gtong dbang sgyur te// bde ba sgra snyan phyogs bcur sgrogs// shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi brjid 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen phreng bar 'bar// dbyangs snyan yid
'phrog gzi ldan 'bar// gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo// kun du tshim byed bro bsung thim// lha mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro// 'od gsal 'phro bas kun du 'bar// bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam
pa'i dbyings// a la la ho// gsang ba'i dbang po pad+mar ldan gyur nas// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su// pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs// sa bcu rim gyis bkod med rdzogs// kun du 'od gsal

pad+ma spyan yang rdzogs// yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa// yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan// thabs dang shes rab bla med sa yang rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par rol//
a la la ho// de bzhin nyid kyi gsang mchog las// khams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// bcwa brgyad po ni rgyud gzhan bzhin// gsum ni de bzhin kun gyi bdag/ bcwa brgyad 'byung ba'i gnas yin

te// byang chub 'grub pa'i zhing yang yin// bde ba 'byin pa'i rgyu yang yin// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// dbang po rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal// yul ni pad+ma bde mchog dbyings// sems ni byang chub 'byung
ba'i gter// dbang po yul sems ldan gyur nas// gsang ba mchog gi 'phrul chen spro// dkyil 'khor rdul snyed grangs med dang// phun sum tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams// gsang ba mchog gis 'byin par
byed// 'di ni rtse gcig yin par gsungs// gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni// lta ba dman la bshad byas na// dus min par ni srog zad nas// mgo 'gas snying yang tshig par 'gyur// khab len gyis ni

lcags sdud ltar// mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par// ngan song mi khom bskal par brgyud par 'gyur// de bas 'di ni shin tu gsang bar bya// shes rab rgya chen blo zab yangs pa yis// blo brtan snying rje che

dang dad ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan// gzhan du nams kyang sbyin mi bya zhes nyid la yang nyid brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsdus nas// thams cad ma lus
par dbyings su bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par spros pa 'di ched du brjod do// rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun
gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te// yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa

yi// dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsir 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nad sel cing// longs spyod 'byung zhing ngan song sbyong// ci yang gzhan du 'gyur bar 'grub// nam
mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing// 'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang// chur 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin te// 'jig rten khams ni gtor ba dang// thams cad stongs shing lhung bar 'gyur// dgug dang btang dang
bcing dang dgrol// gso dang bsad dang pham dang rgyal// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// de nyid ye shes rang snang ba'i// ming tshig gzugs tshogs yid bzhin gyis// mun la snang byung ji bzhin
du// 'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul// ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan// 'grub 'gyur mi ldan don med brlag/ dus gsum
rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod/ 'phel 'grib med par 'byung ba ste// dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin// sna tshogs rnam
par 'byung zhing 'gyur// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par// rtogs pa'i dbang sgyur ting 'dzin yin// gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa// de yis chos kyi dbyings mi shes// de phyir dngos dang dngos med
pa// 'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min// kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin// gnas su ma yin gang

yang min// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu// thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas// tha dad min la tha dad pa'i// nang dang nang gi phyi rol pa// dkyil 'khor bsam yas
ye shes rol// 'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya mchog/ gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su// sngags dang phyag rgyar rab brtan na// dngos grub ya mtshan chen por
'gyur// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo/ e ma'o snying por lam
bcas pas// 'jigs med dbyings nyid kun bzang phyag rgya mchog/ rang bzhin sku gsung thugs chen po// byang chub lhun grub bdal ba'i ngang// snying po nyid ni snying por kun bcas kun tu gnas// de nyid

rdzogs pa'i ngang las dngos grub kun shar kun tu gnas// a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor las lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis sngags 'chang rnams lhar sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di don yod par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di
brjod do// e ma'o ye nas rnam dag pa'i// thabs dang shes rab ldan par gnas// byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar// de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs// chos rnams thams cad bdag med
pa'i// dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal// gcig dang spros pa thams cad med// dkyil 'khor spros med zlum po'i tshul// ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bu ldan// thams cad

mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor// thugs rje byin brlabs 'phros pa yis// ye shes bzhi yi dkyil 'khor spro// ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// byin brlabs ya mtshan bsam mi
khyab// rang snang ba yi thabs las 'byung// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i// thugs rje rgyas pa'i gzhal yas khang// dbus mtha' med par rgyas par gnas// stong smon mtshan med 'od
gsal 'jug/ de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir bshad// der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan khri 'bar// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir// ma
chags pad+mo 'bar ba'i gdan// zad med ye shes gter gyur pas// yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan// ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir// ta la'i ljon shing rang bzhin gnas// re ba yid bzhin skong
ba'i phyir// dpag bsam shing gi rin chen 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen rgyan gyis bskor// thams cad la ni dbang sgyur phyir// 'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor// gsang ba de nyid nges pa las// 'phrul
chen bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor// thams cad ma lus dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'di ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang// gzugs brnyan lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum// ting 'dzin
lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog brten// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas/ lhag pa'i
gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la
nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye shes phyogs bzhi dbu brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor

pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan bar khyams dang// kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor

bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung// nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang// g.yas nas
mthong thos mnam pa dang// myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang// thos byed mnam byed myong byed rnams// btsun mo dag dang bcas par gnas// bar khyams la ni thub drug
dang// mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang// bya ba bdag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu
'bar// ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul
can// gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin can// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khyil pa ste// dbus mtha' med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// sku yi phyag

rgya che mchog ni// de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang// 'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// mthun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston// ston nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul// tshul nyid

dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// de'i tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la// so so 'dra bar snang ba ni// de bzhin nyid kyi ma bcos kyang// las 'phro dbang gis so sor snang// dper na
me long chu zla bzhin// de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la// sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan// dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul// gzhan yang thig mchog rim pa
bzhin// 'og min bla med gnas mchog tu// sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste// sku yis chos rnams mjal bar ston// me long bstan

pa'i tshul bzhin du// dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel// 'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na// byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med// me long bzhin du sku la snang// de nas sa bcu rim gyis 'byung// bla med
byang chub yang dag 'thob// chos sku dpag med brjod du med// longs spyod zad med rin chen gter// sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs// spyod yul kun tu maN+Da

la// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog/ de la sogs te bsam yas mchog/ skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung sku// nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas// zad mi shes kyi gter

du gyur// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sku// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs// zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu
med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed du gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i yon tan chen po'i dkyil 'khor de dag
nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo// a ho// dmigs bya dmigs med mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab// ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod
mi lang// mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings// ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnams spro spros pa med// ye nas kun khyab dkyil 'khor bsam yas zhing gi rdul snyed

du// ye nas rnam spros snying po kun gnas gnas pa med// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// a'o zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste bcu
pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang// nyid la nyid mnyes par mchod cing/ kun tu bzang po dgyes te/ phyogs
bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas thams cad gzhal yas khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ rgyas pa/ mtha' dbus med par khyab cing 'od zer sgrib pa
med pa rang byung ba la bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// nyid kyi dbyings nyid 'phro ba dpag tshad med// kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su ma chad pa'i// srid gsum yang dag mnyam sbyor spyod yul
te// mtshan 'dzin 'das pa mchog gi rgyu las byung// dbang sgyur shin tu rnam par dag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa 'og min gnas bzhugs nas// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i bla med rjes 'dod dang// 'jig rten
'khor gyi gtsos bkur dbang phyug dang// gzhan dang 'jig rten phyogs bcu khams gnas pa// bdud rtsi ro yis dga' ba bde chen 'grub// dug gsum dri bral bdud sde tshar bcad pa'i// 'das dang ma byon de

bzhin nyid du sbyor// shes rab thabs ldan nges pa'i don phyung ba// rig pa'i thabs chen dbang sgyur nyid du bsgom// stong smon mtshan med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i// zad med bsod nams tshogs kyis brgyan

par 'gyur// b+h+ru~M/ rang byung nyi zla pad+ma rin chen rgyas la bzhugs// rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs su chud pa yi// mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun la rol pa mdzad// bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid gnas
pa// dus bzhi rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'ub// thams cad 'od gsal dkyil 'khor thugs chud pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang las 'byung// spyod yul 'phrog med brjod kyis mi lang ba'i// dus
bzhi mnyam nyid nges pa'i don nyid nyon// thugs rje dbang gis 'gro drug dus gnas bzhugs// nga dang bdag med mnyam pa'i dbyings mkhyen pa// mnyam pa'i don grub rdo rje can gyis bya// rnam par rtog med
byang chub rdo rje can gyi sku// shes rab mchog gis ma lus yongs bsdus pa// bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang du byon// thabs chen ma 'dres rnam par sbas pa yi// dmigs med bde gshegs nyid
dbyings thugs chud pa// thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi dbyings gnas mthas gtugs pa// shes rab mchog ldan gsal ba'i ngang 'chang ba// thugs rje
byin brlabs sna tshogs 'phro ba yi// bde gshegs ma lus thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan 'phro// rang rig rgyal po che yis rtogs par 'gyur// zhes nyid la nyid du ched du

brjod de rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gzhal yas khang dbub pa thabs dra ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang

bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang/ thugs rje las 'di dag phyung ngo// b+h+ru~M bi shwa bi shud d+he/ hU~M badzra d+h+r-Ika/ o~M dzI na dzIka/ swA rat+na d+h+r-Ika/ A~M A ro lIka/ hA~M pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ mu~M d+hA twI shwa ri/ lA~M dwe Sha ra ti/ mA~M mo ha ra

ti/ pA~M rA ga ra ti/ tA~M badzra ra ti/ k+ShIM hi rA dzA ya/ tra~M A ka sha gar+b+hA ya/ hrI ha hU~M ba da ma/ dzri ku ru pA Na hrI/ hU~M lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ tra~M mA l+ye sa ma ya hoHhrI gI te rA go\u0f85ha~M/ a nr-i t+ya rA ga ya mI/ mai d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ th+l+hIM nis+sa

ra ma bA ya swA hA// hU~M swa rA dza ya swA hA/ mu~M shrI a ra~M gA ya swA hA/ dzaHd+hU pa pra bi sha/ hU~M puSh+pa a bi sha/ ba~M dI pa su khi ni/ ho gan d+he tsit+taM/ hU~M ya mAn+ta krita phaT/ pradz+nyAn+ta krita phaT/ hU~M big+h+nAn+ta krita phaT/ hU~M pad+mAt+na krita

phaT/ o~M ma hA badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/ o~M ma hA rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/ o~M ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/ o~M ma hA karma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M

badzra tsit+ta hU~M/ a a a badzra b+ha dra sa man+ta a/ o~M mu ne krI~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne tru~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne sru~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne bra~M swA hA/ o~M mu ne k+Sha swA hA/ o~M mu ne ye swA hA/ e h+ye hi/ b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA kA ru ni ka/ tri sh+ya ho/ sa ma

ya sta~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHo~M AHhU~M swA hA/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ o~M AHhU~M swA hA/ o~M ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad po che// de nyid du

ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag gyur cig/ o~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ o~M badzra sa ma ya s+t+wo~M/ o~M badzra sa ma ya ho zhes brjod pas// gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs

bcu thams cad khyab par grags so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang/ bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med

pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do// de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen po// ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las byung

ngo// o~M shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M ma hA A dar+sha shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M ma hA pra t+ya baik+Sha NA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M ma hA sa man+ta shU nu tA dz+nyA na badzra

swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M ma hA kr-i t+ya a nuSh+ThAn shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bA' ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga

ta ma hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ zhes brjod pas thim par gyur to// gsal bar gyur

to// 'bar bar gyur to// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung// gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan

lag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab// sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags// thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog/ rgyud mchog rgyud chen dra ba las// bde ldan gsung gi don 'byung ba'ang// thams cad pad+ma'i

ngang gyur na// grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra// ji skad brjod kyang gsung mchog ste// theg pa mchog dman thams cad dang// log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad// byang chub rdo rje gsung du bsdus// bsdus

nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags// sgra nyid ma chags ngang du gsungs// gsungs pa nyid na brjod du med// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing so sor 'jal// dper na de bzhin sbrid sangs
bzhin// gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad go/ 'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin// theg pa mtho dman bsam yas kyang// de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te// gdul ba'i thabs su so sor thos// ji ltar gsung
rab kun brjod kyang// de bzhin nyid kyis gsungs pa med// yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung// ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang// thugs rje gsung gi byin brlabs kyis// 'gro don sna tshogs so sor

gsal// gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog/ de bzhin gsung gis 'gro don rnams// de bzhin ngang las ma g.yos kyang// dper na brag ca'i sgra bzhin no// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil

'khor bsdu ba dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas nyid kyi phyag rgya ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// o~M hU~M badzra

sa twa hU~M/ badzra pra b+hA na hU~M/ mU~M badzra gan d+ha hU~M/ o~M tsakra maN+Da la hU~M A~M/ lA~M badzra gan b+hA Sha lA~M/ swa rat+na pra b+hA na swA~M/ o~M badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha A~M/ o~M pad+ma pra b+hA na A~M/ pa~M badzra gan+d+ha pra b+han pA~M/ hA~M badzra ga tIk+Sh+Na pra b+hA na ha~M/ ta~M

badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na ta~M/ shI rat+na pra b+hA na shI hU~M/ badzra gan d+ha pra b+hA na g+ho Sha hU~M/ trA~M khaD+ga pra b+hA na trA~M/ trA~M badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na tri/ hrIHpad+ma pra b+hA na hrIHbadzra gan d+ha bA Sha pra b+hA na hrIHha badzra gan+d+ha b+hA

Sha pra b+hA na ha~M/ a badzra gan d+ha bA Sha pra b+hA na AHme kA la pra b+hA na me/ hU~M badzra ga na d+ha pra b+hA na b+hA Sha hU~M/ thA~M pra b+hA na maN+Da la thA~M/ swA~M badzra gan d+ha bA Sha pra b+hA na swA~M/ hU~M rat+na swa~M sA d+ha b+ha dra pra b+hA na swA~M hrIHbadzra gan d+ha bA Sha

pra b+hA na hrIHmu ut+pal nI la pra b+hA na mu/ A badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na AH/ phaT badzra a maHmut+ga ra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ o~M badzra gan+d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na o~M o~M/ phaT ma hA badzra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ hU~M ma hA rat+na badzra gan d+ha b+hA

Sha pra b+hA na hU~M hU~M/ phaT hriHpad+ma mut+ga ra pra b+hA na hrI hrIH/ o~M ma hA badzra pad+ma badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hrIHhrIH/ a karma mut+gar badzra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ a karma badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hU~M// a a a zhes brjod pas phyag
rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to// 'bar bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang/ kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems las phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil
'khor rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang yum gyi dbyings su 'dus par bstan nas ched
du brjod pa 'di brjod do// yang dag don gyi gsang mchog ni// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// nges pa'i don chen bzhi bcu gnyis// yid bzhin rin chen gsal 'bar thim// thams cad ma lus thig
le'i dbyings// sku lnga'i 'od zer mang po kun// thams cad yum 'gyur dbyings su thim// gsal 'bar sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi thigs pa ni// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// kha dog
gnas dang dbyibs ma yin// yon tan mchog gi snying po ni// rtog ge spyod yul yod ma yin// zab cing rgya chen rab sbyangs pa'i// gsal ldan brtan pa'i spyod yul te// gzhan nas btsal zhing brtag tu
med// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// sna tshogs 'jig rten brtan g.yo dang// rgyal ba mngon byung thams cad kun// nam mkha'i dbyings su ma gyur pa// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang na med// dus gsum
bde gshegs nyid kyi mnga'// sngon gyi bde gshegs thugs chud pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad thim// thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid de// dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor// shes rab
dbyings nyid 'byor pa yis// byang chub rdo rje thig le yin// dkyil 'khor gzhal yas lhun grub dang// rgya dang bral ba'i bsam yas kyis// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// yon tan mchog gi gnas yin
te// ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma// de yis ma zin gang yang med// rang gi rnam rtog ma yin pa// yang dag gshegs dang log rtog dang// gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs// phyogs bcu ma
lus thams cad kun// de la gsad cing gzung du med// kha dog dbyibs dang gnas ma yin// skyes bu dam pa mchog 'dod pas// de la rtag 'grus gsal bar gyis// de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni// rgyu 'bras
med pa'i dus gcig ste// thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du// yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par gyur// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor los bsdus// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// skye 'jig med pa'i dbyings la
zhugs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// mtha' yas 'jig rten bsam yas kun// rgyal ba yum gyi dbyings su thim// thams cad ma lus chos skur 'dus// ho/ chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid
do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thams cad yum gyi dbyings su 'dus pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ yan lag thams cad

dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul drwa bas mngon rdzogs pas// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying po

phyag rgya 'da' bar dka'// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las// sbyar ba phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// o~M dang mU~M gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol nas

rtser sprad pa// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// hU~M bsgreng rtse mor rdo rjer 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i
tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// mU~M kyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar

bkan// o~M bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// lA~M gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru
lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// swA~M rtser 'bar ba rin po che// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la
brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// mA~M gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// A~MHgyi rtse
mor pad+ma 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// pA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las

su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// hA~M gyi rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru
bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// tA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// ut+pal la sogs klu shing mtshan// rin chen myu gu ral gri
'bar// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen te// gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang// pi bang gar mkhan mchog nyid de// me tog phreng ba sbos mchod ma// mar me byug la sogs pa

yis// las la 'khril cing chos la brtan// dbu rnams byon nas 'dud pa'i tshul// gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// sgo bzhi phyag rgya chen po ni// nr-i mgo gdengs dang rdo rjes

gnon// thod phreng chen pos gnon pa dang// rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon// lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta hoH// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang// 'dud tshul 'khril ba gong ma bzhin// thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs
te// mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin no// gseg par dang ni pi bang dang// go cha po ti rin chen sgrom// me dang chu ru rab tu bstan// yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings// kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes

'phro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i dkyil// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te// yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid de// yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid// phyag rgya chen po tshogs mchog ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan

'byor na// ma bskyod ma bsgul thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sum 'phror 'bar// de ltar ldan
pa'i gtso mchog gis// rgyal ba rgya mchog de bzhin du// bcu gnyis drug gi 'od 'phro 'bar// de la sogs te bsam mi khyab// phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su// 'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston// theg
pa mtho dman thams cad dang// phyin ci log rnams bsam yas dang// zhi khro tshogs chen thams cad la// so sor mthun byas kun tu snang// dper na gar mkhan nyid 'dra ba// lus las ma dgod sna tshogs

ston// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// 'di zhes gcig ces brjod du med// gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro// bskyod dang spro ba de bzhin nyid// mdor na bskyod 'gul thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i
ngang du gnas// gnas nyid mi gnas gnas pa'ang min// de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad// mthe bo mdzub mo rdo rje 'dzin// mthe bo gung mo rgyal ba 'dzin// srin lag mthe bo chags pa

che// mthe'u chung mthe bo legs pa mchog/ hU~M hoH// mdzub mo gnyis sbyar rin chen mchog/ gung mo gnyis sbyar gzi brjid don// srin lag gnyis sbyar rgyal ba'i tog/ bzhad pa'i sgras ni mthe'u chung sprad// tro~M te

ru ha/ mdzub mo steng 'og chos kyi mchog/ gung mo steng 'og 'jam dpal mchog/ srin lag steng 'og 'khor lo mchog/ mthe'u chung steng 'og smra gsung yin// hrIHb+ha~M TA+o~M ho~M/ mdzub mo rgya gram las kyi mchog/ gung

mo rgya gram bsrung bar byos// srin lag rgya gram gnod sbyin mchog/ mthe'u chung rgya gram gnas par bshad// ha tru~M a b+ha~M/ phyag rgya brda tshig chen po 'dis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mdzes par snang// rang
bzhin dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs// glu gnyis phyag rgya ldan pa yis// sa ler gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bebs// phyag rgya spros pa chen pos ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam gnyis pa// dag par gsal bas

phyag rgya yin// yi ge so so gsal ba yis// gar du bsgyur bas mya ngan 'das// dzaHdang hoHla sogs pa yis// gar du bsgyur bas rdo rjer 'ching// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las phyag rgya spros pa'i
le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos mtshon cha dam tshig ces bya ba'i glu 'di blangs so// hU~M lus ngag yid gsum rdo rje ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku

gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gnas pas// ye shes rdo rje gsor zhing spro// e ma'o rdo rje che mchog ni// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma

g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la// rdo rje 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed rdo

rje 'chang zhes bya// hU~M// ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po gtsigs la btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang// dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da'

dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// hU~M phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// rdo rje rdo rje drag chen

dang// rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang// 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad
rdo rje nyid pas na// nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yin// de las rdo rje gsung 'byung ba'o// o~M badzra dz+wa lA na lArka hU~M phaT/ o~M/ lus ngag yid gsum 'khor lo ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes

te// snang mdzad 'khor lo dpa' bo yin// snang mdzad 'khor lo rang gnas pas// ye shes 'khor lo gsor zhing spro// e ma'o 'khor lo che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed

pas// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las// 'khor lo 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su

bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed 'khor lo 'chang zhes bya// hU~M/ ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang// dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad
kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir

ro// o~M/ 'khor lo 'khor lo drag chen dang// rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang// 'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing gzhig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// hU~M/ btsan

zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad 'khor lo nyid pas na// nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin// de las 'khor lo gsung 'byung ba// o~M tsakra dz+wa lA na lArka hU~M phaT// o~M/ lus ngag yid gsum pad+ma

ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// pad+ma sems dpa' dpa' bo yin// pad+ma sems dpar rang gnas pas// pad+ma dgra sta sor zhing spro// e ma'o pad+ma che mchog gi/ nyid kyi

mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas btab// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las// pad+ma

'chang rgyal thams cad kyis// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed pad+ma 'chang zhes bya// o~M ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po gtsigs ni btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang// dbang
chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'bebs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pa// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// hU~M/ bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags

pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// pad+ma dgra sta drag chen dang// rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang// 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul
phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad pad+ma nyid pas ni// nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin// de las pad+ma'i gsung phyung ba// o~M pad+ma dz+wa lA na lArka hU~M phaT/ swA~M/
lus ngag yid gsum rin chen ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// yon tan chen po dpa' bo yin// rin chen sems dpar nga gnas pas// ye shes dbyug pa gsor zhing

spro// e ma'o rdo rje rin chen che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas

gdab// swA~M/ rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la// rin chen 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed rin chen 'chang zhes bya// swA~M/ ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po'i gtsigs
ni btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang// dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag

nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// rin chen dbyug pa drag chen dang// rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang// 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye
zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis// thams cad rin chen nyid pas na// nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin// de las rin chen

gsung 'byung ba// swA~M rat+na dz+wa lA na lArka swA~M phaT// hA~M/ lus ngag yid gsum phrin las ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// las kyi sems dpa' dpa' bo yin// las kyi sems

dang rang gnas pas// ye shes ral gri 'debs shing spro// e ma'o las kyi che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu

gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas btab// hA~M/ rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las// ral gri 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed ral gri 'chang zhes bya// hA~M/ ji ltar
rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa bzhin// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang// dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs

pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po'i mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// ha~M ral gri ral gri drag chen dang// rang nyid che ba'i
bdag nyid dang// 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'du 'gro 'dis// thams cad ral gri
nyid pas na// nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin// de las phrin las gsung byung ba'o// hA~M karma dz+wa lA na larka hU~M phaT/ mU~M lus ngag yid gsum dril bu las// sku gsung thugs nyid gtum por
'gyur// bskor thabs che ba'i mchog tshul du// rdo rje lan gsum gsor ba yis// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// dam can rnal 'byor dbang du 'gyur// rnal 'byor pho mo gang snang ba'i// thams cad gcig tu
'dus par ni// yul la mngon du snang bar 'gyur// mi bskyod rdo rje thabs ldan pas// o~M dang ha~M ni ma thal bar// lan gsum gsor chen gur dkar bsgom// lhan ne'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur// o~M dang
ha~M ni thal tsam du// kun tu gru bzhir bdag gnas te// lan gsum gsor la gang brtson pa// tshe dang skal ba 'phel bar 'gyur// longs spyod ci 'dod grub par 'gyur// de nas zla gam mdog dmar
sham// 'brel pa mnyam par lan gsum gyis// khros pas gsor la gang brtson pas// yid la dmigs dang las thams cad// dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur// de las gtum pa'i mdog gnas
te// drag tu phaT ces brjod pas ni// kha dog nag por bdag gnas shing// bskal pa 'bar ba'i dbus gnas pa// khros te dgug pa nyid dag tu// rgyang ni ring du 'phangs pa na// ci 'dod las rnams 'grub

par nges// o~M badzra da ha dz+wa la ha na badzra pa tsa dz+wa la badzra hU~M phaT/ chos la brtan pa phyag bsnams pa// sbubs ni dril bu chos khams te// shes rab yum gyi tshogs su brtag/ skad ni gsung snyan bde ba mo// lce ni

gar mkhan mya ngan 'das// chos sku thugs kyi thugs nyid las// rab tu gsor la gang brtson pas// mU~M la sogs pa'i yi ge bsgom// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma 'bar// mU~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// kun tu

dbang sgyur yid 'ong ba'i// 'dod pa bzhin du mthun pas 'grub// o~M badzra g+haN+Da pA sha d+harma d+hA ra/ hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dgyes par gyur to// gsang ba'i

snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po thabs dang shes rab tu 'byung ba phyag mtshan gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig

bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya// 'bru lnga

sbos lnga rin chen lnga// snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang// bdud rtsi lnga yis rab mnyam la// rig pas thig ni gdab par bya// lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi// rtse bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas// gru chad

bzhi dang gru bzhi yi// bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya// sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la// tsa na 'bru tsam pad+mo gdan// yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge las// phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri// bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs

dang// rgyan phreng dung dang bro bas bskor// glu tshig bro gar rol mo yi// sprin phung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod// yum dang 'jo ma sems ma dang// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod// dbyibs dang kha dog

mtshan ldan pa'i// zhal du gyur pa'i me bos la// bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis// las bzhi mchod pa rab tu sbyin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te// shin tu phra la sbyangs pa yis// bsam yas dag

la de bzhin bya// rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing// mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yi// sna tshogs
rin po che yi gzhi// mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang// kun 'byung rin chen phung po 'bar// dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang// rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i

tshal// glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra// bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung brgyan se mo do// bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang// rang la mdzes pas brgyan pa yi// lha dang lha mo
rdul snyed kyi// bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul// skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis// rim gyis yang na cig char
du// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po bsgom// gsal ldan ma'am byin brlabs la// stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs
mchod// mnyes nas 'grub pa'i dam tshig mchog/ bdag nyid chen po mched pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus la// dga' ba chen pos khyab par gyur// sgyu 'phrul
drwa ba brtan pa yis// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang// khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du gyur// lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad// gang na mi gnas mi
dmigs pa// rang bzhin mnyam pa'i chos nyid la// mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom// goms pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la// kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de nas
slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod
na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin// nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos// nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs nas// phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i

dbang// rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya// snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung// yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas// phyag chen po yi 'phang du ni// dkyil 'khor mdzub gang tshad du bya// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du

bya// yang na sa gzhi mnyam pa la// dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya// yang na lus gang tshad du ste// yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad// phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang// gos rgyan mdzes ma yid 'ong grogs// thig

gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs// mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya// yang na khru ni bcu drug dang// nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom// sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang

dgod// yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad dam// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom// ma mthong rmongs pa ston phyir tshon// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am// lnga yi tshon

gyis bri bar bya// 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgye// ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog/ yi ge'am gdan nam snying po 'am// phyag rgya'am sku gsung thugs ldan par// byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// 'grub
'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam// sa la sogs pa phyag rgyar byas// rnam grol rim par thob par 'gyur// dag pa'i ye shes kyis byas pa// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid
che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo// rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa
yi// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// kun tu bzang mo mi bsnyengs yin// kun tu bzang mo rang gnas pas// ye shes dril bu gsil zhing spro// e ma'o sangs rgyas yum chen gyi// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba

ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen yum du gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya yum lngas btab// mU~M/ kun tu bzang mo'i thugs nyid las// rdo rje yum chen thams

cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed dril bu 'chang zhes bya// mU~M ji ltar rgyal po'i gnas bshams te// rgyal pos gtsigs chen 'gyed pa ltar// bde chen yum du gnas pa dang// dbang chen dus
la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid yum chen mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni

bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// mU~M dril bu dril bu grags snyan dang// yum nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang// 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal mo yis// phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs

shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad dril bu nyid pas na// nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin// de las chos sku gsung 'byung ba// mU~M g+ha dz+wa lA na lArka mU~M zhes

brjod pas phyag rgya'i tshogs su snang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mtshon cha dam tshig phyag rgya glu'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang

pos thabs dang/ shes rab 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// de nas yid dang chos mthun par// thugs kyi phyag rgya rdo rje 'chang// shes rab dril bu chos la brtan// hU~M dang mU~M gyi snying po

'bar// de las rdo rje rtse bcur 'bar// o~M dang mU~M gyi mchog tu brtag/ shes rab nyi zer zla rgyas thabs// 'bar ba'i phung pos chos la brten// de las gzung thabs gnyis kyis ni// 'bru lnga phyag rgya nyid du
ste// de las rdo rje phyag bsnams gsor// de las 'khor lo phyag bsnams gsor// de las nor bu phyag bsnams pa// de las pad+ma phyag bsnams 'dzin// de las ral gri phyag bsnams gcod// de nyid rdo rje

phyag bsnams pa// thabs chen drug tu yang dag gsor// de las rdo rje gzung thabs gnyis// o~M dang mU~M gyi mtshon bzhin du// rdo rje rtse bcu thabs chen po// thugs kar brtan pa'i tshul du 'bar// sangs rgyas rdo
rje sems dpa' yi// phyag na mi 'jigs thugs kar 'dzin// mU~M las phyag rgya chen po ni// dril gsil 'bar bas sangs rgyas yum// mchod gnas chos la brten par 'dzin// thams cad kun tu phyag rgya

yi// thabs dang shes rab rdo rje 'chang// sku gsung thugs ni thams cad pa// yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// sgyu 'phrul drwa bas byang chub pa'i// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang du dmigs// de las rdo rje mchog

bsnams pa// de las mi bskyod nyi ma'i lam// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan las// o~M hU~M swA~M gyi rtser 'dzin pa// nyid las yang dag bskyed tshul du// shes rab yum du shin tu brtags// rdo rje 'bar bas rab

brten pa// thabs chen yid ni sangs rgyas yab// gcig dang du ma yongs kyis med// de las 'gro don phrin las 'char// yid dang chos su rab brtags pa'i// rdo rje 'chang rgyal tshul chen las// rdo rje drag por
lan gsum gsor// gtum pa'i sngags brjod de bskyed pas// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi// rin chen
dbyig dang 'byung ba kun// de dag rdzas yod ma yin te// rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te// thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid// de

lta bu yi ngang du 'byung// shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir// ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid gang gsog/ rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang// byin brlabs

ston pa'ang de bzhin te// bya byed nus mthu'i gzi byin gyis// sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po mchog/ cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing// yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// ma nyams 'jug

la rab brtson pa// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le de
nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang// rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang// 'khor
lo rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang// rgya chen gsung las don byung ba// mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo// gcig dang du mar bral ba
yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi gzigs te// rang byung ye shes gnas med snang// log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing// ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje
chen pos 'brel pas na// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang// bde ba chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni// stangs dpyal gnyis sam yang na lnga// byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na// 'dod pa yid 'ong mnyam par

'gyur// skal pa mnyam pa'i ye shes de// gnyer na nye bar mnyam pa yi// ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges// dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur// zhes ched du brjod do// rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi
le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub blang ba'i thabs 'di gsungs so// ye nas mnyam nyid
dkyil 'khor la// thabs dang shes rab ldan byas te// rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// thams cad ma lus maN+Da la// de bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas la// rig pa rang byung gyur pa yis// mnyam par mnyam la mi
gnas pa'i// chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom// 'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyi// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa yis// rang rig bsgribs
shing bdag tu bcings// kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir// de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan// rtog dang mi rtog rang rig dang// yang dag thabs chen rdzogs pa'i don// rin chen sna tshogs la
sogs dang// 'byung ba bzhi las gyur rnams kun// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu// gzugs sogs ri mor bris pa dag/ ye shes chen po rab 'byam gyis// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// de bzhin
ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis// thams cad dbyings su bsdus nas ni// nyid kyi thugs la bstim byas te// thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dag byas pas// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
dkyil 'khor du// rang rig ye shes 'du 'phro yis// thams cad chos sku phyag rgya che// yang dag rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// ting 'dzin don rnams gsal bsgoms te// mA ma kI yi rgyun chags la// yang dag

chos sku phyag rgya che// de bzhin ting 'dzin gsal bsgoms nas// don mchog ma lus rdzogs pa'i phyir// mkha' la 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dri med chos sku phyag rgya gsal// dbyings dang de bzhin nyid med

par// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas// kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs su bsgyur// sna tshogs phrin las rnam par rol// don gyi snying po mchog rnams kyang// byang chub phyogs rnams rab tu rdzogs// 'jig
rten gtso mchog rnams kyis bskor// a hoHchos sku phyag rgya de dag las// las lnga'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrub// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// drag po gtum po
gdul ba'i phyir// bdag nyid drag po bsgoms nas ni// chos sku nag po 'od 'bar gyis// bgegs kyi ling+ga mnan par bya// gtum po rngam po'ang brlag par 'gyur// mi mthun phyogs kyang rdul du rlog/ 'di
dang 'gro ba thams cad du// shin tu stobs drag che ldan 'gyur// thams cad gnyis med dbyings bsdu'i phyir// bdag nyid ha ya grI bar bsgom// dmar po'i chos sku gsal bsgoms te// mi mthun phyogs rnams
gdan du gdeng// ting 'dzin gsal bas byin brlabs na// thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdu// mthu chen dag kyang phyi bzhin 'brang// ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur// thams cad yon tan 'phel bya'i
phyir// bdag nyid rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ste// gser gyi mdo 'dra phyag rgyar bsgom// gang 'phel chos sku gdan du gzhag/ de ltar dag pas byin brlabs na// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// tshe dang
longs spyod 'phel ba dang// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// gtum khro ma lus zhi bya'i phyir// dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i chos sku bsgom// gang zhig
gtum khro zhi ba'i gdan// de bzhin ting 'dzin byin brlabs na// gtum po rngam po'ang zhi bar 'gyur// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// zhi zhing dul ba nyid du 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes

kyis// rnam bzhi dkyil 'khor dbyings su bsdus// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// lhun grub dkyil 'khor ye nas rdzogs// a hoH/ chos sku phyag rgya chen po ni// dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin par nges// nye

ba'i lha ni gang bsgrub pa// phyag rgya'i snying po bris bcug na// gang bsgoms the tshom med par 'grub// de ni rgyal ba kun dang mnyam// the tshom med de nges 'grub 'gyur// 'jig rten pa yi lha sgrub na// lha yi snying

po gang yang rung// bris te dkyil 'khor nang bcug na// lha de nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// chos nyid rten cing 'brel bris na// chos kyi don rnams rtogs 'gyur te// rang dag spyi yi don rtogs nas// skye rga na
'chi med par rtogs// phyag rgya chen po de dag la// nyon mongs las rnams sbyong byed pa'i// snying po ma nor don bris na// ngan song sdug bsngal med par 'gyur// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas

dang// dpag tshad med pa'i phyag rgya che// sku gsung thugs ni rgyun mi chad// zhing khams bye ba rdul dang mnyam// a ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis dngos

grub len pa'i thabs te mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po rgyal po dbang sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa
'di brjod do// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun// rdo rje lam las pad+mor dkyil// rtse nas bstim zhing dkyil 'khor sgyur// nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas

su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// tra~M gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim// tra~M gsang ba'i gsang chen gsang mchog dang// gsang ba kun la mnyan par bya// gsang ba'i
don nyid rtogs pa las// gzhan du smra bar bya ba min// gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// o~M

dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor// lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo
nyid// hU~M gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// o~M khyod ni rdo rje las yin pas// las rnams ma lus kun byos shig/ pho nya 'du 'phro mang po kun// khyod kyi

dgos pa byed pa yin// smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsang ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// hriHyi phyag rgya tshogs mchog las// chos kyi 'khor lo gsal spro thim// o~M chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis// dad ldan
skyes bu ngoms par byos// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la// mthun par gsang bsgrags gzhan du min// bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hU~M o~M swa~M a~M ha~M rnams

las// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod// slob dpon mnyes

par ma byas shing// dbang rnams thob par ma byas par// nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang// go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang// gdugs

dang bum pa bza' btung dang// snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na// dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song thams cad med pa dang// gnyen por gyur pa'i rtsal 'chang bas// tshe ring bde ba phun sum
tshogs// kun tu bzang po la sogs mtshan// mtho ris thar pa'i dbang por 'gyur// lus dang phung por bcas pa'i sa// rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa yin// rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i sa// bla med kun tu

bzang por 'gyur// yum dang sgeg mo la sogs la// de nyid byin gyis rlom par 'gyur// pho nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams// sangs rgyas bka' las mi 'da' zhing// de yi dgos pa byed pa dang// sgro dang skur pa la

sogs pa// de ni myur du brlag par 'gyur// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// zhes ched du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u
ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dngos grub myur bar len pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// de bzhin nyid dang
mnyam sbyor phyir// dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// byang chub phyogs la gzung bar gnas// mchog tu bde ba'i zhing gnas pas// mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun bsgom zhing// byang chub sems su brtan par
gzung// bya ba med las bya byed bya// mi gnas gnas la gnas par bsgom// b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling+ga a// shin tu 'tsher zhing gsal bsgoms nas// 'od 'phro 'bar bas thams cad khyab// dus gsum ngan
song gnas bsregs nas// b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'od 'phro thim// thim 'gyur dbyings nas 'od 'phro 'bar// a ma las ni zla nyi 'bar// phyogs bcur 'thoms pa'i mun sel zhing// nyon mongs
sdug bsngal bsil ba'i sman// thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// rol pa'i phyag rgya bsam mi khyab// mkha' la 'ja' tshon sprin mang yang// nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad bsdus// thams cad mkhyen

nyid bsam yas kyang// chos kyi dbyings su thams cad 'dus// thams cad yi ge hU~M du gyur// hU~M nyid gsang ba'i thugs rje'i dkyil// 'od zer 'phros pas 'bru gsum ste// yang na 'od zer 'bru lnga yi// lnga pa'i
don spros bzhi bcu lnga'i// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas mchog/ ma bcos ngang gis gnas pa la// ye shes lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// sen zlum zla ba gang ba yi// thugs kyi dkyil du gnas par
bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang ba yi// gzhal yas 'od zer 'bar ba'i khang// pad+ma'i gdan dang rin po che// de dkyil yi ge hU~M gnas pa// shin tu phra zhing yungs 'bru 'bar// gnas gcig dang ni gnas
gsum dang// gnas lnga dag tu rab tu bsgom// shes rab spyan la 'dris pa dang// nr-i yi mig gis bltar yod par// shin tu phra zhing gsal bar bsgom// shin tu blo gsal 'dris gyur nas// phyogs bcu'i stong

khams rdul snyed du// thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam yas spro// spros kyang hU~M las nyams pa med// bsdus kyang phyogs bcu bri ba med// spro med bsdu med de bzhin las// yi ge mu~M du thim par gyur// thim 'gyur

dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// shin tu gsal zhing 'dres pa dang// phyag rgya'i sku nyid gsal bar bsgom// sku de tshon gang 'od 'bar nas// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i rgya// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing don byed

bsgoms// yang na phyag rgya chen po ste// bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsam// zhal gsum phyag drug rtag tu bsgom// gzhal yas khang dang gdan khri rnams// phra ba'i tshul de snga ma bzhin// mtshan dang dpe

byad thams cad ldan// dbu rgyan yi ge lnga dang ldan// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar// rin chen pad+ma dril bu 'bar// phyag rgya chen po de dag las// phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal yas khang// nyi zla gza' skar dkyil
'khor gdan dang rgyan// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus bsgom// thugs rje byin brlabs 'gro don mdzad// zhi ba phyogs gcig shes bya spro// sa bcu mnyam par sbyong byed cing// bde gshegs 'khor yang
dag par byed// de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog de// 'bras bu mngon du ma smin kyang// sdug bsngal thams cad yang mi 'byung// lha mi mtshan rdzogs yongs su 'grub// theg pa dman par yong mi skye// bde
gshegs 'byung dang skol mi 'gyur// byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin// zhes nyid la nyid gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje sems

dpa' sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i rgyal po sgyur ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// rgyu
gcig dang ni yig 'bru tshul// byin gyi brlabs dang mngon sum par// rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun// rnam smin o~M du shes par

bya// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// rnam smin mu~M du shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khro mo'i

dkyil 'khor bsgom// gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig/ bro gar tshogs kyi sprin phung la// hU~M du shes pas rab spyad na// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi// dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes par 'gyur// lha mo klu mo

rigs ngan mo// dbye ba'am yang na mi dbye bar// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'i// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs

ma lus la// dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim// grub pa'i nyi zla snying po de// 'gro drug dus gnas de dag nyid// mchod pa chen por mnyes sbyar zhing// dkyil 'khor rdo rje rtse yis blang// mkha' 'gro
gsal 'bar tshe la sogs// yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur// zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas pas gzhag/ nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed bsgom/ hU~M du gyur pas rnam

par dag/ dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar// skur 'gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu ma snang
ba mig yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang// rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med// snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing// mnyam nyid lhag pa'i mnyam nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang po'i

zhing// byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas// yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan// cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yi// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// lnga zhing lnga

dang sbyor ba yi// tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom// de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i rigs dang sku gsung thugs// khro bo'i tshogs dang
ldan pa yi// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gcig gi lha rnams

bsgom// khro bo khro mo tshogs chen dang// pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs// ci bgyi la sogs pa rnams kyis// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub na// mnyam
rdzogs lhun grub ngang gnas shing// spyod pa ci la'ang thogs med pa'i// thams cad ye nas dbyer med pa'i// rdo rje'i rigs su thams cad dkyil// 'od 'phro 'bar ba rab tu bsgom// chags med tshul gyis
bstim par bya// gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che// yang na sku gsung thugs nyid de// thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'phro// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// rig
'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar ba 'grub// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// rdo rje rigs su bskyed pa'i gnas// sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni// thabs dang

shes rab thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom/ chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'od zer rnam pa mang po spro// gnyis su med par bstim par bya// dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub// rnal
'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis// de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom// sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom// so so sngags dang phyag rgya dang// ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal// gnas dang longs spyod
ci bde dang// ma nyams blo ni rab ldan pas// dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya// le lo sgyid snyom med pa yis// the tshom med par bsgrub byas na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang

mchog dam pa thob// sgrub pa'i zhag dang tshes grangs ni// rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bya// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod

do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te/ rgyan bkod pa'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul drwa bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bro ra phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis// 'dzul lam nam mkhar

'gro bar 'gyur// glu tshig sgra y-i phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thogs med 'grub// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgyas ni// yid bzhin
sku dang bdud rtsir 'grub// A li kA la'i phyag rgya yis// sku gsung mchog gi thugs ldan pas// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzungs// 'bras bu

smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can du gang gyur pa// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi// skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyi// khyad par sa la gnas gyur yin// pha rol phyin pa kun

tu rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab mchog gi mchog gyur pa'i// sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum// rgyu 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs// mkha' dbying dang ba'i dbyings nyi zla// ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal
sgom// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// ma lus par ni bsgoms par 'gyur// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

te// sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na// skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med ces ched du brjod pas rol

mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to// rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur te// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo// a hoH// ma mthong rmongs la chags pa
yis// chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam// 'gro drug dus gnas ming tshogs khyad par rab snang ba'i// zab chen spyod yul log par rtogs btags ming tsam pa// A li kA li la sogs 'dod pa'i snying po

nyid// phyag rgya glu tshig sku gsung thugs// thugs kyi thugs chen yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// nyid de mnyam pa'i thugs su rab tu gsal// mnyam nyid khyab pa'i stangs dpyal yon tan mchog ste sngags

kyi phrin las rdzogs// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sku

gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas dgyes pa chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin tu gsang ba'i snying po'i sprin bkod pa'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang// rang bzhin gsang ba'i
don rnams ni// yi ge sgro btags ming tshogs la// brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil
'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// sku gsung thugs rig
kun mnga' ba'i// bder gshegs kun gyi snying po rdzogs// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams// kun tu
bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi// thugs kyi ye shes lngas lta zhing// snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes la mnyes par 'bul// zag
pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba/ rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon
rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis
grub// rgyun du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor
sgrol ba yis// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// rang byung kun nas lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad
kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yis// nye ba'i
sras su dgongs par 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu

na// 'das dang da ltar byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pas// brnyes pas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs// 'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gsang chen
nges pa yi// 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'di yis gsang ba'i nges don med// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do// kun gyi phyag rgya chen po mchog/ thos bsams bsgoms
la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung// snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan// lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin// gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya// rmongs la 'phyar bas gal te
sbyin// dus min bar ni srog zad nas// bsregs dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod do// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil
'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu gsang ba man ngag gi snying po'i
le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos dgyes pa chen po'i ngang las gsang ba 'byung ba bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o thams cad ma lus dus
gsum bder gshegs mchog/ gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems// rang bzhin dbyer med gdod mtha' mi 'byed cing// ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin// 'gro 'ong med par dus gsum

cig char rdzogs// dbye bsal med phyir bzang ngan blang dor med// rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang bzhin te// rnam rtog mi skyed ye shes brjod du med// bdag tu med pa'i skyes mchog sngon sbyangs pa// khri la
'ga' tsam gal te 'byung 'gyur zhing// sngar bas phyis 'byung dag dang dbyer med pa'i// mngon sum sangs rgyas skyes mchog de dag la// bskal pa 'ga' nas shes rab blo sbyangs pa// dad ldan 'ga' yis

'tsham par ci theg gi/ bdag nyid ma mthong shes rgyud ma 'byongs pa// gzhan du tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis// bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong ba// bdag cag gzhan du tshol bas sangs mi

rgyas// de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhing// bgrod par 'dod pas phyin par mi nus te// shes rgyud ci yin gang gis ngo shes shing// bya byed las 'phags gyin da 'dug byed pa// gang zhig blo la dpyod pa byang

chub thob// ma spangs mtshan ma kun bral yod med pas// dran byed mi spong 'khor rgyun mi 'byed de// ma snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la// blo yi rig pas dpyod cing nan tan dang// mchod cing bsten
pas byang chub thob mngon te// nam mkha' gzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur// nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa na// sprin zhig 'byung zhing khebs par mi srid do// rnam par rtog pa'i g.yung drung
sangs rgyas la// thams cad ye nas mnyam gnas rnam dag cing// mi rtog sa ler gnas la rtog pa mdzad// bsnyad du med pas sna tshogs 'byung ba yin// bdag med bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i
gter// ma bkag pa las rgyu zhing 'byung med pa'i// thams cad sems kyi ngang ste sems zhes gdags su med// ma bcos lhun gnas ye nas byang chub cing// thob rgyu med pas ye nas bder gshegs
yin// zhes brjod pas chos dang ye shes kyi khams thams cad rang bzhin sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// mkhyen nas ji bzhin pa'i bdag nyid chen po de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo// e ma'o ma bsgrubs grub chen po// grub pa chen po ye shes che// blang dor med pa'i sa chen
po// mi g.yo 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs// rtog pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter// thams cad la yang me long bzhin// bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo// gang na gsang chen 'di yod par// me ma mur gyi

dong 'bogs la// spu gri so ni gtams pa la// 'dzegs nas bu dag 'gro bar byos// khong na gnas pa'i yang khong du// lcag kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo// dbyings nyid la ni nyid spyod phyir// dbyings nyid mchog gi

gnas la spyod// de nyid mi gnas mya ngan 'das// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gsang ba chen po man ngag gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o//// de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs nas nyid kyi sku la thams cad ma lus par ston te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs dang// 'byung bar ma

nges dus 'di dag/ snga phyi med par mnyam yin par// nges pa med par yang dag gsungs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// rang dang spyi ru bstan pa dang// ji snyed brtan g.yo la sogs pa// sgyu ma mig
yor tshul yin te// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor zhing// sems can kun gyi zhing gyur pa// de dag gnyis med dbyings su sbyor// thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de// thabs

la thabs ni rnam par sbyor// thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi// de ni byang chub rdo rje mchog/ ji snyed brjod pa'i kha brgyud kyang// yang dag don gyi snying po ni// gang nas btsal kyang mi rnyed de// rang rig sgrib
med dag pa yin// de la rtag 'grus goms pa ni// bsnyen pa'i dam pa de yin te// de ni ma nor lam yin par// a yis b+ho d+hi rab tu bsdus// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid ni// gcig gam 'di zhes brjod du
med// gsum du sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'phro// byin brlabs bsam yas mtha' yas mchog/ don bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu gnyis// de las lhag pa'i don smra ba// de ni rnam dag lam min te// rang blos bsam

pa'i 'khrul pa yin// thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad// tshad bzhis phab pa'i don yin te// dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgom zhing// 'bru lngar bsdus pa thabs chen te// 'gro
ba kun la rang rig gnas// bya ba med la byas pa med// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin gter// bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin mdzod// za ma tog dang yid bzhin rgyal// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma

yin te// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsnyen pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo

nyid kyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtogs pas brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa dang yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag gab pa'i gsang ba ma

rtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs pas/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so// de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug

bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang 'dod pas gdungs nas 'di bas shin tu grang yang ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa pad+ma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyen pa de lta bu'i sdug

bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang/ shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad po dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams brgyud cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo// de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa

dang yi dwags ltogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang/ 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang/ gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su 'gyur ba dang/ yong med par yang 'gyur zhing

shin tu rid cing skams pa dang// lus dang yan lag dang dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa dang/ bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so// de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang
sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dwags srin po chen po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus gcig la mgo brgya pa dang/ mgo sna tshogs pa dang/ lus brgya mgo gcig pa dang/ lus sna tshogs pa dang/ yan
lag mang po dang/ yan lag sna tshogs dang/ gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa 'khor rab tu mang po dang/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro sna tshogs sgrogs pa/ gzugs dang/

ro dang/ dri dang/ kha rlangs kyis thams cad skyi bung zhes byed pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung grang ba dang tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs kun du khams 'khrugs par byed pa/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par

byed pa/ myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i ris dang/ lha ma yin gyi ris dang/ lha'i ris dang/ tshangs pa'i ris dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dge rgyas dang/ 'bras bu che man chad dbang du bsdus so// de
sngon gyi rten pa'i stobs dang thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dul bar gyur te thams cad kyis mtshan nyid bstan pa'i glu 'di blangs so// e ma'o 'gro ba yongs ni bder

gshegs lam yin te// sdug bsngal sreg mdzad sgyu ma'i sprul par snang// yon tan rmad 'byung che ba'i rang bzhin 'di// sdug bsngal kun la bshes gnyen mgon po yin// rmongs dang 'khrul pa rab sel zhe sdang
'joms// kun 'byung bde ba rdo rje sku mchog ste// rdzogs ldan mdzad pa'i phrin las bsam yas pas// thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis bdud rnams 'joms// sku mdog sna tshogs thabs mkhas bsam
yas la// rol pa'i rtsed mor 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing// byang chub sems kyis lam la gnas par mdzad// 'gro ba kun las bde ba gcig pu pa// a hoHdgyes pa'i mnyes pa nyid la gnas par
mdzad// byin brlabs kun gyis bde ba nyid la snang// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la kun las rnam par rgyal ba nyid du mkhyen nas mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i rdo

rje bkod pa'i sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po gzi brjid ston pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i

bdag po bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin chen po rnam par 'phro ba'i sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas khro

mo'i dbang phyug chen mo mngon du phyung ste hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas gnyis su med par 'khyil pa'i dgyes pas thim nas byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ hU~M hU~M hU~M bi shwa badzra kro

d+ha dz+wa la na maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la ha la hU~M zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad khyab par khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam phyogs bcu'i
rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par gyur pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos// 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem rab tu chem chem/
kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// shig shig rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go/ gtor gtor rab tu gtor gtor/ kun tu gtor gtor ro// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams thams cad na gnas

pa'i dbang che ba dang mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad brgyal rab tu brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa'i skyi bung
zhes byed pa'i 'bar ba chen po khrag 'thung sku smug gnag cir yang 'gyur ba dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir

gyur te/ dur khrod chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na keng rus chen po ri rab kyi steng gi 'bar ba chen po'i klong gi 'khor lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa chen
