po khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du bzhugs so// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin phung po de dag kyang la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rjer gyur te shar phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung

chen po rin po cher gyur te lho phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+mar gyur te nub phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu las su gyur te byang phyogs su

bzhugs so// de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang/ rngam pa'i nga ro dang/ 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ gshin rje la sogs pa khyo shug
gis gdan du byas pa la bzhugs so// btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so so'i sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// rigs lnga'i he ru ka las gcig tu bstims te bsdus nas gcig gis mang po

'dul ba'i ngo mtshar bstan nas dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gtum pa'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan nas mgrin gcig tu 'dug pa'i nga ros brlang po'i gtum tshig tu smras pa/ thong thong

snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes 'dzer zhing shin tu gtum sems kyis rngam nas khros so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po thams cad kyi bdag nyid des dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad zhabs

brgyad du gnas nas rngam pa'i skad kyis thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shin tu khros nas/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi zhes brjod nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa chen po'i tshogs de dag gi

snying dang dbang po kun phyung// nang grol kun drangs/ yan lag kun bcad gtubs nas khrag kun 'thungs// rus pa kun 'chos so// de nas hU~M hU~M hU~M e A ra li dzaHdzaHzhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten

gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas par yungs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so// de nas 'byung po ma lus pa'i rgyal po'ang rgyal po dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma/ 'byung po thams cad kyi chung ma/

'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo// srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang/ tshangs ma dang/ 'khrug mo dang/ dbang mo dang/ 'jug sred mo dang/ gzhon nu mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ bdud rtsi mo dang/ zhi ba mo
dang/ be con mo dang/ srin mo dang/ za ba mo dang/ dga' ba mo dang/ ra ro khrag 'thung myos byed dang/ gcig spyod mo dang// yid 'phrog ma dang/ grub mo dang/ rlung mo dang/ gsod byed mo dang/

me mo dang/ phag mo dang/ rgan byed mo dang/ sna chad mo dang/ chu lha mo dang// nag mo chen mo dang/ ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang/ bum rna sngo gnag chen mo dang/ gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo la sogs pa/

bran dang yang bran g.yog dang yang g.yog 'khor zhing gi rdul snyed kyang bsdus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i 'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed

snang bar byas nas de dag kun dgyes pa rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo// o~M hU~M a~M badzra pra be
sha a la la hoHzhes brjod pas 'byung po'i rgyal mo rnams shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur nas/ dper na khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das

dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'i sku la srin mo chen mo mi srun mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ dga' mo dang/ gsod byed mo dang/ nag mo chen mo dang/ dmar ser chen mo dang/ sngo gnag chen mo dang/ ser
nag chen mo rnams 'khril to// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sku la tshangs ma dang/ 'khrug mo dang/ dbang mo dang/ 'jug sred mo dang/ gzhon nu mo rnams 'khril to// bcom ldan 'das dpal

khrag 'thung rin po che'i sku la bdud rtsi mo dang/ zhi ba mo dang/ be con mo dang/ za ba mo dang/ srin mo rnams 'khril to// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung pad+ma chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos pa dang/ gcig

pu spyod pa dang/ yid 'phrog ma dang/ gru mo dang/ rlung mo rnams 'khril to// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i kun du las kyi sku la me mo dang/ phag mo dang/ rgan byed mo dang/ sna chad mo dang/ chu
lha mo rnams 'khril to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs bsdus nas shin tu bcum par gyur to// de nas

dgyes te he zhes brjod pas byang chub sems kyi sprin las dkar mo'i tshogs dang/ rkun mo'i tshogs dang/ rmongs mo'i tshogs dang/ thal byed ma'i tshogs dang/ sbos mo'i tshogs dang/ gtum mo'i tshogs dang/

sme sha can gyi tshogs dang/ ma mo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar dang chas nas 'thon to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang
rang gi lag chas chas nas 'khod do// de nas shin tu dgyes nas he zhes brjod pas seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ stag gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ wa gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ khyi gdong

chen mo'i tshogs dang/ bzhad gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ kAng+ka gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ dur bya gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ 'ug gdong chen mo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas

'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs kyi phyi rol nas 'khor ba'i rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do// de nas shin tu dgyes pas phyogs bcu'i zhing du ma lus par

khyab nas phaT ces brjod pas rdo rje bsrings 'gro ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje gdong mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas
'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so// de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phaT ces bsgrags pas thams cad khros

nas ma mo thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas pa la bar yud tsam gyis bgye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun thugs rje chen po'i bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo// o~M badzra ma hA a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+he a~M a~M a~M zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan

'das khro bo chen po de dag gi sna nas 'thon to// mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtshor btsud pa las gnam nas uts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha phyung bas 'dam kun 'thungs te/ dran pa slar rnyed nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de

dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya/ phyag stong brgyad brgya zhabs brgyad brgya/ sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil na bzhugs par mthong ngo// de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa kun tu dregs pa'i
dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul to// de nas de dag shin tu 'dar zhing bred pas rab tu zhum pa'i nga ros 'bangs su mchi 'bangs
su mchi/ 'bangs su nan tan nan ma bgyis na/ mgo dang lus ni brgyar 'gas shing// snying yang 'gas shing gtubs gyur cig/ rul myags tshig nas brlag pa dang/ dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par
shog/ ces 'bangs su mchi bar mna' bor nas dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la bzhag go/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang smras pa/ bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang// ma dang sring mo bu mo
rnams// dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol// dpa' bo lha rje bzhes su gsol// bdag cag so so'i 'khor bcas kyis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// ming tsam 'dzin par byed
pa yang// gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar// g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pa'i// sems kyis blangs nas spyi bo yi// gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur bar bgyi// de yi dgos pa ci yang rung// ma lus rdzogs par bdag
cag sgrub// gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga 'dir// smras pa bzhin du ma bsgrubs na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying// gsad gtubs dum bur ral bar mchi// zhes smras so// de nas de'i chung ma'i tshogs
dang srid mo dang bu mo'i tshogs thams cad yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa// bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kun// dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi// dpa' bo chen
pos bdag cag rnams// las kyi dngos grub stsal du stsol// zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gi dbang bskur te dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bkod

do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos dkyil 'khor

tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis grub par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo khrag 'thung chen po btsun mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs de dag gi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil

'khor 'di dag phyung ngo//// o~M ta thA ga ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M rat+na ma hA shrI

he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M

phaT/ o~M ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI sarba duSh+tA~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA badzra d+hA ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi d+ha ma hU~M phaT/ o~M hriHma hA sA ra swa ta ma hA pad+ma kro d+he shwa ri khA

hi hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi shwa hU~M phaT/ badzra gau rI haH/ badzra tsau rI haH/ badzra pra mo he haH/ badzra be tA lI haH/ badzra tsaN+Da lI haH/ badzra puk+ka sI haH/ badzra g+hasma rI haH/ badzra sma shA nI haH/ badzra siM ha mu

khI he/ badzra byA g+h+ra mu khI he/ badzra sr-i gla mu khI he/ badzra shwa nA mu khI he/ badzra g+h+r-i D+ha mu khI he/ badzra kAng+ka mu khI he/ badzra kha ga mu khI he/ badzra u lU ka mu khI he/ badzra Ar+ya te dza te dA dzaMHbadzra a ma ka hU~M/ badzra lo kA ba~M/ badzra

b+ha sh+mi pa la ya ba to hoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hUM/ e h+ye hi A na ya dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHrA~M/ o~M badzra kro d+ha sa

ma ya hU~M/ o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT// o~M khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa// thugs rjes khros dpal rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma yas+t+wa~M/

o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya ho/ a li u le/ ta li ta pa ti/ daMSh+ta~M/ go nA ro/ tri kha ra~M yo gi nI khA hi hoH/ hU~M ha he phaT ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad tshig rab tu tshig kun du tshig go/ 'bar

rab tu 'bar kun tu 'bar ro// thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang rab tu gang kun tu rab tu gang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i tshogs chen po

gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo chen po'i byin brlabs phyag rgya 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa

'di brjod do// dbang po'i yul de rig pa'i rnams// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing// mnyam pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na// thams cad bde ba chen po'i rgya// bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// khro

bo khro mo thams cad kun// gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na// bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// zla med chen pos de skad gsungs// yan lag snying po rtse lnga rtse dgu bcu gcig tu// las rnams so

sor rab tu bsgom// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs// rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur// thabs chen re re bskyod na ni// pad+ma chags med re re 'byung// rdo rje pad+ma de 'byor na// sems can thams cad bla
na med// byang chub zhing du skye bar 'gyur// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas te// dbu yi dkyil 'khor bsgul bskyod na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad
g.yo// lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas na// rig 'dzin zhing khams thams cad g.yo// rkang pa'i stabs chen gnan mchongs na// sdug bsngal mi bzad thams cad dang// bdud dang log 'dren thams cad

gnon// yan lag thams cad bsgul bsigs na// ba spu bu ga re re nas// khro bo grangs med rdul snyed 'phro// de dag sprul pa grangs med kyis// phyogs bcu khams mang rdul snyed du// khro bo'i don rnams rdul
phran snyed// thugs rjes gdul zhing dbyings su bstim// thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang// khro mo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dus// thams cad rdo rje'i brag stengs dang// me ri'i dkyil 'khor rab tu
'bar// 'di ni spyi rgya chen po yin// steng gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'khor lo nr-i mgo gdengs// 'og gi 'jig rten bgegs 'dul ba'i// rdo rje thong gshol nr-i spar dang// rdo rje
gtun chen dril bu'o// shar gyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba dang// sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa'o// lho yi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rin chen mi mgo'i dbyug pa dang// gshin rje chen
po'i rkang bzung ba'o// nub kyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// sbrul dang sti ra'i dbyug pa dang// khyung chen gshog gis rab tu rdebs// rgya mtsho che rnams rked par gtub// byang gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba
ni// rin po che yi dbyug to dang// nr-i mgo gsum pa'i dbyug to can// gnod sbyin gdon rnams tshar gcod pa'o// mtshams bzhi'i bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// phyogs bzhi dag gis gdul bar 'gyur// gal
te de yis ma dul na// byang shar mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje rtse gsum nr-i mgo gdengs// i sha nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// 'byung po de kun rab tu btul// shar lho mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul

ba// rdo rje ye shes me lce 'bar// me de nyid kyang 'tshig par byed// drang srong nyid kyang phyag rgyar bsnams// me lha gdon 'khor dbang du bsdus// lho nub mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje dang ni srin po'i
mgo/ rab tu rno ba'i ral gri 'bar// bden bral nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdus// nub byang mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rlung gi ba dan nr-i mgo gdengs// shin tu drag

po glang po'i brjid// tshig srung nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// g.yeng ba thams cad dbang du bsdus// 'og tu 'jig rten bgegs 'dul phyir// phyag rgya ri rab chen po ste// phag chen po ni phyag na bsnams// 'og
gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'o// gzhan yang nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis// tsha dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal sel// me yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus sreg par byed// chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po
yis// thams cad ma lus 'khru bar byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus gtor bar byed// gzhan yang ral gri 'khor lor bcas// mda' gzhu tho chen gri chen dang// rdo rje mdung chen

dgra star bcas// mche gtsigs spu gri so dang ni// mda' dang mdung dang sti ra dang// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs so// dbus kyi he ru'i phyag rgya ni// sti ra dbyug to chen po dang// 'khor lo chen po rab tu

'bar// dung chen dmar gyis gang ba la// rdo rjes dkrug cing rab tu gsol// shar gyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// rdo rje chen po rab tu 'bar// nr-i mgo dmar chen bkang ba gsol// lho
yi phyag rgya chen po ni// sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// yid bzhin nor bu'i gzhal yas su// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rab tu gsol// nub kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// pad+ma

chags med rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol// byang gi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// rdo rje rgya gram rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol// khro mo rnams

kyang khro dang mthun// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni// rgyud gzhan dag dang mthun par bshad// ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// 'jig rten 'das mdo che las bshad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa sgyu
'phrul drwa ba las phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor

rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ khyu
mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ gtum pa'i dom gyis sbar bas ni// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung// smug gnag sngo gnag ser gnag dang// dmar gnag ljang gnag 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag

drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon// rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs// sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zlar bcas// steng gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang// ral gri

dgra sta gshol la sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang 'khril// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang// sgo bzhi phyag rgyar rab mdzes shing// slas dang byi mo tshogs kyi
gtso// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang// ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas// zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du

gsal bar gyur to// de nas dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo// a ho// bskal bar bcas shing dug tshogs 'bar
ba yi// nyon mongs kun g.yo dkyil 'khor 'khor lo brjod dka' ba'i// ji snyed 'jig rten rgyan gyis rdul snyed bsam yas pa// ro tshogs khrag la brkam pa dpung gnyen kun bkye nas// zhen pa'i gdug mo
shin tu gsal ba dka' ba yi// mi mngon dbyings nas gzugs kyi cho 'phrul bsam yas kyis// snyigs mar bcas shing mtshams sbyor kun ngam zil gyis gnon// rab tu gnon pa'i 'jigs byed bsam mi
khyab// de bzhin de nyid gnyen por kun byung kun tu gsal// ho/ chos rnams ji snyed 'gro drug smin byed brjod mi lang// dus mtha' rmongs la gnas pa brjod mi lang// 'dod pas zhen pa'i
las kyang ji snyed ji srid par// drag po bdo ba'i rlung chen bsam mi khyab// bde bar bcas pa gzhan du med par brjod mi lang// bskal par bsags pa'i dug chen rab rtogs kun tu rtog/ de rnams zil
gnon khrag 'thung sku gsung 'jigs byed par// rkyen du bcas nas sbu bus 'bras bu smin pa rab smin ltar// dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ni mang po'i tshogs// dpag med bsam yas lhun grub
pas// rab tu 'dul bar shin tu gsal// ho/ khro bo'i rang bzhin gdug par 'jigs pa ma yin zhing// zhi ba mdzes pa kun gyi yid dang 'thad par gnas rgyud yong ma yin// de nyid gnyis su min pa'i cho

'phrul bsam yas thams cad kun tu khyab// rigs lnga khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i rol pa rdul snyed rab ston pa'i// rnam dag byang chub mchog gi dbyings te gsang ba'i snying por rab bstan nges pa nyid de shin tu
gnas par gsal// ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen

pos nyid kyi byin brlabs dang yon tan ston pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// o~M sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes snying po'i mchog nyid
de// sangs rgyas kun du bzang po nyid// 'di yin gzhan na med pa ste// rol pa kun la mnga' brnyes shing// srid pa 'jig rten thams cad kun// sangs rgyas nyid de dus gsum du// ma g.yos lhun gnas snying

po ste// rang bzhin che ba'i yon tan las// ma rtogs rmongs pa'i 'gro ba la/ sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa// snying rje chags pa'i dam tshig gis// nga rgyal nyid kyi sku chen bstan// gdug cing gtum pa'i

khams gsum na// 'dul ba'i zhing du rab sbyor zhing// phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs par mdzad// ye shes ngo mtshar tsham ngam gyis// chos bzhi rnam dag che ba'i lha// ye shes sku ste khyad par che// chags pa'i tshogs

kyis mtshan ma ni// 'dod chags chen po nyid kyi sku// gtum rngam gdug pas mtshan pas na// zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi sku// gdul bya zhing du rab sbyong zhing// chos nyid mnyam las bzhengs pas na// gti mug chen

po nyid kyi sku// snod bcud dag pa'i spyod yul ba// thugs sku gsung las 'phros pa dang// rgyal ba nga yis mtshan pas na// nga rgyal chen po nyid kyi sku// gsang ba'i snying po bzhi bcu gnyis// thig le thugs su
bsdus pa nyid// gzhan du mi gtong mtshan pas na// de nyid phrag dog nyid sku rdzogs// stong gsum stong gi stong chen po// 'jig rten khams mang sna tshogs pa// rdul dang bye ba la sogs

pa'i// bgrang ba las ni rab 'das mtshan// de nyid snang zhing srid pa nyid// 'jigs byed sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings// chos sku ye shes rang bzhin la// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i thig le mchog/ snying po thig le bsam
yas nyid// 'jigs byed dbu dgu bcwa brgyad phyag/ sgyu mas mtshan pa'i drwa ba yin// de nyid tshogs dang dkyil 'khor sngags// gcig la gsum du mchog tu sngags// yul dang 'byung ba de nyid do// bdag rig

gzhan don snying po nyid// thabs dang shes rab phyag mtshan pa// gnyis med rig pa'i ye shes che// ming dang gzugs dang dbur gyur pa// phyag dang zhabs su rnam par brtags// brtags pa las ni 'phros pa'i

sku// ci yang med las cir yang snang// skal bzang mchog gi sgyu 'phrul ba// drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// brtags pa zil gnon chos nyid spyan// spyan ni chos nyid mnyam pa nyid// ji bzhin dbyings kyi
yul la sbyor// rol pa'i rtsed mor sdang mig pa// gzhan du mi gzigs yul la gzigs// pad+ma 'khyil pa nyid sku gsung// mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'jig/ ye shes chen po'i spyan bgrad las// khro gnyer

glog stong 'gyur ba yi// me yi tshogs kyi gzhan phug glog/ bdud rtsi zhing du sbyor bas na// bdud rtsi mchog gi khro bo yin// sku nyid mnyam pa rdzogs pa las// sna tshogs 'char bar rab ston pa// ye shes sgyu
'phrul stobs chen po// mi g.yo mchog gi 'du 'phro las// gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa ni// shes rab tshogs la 'phrul pa dang// thugs rje dra ba'i byin brlabs kyis// 'khor yug ji snyed mtha' klas

pa// dbyings nyid bde la skyod pa ste// 'phros nas dbang du byed pa'i don// rta yi gar thabs rdzu 'phrul gyis// gcig kyang yal ba ma yin pa'o// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// sgyu 'phrul dkyil

'khor mthas klas par// rtsed mo mchog gi phyag rgya ni// brkyang dang bskum pa zhabs tshul te// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i don// rang dbang thabs chen rgyal po yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung ba// thig

le mchog gi gnas la rdzogs// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs la// zil gnon khros pa'i phyag mtshan pa// sna tshogs mtshon rnon mang po bsnams// nga rgyal gdug pa'i zhe sdang gcod// gti mug chos sku sgyu 'phrul
ba// dra ba'i thugs rje mtha' dag ni// khros pa'i dam tshig snying rje yis// mnyam pa'i thig ler dgod pa ni// gshin rje gshed por gdugs pa'i rgyal// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams mchog sgrol bden// 'gro la
mgon du gyur pas na// dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med pa'i// chos sku gdug pas brgyan pa'i sprul// dbang rtags ye shes rgyan du bzhag/ dur khrod rdzas dang khrag 'thung ba'i// g.yang gzhi stag gi

pags chen bgos// 'jigs byed snying rje'i dam tshig ni// skye shi rtsa ba gcod mdzad pa// mi g.yo mgon zhes mchog tu bsgrags// nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed pa// nga rgyal 'phrog pa'i dam tshig ste// kun tu

bzang po'i spyod yul la// sngags kyi snying po de nyid pa// hU~M hU~M hU~M gis sdud za 'thung// rdo rje thugs kyi byin brlabs kyis// hU~M mdzad ches ni rnam par bsgrags// mi mched gti mug chen po ni// nyon mongs rgya

mtsho rngub pa'i phyir// b+han d+ha klong chen 'thung bar snang// 'jig rten 'bar ba'i sprin chen po// bskal pa las kyi zil gnon pa// rdo rje me yi 'bar ba 'byung// nyon mongs rgya mtsho skems par byed// 'jigs
byed thabs kyi dam tshig gis// bsam yas 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas// rang gi sku yi gzhal med bsdus// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i ye shes ni// zil gyis gnon pa dur khrod gling// tshom bu gnyis kyi lha chen

po// rdo rje sku yi byin brlabs kyis// thig le mi g.yo bde ba las// rang bzhin rol pa chen pos ni// rdo rje phra men pho nya'i tshogs// khams gsum 'dul bar yang dag mdzad// ha ni thig le zhi ba nyid// ha

ni thig le zhi khro snyoms// ha ni thig le dbang chen yin// ha ni thig le drag po nyid// ha ni thig le rol pa nyid// ha ni thig les phrin las nyid// ha ni thig les chags dbang 'dul// ha ni thig le las kun

rdzogs// he ni thig le ye shes thugs// he ni thig les gsung snyan pa// he ni thig les tsham ngam lce// he ni thig le rol pa nyid// he ni thig le dbang rtags yin// he ni thig les drag shul ba// he ni thig

las thugs chen rdzogs// de ni thig les dkyil 'khor ba// 'jigs phyed mchog gi sgyu 'phrul te// drwa bas zil gnon lam 'gog go/ hU~M ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs// hU~M ni ye shes thugs sku nyid// hU~M ni ye
shes thugs sku gsung// hU~M ni ye shes yid bzhin las// hU~M ni thig le ye shes so// phaT ni sku yi thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni gsung gi gsung gi thugs// phaT ni thugs kyi thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni chos

sku'i thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni chos sku'i gsung gi thugs// phaT ni chos thugs thugs kyi thugs// sgyu 'phrul drwa bas dgyes pa ho// dbang phyug chags pas dgyes pa ho// gar thabs rol pas dgyes pa ho// sku
gsung thugs ldan dgyes pa ho// yon tan las kyis dgyes pa ho// pho nya 'du 'phros dgyes pa ho// kun la snang bas dgyes pa ho// byin gyi brlabs kyis dgyes pa ho// chos kyi sku la dgyes pa ho// ye
shes rol pa dgyes pa ho// ci yang min pas dgyes pa ho// gnod pa sdud pas dgyes pa ho// chos kyi dbyings nyid dgyes pa ho// des dgyes pa chen po nyid la nyid shin tu dgyes par gyur te/
chos thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa stong phrag brgya las dgyes pa chen po'i byin brlabs dang yon tan mchog ston pa'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'jigs byed kyi bsod nams sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo
rnams su// 'jigs byed 'khor lo rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du// sku

gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs byed rdo rje rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po
dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas// bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams
su// 'jigs byed rin chen rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// lus dang
ngag yid byin brlabs nas// bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sgom// yang na rigs dbang dkyil 'khor ro// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs pa'i phrin las
rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// las bzhi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus
su// lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas// bdag nyid drag por rab gnas nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'jigs byed lnga rdzogs dkyil 'khor ni// nyi shu rtsa lnga sku gsung thugs// yon

tan phrin las rdzogs par bsgom// rgyan dang cha lugs la sogs pa// 'jigs pa'i tshogs ni ji bzhin par// tsham ngam chen po'i cha lugs bsgom// glu dang gar dang phyag rgya dang// shes rab thabs su shes pa
dang// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa dang// brda la sogs pa'i yon tan dang// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad kyi// mdor na tshogs rnams mngon du bsgrub// gsang ba'i
snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 'jigs byed chen po'i bsod nams sbyin pa dam tshig gi le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos cho ga dang dkyil 'khor
yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs// chos dbyings rnam dag dkyil 'khor ro// gsang sngags spyi yi dkyil 'khor las// shes 'jug yum
gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs dang// lus gang lus do gsum gyi tshad// rang gi rig pas ci nus par// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gnod bskrad sa gnon byin gyis
brlab// ljon pa lcug phran sdong gcig dang// ma reg tshon gyis ji bzhin du// goms par bya ba'i ting 'dzin dbab// 'jigs byed sku gsung dkyil 'khor bzlas// gnas dang zla dang rdzas rnams ni// tshogs
kyi mchog tu dmigs pas gzhag/ dang por mchod sbyin dam pas mchod// gzugs dang lugs chen dung mchog ni// ci 'dod snang bar bdag gis dgod// 'jigs byed dbang du bdag zhugs nas// khro mo ji
snyed 'khor du bya// bar chad ting 'dzin mchog gis zlog/ gsang ba'i snying por nyid bshams te/ 'das pa bdag tu mnyam sbyar zhing// thugs kyi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas// bdag gi lus la zhugs tshul
du// de yi gzugs gzung mchog tu bstim// dzaHzhes lan gsum brjod pas na// de nyid bsod nams lus thob cing// ye shes lnga yi dngos grub sbyin// pho nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams// de yi dgos pa byed par

'gyur// yang na sa gzhi rab mnyam la// phyag rgya gzugs dang snying po rnams// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// rdo rje dung chen dmar rtsis dgang// dung dang srog shing gsar rnying

dang// zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran dang// ji snyed pa yi rdzas rnams kun// 'jigs byed chen po'i ting 'dzin dang// nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis spyad// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rdeng dang

bcas pa'i bsam pa yis// re ba med par rab tu bsgrub// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen pos// zhag ni tshang zhing rtags byung na// dkyil 'khor mthun pa nyid du sbyar// zhag ni sum
cu phrag drug gam// drug cu dgu bcu rtsa drug tu// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'jigs byed tshogs la bdag lus dbul// de nyid dkyil 'khor nyid du brtag/ 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig
las// nams kyang 'da' bar mi mdzad do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dgyes pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gi le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa

chen pos sngags kyi snying po 'di ched du brjod do// a gi du na dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hU~M phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ o~M

ma hA badzra shrI he ru ka badzra kro d+he shwa ri sarba duSh+tAn hU~M phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ o~M rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka rat+na ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi d+ha mu kha hU~M phaT/ ru lu ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ o~M hrIHpad+ma ma

hA shrI he ru ka pad+ma ma hA kro d+he shwa ri khA hi hU~M phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ o~M karma ma hA shrI he ru ka sarba a ga ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi shwa rU be hU~M phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M/ ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M

b+h+yo hU~M/ o~M ma hA sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na pad+ma a mo g+ha ma hA badzra shrI he ru ka/ ma hA sa ma ya ha he hU~M phaT/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pad+ma shrI he ru ka man+t+ra dz+wa la ma hA maN+Da la kA ya bA ka

tsit+ta/ o~M o~M o~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ swA~M swA~M swA~M/ A~M A~M A~M/ hA~M hA~M hA~M/ badzra ma hA ka pA la khaD+ga daN+De na dz+wa la sid d+ha/ ma hA shrI he ru ka a me du me sid d+hod bA be/ sa~M ha ra Na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ma hA yo ga ad d+ha ma hA sa ma ya/ ru lu ru lu/
a la la hoH/ ho sems nyid thig ler rab gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis nyid rdzogs// sangs rgyas rdo rje he ru ka/ tshom bu dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyi// sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor cig/ o~M

badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoH/ o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ o~M a~M hU~M su ra s+t+wa~M/ ka ma la ma hA su kha mA lai ma nu sa ma na dz+wa la ni d+ha na a ba yo ga khA hi a la a la hoH// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 'jigs

byed chen po sngags kyi bzlas pa snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dam tshig chen pos phung po dang/ khams dang skye mched sbyin pa'i ting nge

'dzin la bzhugs te gdug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma sa ma yo gi nI dzaH/ zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs

bcu thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi snying po kun tu pad+mar gyur te/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad pa las dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed du srid pa'i rtse mor thug par gnas

par gyur to// de nas yang dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// ri rab chen po brkyang bskum gyi tshul gyis 'dril zhing/ o~M a b+hi tsa ra pa shI na zhes brjod pas lha'i

tshogs dang/ klu'i tshogs dang/ gnod sbyin chen po dang/ srin po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa thams cad rang dbang med par zhabs 'dril ba'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to// de nas yang ha ha a bi ra
tsa tiSh+Tha zhes brjod pas la la ni lus shin tu brdzes te ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur te/ la la ni mngon sum gcan mar ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to// de nas yang sa

'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba gdug cing zhe sdang che ba dad pa med cing rdo rje theg pa smod pa zhig yongs kyi 'jig rten na gnas par mkhyen to// mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ o~M pad+ma sa ma yo gi ni

ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M zhes brjod pas kun tu sku chags pa'i bdag nyid dang/ kun tu gsung chags pa'i cha lugs dang/ kun tu thugs chags par gyur pa dang/ kun tu rin po che chags pa chen po dang/ kun tu phrin

las chags pa chen por gyur te/ shar dang/ lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ dbus chen por khrag gi dba' klong keng rus chen po'i ri rab chen po na dus kun dang de nyid snang bar gyur to// de yang kun tu sku lnga
'jigs pa'i gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu gsung lnga'i nga ro bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ 'jigs byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu thugs lnga'i rol pa dang/ zhal bsam gyis mi khyab

pas 'jigs pa dang/ rigs lnga tshom bu chen po'i steng du gnas par gyur to// de las mchog gi snying po chen po ma hA rat+na ti la ka'i dbur gyur las rab tu sku gsung thugs spras pa'i gzhal med khang na 'jigs

byed chen po'i thig le snying po nyid dbu gsum phyag drug tu gnas te gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas de nyid du sku dang/ dbu dang/ phyag dang/ zhabs dang/ 'khor stong khams kyi rdul snyed du 'jigs

byed chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par khebs par mthong ngo// de nas yang bdud chen po sa 'dzin gyi rgyal pos skyes bu chen po sa 'dzin gyi bdag po// thong thong ji de lta bu byed dam zhes pa las de nas yang dgyes

pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyis// o~M a b+hi tsa ra ba shI na hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas dam pa'i bstan pas dam pa'i bstan pa rdo rje theg pa smod cing 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor pa la gnod pa'i tshogs 'khor bsam gyis mi

khyab pa dang/ g.yog dang yang g.yog tu bcas pa'i bdud chen po de dag nyid kyi yid kyis gdungs te rab tu brgyal nas ma mthong bar rmongs pa'i gnas nas rang dbang med cing dran pa med par keng rus kyi ri

rab chen po'i 'og zhabs kyi gnas su phyin par gyur to// de nas 'jigs byed chen pos tiSh+Tha badzra a~M a~M zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i blo dang phral/ mi mthun pa'i lus brdzes te lha chen po'i tshogs 'dul ba'i

'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por gnas par gyur to// de nas dgyes pa chen po dpal 'jigs byed chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las las thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thig le chen po zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi rdo rje thig le chen po'i dam tshig sgyu

'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo// o~M khrag mangs dba' klong 'khyil pa yi// keng rus tshogs kyi ri rab 'bum// 'dus pa'i tshom bu lnga yi ri// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi 'bar ba'i khang// gru chad bzhis brgyan rab brjid

pa'i// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid// sta na mang po lha chen brten// dgyes pa chen po kun tu bzang// phyag dang zhabs ni brgyad

pa yi// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid// 'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung ba'i// rdo rje snying po thig le thugs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// khro mo bzhis mchod ngos bzhir ni// dgyes pa chen

po'i tshul 'chang ba// phyogs bzhi grwa dang bcas par ni// sprul pa'i rnal 'byor phra men rnams// ri rab zhing chen steng na gnas// 'bar bas phyag bsnams chen po ni// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang// pad+ma'i gzhal

med rnge'u chung brdung// zhing gi zhags pas 'ching ba dang// kha T+wAM 'phen cing 'khril ba ste// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang// sgo bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes par// bran
mo'i tshogs chen mang po rnams// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas par byed// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gdug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlob pa
zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod

do// byed pa rdo rje mchog nyid kyi// sgyu 'phrul lam gyi dkyil 'khor las// drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs par// 'jug pa'i yid kyi dgongs pa yin// shin tu phra la sbyangs pa ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu

gnyis kyis mdzes// tshom bu gnyis kyi bye brag tu// spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir ni// rkang mthil thig gdab dkyil 'khor bri// o~M dang mU~M gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// de las phra mo
rdo rjes dgang// phra bar sa bsdus mthil du gzung// yum gyi tshogs su shes pas brtags// gang gi yul yang dbang du gyur// mi mthun gzugs su brtags pa ni// drwa ba'i 'du 'phros de lus bzhin// lugs

ka bzhin du ha~M du brtag/ de las 'od bzhin mthil du gzung// gsang nas ngag lam ha~M du bya// rlung zla'i steng du mkhas pas gzhag/ drag po lce yi sbyor ba yis// gling khams gzhan du shin tu gtang// bdag
nyid hU~M gi tshogs bcas pa// ma skyes pa yi yi ge bsgom// bya ba chos khams de yi tshogs// mU~M du byin brlabs yi ger bstim// brtan pa a yi 'phro 'du yis// nam mkha' bzhin du shin tu
bsgom// brtan 'gyur a yi snying po bzlas// nyams su lon par ma gyur tshe// 'jug pa'i yid dang nyams su sbyor// dang po'i gnas su shes pa dang// rnam pa mang por mnyam du'o// de las mi snang gzugs zhi

ba// rab tu blo yi thig gnas ni// gzhan du nams kyang mi bstan cing// gzhon dang spyad dang 'tshong la sogs// longs spyod rnam par sbyor ba dang// rdzas kyi nor phyir ma yin no// rmongs la 'phar dang brtson

'grus zhan// nams kyang sbyin par ma gsungs te// smad pa bam gyi gter bzhin du// sus kyang phyin par ma gsungs la// srog chags khwa yi gtam bzhin du// nams kyang smra bar mi bya'o// byed pa rdo rje gsha'

yi tshogs// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gling gzhi'i lam// kun tu bzang po thabs tshul ba// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// chos khams bya ba a yi tshogs// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gleng slong ba// kun tu bzang mo shes

rab tshul// gsha' la ye shes thugs kyi thugs// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// de ni chos khams a la bstim// chos kyi chos bya ba yi dbyings// kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum// de yi ngang du tshogs kun
brtags// sa chu me yi 'byung ba rnams// de yi dbyings nas 'byung bar ni// 'dod pa'i bdag la shin tu brtag/ mi gnas nam mkha'i mtha' klas par// goms par 'dod pa thod pa dang// chu las sa bzhin

'gro ba dang// bsreg bya 'bar ba'i dbus gnas dang// tsha ba rlung gis bteg nas kyang// phyogs bcu kun tu phyin par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje snying po las thams cad kyi
le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos gsang ba'i snying po 'di brtan par 'dzin pa'i don ched du ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// de nyid chos dbyings mnyam sbyor
bas// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// k+Sha lam a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid yid lam mchog grub pa'o// de nyid gsal
bar mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// o~M lA~M a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid gzugs lam mchog grub

pa'o// de nyid mnyam nyid mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// swA~M la~M a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid khyad par
lam mchog go// chos dbyings rtogs pa mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// o~M la~M a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa
bzhin du ni// de nyid gsum lam mchog grub pa'o// chos dbyings bya ba mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// hA~M la~M a yi tshogs bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor

bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de ni phrin las ye shes so// de las ting 'dzin sgyu 'phrul bsgom// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog nyid ni// rtse bcu rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgom// de nyid ha dang k+ShaHnyid

de// mU~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid las// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa// de nyid hU~M lam phyag bsnams pa// rtse bcu rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// yang na rtse

lnga thugs kyi thugs// dbus nas hU~M gi lo tsa na// lcags kyu 'dzin par rgya bcings shing// hU~M hU~M hU~M gis lan gsum du// rang lus dgra yid byin gyis brlab// mU~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bskul// 'bru lnga rgya
bcings byin gyis brlab// bskyed pa rdzogs par gsor ba yis// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor bri// zhi ba rgyas pa lan gsum gyis// de 'dod las rnams grub par 'gyur// bcu pa drag po mthing gnag

dpung// 'gying ba'i gar gyis gsor ba yis// gsung snyan sgra yi bro rdebs pa'i// phyag rgya brgyad du sbyor bas na// phaT phaT hU~M gis gsor ba yis// snying po thugs rtags phyag bsnams pa// sku gsung thugs kyi
rgyal po las// bsod nams lus 'jig dbang du 'gyur// ci 'dod re ba thob par mdzad// brgyan pa sgegs pa pho nya dang// tshangs pa dbang po 'dod dbang dang// mdor na bcu gnyis gling gi bdag/ drag

shul mthu yi dregs pa can// sngags shing brgyal te blo stor nas// bum pa bzang po 'bul bar 'gyur// lha mo klu mo brgyan pa dang// rta dang glang po bzhon pa dang// gnas dang rten dang bgo ba dang// gtsug na
nor bu yod pa dang// ci 'dod yid la bsam pa 'bul// de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// de yi dgos pa thams cad ni// ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa

las sgyu 'phrul chen po brtan par gzung ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dul ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba
la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas dag chos la// log rtog rnam pa gnyis su 'grub// thams cad 'byung ba lnga las skyes// thams cad gtsang zhing dri med las// rnam
rtog mi mthun so sor gyur// la la'i sman la la la'i dug/ sman du ma gyur gang yang med// thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig las// mi mthun khyad par so sor snang// sus kyang ma byas su byed
yod// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor bcing// sdug bsngal ma lus 'khrul 'khor dang// khams gsum phyin ci log bzhi dang// dus gsum 'gro lnga thams cad dang// nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad

sbyong// rnam par thar pa lta rdzogs byed// sa bcu rdzogs shing sangs rgyas sa yang rdzogs// de phyir sman 'di bsgrub par bya// kun la phan pa'i sman yin pas// de phyir nga dang bdag ma 'dzin// gtsang dang sme ba'i

blo rtog bor// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du spyod// rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs// thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa spyod// snying rjes chud ma zos par gyis// bdud rtsi mchog ni mnyam pa'i dbyings// bdud rtsi'i

don ni skye shi med// bdud rtsi gnas ni byang chub sems// bdud rtsi las ni rnam rtog sbyong// bdag dpal tshogs shing 'gro don mdzad// sman gyi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// ngan song sbyong zhing mtho ris
'grub// gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel bzhin// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs 'grub// rkyen las byung ba'i dug rnams dang// rtsa ba'i dug dang sbyar ba'i dug/ klu dug sbod gtong dug la sogs// thugs rje

chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// dug rnams thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor ma lus tshang bar bsgom// gnas lnga dag tu 'bru lnga bstim// o~M hU~M trA~M hrIHa// yang na yi ge A~M gyis bya// yang na yi ge

hrIHlas gtang// dug rnams bdud rtsir bsgyur bar bya// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thim par bya// a hoHrdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// hU~M bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste// thugs rjes rtog bdag 'dul bar byed// nga

dang bdag med dbyings sbyor zhing// byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o// o~M bdag nyid gti mug chen po ste// ye shes 'od zer gsal ba'i ngang// thams cad 'byung ba'i 'khor lo yi// trAM bdag nyid nga rgyal yon

tan te// snying rjes 'gro don 'phel bar byed// zhi ba'i blo chen dbyings su sbyor// yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med pa'o// hrIHbdag nyid 'dod chags gsung mchog ste// nyon mongs las rnams dag par byed// nyon
mongs sdug bsngal rnam par dag/ chags med sems ni byang chub pa'o// A bdag nyid las kyi sems dpa' ste// don rnams ma lus grub par byed// log rtog ma lus 'dul ba'i mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi
'phro ba'o// mU~M bdag nyid shes rab 'od gsal te// le lo g.yeng ba sel bar byed// thugs rje myur ba las byung ba// rgyal ba kun tu thogs med pa'o// nyon mongs las rnams dag byed cing// dbugs chen
dag kyang 'byin par byed// dug rnams sbyong ba sku gsum ste// lam lnga sbyong ba ye shes lnga// 'khor ba'i rtsad gcod shes rab mtshon// hU~M du bsdus shing hoHyis g.yeng// ra~M gyis bsregs shing phaT
kyis 'phang// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// thig le'i dbyings su thim par bya// de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur nas// ye shes sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom// 'bru gcig 'bru gsum 'bru lnga bsgom// bzhi

bcu rtsa gnyis ma lus dang// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom// nga med bdag med phyag rgyar gsol// de nas longs spyod lnga kun dang// ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga dang// lha mo lnga dang sman lngar

bsgom// o~M hU~M trA~M hrIHaHo~M badzra a mr-i te kuN+Da li ha na ha na hU~M phaT// o~M bi shud d+he a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ o~M d+harma amr-i te hU~M phaT/ o~M AHhUM zhes brjod pas thams cad dag par gyur/ bdud rtsir gyur/ sa chu me rlung

nam mkha' rnams// rang bzhin med par gzhig pa'i phyir// gcig la lnga lngar dbye bya zhing// mU~M gyi dbyings su bstim par bya// 'byung ba che rnams de dag la// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed par bya// rigs
pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste// de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgom zhing// 'byung ba so so'i mtshan nyid de// yum lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de rigs ye shes lnga nyid do// rgyur byas gzugs sogs bzhi bcu
gnyis// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid na// de ltar gyur cing skyes pa kun// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// a hoHe ma'o lhag pa'i byin brlabs kyis// bdag la lha
rnams bsdu bar bsgom// de nas lha dang gnyis med nas// bdag nyid yi ge o~M dang mU~M// gnyis dang bdag dang dbyings su thim// bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom// sku mdog gangs la nyi shar

'dra// zla ba pad+ma gdan khri la// nyi ma stong gi gdan khri ldan// lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyas mdzes// slas dang byi mo tshogs kyis

bskor// a ho 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// shar gyi rtse la rdo rje'o// lho yi rtse la rin po che// nub kyi rtse la snang mtha' yas// byang gi rtse la don yod grub// thabs dang
shes rab ldan par bsgom// phyag rgya rnams kyang gsal bar bsgom// snying po 'bru tshig gsal bar bzlas// de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni// bum pa gang ba yid bzhin 'bar// re ba yid bzhin skong bar

byed// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// 'dod lnga yon tan ldan par byed// dngos grub chen po bla med pa'o// bdud rtsi char bzhin 'bebs par byed// sgo bzhi phyag rgya ldan pa dang// a mr-i ta yi rgyu nyid
ni// byang chub sems dang sha chen dang// dri chu dri chen maM sar bcas// pad+ma rak+ta la sogs dang// gzhan yang don yod sna tshogs rnams// dbye'am yang na mi dbye bar// bdud rtsi nyid du byin gyis

brlab// rtog pa'i bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// gtsang sme med par dag par bya// dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya// phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing// dug gsum sdug
bsngal med pa dang// bskal pa yun ring gnas pa dang// dngos grub chen po 'thob 'gyur te// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par yang dag gsung// bdag nyid yi ge hU~M gyur nas// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad

la// o~M AHhU~M du gyur par sgom// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing phyogs bcur spro// slar 'dus 'od 'phro bdud rtsir 'bar// shin tu gsal zhing rtse gcig sgom// gzhan yang yi ge'i tshogs pas gdab// 'thungs na ngan

song sgrib pa byang// tra tA/ rtag bsten dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nad sel cing// lha la rtag tu mchod byas na// bdag dang gnyis su med par 'gyur// mi mthun phyogs la gtor byas
na// drag po gtum po'ang lhan ner 'gyur// gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad kyi// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// sangs rgyas go 'phang thob 'gyur na// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// the tshom med

par bsgrub par gyis// rtag tu spyod cing dbyings su thim// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o//// de nas dgyes pa chen

pos de dag gi byin gyi brlabs 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid// khams dang 'byung ba nyid la gnas// de nyid sgyu
'phrul thabs mkhas pa// dra bas mngon rdzogs sku gsung thugs// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid ngag lam kun khengs

par// hU~M gi tshogs su rnam par bsgom// lus nyid hA yi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung bas// kha dog nag po'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// dzaHzhes bya ba'i sngags
bzlas nas// mgyogs su 'gro bar lcags kyis spang// dri rno lnga bas mgyogs pa dang// gang du bya ba byin par byed// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// zhi bas bdag gi gzugs bzung la// dal bus hU~M zhes
bsdus pa yis// bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid ngag lam lus khengs par// o~M gyi
tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid aHyi tshogs la bstim/ gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog dkar po'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// hU~M zhes bya ba'i sngags
bzlas nas// mang pos bkur ba rgyal chen po// blo rno yid mdzangs bzhin bzangs dang// snga bas longs spyod 'du ba dang// gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// zhi bas
bdag gi gzugs bzung la// dal bus o~M zhes bsdus pa yis// bdag gi lus la gzud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar

bsgom// de nyid ngag lam kun khengs par// swA~M gyi tshogs su rab tu bsgom// lus nyid swA~M kyi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog ser po'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag

zhugs la// swA~M zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// nor mang blon po yid mdzangs la// blo rno snga bas longs spyod 'dud// de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing// gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi lus las
'byung 'dod na// rgyas pas bdag gi gzugs bzung la// dal bus swA~M zhes brjod pa yis// bdag gi lus la tshud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs bcu
gang bas gsal 'bar bsgom/ de nyid ngag la lus khengs par// A~MHgyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid A~MHgyi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog dmar po'i tshon phye
yis// de yi snying nang bdag gzhugs la// A~MHzhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// rgyal mo zhang blon dbang chen dang// ci 'dod yid bzhin dbang du 'gyur// de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing// gnas par dga'
ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi gzugs las 'byung 'dod na// dbang gis bdag gi gzugs bzung la// dal bus A~MHzhes brjod pa yin// bdag gi lus la tshud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya

nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid ngag lam lus khengs par// hA~M gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid hA~M yi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs

bzung nas// kha dog ljang gu'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// hA~M zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// las kyi rigs chen gang 'dod gzugs// dmag mang mthu dpung go mtshon bzang// zhe sdang
can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur// 'dod chags can rnams 'du ba dang// nga rgyal chen po 'dud par 'gyur// de yi bstan pa 'dzin par byed// de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing// gnas par dga' ba bzhin du
'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// snyoms pas khro yi gzugs bzung la// dal bus ha~M zhes brjod pa yis// mi snang ba yi gzugs su 'char// bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur// gling

ngam dur khrod gnas rnams su// nga yi 'dod pa chos dbang gis// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor mchog 'dzin la// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i sems can gyi don

ched du de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dpal nyid kyi mchog rigs kyi yum// dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin

brlabs mU~M du brtags// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// mU~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las// de zla'i ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/ shes rab
yum dang ldan par bsgom// lam du zhugs la de lus dgang// de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// de bzhin rigs rnams o~M du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar
gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun par rnam par bsam// brtan pa AHyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid
bzhin yi ge'i sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya shin tu gsal ba na// nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin par bsgrags// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun pa'i grangs// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// lcags kyu mchog gi
phyag rgya bcing// des ni 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur// rang bzhin sku gsung 'dus ma byas// gzhan dbang ma yin rdo rje rigs// dpal ldan rdo rje sgyu 'phrul yum// shin tu chos kyis bsgrags pa la// gsal bar

'dod pa smra bya ba// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngar byin brlabs lA~M du brtags// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// lA~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgoms// sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyor ba las// rgyal
ba thams cad byin gyis rlob// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang bzhin mchog gi gzugs bcas nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs
te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzum thabs yin// sbubs nas zhugs la de lus dgang// de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// rdo rje rigs rnams hU~M du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs
kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun par shin tu bsam// brtan pa hA yi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid
las// yid bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun pa'i grangs// sgom dang bzlas dang mngon sum na// lcags kyu'i stangs kyis bskul bar
gsungs// rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya yis// rigs dang mthun pa'i 'phro 'du bsgom// yon tan sku gsung yid bzhin gter// dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul mchog chen mo// chas shing bsgregs pa'i gzugs brnyan

ni// ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la// dbab pa mchog gi las bya ba// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs o~M du brtags// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// o~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams
bsgom// sangs rgyas me yi sbyor ba las// rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis rlob// de nyid mtha' bral mi dgyes las// yon tan gter gyi gzugs bcas na// sangs rgyas rin chen tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang
ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzum thabs yin// spubs su zhugs la de lus dgang// de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// rin chen rigs rnams swA~M du bsgom// snod
gnas bde ldan khengs gyur pa// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun par shin tu bsam// brtan pa swA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs
ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun pa ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// dam

tshig zhags pa mchog gis bcing// rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhi// rigs dang 'du 'phro mthun par bsgom// gso dang gsad dang pham dang rgyal// gzhan du 'gro dang 'dug pa dang// ci 'dod 'ong dang smra
yang rung// mtshon dang 'jigs pa mang ba dang// bcings pa'i las dang mtshon las thar// dpal ldan pad+ma mchog gi yum// bde chen gar dbang gzugs 'dzin pa// dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan

ni// ljon pa'i lcug phran la sogs la// dang por gnas lnga byin gyis brlabs// de nas gnas lnga shes rab bsgom// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// las bzhi 'bru bzhi ba~M du brtags// de nyid goms las

gsang mtshan pa// ba~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas chu yi sbyor ba las// rdo rje gsung rnams byin gyis rlob// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rdo rje gsung gi gzugs bcas nas// sangs
rgyas gsung chen tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang// de goms blo bde
gsal spro thim// ming dang snying po bcas pas dgug/ rdo rje gsung rnams o~M du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la
sogs// rigs dang mthun par shin tu bsam// brtan pa o~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// chos dbang yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya
gsal bar nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// chags pa'i lcags sgrog mchog gis bcing// chags pa chen po'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa

nyid du bsgom/ zhi ba dbang dang drag po rgyas// ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsngags// dpal ldan 'grub pa sgyu 'phrul ba// dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// ljon pa mchog dang 'bring rnams la// spyi gtsug kha

dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs hA~M du brtags// de ni e yi tshogs yin te// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// me yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid steng gi lha rnams te// bdag med
mtha' bral mi dmigs las// don yod ngang tshul de bzung nas// don yod mchog gi tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rgya gram byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs

yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang// rgya gram mtshon gyis khengs pa dang// so so'i snying pos ming yang dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// rdo rje la la rnams hA~M bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs

gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// brtan pa hA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa

med pa'i sems nyid las// grub pa sgyu 'phrul sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum ni// dgyes pa gar gyi gsung snyan

cing// rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// phyogs su 'gro dang dbrog pa dang// tshe bstung ba dang las rnams dang// mngon sum ci 'dod smra ba'i mchog/ rigs kyi yum
dang rtsen par 'gyur// srid pa las 'phags mya ngan 'das// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod pas rnam par smin pa'i tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan nyid du mkhyen to// mkhyen
nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo// a hoHbsam bya bsam par zin pa yi// bsam pas mi zin bsam mi khyab// bsam yas
lhun gnas mi g.yo dpag med bsam mi khyab// rgyu dang 'brel pa'i rkyen du shes pa'i dbyings nyid zad mi shes// ngo mtshar srid lam mtha' bral dmigs med pa// de nyid yon tan mchog gi 'khor lo lam
mchog yin// a hoH/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas che ba'i yon tan ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas

bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i sgyu 'phrul chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba cho ga dang bcas pa 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung

ngo// dbab pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnams// kha dog grangs bcas ma brlams pas// shes pa blo che khongs yangs la// zab par spyod la mi skyo bar// zas srung gos rjes dam zas sbyin// dung chen snod du chu

yis bsing// rten du rung bar ting 'dzin dang// dbang dang sgrub pa mchog kyang bstan// mi smra gsang ba'i dam tshig dbog/ o~M dang mU~M gyi blo bstan nas// gsang bas mtshan ma lnga nas sbyang// sgyu 'phrul dkyil

'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// phung po khams dang skye mched sbyar// longs spyod lnga ldan mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje ngag lam gsung chen bzlas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dzI na o~M/ o~M badzra ku la hU~M badzra/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta swA~M

rat+na swA~M/ o~M pad+ma ta thA hr-i da ya A ro lika/ hA pradz+nyA hA~M/ d+hA twI shwa ri mU~M/ dwe Sha ra ti lA~M/ mo ha ra ti A~M/ rA ga ra ti pA~M/ badzra ra ti tA~M/ mU~M mU~M mU~M/ lA~M lA~M lA~M/ A~MHA~MHA~MH/ pA~M pA~M pA~M/ tA~M tA~M tA~M/ e ba~M ma ya/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra

dzra dzra dzra dzra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ s+t+wa~M hoHzhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas par dam tshig thams cad kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang

gsung dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma chen mo dang/ spyan chen mo dang/ mA ma kI chen mo dang/ gos dkar mo chen mo dang/ dam tshig 'phags ma sgrol ma chen po'i rang bzhin nyid du kun tu
snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das

dpal kun tu bzang pos sgyu 'phrul chen po'i byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo// sgeg mo
mchod pa byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs ya nyid sbyin// de nyid pad+ma'i
dkyil 'khor yin// de nyid goms la gsang mtshan pa// ya yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid hU~M gi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas

rdo rje tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang// rdo rje tshon gyis khengs pa dang/ so so'i snying po

ming yang bod// de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// ming yang snying po bcas pas dgug/ rdo rje lha rnams hU~M du bsgom// snod nas sgeg mo khengs gyur bar// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying
po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsam// brtan pa hA yi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sprin tshogs

bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing// rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa

nyid du bsgom// rin chen phreng ba'i byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs e nyid sbyin// de nyid
pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor yin// de nyid goms nas gsang mtshan pa// e yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid swA~M gyi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung
nas// sangs rgyas rin chen tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rje byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang// rin chen tshon gyis khengs

pa dang// so so'i snying pos mi yang dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// rin chen lha rnams swA~M du bsgom// snod gnas phreng ba khengs gyur bar// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po
gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsam// brtan pa swA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas rin chen sprin tshogs

bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing// rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa
nyid du bsgom// pad+ma'i dbyings kyi byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs ba~M du

brtags// de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de nyid goms la gsang mtshan pa// ba~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid a~M gyi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul

de bzung nas// sangs rgyas pad+ma tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang// pad+ma'i tshogs kyis

khengs pa dang// so so'i snying pos ming nas dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// pad+ma'i lha rnams o~M du bsgom// snod gnas dbyangs ma khengs 'gyur bar// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag

rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// brtan pa hA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas pad+ma'i sprin tshogs

bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing// rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa

nyid du bsgom// gar mkhan las kyi byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs ma nyid sbyin// de
nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// ma yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid hA~M gyi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung
nas// sangs rgyas las rnams tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang// las kyi tshogs kyis
khengs pa dang// so so'i snying pos ming nas dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// las kyi lha rnams hU~M du bsgom// snod gnas gar mkhan khengs 'gyur bar// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar

gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// brtan pa hA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas
las kyi sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing// rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya
bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/ lha rnams mngon du snang ba dang// sgo ba sgo ma mang po dang// dus bzhi'i lha mo mchog dbab dang// lha dang klu

yi tshogs bcas las// mngon du smra bar bya bar mthun// rgyal srid dang ni 'khor 'phrog dang// bsdu dang dbang du bya ba dang/ gsad dang bskrad pa'i tshogs bcas dang// bdag 'gro myur du phyin pa dang// nor
'dod pa dang ci bya ba// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// dus med par ni mchod dang phrad// ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad byin bsdu ba'i mchod pa chen por gyur to// gsang

ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las byin bsdu ba dang dam tshig dbab pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thugs rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas dgyes pa chen pos longs spyod chen po rdo rje snying

po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgyu 'phrul chen po'i dam tshig mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung

ngo// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo rnams kyis// nges par bsgom par bya ba ni// rgyal po'i sa 'dzin mchog 'dod pas// gzugs su bri'am rten bcas la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// goms par dzaHnyid mdog
dmar bsgom// de goms gsang nas khong bsdus te// rang lus mdog dmar ngang tshul 'dzin// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs ba~M du brtags// de goms gar gyi dkyil 'khor
bsgom// dzaHzhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing// goms par gsang nas zhugs tshul du// lam nas ngag gi dbang por bsdu// o~M las sangs rgyas tsa na ka/ snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom// ming dang
snying po goms pas dgug/ mngon sum gsal bar gyur pa na// lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi// rjes su chags pa'i mchod pas bsham// yid la goms pa gsal ba na// gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur// blon
po'i sa 'dzin mchod pas bsham// yid la goms pa gsal ba na// gang la bya ba kha dang snying ga mtshan// goms par dzaHnyid mdog dmar bsgom// de goms gsang gnas khong bsdus te// rang lus mdog

dmar ngang tshul 'dzin// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs ba~M du brtags// de goms gar gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ dzaHzhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing// goms par gsang gnas zhugs
tshul du// lam nas ngag gi mchog tu bsdu// A~MHnas sangs rgyas tsa na ka/ snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom// ming dang snying po goms par dgug/ mngon sum gsal bar gyur pa na// lcags kyu la
sogs mtshan pa yi// rjes su chags pa'i mchod par bsham// de la las su stsal ba na// gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// yud tsam rtag par 'dod sgrub rnams// ting

'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// dbang phyug lha chen lha dbang po// rgyal chen phyogs skyong mang po la// chung ma bu mo la sogs mtshan// 'dod spyod dbang bar blo 'chang rnams// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par
'gyur// de yi dgos pa thams cad pa// ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur// ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad rab tu g.yos kun tu gsal bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i

longs spyod chen po kun tu snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po dam tshig gi mchod

pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid du snang
bar gyur to// gdug pa'i las klu'i tshogs 'dul bar gyur nas sgrub pa chen po la mos pa'i ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// klu'i tshogs rigs gnyis pa dang// rigs gsum pa dang// rigs tha dad pa

dang// phyogs gnyis pa las 'khor du byas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas khengs pa'i gnas su nyid kyi bsnyen pa che chung la ma gtogs pa yid la dga' ba ci byas kyang mi 'grub cing bar chad byed par 'gyur ba'i
phyir gegs bsal ba lnga pa zhes bya ba 'di 'thon par gyur pa 'di ched du gsungs so// sgrub la 'dug pa mi gnas dang// sa gzhi bdag tu dbang ba dang// sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams ci yod pa// gdug pa'i sbrul
rnams bsal ba dang// 'khor du gtogs pa mang nyung la// gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing// ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la// gdug pas gnas par mi 'gyur phyir// lnga pa zhes ni rab tu
bsngags// bdag gis gdug par mchod pa'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting 'dzin las// bdag nyid gdug pa'i mthing gnag mdog/ lag na zhags pa ut+pal 'dzin// mgo la gdengs ka sbrul chen bcu// nyi
shu brgya'am stong dang khri// bsam yas dag gi sbrul chen po// kha dog nag po lce gsum 'bar// gdug pa klu yi tshogs mangs pas// 'khor mang 'jigs brjod skyi bung bas// mchog tu phyag rgya 'di bca'
bya// mi bskyod rin chen yig 'bru rnams// phral te go ran byas pa na// gdug pa sbrul gyis 'og tu gding// nA ga pu kal nA ga phaT ces brjod// 'di la goms par gang brtsom pas// nga yi cha lugs 'di
bzung na// me lce'i tshogs la phung po bzhin// rgyal po chen po'i rgyal chen por// kun la snang bar gsal gyur nas// rang dbang med par 'bros pa dang// de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// sa
la bdag tu bya ba ni// thog mar sa gzhi rab mnyam ste// o~M dang mu~M gyi tshogs kyis dgang// rin chen pho brang dkyil 'khor las// 'jug pa'i lha tshogs dkyil 'khor bsgom// de la gshog pa rab brkyang

ste// rdo rje thal mo drag tu rdab// o~M badzra kro d+ha du na mu ne du nA gats+tsha/ de nas yig 'bru shin tu gshig/ de nas yig 'bru tha ma bsgreng// de nas yig 'bru 'phral bskyed pa// nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung ste// sa gzhi
mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de la shin tu dngangs 'gyur te// phyogs bcu kun tu 'bros par 'gyur// de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// 'khor du gtogs pa nga yi 'khor// 'khor mang ji snyed mchog
byed pa// gdug pa mang pos gnod bsgrub phyir// rdzas la mes ni rab sbar nas// nga yi snying pos brjod nas 'byung// de la yig 'bru drug brjod na// de la gnod par mi nus shing// gdug pas mchod cing
bkur bar 'gyur// de yi nad rnams sos par 'gyur// mngon sum snang ba'i gzugs brnyan dang// mchog dang tha ma 'bring rnams la// gdug pa'i tshogs kyis zhen pa ni// snying gar a~M gyi 'bru rnams te// kha
dog dmar po 'bar ba'i nang// gzugs su snang ba kun bzhun te// thub pa'i ngang tshul de bsgoms nas// rin chen yig 'bru yi ge bsam// de la rab tu 'jigs par brkyang// yi ge dang po tha ma mig/ a~M gyi
tshogs su 'bar ba gzhan// mi bskyod nyid mas be con 'chang// thod pa'i dbyig par chas nas ni// lce la sngags ni dran pa yis// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur zhing// gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul 'gyur

te// phyogs bcu kun tu 'bros par 'gyur// de la mchod dang bran du 'gyur// o~M mu ne pad+ma sa ma yo gi hU~M hU~M dza dza/ 'di la goms par gang brtson pas// nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung nas// bkur gnas mchod pa
byed pa dang// sgrub pa thams cad myur bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs kyi gdug pa'i las 'dul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos 'byung po'i tshogs zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'di'i ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las// tshom bu gnyis kyi

lha rnams bsgom// nga nyid 'dug pa'i gnas bshams te// lo dang zla ba gsum dang lngar// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang// rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen// rdzas la
tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas// khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal// rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan bgrad mche

gtsigs sdang mig 'bar// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa na// de yi snying po bzlas nas ni// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de ltar 'grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// gang
la dmigs pa'i mdun dag tu// bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni// lce la drag tu phaT ces brjod// brgyal 'gyur a~M nas dmar rtsi dbab// de las hU~M zhes bya ba yid// dang po'i gnas su 'dus pa
na// mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las// tshom bu gnyis kyi lha rnams bsgom// nga nyid 'dug pa'i gnas bshams te// lo dang zla ba gsum lnga bdun// de yi dung

chen gang ba dang// rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen// rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams

nas// khro bo chen po gshin rje rgyal// gshin rje khros pa'i rgyal mor sbyor// rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig par// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom// shig shig
drag tu gyur pa na// de yi snying po bzlas nas kyang// o~M zhes pas ni rked par gcad// des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom// sa las gser dang chu las sa// yid dang 'thad pa nyid du ni// ji bzhin ji bzhin
'grub par 'gyur// de las 'dod pa bzhin du nges// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na// dbu gsigs sdang mig drag pos blta// o~M
gyi rtse mor phaT ces brjod// brgyal 'gyur o~M las dmar rtsi dbab// ngag las a~M zhes bya bas ni// bzlas brjod bcas de bdag nyid bstim// de nas 'dod pa bzhin du nges// de bsnyen nyams su len pa
yin// de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum la// bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni// o~M las drag tu phaT ces pas// brgyal 'gyur a~M las dmar rtsi dbab// de las hU~M

zhes bya ba yis// dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na// 'tsho bar 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon rdzogs pa// byang chub mchog gi kun ngo bo// phyag rgya bzhugs yun la sogs pa// gcig bu cha
yi ting nge 'dzin// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang// rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen// rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// rtags dang mngon du gyur par
ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas// khro bo chen po rta mchog dpal// rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig bar// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs

bsgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa na// de yi snying po bzlas nas kyang// o~M zhes bya bas rked par gcad// des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom// sa las gser dang chu las sa// yid dang 'thad pa ji lta ba// ji
bzhin ji bzhin grub par nges// de la 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de yi grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na// dbu gsigs sdang mig drag pos
blta// a~M las drag tu phaT ces pas// brgyal 'gyur o~M las dmar rtsi dbab// de las hU~M zhes bya ba yid// dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na// mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul chen po de
nyid las// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams pa// khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil// bdag nyid rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig bar// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs
bsgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa las// mgyogs par phyogs su song ba na// de yi snying po mchog bzlas nas// hU~M zhes pas ni bskul ba yis// dang po'i gnas su phyin par byed// des ni dbang du gyur par
bsgom// de las sna tshogs ci 'dod par// thams cad thams cad grub par 'gyur// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// o~M la drag tu phaT ces pas// gang la bya ba mngon bsam nas// se gol snol mar
gtogs pa yis// brgyal 'gyur o~M las dmar rtsi dbab// yid la bsgoms pas langs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po rab tu rgyal bar byed pa dam tshig mchod

bkod pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ phyogs skyong bar gyur pa sde
dpon dang chung mar bcas/ bran dang g.yog dang yang g.yog gi rab tu 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis gus par dam bcas shing// rang rang gi dkyil 'khor dang/ snying po zhes bya ba 'di mgrin gcig

tu yang smras so// dregs pa 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor dang// lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor g.yog bye ba drug cu rnams// keng rus gsar rnying gnas su gyur// rlon pa sha khrag tshogs la spyod// thod

par 'thung za med pa'i nang// mdung thung ral gri dgra sta dang// zhags pa dbyig pa zor ba dang// lnga dang lda ldi khrag 'thor zhing// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun gyis bskor// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di
rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bsgoms te// rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de bran bzhin du bdag cag bgyid// de yi dgos pa ci yang rung// ma
lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// 'dug nas snying po 'di bzhin dbul// o~M kha~M d+hU ha swA hA/ dbang phyug lha chen dkyil 'khor dang// lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor g.yog bye ba brgyad cu
stong// me tog sil ma bkram pa dang// ras stan 'phar ma mang po dang// rin chen bcal dang brdung ba dang// rol mo glu gar rab tu snyan// rin chen khang pa'i gnas su ni// lha mo mang por bdag spyod
cing// rin chen snod du bdag cag 'thung// gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen me tog la sogs dang// lha yi me tog phyogs su 'thor// lha yi
tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bris te// rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de la bran bzhin bdag cag
bgyid// gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang// de yi dgos pa ci yang rung// ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// de gzugs ston cing gda' bar bgyid// o~M sarba de bA ma hA u pa ha// rgyal po rnam thos

yul 'khor srung// 'khor tshogs stong phrag mang po yi// lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni// 'khor g.yog stong phrag bye ba brgya// me tog sil mar bkram pa dang// rgyan mang byug pa gcal bkram pa// sde dpon nyi
shu bye ba rnams// ci legs par ni rab tu smra// rim pa che zhing sri zhu gus// mchod par byed cing lugs mchis pa'i// bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags// rin chen bcal dang 'thung ba dang// rol mo glu
gar snyan pas brgyan// rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing// bzhon pa dmag mangs 'khor bar mchis// rin chen snod du chang 'thung ba// gdugs kyis brgyan par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pas
ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen me tog phyaugs su 'thor// rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// dri za med pa'i bdag po dang// dbang ldan rlung gi bdag po rnams// 'di bzhin gus par bdag cag
bgyid// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du bris nas kyang// rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid// gtsug tu
